81a6(rgyud): pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje nga ro dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ 
81a7(rgyud): po rdo rje tog ces bya ba dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang
81a8(rgyud): dgra bcom pa/ zag bzang ba/ sring par kun tu sbyor ba zang ba/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang/ tshe 'drul bsam
81b1(rgyud): gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob bo// lta ba chags pa meng pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon des
81b2(rgyud): par bsogs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka bi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang cha
81b3(rgyud): dang ldan pa mo'u ngagal gyi ba chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga'i byang dang / tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / 
81b4(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha'i bu dbang byug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang mo'i ris kyi lci
81b5(rgyud): bu grangs meng dpag tu med pa gnal du med pa dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha bu tshangs pa bzang po la sogs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i
81b6(rgyud): rnams dang / lde'i bu rab 'bab bral g.yog 'bab bral gyi lha'i ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongasu dag ba ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byung
81b7(rgyud): dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lnga'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lA ma yin gyi dadang po thags bzangs ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sim dang / sgra gcan dang / rna
81b8(rgyud): snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lnga ma yin gyi dbang po tshang med grang mang dpag tu mang ba rnams dang / k+Sha'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / ma dros pa dang / 'dzag pa dang / nor rgyas
82a1(rgyud): kyi bu dang / dang skyong dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / mtha' yas dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po cheng med grangs med dpag tu
82a2(rgyud): med pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug pung lta ba dri za'i rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngag
82a3(rgyud): 'chang gis rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po'i g.yog du ma can dang / na mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig na mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i gas
82a4(rgyud): du ma can/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang / gan da spyir gyi rgyal po lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal ba'i
82a5(rgyud): g.yog du ma dang / 'brog ma bu lnga brgya la g.yog can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / sring mo chen mo bdun dang / drang srong chen po bdun dang / bar sAng la rgyu ba
82a6(rgyud): skar dang / gza'i lha thams cad dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang / bgegs rnams
82a7(rgyud): dang / log 'dren rnams dang / yi dgas dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang / 
82a8(rgyud): bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / ma'i lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang / dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa chog
82b1(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum drag du ma'i 'khor can dang / sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / phreng ba can dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen
82b2(rgyud): bo dang / sprin tal dang / log 'dren dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb kyi lha drug cu dang / sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang / ma bdun
82b3(rgyud): dang / rdo rje lcags kyu can dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje po nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag bzang dang / gtsug gis 'gro rdo rje'i rigs kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas
82b4(rgyud): pa dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang sangasargyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang // klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'
82b5(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen bo dang / 'byung po dang / yi dag sa dang / sha za dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byeng dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzir bcas dang / 
82b6(rgyud): gnon po tshad med dpag tu meng grangs med pa rnams dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla ba dang / dus tshogs kyi lha dang / nub ka'i lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / gnam
82b7(rgyud): sa'i lha thams cad dang yang thabs gcig// de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin tu bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni shin tu yong su mthar phyim/ 
82b8(rgyud): bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs ni shin tu yongasu rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / byang chub chen po dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sa brnyas pas ni shin
83a1(rgyud): tu yongasu bzung / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 'bar ba sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis ni sku rgyun/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus ni yan lag dang / nying lag thang
83a2(rgyud): rnam par spras// spyi gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong / bdud kyi tshar ma thams cad ni bkrugs// de kho na nyid mkhyen pa nyid ni rim par thugasu chud/ spyan
83a3(rgyud): rnam pa lnga ni mnga'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i mchog dang ni ldan/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni ldan// bdud dang
83a4(rgyud): phas kyi rgol ba dang / ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ brjod pa'i sgra dang tshe gsu bcad pa ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang / sang+ga'i sgras
83a5(rgyud): ni sgrog/ ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu ga sal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs me da dpag tu med par sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod
83a6(rgyud): pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / babs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dka' ba spyad pas mngon par grub
83a7(rgyud): pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum su rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku brgyan pas ni mdzes shing rin po che rdo rje'i pad+mo'i snying pos seng ge'i khri la ni bzhugs
83a8(rgyud): te/ gdon rin po che dang / rdo rje'i pad+ma'i seng+ga khri ri rab tsam rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / mu tig dang ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sil sil sgra 'byung ba/ rdo rje dang rin po chedu
83b1(rgyud): / ma'i stegs bu la rtsa ba legs par brten pa/ rdo rje dang rin po tshe du ma'i chu srin gyi kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba dang ldan pa'i snam rten dang bcas pa/ rin po tsha du
83b2(rgyud): ma'i pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa'i rin po cho ke ke ru dang / ka ka ru chen po dang / an da rnyil dang / mngon ka chen po dang / du nu las du ma'i 'od zer 'bar bas snang bar gyur pas
83b3(rgyud): kun tu mdzes pa/ rin po che dang / rdo rje'i thur mas rgyan pa'i gdugs yu bas bstod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas grib mar bsgribs shing bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam
83b4(rgyud): kyi shing du mas mdzes par byas pa rgya che ba la bzhugs te/ gser gyi ri bo ltar dpal gyis 'bar ba/ nyi ma ste dra pas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byor pas sa phyog
83b5(rgyud): mdzes par gyur pa/ zla ba nye ba lngar 'jag rten kun gyis mthong na dga' ba/ dpag bsams kyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi
83b6(rgyud): yang dag par rgyas par chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ theg mar dge pa/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dag pa/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa
83b7(rgyud): yongasu dag pa/ yongasu dkar ba yang dag par ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu ston pa/ 
83b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po byung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba nges stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas gsal bar byas par gyur to// bang+gang+gi
84a1(rgyud): klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang snang ba nges gsal bar snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag/ 
84a2(rgyud): na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang seng ge'i khri du ma bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang rnams na chos ston to// nyan thos chen po
84a3(rgyud): ngag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dang thabs gcig// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / 
84a4(rgyud): dri dang / lha ma yin dang / ma mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang yang thabs pa cig go// de dag thams cad kyang rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i rtse
84a5(rgyud): mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs yang / dag par rab tu ston to// de dag thams cad kyang kun tu sna // skad cig de la sems can de dag thams cad bde ba
84a6(rgyud): thams cad kyis tshim par gyur to// 'on pa rnams ni smra boso// long ba rnams ni mig thob bo// smon pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed do// nad pa rnams ni sos par gyur to// sbrum ma rnam
84a7(rgyud): ni bde bar bcaso// sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnams ni med par gyur to// yud tsam de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi skye gnas dang / 
84a8(rgyud): gang shin rje'i 'jig rten rnams kyis ming yang mi grag par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi bar gang dag mun pa mun nag dang / mun pa mun nag chen por 'dug pa de dag thams cad
84b1(rgyud): / gsal bar snang bar gyur to// der ni sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad dang / sems can gzhan 'dir skyes pa rnams kyang gcig gis gcig she so// de nas sem
84b2(rgyud): de dag thams cad kyis ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi dga' ba thob ste mchog gis tshim par gyur nas kun tu bltas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa sa
84b3(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ste de dag gis gser gyi mchod sdong ltar dpal gyis 'bar zhing rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par 'phags pa de mthong nas de nyid
84b4(rgyud): la skyabs dong ngo // skyabs dong ma thag tu de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid du bdag son pa snyam du shes so// snang ba des
84b5(rgyud): bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'ab ra rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gci ga tu gyur par kun tu snang ngo // bdud kyi ris kyi lha de
84b6(rgyud): ngag kyang skad cig de la nyam thag pa'i sgrar du zhig skrag nas byer ro// bdud sdig can yang bzhin bzang po nI rI por gyur cing lus rdul nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thang la
84b7(rgyud): smras pa/ grogs po dag bdud kyi khyim thams cad kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu mchod cing 'bar te me lci gcig tu gyur pa dang / dge sbyong go'u ta ma ri rab kyi
84b8(rgyud): rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na chos bstan pa 'di la ltos// nges bdag cag phung ngo // bo btsam so// phyogs gang na ga su gtol ma // longs la dge sbyong go'u tu mdo/ 
85a1(rgyud): gan du drong ste bdud kyi yul 'di thal bar byas par ma gyur gyi bar du gzhom mo// de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu de dag thams
85a2(rgyud): cad kyis rje bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes smras nas/ rang rang gi gnasu dong ste/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs can/ lus la gi cha sna tshogs pa/ cha byang dang / rgyan sna tshogs ca
85a3(rgyud): mche ba mi bzang par 'jig su rung ba bzhin mi sdug par bsgyur ba/ mig dang / bzhin dang / skra kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba dag skad cig ngo nyid la gcig tu 'dus nas
85a4(rgyud): bdud sdig can ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smraso// bzhengs bzhengs bog mar bzhud la ji tsam du dge sbyong go'u ta ma nyan
85a5(rgyud): thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' dag dun dang bcas pa de ci nas kyang phyis bdag cag gi yul du/ gnod pa cung zad kyang mi bskyed pa dang / bdag cag gi
85a6(rgyud): yul gnod par mi 'gyur bar dang nyid du phye mar brlag go// rnam par gzhom mo// ngo nas bdud sdig can dga' zhing mgu ste shin tu dga' bas spri'i khung bu khyab nas skad cig
85a7(rgyud): de nyid la bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / bdud kyi sde chen pos bar snang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir
85a8(rgyud): khyab par byas te/ dung dang / rnga dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / rgyud gtsigs pa dang / lcags kyi sil dkrol dang / rnga bo che brdung zhing hu hu zhes bya ba dang / pi tsi zhes bya ba dang zug
85b1(rgyud): shig zung shig/ song cig song cig ces bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing gshol dang / gtun shing dang / gtur rked nyeg dang / phur bu dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang / mnga' bo che dang / 
85b2(rgyud): mdung thung dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang / mnga' la sogs pa'i tshon cha lag na bogs shing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste skad
85b3(rgyud): cig ngo nying la a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshom cha thams cad kyi char phab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus mtshom tshad dag thams cad
85b4(rgyud): me tog gi gdags kyi sprin chen por gyur bar snang ngo // bdud kyi sgra de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / yang
85b5(rgyud): dag par 'gro ba'i sgra rnamasu grag go// dung sdig can ni zhags pa lnga'i bcing bas bdag nyid ba cings par mthong ngo // de nas bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu
85b6(rgyud): ngag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ngo mtshar chen po de mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur cing dga' ba thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de nyid la skyabs
85b7(rgyud): su dong ngo // bdud sdig can ni bdag nyid dgrol bar 'dod na 'grol ma nus te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi khyab su bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar shing rtsa ba nas
85b8(rgyud): bcad pa de bzhin du rdo rje'i 'khor gyi khyams chen po 'gyel to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe byams pa chen po'i thugs dang / thugs rje chen pos brnyan pa'i
86a1(rgyud): spyan gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khams thams cad du gzigs nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
86a2(rgyud): bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'di 'khor gyi khyams 'di nas slong la stan la zhog ste/ rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i
86a3(rgyud): ting 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs bsam gyis mi khyab par bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byeng pa zhes bya ba gang gis bdud
86a4(rgyud): ris kyi lha'i bu 'di dag dang / bdud sdig can 'di sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'dong ba dang / gzhan yang gang dag sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / yi/ 
86a5(rgyud): dgas dang / brjed byed dang / 'byung ba dang / don dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin pa ces dang / gnon po dang / za su bcas pa za ba la
86a6(rgyud): sogs pa sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma gus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid
86a7(rgyud): khong du ma chud pa de dag thams cad gang gis 'dzud pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro bar byed pa yang ston cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngan 'gro log par ltung
86a8(rgyud): bar 'gro ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mnyan nas/ rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan
86b1(rgyud): las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la gcugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log su thal mo sbya
86b2(rgyud): ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshig su bcad pa'ang dag gis mngon par bstod do// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs pa// gzhig pa'i slang du 'dren
86b3(rgyud): bar byung / khyod ni bdud rnams kun las rgyal// 'jig rten rtsa lag gcig pu khyod// thar pa'i grong khyer 'jug pa'i lam// ye shes ma lus khyod cig pus// yang
86b4(rgyud): ngag bsres nas thugs rje yis// snyan pa'i gsung gis bstan pa mdzad/ khyod sngon sbyin dang tshul khrim sa dang / bzod dang brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang / 
86b5(rgyud): rab la sogs yon tan gyis// bdag maHnga slar kyis sems can bcud // khyod kyis chos rnams sku med par// bshad cing de bzhin rnams phye yang // 'gyu
86b6(rgyud): dog pa ma mchis pa// kye ma mgon po khyod kyis bshad// 'khor lo yan lag bcu gnyis pa// khyod nyid mkhyen nas rab tu bskor/ mu stegs can dang bdud datul te// 
86b7(rgyud): chos kyi snang ba gsal bar mdzad// nyon mongs brag chen rnams kun tu// ye shes rdo rjes rab bcom nas// sus kyang thob par ma gyur pa'i// byang chub bla na med pa ba
86b8(rgyud): gang gi mtshan yang rdzogs pa yi// byang chub sa bon nyid 'gyur ba// khyod ni 'jig rter mchog gcig pa/ dam pa rab sbyin bdag po lags// khyod ni mgon pa
87a1(rgyud): khyod ni pa// khyod skyabs khyod ni dpung gzhan lags// thugs rje chen po ye shes nyid// mya ngan 'das nas gcig pu khyod// khyod nyi
87a2(rgyud): gshegs nas sems can rnams// sems can dmyal las rnam par dkrol// rang gi sku yang yongs btang nas// khyod kyis srog chags rnams kyang bsrungs
87a3(rgyud): lus can kun gyis ma thob pa'i// ye shes khyod kyis brnyas gyur nas// grol te 'jig rten rnams kyang grol// kye ma khyod ni rtsa lag bzang // mgon po khyod kyi
87a4(rgyud): 'od zer gyi// dra ngas 'jig rten khams khyab ste// mya ngan 'das las lhag pa bde// lus can ku dan gyis thob par mdzad// khyod kyi 'od kyi gzis bcu
87a5(rgyud): pas// gza' rnams kun dang dgung zla dang / gzugs rnams dang ni zhugs rnams dang // nor bu lam mer ma gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag
87a6(rgyud): po lag na rdo rjes tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas yang rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug ste/ 
87a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das legaso zhes gsol nas rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byud pa zhes bya ba la/ 
87a8(rgyud): snyoms par zhug so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par
87b1(rgyud): byed pa zhes bya ba 'di la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos// kun tu ra
87b2(rgyud): tu g.yos te/ shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dma'o// nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'// lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma'o// byang phyogs mthon
87b3(rgyud): lho phyogs dma'// steng mtho na 'og dma'o// 'og mtho na steng dma' bar gyur to// phyogs thams cad dang / phyogs mtshoms thams cad kyang dga' ba dang yid
87b4(rgyud): bang ba skyes par gyur nas/ lham me lham ne// ljang nge'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjeyan lag nga nying lag gi mtshams thams cad
87b5(rgyud): nas rdo rje kun tu 'bar ba/ rab tu 'bar ba/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba/ me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag byung bar kun tu snang ngo // rdo rje 'bar
87b6(rgyud): snang ba nges phyogs bcu'i 'jig rter gyi khams tshad med grangs mang dpag tu med pa ji skad pa dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag nga ltar bzhugs
87b7(rgyud): ta 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thogs mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba kha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ 
87b8(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa/ yong su dag pa/ yongasu byung ba/ yang dag par ston pa/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub songa'i dge 'dun dang bcas par
88a1(rgyud): ngag gi 'khor gyi khyams rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag na yang kun tu snang ngo // byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
88a2(rgyud): gi spyan snga na/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba rgya chen po nges snang bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la so sor zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba rgya chen
88a3(rgyud): po kun nas ganga' ba 'di su'i lags/ de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis so so'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ri
88a4(rgyud): kyi bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bdam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na ri rab
88a5(rgyud): kyi steng na chos ston te/ bcom ldan 'das nges bdud sdig can zhags pa'i bcing ba lngas bcings te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gyel pa gzigs ma
88a6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe' chen po gsang ba po'i bdage po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba la 'di skad du/ gsang ba pa'i bdage bo lagan rdo rje khyod kyis rang gi rdzu 'phrul
88a7(rgyud): gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul ston cig ces dka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag 'od ni rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de'i
88a8(rgyud): rdo rje'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i byin gyi brlab so// de skad ces bka' stsal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ 
88b1(rgyud): gnang nas/ rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems
88b2(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
88b3(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ma rdo rjes la mchod pa'i sprin dang / gdugs kyi sprin
88b4(rgyud): dang / rgyan drang go sprin dang / dbu rgyan gyi sprin gyi sprin dang / me tog gi sprin dang / na bza'i sprin chen pos mchod pa chen po byas nas/ ra mkha'i dkyil 'khod
88b5(rgyud): bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ pus mo'i g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i stan la btsugs nas/ 
88b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la logasu lta zhing bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gnang nas rang rang gi rin po che'i pad+ma'i rdo rje'i snyam de dag
88b7(rgyud): la 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje tog ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
88b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying po rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba nga ltar bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes te/ 'di ltar rdo rje ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i
89a1(rgyud): gzungs 'di nyid las brtsams te chos kyang ston to// rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kun nas snang
89a2(rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi khyamasu 'dus te 'dugu/ 
89a3(rgyud): par gyur pa des ngo mtshar de mthong nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba de la/ 
89a4(rgyud): zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'du ra ba'i snang ba 'di lta bu gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang bar gyur / sems can thams
89a5(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad kyi sa sen dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad mi
89a6(rgyud): gda' bar gyur/ lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dong / lA ma yi dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa'i ngag rten na rdzu 'phrul che zhing pha
89a7(rgyud): che bar grags pa thams cad kyang kun nas mchod pa'i sprin chen pos dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ nub phyogasu mchi bar 'da' ba 'di su'i lags// de bzhin gshegs
89a8(rgyud): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad
89b1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu nub phyogs kyi logs na mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
89b2(rgyud): rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje chen po'i ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa na rdo rje chen pa'i ri rab kyi rnga mi'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs
89b3(rgyud): ston to// bcom ldan 'das nges spyi gtsug gi mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po phyung ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po nges 'jig rten gyi khams der bdud sdig
89b4(rgyud): can bskal ma thag tu kun tu khros na sa lha'i bu thams cadadang / gzhan yang bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / dpung gi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan
89b5(rgyud): 'das de la gtse ba'i phyir lhags pa dang / de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi khyams de nyid du zhags pa lnga'i bcings pa
89b6(rgyud): bcings nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spar sngar 'gyel te/ de la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das nges byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag
89b7(rgyud): po lag na rdo rje'i la ston cig par bka' lung byin nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje des rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par
89b8(rgyud): zhugs te/ yan lag dang nying lag gi mtshams thams cad nas rdo rje'i rnams bstan to// 'di ni rdo rje'i de dag nyid rdo rje 'bar ba'i snang ba'o// rigs kyi bu rdo rje 'bar bas
90a1(rgyud): snang ba nges kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnamasu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byam
90a2(rgyud): dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa snang bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag zad kyang bskul/ byang chub se'i de dag gi
90a3(rgyud): 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang bskul bas ngo mthar thob par gyur pa ngag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de ngag la yang sor zhus// 
90a4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu de nyid kyis mthus bac+doMs de ba zhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa ngas rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i spyan snga na 'dug cing bsnyen bkur
90a5(rgyud): byed pa yang mthong ngo // de skad ces bka'/ stsal pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang nga// ga par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu
90a6(rgyud): 'joms pa de la byang chub sems dpa' senga' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der de bzhin gshe
90a7(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje de yang
90a8(rgyud): blta bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'joms
90b1(rgyud): pas/ byang chub se dar senga' chen po rdo rje'i snying po de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ de nas byang chub senga' senga' chen pa/ 
90b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i snying po bcom ldan 'das nges gnang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje'i snying pos rab tu 'jom
90b3(rgyud): ba de la lan bdun bskor bar byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ na mkha'i dkyil gyi lam nas byang chub sed bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu
90b4(rgyud): rtsa dgu dang lhan cig tu byang chub se'i rnam bar 'phrul pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul na pos 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'ang ga la ba der sa
90b5(rgyud): sde byin nas byang chub sems dpa'i de dag thams cad dang lhan cig spro ba na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po bsags pa las grub pas byin pa'i rin po cheng dag las
90b6(rgyud): 'od zer 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang sngon dang / ljang ser dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dang lha dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang gser dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / rdo'i snying po
90b7(rgyud): dang / ke ke ru dang / ki ru chen po dang / a nang rnyil dang / mthon ka chen po dang / dur+ya las dang / go mu ta ra ga dang / mu tig dmar po'i kha chog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis thang dang ldan gyi/ 
90b8(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas te/ steng gau bar snang khyab par byas nas/ lha'i snang bas snang bar byas te/ 'dus nas 'ja' lta bur gyur te/ bcom ldan
91a1(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs mtshan thams cad phun sum tshogs pa/ 
91a2(rgyud): ga mnyen pa/ rab tu gzhon pa/ sha rgyas gasnum pa/ long bu gnyis kyi rtsa mi mngon pa/ pad+ma gsar du kha phye ba lta bu/ dung dang / nya dang / rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu da
91a3(rgyud): pad+ma dang / chu srin ma ka ra'i mtshan dang ldan pa gnyis la lan 'bum phrag du mar bskor ba byas nas nub par gyur to// na mkha'i dkyil na 'od zer re re'i rtse mo las pad+ma bye ba khrag
91a4(rgyud): khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu tshang shing rta'i phang lo tsam pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las byung ba 'di lta ste/ gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dang / an nga rnyil dang / dngul dang / 
91a5(rgyud): byi ru dang / shel dang / ke ka ru dang / dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dag 'thon to// de la gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni anang rnyil gyi rgyu las
91a6(rgyud): byung ba dag go// snying po ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze 'bru ni ke ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// a nang rnyil gyi rgyu
91a7(rgyud): las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab mi ni dngul gyi rgyu las byung ba dag// snying po ni byo gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni kaM ka ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// the 'bru/ 
91a8(rgyud): ni dun las byung ba'o// dngal gyi rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba dgo// snying pa ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni kaM ke rung rgyu las byung / 
91b1(rgyud): ba'o// chub ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// the 'bru ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba go// snying po
91b2(rgyud): ke ke'i ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni dran las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// zhe 'bru ri an nga rnyil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// shal gyi rgyu las
91b3(rgyud): byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni ke ke'i rwa'i rgyu las byung ba dag/ snying po dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ri gser gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni ar nga rnyil gyi rgyu las
91b4(rgyud): byung ba'o// ze 'bru ning ngul gyi rgyu las thung ba'o// kaM ke ru'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni dun las kyi rgyu las byung ba dgo// spring ba ni gser gyi rgyu
91b5(rgyud): las byung ba'o// ze ba ni an nga rol gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ni dal gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze 'bru ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung ba'o// ngur+ya las kyi rgyu las byu
91b6(rgyud): ba'i pad+ma rnams kyi 'dab ma ni gser gyi rgyu las byung ba dag go// snying po ni anang rmil gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// ze ba ni pal gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// chu ba ni byi ru'i rgyu las byung
91b7(rgyud): ba'o// ze 'bru ni shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar rin po che rnam pa du mi'i rgyu las byung ba'i pad+ma dgo// rin po che'i pad+ma ri ra la yang sa bcu la yang rab tu
91b8(rgyud): gnas pa'i byang chub sede'i so 'i chen po kun tu mdzes pa'i spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa nges ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// byang chub seda' re re'i lte ba nas kyang 'di
92a1(rgyud): zer 'bum byung ngo // 'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang rin po che tha~Md kyi rgyu las byung ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor bu dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi stegs
92a2(rgyud): bus bskor ba/ shel gyi rgyu las byung ba'i zla ba sa spras pa'i khang bran gyi rtse mo la sang+ge'i rna ba'i stang na rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan dang / rnar rgyal ba'i ba dan sbyangs pas
92a3(rgyud): na mkha' kun tu khebs pa/ pad+ma rA ga dang / an nga rnyil dang / mar gang dang / bai DU r+ya dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / spug dang / ke ke ru las byas pa'i ka ba chen po'i glang la 'dza sgo chu ba'i ga
92a4(rgyud): gyi shing las gcod pa lta bu'i tshogs pa kong pas rnam par smras te/ mdzes par byas pa/ dngul las byas pa'i phug ron gyi phreng gi mtha' mu tig dmar po dang
92a5(rgyud): ldan pa'i dril bu g.yer ki'i dra ba sbyangs pa 'a sgras sad par gyur nas/ rab tu dga' zhing dregs pa'i phug ron dang / bya bang dang / ne tso dang / ri skags dang / rma ba'i
92a6(rgyud): ngari ngag gis nyams dga' ba/ khyams dang / 'dun khang chen po'i nyo nakor stegs bus bskor bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs las byas pa'i sgo gong
92a7(rgyud): can/ shel gyi rgyu las byas pa'i stegs bu dang ldan pa/ bkra shis kyi gser bum du ma nas chu dri zhim pos chag chag btab pa// rdzing chen po 'gram gyi re'u gsing mar gang
92a8(rgyud): kyi rgyu las byung ba/ ka tsi lin nga'i gos ltar reg na bde bas mdzes pa'i phyogs na/ bde bar nyal ba'i ngang pa dang / khrung khru dang / dranu pa dang / ka lan da ki'i khyu gnas pa/ gser gyi
92b1(rgyud): ma bdal ba'i gtos chen po rin po che sna bdun gyi 'am skas kyis phreng bas rgyan pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongasu gang ba grangs 'bum phrag du mas kun nas sa
92b2(rgyud): bskor ba dag byung ngo // rdzing bu re re nas kyang rin po che'i pad+ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu rtsa dgu byung // rin po che'i pad+ma re re'i snying po la yang sil snyan dang / pheg
92b3(rgyud): rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyi sgra byung bas lha'i bu mo dag glu len gar byed cing yongasu spyod do// sil snyan dang / phag rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgra byung ba de dag las kyang tshig su
92b4(rgyud): bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung // sbyin dang tshul khrims kyis ni gang zhig dpag med cing // de bzhin bzod dang ba rtson 'grus ngag gis stobs ldan la// bsam gtan gyis
92b5(rgyud): ni zhi zhing dbang gis kun 'byor pa// ye shes sgron ma de la skabasu 'dong bar gyis// bsam gyis mi khyab stobs dang smon lam rnams dang ldan// thabs dang byang chub
92b6(rgyud): yan lag ting 'dzin rnams kyi bdag rnam par grol ba'i lam dang stobs bcu ldan pa yi// thub pa gang yin de la mchod phyir 'dong bar gyis// 'dam rdzab nas ni pad+ma rgyas
92b7(rgyud): pa ji bzhin du// gang zhig nyon mongs 'dam gyis rtag par mi gos pa// tshe dang skye ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par bsal ba yi// rgyal ba 'jig rten mgon po de la blta phyir dang / 
92b8(rgyud): gcig kyang mi ldan min par gyur pa gang zhigs// skye dgu rnams kyi gti mug sgo glegs rnams bshig cing // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi spyong pa rab zhi ba// shAkya tog
93a1(rgyud): ldan de la skyabasu 'dong ba gyis// de ltar khang pa brtsegs pa dpag bsam kyi shing ljon pas legs par rgyan pa/ rnam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig
93a2(rgyud): 'bum phrag du ma namakha'i dkyil na kun tu snang ste/ kha cig tu na rin po che'i sprin gyi char 'bab par kunu sdang ngo // kha cig du ni me tog gi gdugs kyi sgron gyi char/ kha cig du ni ga/ 
93a3(rgyud): shir shi'i tsan+da dang / spos dang / byugs pa dang / phye ma'i sprin gyi char// kha cig du gos kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig du ni ka shi ka'i ras dang / du ku li'i ras dang / za 'ug gi sprin gyi
93a4(rgyud): char/ kha cig du ni dpag bsams kyi shing ljon po'i sprin gyi char/ kha cig du ni me tog pad+ma dang / ud pa la dang ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / a di muk+Sha ka
93a5(rgyud): dang / ka tsa lin da dang / ma hA ka tsa lin da dang / bta nga bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po dang / man nga ra ba dang / man nga ra ba chen po'i sprin gyi
93a6(rgyud): char mngon par bab po// me tog gi char de dag las dri gang byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med grangs med pa gang dag gang+gA'i klung gi bye mi'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa
93a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rgyas par khyab po// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na son gang dag 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa de dag thad dri ngas mchog tu bde bas tshim zhing sems dga' bar gyur
93a8(rgyud): te/ sdug bsngal ba dang bral nas phan tshun 'dri ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ byang chub song rdo rje'i snying po byang chub se de'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston pa rgyan ring po nas
93b1(rgyud): mthong // de bang gis de mthong nas kyang phyag 'tshal to// skyes bu dam pa de la phyag 'tshal ma thag tu sems can gang dag ngan 'gro log par ltung bar dong ba de dag kyang mchog tu bde bdang
93b2(rgyud): dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / ngang pa thob nas skad cig de nyid la ngan 'gro log pa ltung ba las grol te sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes nas bar snang la 'khod do// 
93b3(rgyud): de dag gis bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ni rdo rje dang / byang chub sede'i seM
93b4(rgyud): chen po rdo rje'i snying po la mchod pa'i sprin chen pos mchod nas lan 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje 'khor
93b5(rgyud): gyi khyams chen po thams cad ldan pa la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas lnga rnams bar snang las bab sa te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar rang rang gi rin po
93b6(rgyud): gzhal med khang pa brtsegs pa dag na lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu sil snyan dang / phag rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs kyi sgro 'byon cing tshul dang 'dra
93b7(rgyud): ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis bac+doMs la mngon par bstong ngo // gang snang ngan 'gro mchog tu sdug bsngal 'khrugs pa yi// ming yang bde gshegs stobs kyis deng du
93b8(rgyud): med mdzad dang // bsod nams mi ldan sems can rnams la'ang rgyal ba mchog khyams par mdzad pa kye ma ngo mtshar rmad du byung / bdag cag rnams kyi rmongs pa'i rlung / 
94a1(rgyud): bsgrubs pa yi// sdig pa'i las gang shin tu bgying dka' sna tshogs pa// de dag thub pa'i bya dgas de ring glo bur du// skad cig tu ni ji ltar
94a2(rgyud): zhig par 'gyur// ji ltar gdugs kyi mun pa mun nag kun bcom dang / ji ltar zhugs 'bar bas ni ras rnams sreg pa dang // gser mas shing bal ltar yang sprin
94a3(rgyud): 'bor ji bzhin du// de ltar 'gro ba'i sdig pa bde bar gshegs kyis bcom// bang gshegs sras po mthong ngam thos sam drar gyur na// lhan cig skyes dbang 'od zer
94a4(rgyud): drabs sdig 'phrog pa// 'gro ba yongs kyi srid pa'i spros pa zhig pa yi// thugs dang rtag tu ldan zhing sgo bar 'gyur mi mnga'// mig dang mgo dang snying dang sha khrag
94a5(rgyud): tshil rnams dang // srog dang sdug dang bu/ mas rwa ltar bor nas ni// mi mtshungs son don phyir thugs rjes thugs brlan pa// 'jig rten mgon sras dag
94a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// yi dwags lhogs la chu dang ro brgya'i zas rnams dang // de bzhin skye bo nor 'dod snying dang ldan pa la// thugs rje sprod cing rnam pa sna tshogs tshim mdzad pa// 
94a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog de la skyabasu mchi// gang dag mnar med pa yang rab tu bsil mdzad pas// mchog tu che ba'i son dmyal ba'ang bsil bar 'gyur// rang
94a8(rgyud): bang mo gzigs sen brtson thugs ldan pa// 'jig rten mgon sras mnyam med de la phyag 'tshalo// gang dag srid par 'khor ba'i srid pa'i skyon las grol// stong pa gsu
94b1(rgyud): yang las kyi 'bras bu'i 'dor zhing // ye shes me yis rnyog pa bsregs kyang thugs rjes brlan// spyod pa brtag med dbang ldan de la phyag 'tsha lo// kye ma dang ldan rje sa
94b2(rgyud): po bde gshegs sras// mtshan nyid mtshan btab sku las 'od stong mang byung ba'i// dri ba rnams dang sna tshogs glu yis bdag cag sim// skad cig gis ni dmyal sum
94b3(rgyud): ci'i lha dbang gyur// bdag cag rnams kyis rgyal dang rgyal sras rnams ni// de dag rnams kyis gsungs pa mchog tu zhi chos la// gus bstod dge ba rgya cher de ring gang
94b4(rgyud): pa// des myur 'jigs rten thang bdeg she gas thob par shog/ de ltar tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcad dpa rnams kyis bac+doMs la bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das
94b5(rgyud): kyis gnang ste// de dag rang rang gi rin pa tshe'i gzhal med khang gi khang pa brtsegs pa rnams 'kho dang // chos nyan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig tu 'kho // nga
94b6(rgyud): byang chub songab senga' chen po rdo rje snying pos byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu 'di bstanas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
94b7(rgyud): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor glo khyams pa chen po dang ldan
94b8(rgyud): pa la mchod pa'i sprin chen po rnams kyis mchod nas/ ting 'dzin de las langs te bar snang las babs ras// byang chub senga'i so 'a chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu lan// 
96a1(rgyud): 'bum phrag du ma mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la gzugs te/ thugs phrag pa gcig
96a2(rgyud): tu gzar nas bac+doMs la lta'o// rigs kyi bu de dag thaMd kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lha'o// bltas nas kyang sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu bac+doMs
96a3(rgyud): la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod ngo // dran pa'i gzhus 'phangs pa ye shes rab mnga' mang gis// ma 'phangs mthur ldan bdud bzhi pham mdzad ceng
96a4(rgyud): 'jig rten nyon mongs nyen pa'i mun pa gas la mdzad nas// bla ma sprin chen zla ba bzhin du lhung nge'o// dam chos 'od mang gti mug bcom pa'i dra ba yis// 'dul ba'i
96a5(rgyud): pad+ma'i gnas rnams kha phye nas// ye shes na mkha' che la dri med 'bar ba'i gzugs// nyi ma ji bzhin gdung bar bgyi ba'i bdud sde gdungs// mu stegs can gyi
96a6(rgyud): rgyal mtha' dag pham mdzad cing // 'gro ba'i 'dod chags rab gdung ma lus rab zhi mdzad// dge ba'i lo tog rtsi chen yang dag 'phel mdzad pa// dge ba'i char pa phab cing 'brug
96a7(rgyud): ltar bsgrag tu gsol// mgon po mu stegs can gyi wa brgya ma mdzad cing // bdud rnams bcom ste byang chub dam pa rab brnyas nas// ma 'dres bsags pa'i bden pa'i
96a8(rgyud): stobs kyi mthu mnga' ba// skye ba'i 'jigs lam rab grol sing+ge ji bzhin sgrogs// spyod pa zab cing brtan la brtag pas mi dpogs pa// sen gnas gyur stobs dang ting 'dzin nor du/ 
96b1(rgyud): bkram// dri med chos lhun 'dul ba'i ri bo rnams 'dzin pa/ ye shes rgya mtsho mchog khyod smre dgu mchog gcog/ tshul khrims bzang ba'i rtsa ba sbyin pa'i chus btab 'phel// byams
96b2(rgyud): dang bzang ba'i me tog yal ga 'khrungs pas mdzes// byang chub lam gyi yan lag 'gro chags 'dod byas bsten// bsod nams dpag bsams shing khyod de ring ga las byung su
96b3(rgyud): cu rtsa gnyis 'bar ba'i mtshan gyis yan lag rgyan// dpe byang bzang mchog rin chen man shel gyis bskor cing // sa dang dbang dang dam chos phur pa brtan btab pa// lhun po bzhi
96b4(rgyud): bu mi g.yo khyod ni 'gro la mdzes// de nas byang chub senga'i senga' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos/ byang chub sengs sanga' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la nul
96b5(rgyud): dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcang ba 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas/ bac+doMs kyis gnang ste rin po che'i/ pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'gro/ rigs kyi bu
96b6(rgyud): de dag thad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod do// de bzhin du sbyar te de ltar lho phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
96b7(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal byung ba nas byang chub senga' sede'i chen
96b8(rgyud): ba rnga rje'i tog ces bya ba dang / byang chub seMng 'bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor te/ mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di re 'ongs te/ bcom ldan
97a1(rgyud): 'das kyis gnang nas rigs kyi bu de dag dang ldan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du nub phyogs
97a2(rgyud): na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can zhes bya ba de
97a3(rgyud): nas byang chub senga' sanga' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / byang chub seMnga' seMde' chen po mthu chen thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du
97a4(rgyud): mas yangasu bskor te mdun du bdar ba na sa 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom lda na 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'bru
97a5(rgyud): cing / rigs kyi bung dag thad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'kho dpa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'a
97a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos mchog rang bzhin gyis rnam par nges pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba
97a7(rgyud): 'byung ba nas byang chub seMnga' sanga' chen po rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum brag du las yongasu bskor te mdun du bdar nas/ 
97a8(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan par
97b1(rgyud): phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo
97b2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas rab gsal dbang phyug rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams dpal brtsegs nas byang chub serar se 'a chen po blo gras
97b3(rgyud): brtan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor te mdun du byangar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan
97b4(rgyud): 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag
97b5(rgyud): la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du shar lho'i mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang
97b6(rgyud): bo'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams the tsom dang bral ba nas byang chub senga' seMde' chen po blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba byang chub seng
97b7(rgyud): ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor te bdun du bangar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying
97b8(rgyud): la 'dug cing rigs kyi bu de dag thad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyi nga bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar 'a'o// de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs na bac+doMs de bzhinas
98a1(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen stsal gyis rnar gnon pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che brtseg
98a2(rgyud): pa nas/ byang chub se 'a seng 'a chen po rin chen blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sed 'bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor te mdun du bangar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi
98a3(rgyud): mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas chos nyan pa'i phyir byang chub senga' sada' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dag cing rigs
98a4(rgyud): kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin pa che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa/ bar du// de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das
98a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen pad+ma la rab tu gnas/ pa'i ri dbang gi rgyal po sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten
98a6(rgyud): gyi khams pad+ma bkong pa nas// byang chub songang seng 'a chen po na mkha'i blo gros zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor te mdun du
98a7(rgyud): bdar ba nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chan
98a8(rgyud): nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du steng gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/ 
98b1(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bdud kyi tsher ma bkrugs pa nas byang chub sederas pa chen po bdu
98b2(rgyud): sgrib pa las rnam par rgyan pa zhes bya ba byang chub se 'a bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas yongasu bskor te mdun du bdar ba nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir 'ongs te/ 
98b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po la 'dug cing / rigs kyi bu de dag thams cad kyang chos nyan pa'i phyir de bzhin du rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag la
98b4(rgyud): 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de ras de'i tshe stong gsu ma gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir byang chub se'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnar 'phrul pa du ma bstan pas
98b5(rgyud): gzhal med khang dang / me tog sprid dang rin pa che'i sprin dang / bye ma'i sprin dang spos dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rjer rgyal ba'i bder gyi sprin dang / rinam
98b6(rgyud): che'i spug dang / rdo rje'i snying po dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / anang rnyil dang / byi ru dang / mar gang dang / mu tig dpar po dang / 'dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi sprin dang / dpag bsam kyi shing ljon pa dang / 
98b7(rgyud): rin po che'i pad+ma du mas khebs pa'i rdzing gis legs par brgyan par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams chad mang gas
98b8(rgyud): meng bsams kyis ma khyab cing dpag tu med pa gzhal du med cing brjid du med par gtogs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las shin tu 'das pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ 
99a1(rgyud): dag na gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rnar thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin du legs par rgyun
99a2(rgyud): par kun tu snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa dag
99a3(rgyud): bang den bzhugs bzhin du phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste 'jam zhing mnyen la rab tu gzhon zhing pad+ma dang / yal ga gzhon sha chags shing 'jam pa'i sa
99a4(rgyud): ma'i ngos can gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lcags kyu dang / bum pa dang / 1dang / sprogang dang / gzhal med khang dang / dung dang / rdo rje dang / pad+ma dang / dpal ba'u dang / 
99a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis rgyan pa/ tshe rab sa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu na pa yongasu rdzogs par mdzad pa'i rgyu 'thun pas mngon pa
99a6(rgyud): grub pa'i dpe byad bzang pos rdor spras pa/ sen mo zangs 'dri zhing rgyas la snum zhing sra ba'i nor bu'i mdongs kyi me tog gi 'od zer gyis khrigs ma mdzes par gyur pa/ seMn thang
99a7(rgyud): la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / yang dag par 'thun pa'i phyag rnams kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par dga' bar bya/ 
99a8(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ spyi bo las byugs nas dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig gis 'jigs rten gyi khams thang go bar mdzad cing 'di skad ces kyi rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir bdu
99b1(rgyud): / sdig can dang / gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ma dad cing sdang ba'i bgegs dang log 'dren dragra shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa// seMn thad kyi
99b2(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa'i phyir zhugs pa thang tshar bcad pa/ rnam par gzhig pa dang / de bzhin du byang chub senga' senga'i chen po sems dang po bskyed pa sems zhum pa brtson 'gru
99b3(rgyud): brtan po ma yin pa'i go cha bgos pa rnams kyang yang dag par gzeng bstong pa dang / rab tu dga' bar bya ba nas khams gsum par btogs pa'i son tha~Md kyi bar dag kyang mya ngan
99b4(rgyud): las 'das pa thob par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gtsang pa'i phyi ra/ khyod rdo rje'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting 'dzin pa
99b5(rgyud): rnams dang / ye shes kyi tshogs bsam gyos mi khyab pa bsags pa yongasu rdzogs pas grub ba'i mtshan dang / dpe byang bzang pos spras pa/ ting 'dzin
99b6(rgyud): dang / dbang dang / gzung dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i mthu grub pa/ sen thaMd kyi sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgri
99b7(rgyud): pa nye bar zhi ba sen dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du lhung ba'i 'jigs pa'i dus kyi char me ma lus par 'don pa dang / 
99b8(rgyud): lha dang / klu dang / gnang sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
100a1(rgyud): la sogs pa'i 'khor mngon par dga' ba can la ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dga' ba du ma kun tu skyed pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ni legaso legaso
100a2(rgyud): zhes bka' stsal to// de ltar sangs rgyas bac+doMs de dag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje gzeng bstod de rab tu dgo' bar mdzad nas rang rang gi phyag bskum ste/ rang rang gi
100a3(rgyud): byang chub senga' sada' chen po rnams chos nyan du gzung ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bkye'o// de dag gis gnang bas byang chub senga'i sede' chen po de dag thad
100a4(rgyud): kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/ byang chub songa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis brla
100a5(rgyud): chen po dang / byang chub se de'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po sa ji tsam du skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bsku ma pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las
100a6(rgyud): bskums pa tsam gyi skad cig thang cig yung tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste rin po che'i pad+ma'i snying po dag
100a7(rgyud): phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa'i bar du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas de'i tshe gsang ba
100a8(rgyud): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje bdud sdig can 'di rdo rje'i zhags pas bcings pa 'di las khrol la ci ma/ 
100b1(rgyud): kyang sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / chos la skyabasu 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la skyabasu 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhan yang gang dag lha dang / klu dang / ga
100b2(rgyud): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'ami tsi dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi mi yin po gang dag ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gnas pa
100b3(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs nas kyang ci nas khong du chud par 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i
100b4(rgyud): bdag po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das la legaso lag so// zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
100b5(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas yang rdo rje'i rnar thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bde 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs
100b6(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ra rdo rjes rdo rje'i rnar thar pa'i sgo chen po'i ting 'dzin bdud kyi dkyil 'khor zang 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu dem
100b7(rgyud): de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i dzi gyen gyi khams 'di rnam pa drugu tu rab tu g.yos te/ 'gul rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// che mchem/ rab tu che mchem/ kun tu
100b8(rgyud): rab tu che mche mo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang ma lce 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te/ 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mchid cing 'bar te/ 'jig su rung ba'i mche ba rma
101a1(rgyud): po drag po gzangs can 'jigs pa chen po skyed pa gtsigs te/ mche ba man nas me lce chen po ltar sma ra ser zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug ste// mi ba
101a2(rgyud): brna ba las 'phyang ba'i sbrul dug 'thor dang / ba lang sA lta bu dang / gzar bu lta bu dang / sbrul chen po kha gdangs pa'i kha nas byung ba'i mche ba'i rtse mo nas dug drag po 'bar ba 'byung
101a3(rgyud): ba'i tshogs kyi phreng bas bzhin du ma 'bar ba/ lag pa stong phrag du ma la rdo rje dang / zhags pa dang / gtum shing dang / gtun shing rkeng nyeg dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lcags
101a4(rgyud): sgrogs la sogs pa thogs pa'i mtshom 'i rtse mo la me stag rab tu 'phro ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongasu gtogs
101a5(rgyud): pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas pa sha za dang / ma mo dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa sdang ba rab tu sdang ba'i sems
101a6(rgyud): par byed pa rig dgas kyi dbang ba'i lpags pa khrag dang bcas pa sham thab su bgos pa/ sbrul chen po'i lus kyis rgya gram du ngam du bcings pa/ 'jigs pa bas kyang 'jig
101a7(rgyud): par byed pa/ 'chi bdag kyang skrag par byed pa/ khams gsum pa thad kyis bsdus pa lta bu'i lus dang ldan pa'i khro bor gyur nas lus kyi tshigs bde las kyang khri kha dog dus
101a8(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ kha dog sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / nag pa ste thams cad kyang rdo rje'i rang bzhin can khro gnyer mi mnyam pas rnar spras pa'i gnyer ma
101b1(rgyud): khrem gnyer can gyi dbral ba'i dbyes nas me stag lta bu'i rdul gyis thigs pa nub bo 'dzag pa las/ dag 'byung rnam pa sna tshogs kun tu byung bas yan lag dang 'a
101b2(rgyud): lag kun tu dkris pa'i mngon rtags can du gyur cing / rdo rje drag shul can du snang ste/ mche bas mi bzad par 'dugr-I pa'i kha gdangs pa las ha hazhis gad mo rta gang 'byung 'i
101b3(rgyud): 'jig pa'i dus kyi rlung gis char ba dang bcas pa'i sprin dkrugs pa las char gyi rgyun rags pa 'bab pas yongasu gang bas rgya mtsho dkrugs nas rlabs chen po g.yo bar
101b4(rgyud): rta rgod ma'i kha nas mi byung ba lta bu'i hUM zhes bya ba zab cing brtan pas rgyu ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs 'jigs skrag sde 'byer zhing 'thor nas sngas te skyabasu 'dong zhing
101b5(rgyud): 'dud pas/ nyi ma stong pas 'bar ba'i lus rnams mthong ba ra/ sA sgrar sgur can zhom pa lta bu'i bug zab mo'i sbubs kyi nang nas sbrul sna tshogs 'khyil
101b6(rgyud): gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od kyis 'gram pa rnar mdzes pa/ klog 'dus pa ltar ser zhing dmar ba'i mgo 'bra s+tha'i 'od zer gyis skra'i tshogs rtsub shing ga sho ri la gyen du 'greng ba'i rtse
101b7(rgyud): mo brgyan cing 'dres te gsal bar gyur pa/ sbrul gyi gdangs ka stong gis gdugs byas shing / sbrul rnam pa sna tshogs kyi do shul dang / ska rags dang / dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu dang
101b8(rgyud): rna chas lus rgyan pa/ rdo rje 'bar ba dri ma med cing dreg shul can mi bzang ba lag na bogs pa/ mdzub mo rnams las/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sang+ge'i sgra chen po dgis bgegs dang / lag
102a1(rgyud): 'dren thad kun tu sdigs pa dag 'bon te/ gang de dag gi mig dang / kha rnams nas gnam grum pa lta bu'i sgra chen po'i tshogs las me lce chen po 'bar ba'i
102a2(rgyud): tshogs kyi snang ba byung ste/ des sdang ba'i bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ snga
102a3(rgyud): ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams tshig par byed do// rmongs par byed// 'tshog par byed de// mi bzad pa drag pa rtsub pa sdug bsngal ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong bar byed// 
102a4(rgyud): de dag tshor bas nyen pas dkon mchog ga sum la skyabasu dong ngo // de'i tshe bdud sdig can gyis bgegs dang / log 'dren de dag tshor ba chen pos nyen te/ dkon ma
102a5(rgyud): gsum la skyabasu mthong nas 'jigs snga ngas skrag te skyabs ma rnyed nas rlung drag pos bskyod pa'i sha nga bzhin du 'dar/ rab tu 'dar te/ ngu bar 'dod na yang du ma
102a6(rgyud): rus nas ri mi bzhin du lus thaMd g.yo ba med par gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdadu sdig can 'dul bar byed de sdang ba gdon dang /

102a8(rgyud): 'jug ba'i rkang pa gnyis las khro bo 'bar zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs cam/ sang+ge'i sgra chen po hUM zhes bya ba 'di gnyis byung ste/ de gnyis ga ma/ 
102b1(rgyud): bzhin dur mkha'i dkyil du rgyang ring du 'phur te/ na mkha' la gnas pa'i shugs kyis bac+doMs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
102b2(rgyud): shAkya thub pa la lan 'bum phrag du mtha' yas mu med par bskor ba byas te gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu ci bgyi bka' stsol cig/ 
102b3(rgyud): nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/ yang pral ba'i dkyil nas/ rdo rje khro bo 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs mche ba mi bzad pa drag pas 'jigasu su
102b4(rgyud): ba'i kha gdangs te/ mchu ma rungs par bsgyur ba'i kha nas dus kyi tha ma 'jig pa'i tshe rnar 'thor ba'i rlung drag pa'i shugs kyis rab tu bskyod pa'i sprin rig po'i tshogs rab tu
102b5(rgyud): sgrogs pas rnam par bkrugs pa'i rgya mchen po'i sgra drag po lta bu'i hUM zhes bya ba'i seng+ge'i sgras gang ga/ bgegs dang lag 'dren zede 'jigs nas 'bros
102b6(rgyud): shing spyod lug nas phyogs bslad par byed pa/ lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / sen mo dang / mig dang / a ga chom dang / ska bde rdo rje 'bar bar snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
102b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thang rgyas par 'gongs pa gzi brjid pad kyi gzi brjid rnams rang gi gzi brjid kyis zil tu brlag par byed cing rgyang ring du byed pa'i rdo rje 'bar ba'i
102b8(rgyud): snang ba des rgyu skar dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rnams kyi 'od lham mer ma yin/ lhan ner ma yin/ ldengar ma yin par byed pa/ gang zhing ma dang / zla ba rdzu 'phrul che ba/ 
103a1(rgyud): dbang che bar grags pa mthu che ba yang lham mer ma yin/ lngar ner ma yin par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od dang / byang chub senga' seMnga' chen pos

103a6(rgyud): shig/ gzhan yang gang dag sdang ba gdon dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan
103a7(rgyud): pa sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la mi 'jug pa dang / mi rtogs pa dang / yid mi ches pa bde de bzhin gshegs pa/

103b1(rgyud): pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i tshig mnyanas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang bzung ste/ dus gcig tu sgra skad kyi nga ro gcig tu seng+ge'i sgra chen po hUM zhes bya bas stong gsum
103b2(rgyud): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gangs shing / gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag smra so// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag
103b3(rgyud): 'tshalo// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub senga'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa 'dun po dag la phag 'tshalo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon tshon pa

103b7(rgyud): s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ mo Ta mo Ta/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ g+haR+ShA g+hAR+ShA/ g+hAR+ShA pa ya g+hAR+ShA pa ya/ sarba satwA ni/ tra sa tra sa/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ b+h+ra ma d+hA ma/ saM b+h+ra ma ya saM b+h+ra ma ya/ sarba b+hu ti ni/ kuH
103b8(rgyud): ma kun+da ya/ sa kun ya saM kun+da ya/ sarba sha rdzun/ b+hin+de b+hinA~M/ r-is g+han+d+re ya sa~M g+ha nA ya/ sarba bid+ya badz+ra badz+re/ s+pho Ta ye badz+ra badz+re/ ka Ta ya badz+re badz+ra/ u s+ye TA ya badz+ra badz+ra/ na
104a1(rgyud): badz+ra/ da ha badz+ra badz+ra/ pa tsa badz+ra badz+ra ma tha badz+ra badz+ra/ ud sA da ya ma hA badz+ra badz+ra / d+hA ra badz+ra pA Ni pri ye/ ka ha ka ha/ ha sa ha sa/ ma hA TAT Ta hA sa/ kha cig tu rgya mtsho
104a2(rgyud): rlabs 'khrugs pa lta bur zab cing 'jig su rung ba'i hUM zhes bya ba'i seng+ge'i sgra sdang ba rab tu sdang ba bgegs dang log 'dren kun tu skrag par byed pa dang / sdang ba thang gzhom du gas
104a3(rgyud): 'jomasu stsal du gsol// hUM hUM phaT/ badz+ra ba ra pra da s+pho Ta/ bsgrub par bya ba lha dang / lha ma yin dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / ma mo dang
104a4(rgyud): 'byung po dang / gdon gyi tshogs mthar 'byin pa/ 'byar/ bar mdzad pa hUM hUM phaT/ he he phaT/ a mau g+ha phaT/ rgyal chen po zhi'i ris kyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang
104a5(rgyud): chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas par gam bar bgyid du su la gsol/ hUM hUM phag 'byer bar bgyid du stsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ sum cu rtsagasu
104a6(rgyud): gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol// hUM hUM phaT/ 'byer bar bgyid du stsal du gsil/ hUM hUM
104a7(rgyud): phaT/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas par g.yo bar bgyid du rtsal du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ 'thab bral gyi/ 
104a8(rgyud): lha khang khyim dang bcas pa khu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyod du spul du gsol/ hUM hUM phaT/ dga' ldan gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ 
104b1(rgyud): bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du stsal du gsol// hUM hUM phaT/ 'phrul dgi' lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang / chung ma dang / phyugs dang

104b3(rgyud): bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid du gsol// hUM hUM phaT/ de bzhin du 'od gsal dang / tshangs ris nas gnas gtsang mi'i 'og min gyi bar gyi lha khang khyim dang bcas pa/ bu dang chung
104b4(rgyud): ma dang / byugs dang / rtsa lag dang bcas pa g.yo bar bgyid dra gsol// hUM hUM phaT/ 'byor bar bgying du srul du gsol// rig snga gas 'chang grub pa rnams rengs par mdzad//
