104b7(rgyud): tu ru tur tu ru/ g+hu dr-i g+h+r-i ru g+hU ra/ d+hu ra d+hArA d+hu ru/ thar ba ra ba ra/ b+ha ra b+ho ra b+har/ par ha ra ha ra/ ya ra ya ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ku hu ru du/ tsil tsi la mo la~M ma l-i lu nu lu usar+b+ba
104b8(rgyud): DA lA ma ma hUM pu lu pu lu/ li ne ti lo haM sa lin tI/ mu lu lang khA se/ tsu lu tsu len te/ ya lu pu len te/ ma lu ru bi/ ku bi pur+b+ba la t+yu sU ra g+ha t+yA/ s+phu bi'i tsu/ su ru su ru lu
105a1(rgyud): mu ru/ su mu su mu ru/ a ka Te bi ka De ni ka Te ka Ta bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka Tang+ka Te/ dza ye bi dza ye dza yan+ti/ bi dza yan+ti/ ti mong+gi si/ ma hA ti mong+gi sa~M/ g+hA dadz+ra me gU
105a2(rgyud): ba ra ya Na sdang ba rnams la rjesu 'doms pa/ ma dul ba rnams dul ba/ drag shul can rnams 'byer bar mdzad pa/ dpa' bo rnams kyi nang na dpa' ba/ nges pa rnams kyi nang na nges
105a3(rgyud): ma grub pa rnams grub par mdzad pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar mdzad pa/ sen thaMd la phan pa mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa bod kyis gnas bsngags pa/ sangs rgyas thang
105a4(rgyud): la bsnyen bkur mdzad pa/ rdo rje'i rigs kyi tig/ sngags thad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ chur gshegs tshur gshegs/ rdo rje ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs
105a5(rgyud): ba na bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa
105a6(rgyud): bad kyi mdun du dam tshig gong bcas pa de rje su bskyang du gsol// rjesu bskyang du gsol// gshegasu gsol/ myur du gshegasu gsol// bdag gau las rnams myur ba rtsu
105a7(rgyud): bar bsgrub tu gsol// skrag par byed pa/ rdo rje'i dzin pa lag na rdo rje l-i phyag 'tshalo// hu ru hu ru/ grub pa drag po lag na rdo rje bka' stsol cig swA hA/ shin tu grub pa
105a8(rgyud): byed pa la swA hA/ rdo rje chen bi la swA hA// rdo rje phur pa la swA hA/ rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA/ rdo rje kau li kai l-i la swA hA/ drag po ki li ki li la swA hA/ dmar po ke laM ko le la swAH/ 
105b1(rgyud): byis pa ki li ki li la swA hA/ sangs rgyas thaMd kyis byin gyis brlabs pa la swA hA// bang gi gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba thaMd dang / rims thaMd med par mdzod cig swA hA/ de nas rdo rje/ 
105b2(rgyud): khro bo chen pos 'di skad smras pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thaMd dang / de bzhin du
105b3(rgyud): bar snang la rdo rje'i skar mda' chen po'i be con 'bab par snango // gnam grum pa'i sgra chen po yang grago// kun nas sa chen po'ong grum pa kun tu snango // sa chen po'i ser ka de dag
105b4(rgyud): nas yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu'i rgyun gyen du byung // chu'i rgyun de dag gis rnar 'jig pa'i du sa kyi chu bzhin du sa chen po thaMd kun tu gang bar snang // gang
105b5(rgyud): dag sa'i 'og ra gnas pa'i klu chen po dang / lha chen po dang / lha ma yin chen po dang / de dag thaMd kyang sa 'og nas 'bon cing / ri rab kyi drung du 'bor 'gyen du byung
105b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la skabasu dong ngo // de nas drag shul can drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa'i 'byung po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren
105b7(rgyud): gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang kun 'bar rab tu 'bar zhing / kun tu rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa dag gis rang rang gi lus kur tu rnar 'joms par shes te/ de dag sdug
105b8(rgyud): bsngal mi bzad cing drag la rtsub pas nyenas ha ha zhes bya ba'i ngu skad 'bor te tshig 'di skad ces smra so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po bdag cag skad cig gis sros kyang ma mchis pa
106a1(rgyud): 'gyur du bgying na 'jigs pa chen por lhung ba 'di las yongasu bskyab tu gsol// bgegs dang log 'dren rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan 'jig rten gyi kha
106a2(rgyud): gzhan thang na gnas pa dang / ri dang chu bo dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing dang / dur khrod dang / shing dang / thibs po dang / khron pa rnying pa dang / btung ba dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / su mdo dang / gtsug
106a3(rgyud): lag khang zhigs pa dang / gnas dang / lha khang na gnas pa dag thad kyis kyang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa chen po ltung ba 'di las yongasu bsgrub tu gsol/ 
106a4(rgyud): yongasu bskyabs du gsol zhes cheng du brjod pa cheng du brjo ngo // de bzhin du lha'i khang pa bdag yos rab tu gsos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos te/ mog theg por gyur ci
106a5(rgyud): 'ong mang por kun tu sna // bdud kyi khyim thams cad kyang kun tu 'bar zhing / kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lU gcig tu gyur par snang ngo // gang bdud kyi
106a6(rgyud): ris kyi lci'i bu de dag thaMd kyang rdo rje khro bo chen pos sngangs skrag te rang rang gi mgo rdo rje rnams kyis rnam par 'joms pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
106a7(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la skyabasu dong ngo // bdud sdig can yang shon tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba nyam
106a8(rgyud): zag cing skrag la zhum ste/ gnod pas spangs nas sangs rgyas la skyabasu song // chos la skyabasu song / dge 'dun la skyabasu song // gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la phan
106b1(rgyud): 'tshal te/ khro bo chen po rdo rje khro ba de dag la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu ngag yongs skyobs shig/ yongasu skyobs shig/ bdag nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du
106b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas la skyabasu 'gro'o// chos la skyabasu 'gro'o// dge 'dun la skyabasu 'gro'o// sor 'ang kyi dor gyi phyir ba lta bu dang / ma lta bu dang / spun lta bu dang / gnyen lnga bu dang / 
106b3(rgyud): snag gi gnyen mtsham su lta bur 'gyur bar byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bdag ded phyin chad sems can thams cad kyi pha dang / ma dang / spun dang / gnyen dang / snag gi gnyen
106b4(rgyud): mtsham su 'gyur bar bya'o// lus dang / ngag dang yid kyi la sa cung zad gang ci byed de sen ba bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir yongasu bsngo'o// bdag dbugs
106b5(rgyud): byung nas gzhan yang dbugs dbyu'o// bdag grol nas ga zhan yang dgro'o// bdag mya ngan las 'das nas gzhan ya nga mya ngan bzla'o// rus pa dang / rkang rang khrag
106b6(rgyud): ngaM/ sha dang / khams mthu dang / srog gis kyang ser thams cad la rim gror bya'o// mchong por bya'o// brjed par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seMda' dang / 'phags pa 'an
106b7(rgyud): bos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma'i gnas thang la yang bsnyen bkur bya'o// bsti stang bya'o// rim gror bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de nas bdud sdig can gyis
106b8(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la skabasu 'gro ba bzung ste/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che bskyed po dang / khams cad dang ldan pa'i khor de ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dga' ba thob nas sgra skad/ 
107a1(rgyud): kyi nga ro gcig tu 'di skad ces smraso// gang gi phyir na bdud khyod kyis// sems cad kun la bde ba'i phyir// bla med byang chub sems bskyed pa// bdag cag
107a2(rgyud): rjesu yi rang ngo // rin chen sems 'dis mo ring bar// rnam 'dren sangs rgyas gyur nas ni// ser shin tu sdug bsngal kun// mya ngan las ni bzla bar gyis// rgyal ba'i mchog
107a3(rgyud): 'di ji bzhin du// skye dgu thade gdul bar byas// stobs po che dang ldan pa yis// bdud bzhi po dag gdul bar gyis// de skad ces spras pa dang / thaMd dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen
107a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi mthus rang rang gi lag gi snyim pa nas me tog gi phur ma thogs par shes te/ me tog gi pu ra ma de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
107a5(rgyud): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / khro bo chen po rdo rje'i khro bo de dag dang / byang chub
107a6(rgyud): sadang sanga' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub se de'i seda' chen po de dag la gtor ba dang / de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus
107a7(rgyud): me tog gi gzhal mang khang chen por gyur to// bdud sdig can ni mchog tu bde bas tshim par gyur nas sangs rgyas rje su dran pa sgo ba zhing rang gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smi
107a8(rgyud): pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rje su sems dpas mdun du rin po che'i gzhal mad khang chen po dpag bsams kyi shing du mas dmangs ris brgyad du
107b1(rgyud): khres pa/ rin po che dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / mar glang dang / bai DUr+ya dang / an nga rnyil dang / 'bon ka chen po dang / ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po
107b2(rgyud): dang / rdo rje dang / rdo rje chen po dang / dran las dang / dun las chen po dang / 'dzam bu'i chu ba'i gser gyi dra bas rnam par spras pa// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha dan dang / rna
107b3(rgyud): rgyal ba'i ba ngar bsgrengs pas legs par rgyan pa// me tog phreng bas klugs pa// pog snod du ma nas bdug pa dri zhim po'i ngad kyis dri zhim par byas pa/ phye ma dri zhim
107b4(rgyud): bo'i bsgo bas bsgos pa/ lha'i bu mo 'bum phrag du ma sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu len cing gar byed pa/ rdzing bu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu can wu
107b5(rgyud): phrag du ma'i dbus nas ring po che sna tshog/ sa pad+ma dang / ku mA da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ud pa la dang / dri mchog byung bas mdzes par byas pa'i phyogs dang
107b6(rgyud): ldan pa byung nas/ de mchog tu dga' ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde bar skyes pa gus pa thaMd kyis de blangs nas bdud kyi mthu chen po dang / bdud kyi rnar 'phrul ba chen po dang / 
107b7(rgyud): bdud kyi rdzu 'phrul chen pos lag pa gnyi gas spyi bo la blangs te/ dge ba'i gshes gnyen gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la dga' ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir phul te tshul
107b8(rgyud): dang 'dra ba'i tshogasu bcad pa 'di gis mngon par bstong ngo // 'ji sten dag la dbang byeng dbang gis 'byor gyur pa// stobs bcu'i sras rab mchog lngar khyod la brten nasu// dang / 
108a1(rgyud): chub phyir ni chags bral dri med byang chub sems// sen bde sgrub gter dang 'dra ba bdag gis bob// bdag mig gti mug mun pas dri can dri med
108a2(rgyud): gyur// srid pa'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi zhing spros dang bral// mya ngan 'das pa'i drang po'i lam ni bdag la bstan// sems dmyal mi zad tha~Md rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ 
108a3(rgyud): sdig bral 'jig rten mgon la skyabasu ma song ba// kye ma dman pa yun ring ji lta bslus shig gu/ de ring thub dbang sras po rnams la bsod nams dang // dad dang snying rje
108a4(rgyud): ting 'dzin thob nas ngo mtshar gyur/ sa mdog gcig bur sangs rgyas myur du grub par shog/ gcig pus 'gro ba ma lus mya ngan bzla bar bya// srid pa gzhan na kun
108a5(rgyud): tu rgyu che bdag gi yid // rang pan 'jug dang dge ba she sa bral bar ma gyur cig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis rmu/ dang 'dra ba'i tshigasu bcad pa 'di dgas
108a6(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la mngon par bstod nas cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ni rdo rjes khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo nga bdag la 'di skad
108a7(rgyud): ces smraso// rigs kyi bu dag sdang ba dang / gdon dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren de dag thaMd gang gis sems can bde la rnam par rtsom pa rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang / bgegs mi
108a8(rgyud): byed pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabasu 'gro bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig 'dzin du chug shig/ rigs kyi bu dag 'di dag la mi 'jigs pa yA
108b1(rgyud): byin cig desana'ang gyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa bla na med pa yang mthong bar 'gyur// de skad ces smras pa dang khro bo chen po rdo rje khro ba
108b2(rgyud): ngag gis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagar rdo rje la legaso zhes te tshig la mngon par dga' nas yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dpa lha ma yin dang / nam
108b3(rgyud): mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa de dag thang dang / sdang ba bgegs dang / log 'dren dang ma mo dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / 'byung po dang
108b4(rgyud): gdon dang / brjed byeng dang / srul pa dang / lus srul po dang / ro langs dang / mkha 'gro dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'jim bcas pa la sogs pa de dag thaM dang / 
108b5(rgyud): gdon gyi tshogs de dag bad kyis rdo rje chen po mdza po 'bab pas dkrugs pa'i mtsho chen po zab mo kIng lA la ga/ 'uchu'ur sgra 'byung ba lta bur
108b6(rgyud): cing rgyun ring ba'i skad gsang mthon pos 'di skad ce smraso// sdang ba 'byung po dang / gdon dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa drag shul can drag shul gyi se
108b7(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ sdig pa can sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sdang ba can sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ khyed bde nyon cig/ khyed kyis ngeng phan chad sems can gang dag da
108b8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bstan pa la zhugs pa dag dang / de la sogs pa gang dag gsang sngags sgrub bam/ klog pa de dag la bgegs 'byung bar mi bya zhing 'che bar mi bya
109a1(rgyud): ste/ sgrub pa dang rje su 'thun par stobs sbyir bar bya'o// seMn gang dag dam tshig la ma zhugs pa de dag la bsrung bar bya// zhi ba dang bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / 
109a2(rgyud): chad pa spang ba dang / dug gi zhal ba dang / dug bsad pa dang / rig sngags 'grub par sbyin par bya'o// sbrang rtsi dang / tshigs ma dang / sgog pa dang / ki'u dang / gtor ma dang / 'byung po dang
109a3(rgyud): mi 'grungs pa rnams kyi sha dang zas zos kyang sbyor du mi bzung zhing nyes par mi brtsi'o// de nas sdang ba 'byung po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa thad ces bya ba nas/ 
109a4(rgyud): sgra skad kyi nga ro gcog gis 'di skad ces smra so zhes bya ba'i bar du sbyaro// rigs kyi bu dag bka' lung ci stsal pa de bzhin du sbyar bar bgyi'o// dang slan chad sangs rgyas
109a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge 'du na la skyabasu mchi'o// sin thad kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 
109a6(rgyud): nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes khro bo chen po rdo rje khro bo chen po de dag na/ snang ba bgegs dang / log 'drer dang / 'byung po dang / gdor gyi tshogs de dag thams cad la lag
109a7(rgyud): so zhes bya ba byin te/ rig sngags kyi las dang / dam tshig dang / phyag rgya thang 'dzin du bcu go// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje'i rnam par dag pa'i sgo chen po'i ting 'a
109a8(rgyud): de las lang so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad cesmra so// rigs kyi bu gang la gnas nas khyad kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul/ 
109b1(rgyud): / 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa dang / bdud sdig can yang byang chub tu sems bskyed ba dang / gzhan yang sdang ba gdon dang / 'byung po dang / bgegs dang ldog 'dremathang dam tshig la
109b2(rgyud): bkod cing byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du 'dug pa'i ting 'dzin 'di'i ming tsa zhes bya/ de skad ce smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
109b3(rgyud): la 'di skad ces smra so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting 'dzin 'di ni ming dang / yi ge dang sgra skad kyis rtogs par bya ba ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang mong ngam/ gzugasem/ 
109b4(rgyud): dbyibs sam/ gnas ma/ mnyam par gzha ga pa 'am/ g.yengs pa yang rung ste/ ting 'dzin ces bya ba'i chos de gang yang me // gang la ming med pa dang / gzugs med pa da
109b5(rgyud): dbyibs med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / mnyam par gzhag pa med pa dang / g.yeng ba med pa 'di btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ting 'dzin 'di'i ming ci zhes bya zhes pa
109b6(rgyud): ji snyam du sems/ yang btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gsal bar byed pa 'di ni bdag la gsal bar byed pa mi yin/ gzhan la gsal bar byed pa ma yin/ gnyi ga la gsal ba
109b7(rgyud): byed pa ma yino// 'on kyang gsal bar byed par brtags pa yod// de la gsal bar byed pa ni gsal bar byed pa'i bdag nyid kyis stong / bdag ni bdag gis stong // gzhan yang gas
109b8(rgyud): gyi bdag nyid kyis stong / gnyi ga yang gnyi ga'i bdag nyid kyi stong ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu brtags pa'i phyiraro// 'di ci zhes bya ba'i yi ge gnyis kyi tshig yang tshig gi bangag
110a1(rgyud): shAkya/ nyid kyis stong ste yi ge yang yi ge ma yino// de ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don rtogs par byed pa yino// don de brjod pa na yang gang nas kyang mi 'o/ 
110a2(rgyud): gang du yang mi 'gro mod kyi/ gzhan gyi dbang la rten pa'i phyir yi ger btags pa yang yod do// yongasu btags pa yin pa'i phyir btags pa yang stong pa'o// chen cing 'brel par 'ang
110a3(rgyud): ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dbang nyid stong pa'o// rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang stong pa'o// glo bur du rgyu dang rkyer gyis bskyed pa'i phyir 'byung ba'i bdag nyi
110a4(rgyud): kyis stong // de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rang gi mnan nyid kyis stong // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa gang yin pa mtshan nyid med pa'o// mtshan nyid med pa
110a5(rgyud): gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid // de bzhin nyung gang yin pa dem nor ba de bzhin nyid// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid// gzhan
110a6(rgyud): yin pa de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ting 'dzin to// ting 'dzin gang yin pa de rtogs pa'o// rtogs pa gang yin pa de spong pa nyid // stong pa nyid gang yin pa de lhag mthong // lha// 
110a7(rgyud): mthong gang yin pa de gnaso// zhi gnas gang yin pa de rnar thar pa'o// rnar thar pa gang yin pa de dbu mi'i lam yino// dbu ma'i lam gang yin pa de la mtha' gcig med// mtha'
110a8(rgyud): gnyis meng / gzung ba meng / 'dzin pa po meng / 'dzin pa med/ chad pa med// rtag pa med/ skye ba med/ 'gag pa med/ rtog pa med/ rnam par rtog pa med/ rang dbang med// gzhan gyi dbang snga/ 
110b1(rgyud): 'gro ba med/ 'ong ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med/ rnam par bya ba med/ 'du ba med/ 'bral ba medo// de ni lhag mthong yin no// lhag mthong gang yin pa de la phung po med// kham
110b2(rgyud): rnamed/ dbang po rnams med/ skye mched rnams med// yul rnams med/ yul du gdags pa med// las med/ las kyi 'bra spu medo// gang la las med cing las kyi 'bra spu med
110b3(rgyud): pa de bla na mang ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chubo// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yin pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso// bla na med
110b4(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa de cho so// chos gang yin pa de mi skye mi 'tsho'o// mi skye mo 'chi ba gang yin pa de na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud
110b5(rgyud): bya'o// btsun pa shA radwa ti'i bus smras pa rigs kyi bu khyo/ dkyis ting 'dzin bstan pa 'di ni shin tu zab ste/ 'di la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thad kyi 'gro
110b6(rgyud): ba yang ming na/ 'jig rten pa'i mu stegs can dang / phas kyi rgol ba tha de lta smos kyang ci dgos/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di na dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang / mos pa chung ba
110b7(rgyud): bad kyis shes pa dka' ba ste/ gzhan du nu 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi yul du gyur pa ni ma gtog so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan ni dmigs pa med pa gnas
110b8(rgyud): pa med pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa zhes
111a1(rgyud): / bya ba de ni de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa med ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid medo// sha ra dwa ti'i
111a2(rgyud): bus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mtshan nyid med pa yin na de la ji ltar skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing de bzhin gshegs
111a3(rgyud): pa zhes bstan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku legs par rgyar/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rjer bzhag par lta/ ji ltar de bzhir gshegs pa bla na med pa yang das
111a4(rgyud): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyu sa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje smras pa/ bcur pa sha rarA ti'i bu skyes bu cher po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis / 
111a5(rgyud): bya ba de ni kur rdzob kyi brda'i cho go// brgyan ces bya ba spros pa'i yi ge dang sgra'o// dpe byad bzang po zhes bya ba der sgra ma dang / rmi lam gyi ngo nyid ma tshan nyid// yang dag/ 
111a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba de ni namakha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid // sku gsum rdor gzhag po zhes bya ba de ni tshogs gnyis kyisaM sprul pa'i mtshan nyid// btsun pa sha ra dwa dwati'i bu
111a7(rgyud): yang 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba'i yul te/ de la sku gsang ba zhes bya ba de ni bsod nams chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa'i mtshan nyid // bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa gang
111a8(rgyud): yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par long spyod pa'i sku ste/ 'di yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyi'i phran las dang sku'i gsang ba ba'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gsung zhes bya
111b1(rgyud): / ba da ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid do// kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'o// rten cing 'brel par
111b2(rgyud): 'byung 'chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med par 'jug pa thugasu chud pa/ yid kyi rnar shes pa'i lam gyis 'jug pa/ bsam gtan goms par byas pas shes par bya ba ste/ dmigs
111b3(rgyud): pa mang pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnar byung bas stong pa/ lus kyi yul ma yin pa/ ngagi spyod yul ma yin/ yid kyi rang gi ngo'i yul ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gsheg
111b4(rgyud): ba'i chos kyi skur mkha'i khamasu yang dag par 'du ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsum rnar gzhag pa de ltar blta bar bya'o// bcur ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang de
111b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba gang yin par ri chos kyi sku'o// chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni chos rnams kyi dbu mo'i lam du blta'o// dbu mi'i lam gang
111b6(rgyud): yin pa de ni skye mi 'chi ba ste/ de bzhir gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang ru / chos kyi sku 'di ni gnas pa nyidado// btsur pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun
111b7(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba da ni pha rol tu phyin pa dgi rnam grangasu gtogs pa'o// nga la pha ril tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de yang bsod nams kyi rgyu 'thun pa nyid du blta'o// de ci'i phyir 'i ra/ bcun
111b8(rgyud): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni phyi rang gi dngos po rnam pa gnyis yongasu btang bar bya ba'o// de la phyi zhes bya ba de ni kuran rdzob kyi tshig nang zhes bya ba
112a1(rgyud): de don dam pa'i tshig/ de la phyi zhes bya ba de ni gang zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang skom 'dod pa rnams dang / de bzhin du brar po dang / brang po dang / las byung
112a2(rgyud): dang / zho shas 'tsho ba dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / sa dang / mgo dang / lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / mig dang / sha dang / khrag dang / rkang dang / tshal dang / rus pa'i bar du sbyor ba
112a3(rgyud): ste/ de yang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu zin pas yongasu bsngos pa rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang / gya nom pa dang / rgya che ba dang / rang gi sti stang du byas te rnam pa thams
112a4(rgyud): cad sen bde la sbyin pa 'di ni phyi'o// nang gi chos sbyin ba'o// de yang rnam pa gnyis te/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug par yang dag par gzhol ba dang / sprin
112a5(rgyud): ba'i gtam dang / tshul khrims kyi gtam dang / bzod pa'i gtam dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / 
112a6(rgyud): ye shes kyi gtam dang / snying rjes yongasu zin pa thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba'o// gzhan yang nang gi sbyin pa ni gang 'di mthar 'dzin pa dang / skye ba dang / 'gag
112a7(rgyud): par yongasu rtog pa dang / rdar rtog pa dang / shes pa dang / shes bya rnam par spangs pa dga' bas yongasu zin pa'i stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin par yang dag par 'du ba ste 'di na
112a8(rgyud): chos kyi sbyin pa'o// gang 'di nyid la lus dang / ngag dang / yid rgod pa med pa dang // khengs pa med pa dang / lus rnar g.yeng ba med pa dang / ngag rnar g.yeng ba med pa dang / yid rnam pa
112b1(rgyud): g.yeng ba med par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu zin pa/ gcig tu nyon mongs pa med par gnas/ btang snyoms kyis yongasu zin pa/ thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin
112b2(rgyud): yang dag par 'dul ba 'di ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang 'di nyid la rang gi lus dang srog la mi ltar bar bsod nams dang / bsod nams ma yin pa dang / 
112b3(rgyud): chos dang / chos ma yin pa dang / bden pa dang / bden pa ma yin pa dang / g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba'i dngos po rnar spong zhing byams pas yongasu zin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
112b4(rgyud): bar yang dag par 'dul ba 'di ni 'dir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gang sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / ting 'dzin thob par bya ba'i phyir sems spro zhi
112b5(rgyud): rtsom pa dang / yongasu mi skyo bar rtag tu gnas pa ma da pa dang / da dmigs pa med pa dang / byams pas yongasu zin pa yis kyi pha rol tu phan par yang dag
112b6(rgyud): par 'dul ba 'di ni 'dir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu byon pa'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu 'di ni bsod nams kyi tshogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzogs par
112b7(rgyud): long spyod pa'i sku'i gsang ba grub par byed pa'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang ye shes kyi tshogs ni gang pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po 'ang dag nyid rdzogs pa ste/ pha rol
112b8(rgyud): tu phyin pa rnams 'byed pa dang / 'grel pa dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / de la gzhol zhing mi rtag pa dang / bdag med pa dang/ stong pa dang / gso ba dang / gsog dang / dngos pom
113a1(rgyud): pa dang / dngos po bang dngos po med par yang dag par ston to// mdor bsdu ba na 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i 'on
113a2(rgyud): mongs pa sel cing chos kyi dbyings na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang mnyam par yang dag par ston to// dmigs pa dang bral ba 'di ni 'dir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
113a3(rgyud): ba'o// de bzhin nyid dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa 'di ni 'dir shes rab
113a4(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni ye shes kyi tsho gas bsod nams kyi tshogs dang / yis kyi tshogs dang / tshogs 'di gnyis ni byang chub kyi phyogs
113a5(rgyud): kyi chos dang / shes pa dang / shes bya mtha' ngag dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ya nga dag par rtogs par byed pa ste/ btsun pa sha radwa ti'i bu
113a6(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gsang ba dag gis mdor bsdus te bstan pa'o// rgya cher rnar dbye ba ni gal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sku tshe'i tshad bskal par
113a7(rgyud): bzhugs te bstan cing bshad kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyuraro// sgo'i gsang ba ji lta ba bzhin du gsung gi gsang ba yang de bzhi no// thugs kyi gsang ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas
113a8(rgyud): rnam pa dang / so'i rnam pa dang / kha dog dang / rtags dang / dbyabs dang / ngagi rnar rtog pa'i spyod yul dang / bya ba tha dad pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis kyang bstan par mi spyod mod kyi 'on kyang de/ 
113b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i sau rang gis rig pa'i thugs kyi gsang ba yin par shes par bya'o// btsun pa sha ra dwa tI'i bu de ni de'i phyir rnam grangs 'dis de ltar rig par bya ste/ bdag
113b2(rgyud): cag lta bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnams kyis bstan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis som gyi
113b3(rgyud): khams mtho' yas mu med pa'i bsam pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa dang / blo gros dang / blo dang / rtogs pa dang / mngon par 'dod pa mtha' yas mu med pa dang
113b4(rgyud): sems kyi rgyun rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjesu 'gro ba'i spyod yul dang / skye gnas sna tshogs dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i las sna tshogs dang / mi shes pa
113b5(rgyud): ma rig pa'i mun pa dang / mi snang ba dang / mun nag dang / 'gro po lnga dang / 'gro ba drug dang / khams gsum pa thog mo dang / dbus dang / 'jig par gnas pa sngon
113b6(rgyud): gyi mtha' dang / phyi mo'i mtha' yongasu ma chad par gnas par dus gsum dang / phyogs khe mgo rmongs pa skye ba dang / rga ba la sogs pa na ba dang / nad dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags
113b7(rgyud): 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa la sogs pas nyid cig bzhin du bcom pa'i sen rnams kyi sen gyi khams ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang / ma grol
113b8(rgyud): ba dgrol ba dang / dbugs ma phyin pa dbyugs dbyung ba dang / yongasu mya ngar las ma 'das pa yongasu mya ngan las bzla ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzung ba dang / gnas
114a1(rgyud): pa thad gyur pa'i lam la dgod pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa shin tu bde ba/ don dam pa/ zhi ga 'khrug pa mang pa/ dge ba/ nang med pa dang / sangs rgyas bsngos
114a2(rgyud): kyi so so rang gi rig pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa/ rnam pa thad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i thang mkhyen pa'i yas la sbyor ba dang / yang dag
114a3(rgyud): par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par gzeng bstod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang / dga' ba dang / ngang ba dang / mgu ba'i sau la yang dag paro gzud pa dang / chos
114a4(rgyud): rtogs pa'i khyad par brjod pa dang / rgya mtsho// chen po ltar 'dul ba'i son yongasu smin par bya ba'i dus dang / tshong las mi 'da' bar bya ba dang / de dag la rgyu de'i dbang du
114a5(rgyud): byas te skye bo'i tshogs chen po'i don dang pan pa dang / bde ba dang / lha dang / mi rnams kyi don dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i chos kyi tshul gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
114a6(rgyud): de gnas par bya ba dang / gcig nas gcig tu lung byin pas thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang / ye shes goms pa rnal 'byor du gyur pa'i rgyud
114a7(rgyud): rgyun mi bcad pa dang / skal pa yod la yongasu ma smon pa yongasu smin par bya ba'i 'o su gyur pa'i don gyi phyir phyogs tsam gyi sgo gcig mdun du byas te 'jug par byed chung zad
114a8(rgyud): cig bshad par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mchog tu mtshar du gyur cing rmad du byung bar gyur te dga' ba thob nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po la
114b1(rgyud): na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra so// rigs kyi bu legaso leg so// gang gi phyir kho bo cag lta bu'i nyi che ba'i shes pa dang ldan pa gzhan gyi sgra bsgrags pa'i rjesu 'gro ba'i nyan
114b2(rgyud): thos rnams la chos zab mo'i tshig gi don 'dri lta bu gsal bar byas pa ni rigs kyi bu khyod yang lagaso// lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/ 
114b3(rgyud): ji skad smras pa de bzhino// btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ting 'dzin 'anga'i ming ci zhes de skad zer ba ni ting 'dzin 'di ming rdo rje'i rnar thar pa'i sgo chen po zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan
114b4(rgyud): 'das kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog brkyang ste/ phyag g.yas pa 'jam zhing mnyan la shin tu gzhon sha chags pa gsang ba po'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la bzhan
114b5(rgyud): ste/ ched du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang ched du bka' stsal to// gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje khyod kyis gang mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di gsang ba pa'i tshig
114b6(rgyud): gi don bzhin du sen tha~Md la lung bstan cing ba shang bkrol zhing rnar phye ba lagaso lag so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
114b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas lag na rdo rje la ji ltar leg so zhes bya ba byin pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu gtogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyis kyang
114b8(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i mgo la phyag bzhag ste/ tshing du bka' stsal pa 'di dag kyang chang du bka' stsal cing leg so// zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnam
115a1(rgyud): grangs 'jig rten gyi khams mang po dag na ming 'dzin pa yang dkon na rab tu gsal bar byed pa lta ci smos gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes chos kyi
115a2(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu gang+gA'i klung chang med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bye ma'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul las shin tu 'das pa rnyed chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul
115a3(rgyud): med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyeso// dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / ma
115a4(rgyud): 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rab tu mang po dag ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de bas kyang ches mang ba'i son rnams
115a5(rgyud): ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du bya ba'i phyir bla na ma nga ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyeso// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la
115a6(rgyud): dang / de ma yin pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dpag tu med cing grangs med la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yo so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po la/ 
115a7(rgyud): na rdo rje la yang chos kyi gu ba pa dang / mchod pa'i phyir na mkha'i dkyil na rnga rnams ma brdungs par kun nas sgra byung // byang chub senga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi gzhal med khang gi khang pa
115a8(rgyud): brtsegs pa rnamasu kun nas sil snyan dang phag rdib pa dang glu dbyangs blangs pas lha'i bu mo rnams gar bye// spos dang khrug pa dang / gdug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / 
115b1(rgyud): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan dang / dpag bsam kyi shing ljon pa dang / rin po che dang / mu tig gi rgyan phreng dang / me tog pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / ud pa la dang / dri mchog dang / 
115b2(rgyud): ma'i me tog dang / pa ri sha ka dang / ba ri ka chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu sha ka dang / many+dzu sha ka chen po
115b3(rgyud): kun nas skyes dang / kun nas skyes chen po'i me tog gi char gyi sprin kun nas mngon par bab bo// spos chu'i char gyi sprin yang mngon par bab bo// de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'a
115b4(rgyud): dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / 'dzigarten skyong ba dang / gnod sbyin dang /  mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / ma mo'i gdon gyi tshogs dang / 
115b5(rgyud): 'byung po dang / brjed byang dang / skom byed dang / sgrub po dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas dang / gnon po dang / ma mo// dang / yoMyau dgas dang / sha za dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / 
115b6(rgyud): mkha 'gro ma dang / phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / mkho ra dang / ri dngagi sa'i lha la sogs pa sdang ba gdon bge gas dang / log 'dren thaMd dang / de ma yin pa gzhan yang / 
115b7(rgyud): lha dang / mi dang / mi ma yin po dag bla gos rnams phrag pa gcig tu gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bac+doMs ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud
115b8(rgyud): bsngos la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag cag gzir cing nye bar rigs sngags 'chang ba de la dngos grub stsol ba dang / dam tshig bang 'dzin du
116a1(rgyud): 'jug pa la yang dag par gnang bar bgyid par 'gyur ba rang gi snying po 'di bdag cag la bstan du gsol/ de nas bac+doMs kyis tshangs pa la sogs/ 
116a2(rgyud): pa lha'i tshogs de dag la lagaso zhes bya ba byin te/ grogs po dag gang gi phyir khyang cag 'di ltar sen thaMde la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa ni legaso leg so// de'i phyir legs
116a3(rgyud): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas khyed rang rang gi snying po bstan par bya'o// de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lag so leg so// zhes gsol to// bcom ldan
116a4(rgyud): 'das kyis lha'i rnga bo che dang / rgya mtsho dang / sprin chen po'i sgra lta bu'i gsungs tshangs pa chen po'i sgra bas lhag pa sna tshogs pa snyan cing rgya che la zab pa/ thog ma
116a5(rgyud): bar dang / kha mar dge ba/ seMn thad kyi snying du 'bad pags la ba/ 'jebs pa/ dag pa/ mnyen pa/ snyan pa/ brjod pa'i tshig khams gsum pa thang la go bar byed/ 
116a6(rgyud): gde bzhin gshegs pa seng+ge'i sgra bla na med pa des grub pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sos
116a7(rgyud): thad la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya/ dza yA ba hA/ tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi li/ lu Tu lu Tu/ dza ye bi dza ye/ dza yan+ti/ bi dza yan+ti/ a dzi ti/ a pa rA dzi te/ tad+ya te/ sarba duSh+Ta stam b+ha/ 
116a8(rgyud): ni/ dzam b+ha ni/ mo ha ni/ shI te ka rA le/ ke yU ra/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ pAt+tA rA ba saM na~M/ bar+Na sha ba ra/ shrI ye ma hA shri ye sarba ang b+hU tA ya shri ya/ pad+ma ba he/ pad+ma mA lo ne badz+ra
116b1(rgyud): ang ku shi / badz+ra mA ta/ badz+ra pA tA li/ shU li ni badz+ra d+ha re/ hi hi hi hi/ badz+ra pA Ni/ he he he he/ badz+ra pA Ni/ badz+ra shu li ni/ tsakra d+ha re/ hi hi/ badz+ra pA Ni/ he he badz+ra pA Ni/ hi hi hi hi/ he he ha he/ badz+ra pA
116b2(rgyud): Ni/ ka la ka la ba la ba la/ ra la ra la/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ sa ra sa ra hA hUM hA hwA hA/ tsaM lo mo li/ tshi la ngi la/ di da la/ ngi mi laM/ dz+wa le/ ma hA dz+wa le/ dz+wa l-i ti/ pra dz+wa li ti/ Thar thag ge tha ra/ 
116b3(rgyud): ku ti kA me/ kA ma me/ grub pa'i tshogs kyis phyag byas ma/ lha tha~Md kyi snying kun tu 'jug par byed ma/ sen thad kyi snying 'bogs ma/ sdang ba rab tu sdang ba tha~Md kyi snying 'joms ma/ 
116b4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi snying po rjesu skyong ma/ byang chub sada' thams cad kyi snying po la 'jug ma chur shog / dam tshig rjesu slong shig/ sems can thams cad kyi snying
116b5(rgyud): rnams khug la dam tshig la khang cig/ thong mkhyen pa// la phyag 'tsha lo swA hA/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa thams cad phyag 'tsha lo swA hA/ traT traT/ s+pho Da yas
116b6(rgyud): gyen du lA la swA hA/ rnam par lha la swA hA/ chu srin la swAhA/ maM la~M swA hA tshangs pa la swA hA/ khyab 'jug la swAhA/ drag po rnams la swA hA/ brgya byin la swA hA/ 'jig rten skyong
116b7(rgyud): ba rnams la swA hA/ bde la swA hA/ lnga rnams la swA hA/ nair rnams la swA hA/ ma mo rnams la swA hU~M/ mtshun rnams la swA hA/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams la swA hA/ sa la swAH/ 
116b8(rgyud): dbyangs can la swA hA/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang / srin po la sogs pa khams
117a1(rgyud): gsum tha~Mng du gtogs pa'i sems can thaMd la swA hA/ tshur shog tshur shog/ dam tshig rje su skyongs shig/ ku ru ku ruHsa ra sa ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ha
117a2(rgyud): ha na/ da ha da ha/ bca ba tsa/ hUM yAM pApa tsaN+Da li/ ma tang gi/ Dom+bi ni/ puk+ka si/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams
117a3(rgyud): grub par gyur cig swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po dang / lha thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs pa na thang dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'jigs sngangs skrag par gyur
117a4(rgyud): nas/ chu shang gi tshal rlung drag po chen pos bskyod de rtsa ba bcad pa bzhin du g.yo zhing 'gul la snying tshig ste/ rdo rje'i phur bus btab pa bzhin du thugs shang zhigs la
117a5(rgyud): 'grel zhing skyabs btsal ba'i phyir 'du sheso tsam/ gyis sangs rgyas bac+doMs la 'bod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ma
117a6(rgyud): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lho'ikhor 'di slong shog/ ngas dam tshig 'di yongasu 'dzin du ga zhug/ rig sngags grub 'byor par byed pa'i snying
117a7(rgyud): po la gzhol ba bsgragaso// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes gsang ba pa'i snying pos 'dis lha'i 'khor de dag tha~Md bslang ngo // dkan
117a8(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes drag po la phyag 'tsha lo// oM kA li kI li/ badz+ra kI li kI la ya swA hA// bac+doMs 'di ni bdag
117b1(rgyud): snying po mchog tu gsang ba lags te/ rig sngags bde 'grub par bgyid pa lag so// ngas ni bdag kyang drangs nas gzhan gyis ma btang bar mchi'o// dbang du mchi'o// dngos
117b2(rgyud): grub stsal bar bgyi'o// lung bzhin bgyi'o// srung bar bgyi'o// dpal bskyed par bgyi'o// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par bshi go// sen thams cad gdul bar
117b3(rgyud): bgyi'o// 'byung po thang rnam par bshig par bgyi'o// nang bde gsal bar bgyi'o// sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni ma gtog so// bcom ldan 'das bang gi snying po mchog
117b4(rgyud): tu gsang ba 'di nas bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa ga sum du dka' ba spyod pa chen po bgyid pa na gnod pa bgyid pa bgegs dang log 'dren thaMd kyis rnam par
117b5(rgyud): gces pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg sa pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya sa rgya mtsho mchog 'dzin me ltar blos rna
117b6(rgyud): bsgyings shing rnam par rol pa mngon shes dri 'im snang dpal gyis bdag la srung ba'i slad du stsal to// gsang po pa'i bdeg po lag na rdo rjes snying po mchog tu gsang
117b7(rgyud): ba 'di smras ma thag tu 'khor de bang bsam gtan gyi dga' ba dang bde bas tshim par gyur te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i dam tshig bstan pa gnaso// de nas bcwa
117b8(rgyud): kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ 'dzin tu chug shig/ kur chub
118a1(rgyud): bar gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig dang / nges sems can mang po la yun ring por phan pa dang / bde ba dang tha mar de/

118a3(rgyud): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / mchod pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / 'jug pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang /

118a5(rgyud): snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan 'gro log pa ra lhung bar mi 'gyuraro// rigs dma' ba rnamasu skye bar ma 'gyur/ dbul po'i rigs rnamasu skye bar mi 'gyur te/ 
118a6(rgyud): shes rab med pa yang mi yan/ ma dul bar ma yin/ tshe thung bar ma yin zhing tshe rabs tshe rab su tshe ribs dran par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur ro// bos/ 
118a7(rgyud): pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// rab tu dben pa la mngon par dga' bar 'gyuraro// 'khor ngan pa can ma yin par 'gyuraro// tshig gzung bar 'os shing snyan par 'gyu ro// skal po bzang
118a8(rgyud): zhing gzugs bzang bar 'gyuraro// shes rab chen po dang spobs pa chen po dang dbang ldan par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd mnyes par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyuraro// 
118b1(rgyud): dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin par 'gyur ro// sdig pa'i grogs po yongasu spong bar 'gyuraro// pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyuraro// sem
118b2(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par bya ba la mkhas par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing che zhing mtha' yas pa la rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur ro// nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du de
118b3(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyuraro// tshe 'di nyid la bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / rig sngags 'chang grub pa dang / 'byung po dag dang / gdon gyi tshogs dang / ma mo dang /

118b6(rgyud): dus byed par mi 'gyu ro// nga la rig sngags thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la lha thams cad kyang srung zhing spang pa dang / yongasu skyob par 'gyu ro// de'i rtsom pa thad
118b7(rgyud): kyang sla bar 'gyuraro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig la zhugs par 'gyuraro// de nas bac+doMs la tshe dang ldan pa kun
118b8(rgyud): dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
119a1(rgyud): kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub se' thams cad kyi mchod pa'i sprin du bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ de bzhi
119a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrib pa med pa bskor ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa zhes bya bar
119a3(rgyud): zung shig/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ bdud kyi phyogs 'dul ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rten cing 'brel bar

119a8(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang / lha dang / klu dang / 
119b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thad dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ba

119b3(rgyud): bo d+ha dang / dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// @#// rgya gar

119b7(rgyud): byung ba'i rdo leb yangs pa/ me tog dri zhim po bkram zhing phye ma dang / bdug pa dro zhim pa mang pos/ phug gi nang dang nags bsgos pa/ gdugs dang / a ga ru dang / phye ma dang / dril bu da

120a3(rgyud): par 'dus te/ de nas gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong dang / dge slong khro nyi stong lnga brgya dang thabs gcig/ bcom ldan 'das ni chos ston te/ gnas par bde ba

120b1(rgyud): de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dbang du bgyis te/ gnod pa dang drang bas bkug cing drangs te tho brtsams na/ bcom ldan 'das bsgrub du gsol ngas
120b2(rgyud): ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad kyi steng gi dkyil 'khor yangs pa ston pa'i mchog gi blo gros dang / blo dang / las dang / las kyi mtha' dang ldan pas
120b3(rgyud): chen po las sa gzhan thob pa rgyal chab du nye ste/ chos kyi rgyal sring la dbang bskur ba'i byang chub senga'i senga' chen po rjesu dgongs par mdzad pa tsam gyis 'ongs te/ rdo rje 'thos

121a3(rgyud): bla gos phud nas zhabs la cod pan gyis gtugs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas bal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'du'o// de nas bac+doMs kyis rjesu yi rang ba mdzad

122a2(rgyud): 'khor du 'jug/ spyod par byed/ mthu ston par byang brjod par byed/ rnam par skrag par byed ngo // stobs bcus dgongs pa bka' stsal pa'i rdo rje 'chang gi mi 'bam po me ltar rab tu

122a7(rgyud): sna tshogs gser dang rin po che 'drag rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje'i bu mo zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma nges lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ yid ches mgyogs pa'i shugs 'a
122a8(rgyud): 'phro zhing 'bar ba lta bur drag pas/ byang chub sengar seng 'a chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po la skyabasu song ngo // de 'ongs pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang gis smras pa/ skal pa chen po dag/ 
122b1(rgyud): mde bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis sems dang ldan ma/ 'di dag la lag cha dang 'thun par bya ba'i stobs byom cig/ de nas gzungs kyis smras pa/ 'di dag bka' stsa
122b2(rgyud): pa de bzhin du bgyi'o// zhes lan gsum tshig tu smra so// thor tshugs gsum ma/ sa gsum dang / dus gsum dang / drag pa'i rtsa gsum dang / khyab 'jug 'khor lo dang /

122b7(rgyud): 'tshalo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ ta thA ga ta sa mA d+hi d+hA ra Ni/ ma hA A bar+Na yi b+h+yA mi/ a hi badz+ra/ ku Ti la/ ko Ti pA ba k+Sha
122b8(rgyud): ku la sha~M khi ki bo la ke sha~M/ nga tsi cin mo Ta mi/ karka Ta mu tsI bi Ta Ti badz+re/ ma hA bi drul lo le/ bu gu pu lu/ su mu su mu/ sar sau ra/ phaT phaT su dz+ham big la tsi ti/ 
123a1(rgyud): dz+wa la bing+ga la sarba ba ga Na/ pra sa ra Na mA ya/ sid+d+ha dA mi kaM su ru kye/ ku ru ka/ badz+ra g+ho \u0f7f/ badz+ra dziSh+Ta/ sA ra pra ha raH/ rat+na tra ya/ dri kra la bu d+d+hete/ dz+ra
123a2(rgyud): mthi shwa sa ni ka/ a pra ti ha ta pra mdza ni swA hA// gang gsang sngags 'di rje su dram nas klog gam/ sgom mam/ 'dzin pa de thos mngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi gyu
123a3(rgyud): ro// 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor bang la mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro// dam tshig dang / phyag rgya la zhugs par 'gyuro// bsam pa dang rje su yi rang
123a4(rgyud): 'gugs par byedado// dag dang / gsang sngags dang / mdud pa dang / rdeg pa dang / 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnam par skrag par bye'o// de nas lha dang / 
123a5(rgyud): lha'i bu de dag gis de'i mthus bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de'i rnam par rol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ga sungs pa rnam pa mang po du ma spang myong
123a6(rgyud): nas steng gi gnas gtsang ma dang / 'og min gyi lha dang / 'jig rter gyi khams gzhan ra gnas pa dag gis 'od dang ldan pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa'i sprin dang / rin po che mang po'i tshar rgya
123a7(rgyud): chen pos mchod nas bstod pa sman pas bstod de/ snyan cing nab la rnga sgra lta bu dang / bsil ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshig su bcad pa dag kyang smraso// bcom ldan 'das kyis ngaska
123a8(rgyud): ces bka' stsal nas/ dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sang 'a de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon/ 
123b1(rgyud): par bstod do// 'phags pa rdo rje mi 'pham pa me ltar rab tu rmongs byed ces bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzin mi tra dang / dA ma shI la dpa
123b2(rgyud): lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsang chad kyis kyang btsos nas gtan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra suk+Sh+ma a pra ti ha ta nA ma d+ha ra NI/ 
123b3(rgyud): bod skad du/ rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seMnga' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// bde gshegs khro bo thams cad la
123b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis bos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rags pa'i ting 'dzin la snyom sa par zhug so// sangs rgyas kyi mthus
123b5(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po rdo rje hA zhes bya bas bzhin rab tu 'bar ba bstan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bang du 'ang gro/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi sprul pa
123b6(rgyud): las bram ze'i khye'u cig byung ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po la 'di skad ces smraso// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rig pa'i bdag po/ gzungs kyi bdag po/ lha gnas gsum
123b7(rgyud): ngag na lha nyam chung ba dang / klu nyam chung ba la zil gyis gnon pa drag pos rab tu gzhom pa'i gsang sngags dang / rig sngags gzungs sngags dam pa rab tu brjod du ba
123b8(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes smras pa bram ze'i khye'u rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / nga yis bde gshegs khro bo thams cad kyis rtag tu brjod pa'i yang snying 'di rab tu
124a1(rgyud): smraso// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsar+m+ma badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ oM dang ra har badz+ra/ ma ba ma tha badz+ra/ d+hun d+hA na badz+ra/ nga hang nga badz+ra/ pa tsa
124a2(rgyud): badz+ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra badz+ra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya badz+ra/ dA ru Na dA rA \u0f7f badz+ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da badz+ra/ b+hin+da b+hin+da badz+ra/ hUM phaT thA/ ram sh+tsa b+hA badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ hu lu phu lu/ toSh+Ti tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na sa ma a
124a3(rgyud): mri hi hA phaT thA/ bram ze'i khye'u gang la la zhig gis bde gshegs bdud rtsi 'khyil po'i cha bzung ste/ khro bo bide rgya rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu smra zhing kha spu'i bug thams cad ras
124a4(rgyud): rdo rje phra mo grangs med pa sprul te phyogs bcur spros na/ sa mas can thams cad kyi bag chags ngan pa byung / tshe dang bsod nams rab tu rgyas te/ dgra dpag
124a5(rgyud): dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba las rnam par bar nas/ gang zhig gis dmigs pa'i rgol ba ngan pa tsim g+ha d+ha sprin gyis bshig pa 'am/ s+phu ru rA rlon
124a6(rgyud): gser gyis bzhibs pa bzhin du dmigs te/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di smra zhing / rdo rje phra mo spros pas de dag gis phung po lnga dbang po myur du brlag par 'gyuraro// lhas spros na lha'i
124a7(rgyud): zla ba gcig gam/ lo lngan lha ma yin mgo 'gas par 'gyuraro// dge slong gis smras pa/ bdud kyi mtshom cha rnams myur du brtul bar 'gyur// mis brjod na gang la dmas
124a8(rgyud): ba de mo'i zla ba gcig gam/ mi'i lo lnga na nges par brlag par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis lag na rdo rje dang / bram tho'i khye'u la leg so zhes bya ba byin nas mi snang b+ha/ 
124b1(rgyud): gyur to// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des tshangs pa'i skad byung ste/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di lha gnas gsum por bsgrag so// rdo rje phra mo thogs pa med pa'i gzungs rdzogaso// 
124b2(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya sha badz+ra pA ti na hri ya/ bong skad du// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub songa' thams cad la
124b3(rgyud): phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis bos pa dus gcag na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhug
124b4(rgyud): de nas bcos kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' su la pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag
124b5(rgyud): na rdo rje bcu'i ming shes sam/ rus shes sam/ gsang snga gas shes pa de la byad kyis mi chug so// gnod sbyin dag rnar 'tshe bar mi 'gyuraro// srin po rnams
124b6(rgyud): dang / lhag ma za ba rnams dang / bdug pa pa rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyuraro// phyis 'jog pa rnams kyang gnod par mi 'gyuraro// tad+ya bA/ u ki ri ma ki ri/ ma rA tsa pa sha pa ri/ u
124b7(rgyud): e/ ma~M li me yi le me/ i lo me/ oM li ma le met+te/ hU~M re/ prA d+ha raM/ a la pa le pA la pa laM/ khru bu mo ti ku me hu me/ khi ri khi ro/ sa d+ha sad+ha/ sarba pa
124b8(rgyud): kA le/ bam bya ma bag kA le/ kun dga' bo gnod sbyin gyi sdeng po mchen po leg na du rdza bcupo 'di dag la rtag tu bang gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur nas bdag tshad lag pa dang / 
125a1(rgyud): myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa yang srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur bar byed par ba
125a2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi bkas gsol pa thob shig/ 'di lta ste rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / 'brog gnas dang / gangs gnas dang / lngas rtsen dang / nor bu bzang po dang / grags pa bzang dang / khu
125a3(rgyud): ngan gyi bus mdzes byed dang / phreng ba mdzes dang / rgyal po chen po chos skyong rnam thos kyi bu ste/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po 'di dag la rtag tu bdag gi
125a4(rgyud): phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur nas bdag gnyid / sa log pa dang / myong ba dang / rab tu myos pa na yang srung gi dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzungs pa dang / 
125a5(rgyud): yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legasu gyur par byed par bac+doMs kyis bkas gsol ba thab sha gagasang sngags gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig
125a6(rgyud): swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ sa rA sa ra Ne swA hA/ de la lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gi gsang sngags gzhi rnams ni 'di dag yin te/ tad+ya thA/ u ke te/ ke te/ sang ka te/ ung du le/ d+ha d+ha/ ta ta/ 
125a7(rgyud): ta ba ha te swA hA/ tsi tsa tsi ta/ tsi kha lo ts+tsha da ne/ b+he da ni/ sarba bAr+ye ts+tshang mi sarba kri ta/ ka khodz+ra/ pa ri kri ta nA sha mi de la rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje bcu po de dag gis
125a8(rgyud): sngags gin dam pa ni 'di rnams yi no// tAd+ya thA/ a le lak+She/ ba ke le la k+She/ a ke/ ba ke lak+Sha swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ hu tu hu tu/ hu hu hu/ bi Tubi tu/ bi tu tu/ gats+tsha gats+tsha sa pa ta pata
125b1(rgyud): ta ye swA hA// na mo b+ha ga bA to bu d+hA s+ya sid+d+han+ta man+ta pa dAHswA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / 
125b2(rgyud): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bcu'i snying po rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkha
125b3(rgyud): po dzi na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ben+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya kuN+Da l+ya mri ta hr-i da ya
125b4(rgyud): tsa tu ra nA ma d+ha rA trU~M/ bong skad du/ 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sde nga po bzhi pa ces bya ba'i gzungs// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// gnod sbyin gyi sde da
125b5(rgyud): chen po lag ni rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshalo// de nas khro bo chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis 'khor 'du sa ba bde la glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas/ 
125b6(rgyud): bac+doMs la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i sems can rnams ni bsod nams dman pa dang / tshul la mi gnas pa dang / pha ma la ma gus pa dang / 
125b7(rgyud): bsod nams chung ba dang / dad pa ma mchis pa dang glags tshol ba dang / rtag tu zang zing la bskam pa dang / rtag tu log 'dren dpa' che ba dang / sha za rnams kyis zin pa lags
125b8(rgyud): bgegs dang log 'drer de dag gzhig pa dang / mthar gtugs pa'i slad du gsang sngags bshad par 'chalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje khro la 'di skad
126a1(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// bdud rtsi thab sbyor gang khyod ser thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhus pa ni leg so legaso// khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba
126a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sngags shong cig/ de nas khri bo bdud ci thab sbyor gyis bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags
126a3(rgyud): bshad pa/ ra mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma shU NA badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ pra dz+wa la hi dI b+hi// taMSh+Totra ka Ta/ b+ha ya b+hai ra ya/ a si mu sa la/ badz+ra pa ra shre bA
126a4(rgyud): sha ha s+thA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu lu hU lu/ a mr-i takut+pa la ni/ kha kha kha kha kha na kha na/ khA nga khA pa khA hi khA ha~M/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ha maHmang hang/ bcab tsa/ grah+Na gr-ih+Na
126a5(rgyud): ban+d+ha/ gardza gardza/ tardza tardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya b+ha ga ban/ a mri ta ku dzI l-I/ mu d+hA na tA Da ya badz+re Na/ sarba big+h+nAn bi nA ya kam ni bA ra ra ya/ ma hA ga Na ba taM/ 
126a6(rgyud): dzI bau tAn ta/ ka rA ya hUM phaT phaT phaT/ oM kro d+ha ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya na ma shru NA badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mam
126a7(rgyud): hA badz+ra kro d+hA ya deny+tsota ka Ta/ b+hai ra bA ya/ a si pap+na na hastA ya/ ha he/ ba ta pa ta/ d+ha ba d+ha ba/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ a mr-i ta kut+kA lI/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha ne/ gardza gardza/ 
126a8(rgyud): ga Na pa ti dzI bi ta an+ta ka rA ya swA hA/ gsang sngags gnyis pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma shAt+ma badz+ra pA Na ya ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ bi ma la ka na ka/ 
126b1(rgyud): la b+hu Shi NA ya/ ga ga na a mri ta se b+ha bA ya/ rat+na mA l+ya/ a nu len pa na bri yA ya/ badz+ra pA Ni pri yA ya/ badz+ra pa ni hU l+ya/ be ga yA/ de ba nA ga yak+Sha rak+Sha / rAk+Sha sa pra mAr+tha nA ya tre/ 
126b2(rgyud): lo kye go tsi rA ya/ sha ta se n+ya/ pi dA pa ka rA ya/ tr-i rat+na gar b+hota ta mA ya/ a mri ta ku thA li/ e h+ye hi Sh+Tota ka ta b+ho ra bA ga ga ni bi d+yud dz+wa la spu ling ga shi na/ tu l+ye ru bo d+hiH
126b3(rgyud): se b+hu ta oM/ kha kha kha kha/ grah+Na gr-ih+Na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha ni ha na/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pra dz+wa la/ gra sa gra sa/ sarba big+har bi nA ya kA nA~M/ hr-id ma
126b4(rgyud): phaT gan d+harmA tring ya par/ r-ik+Sha hr-ing ya~M paHprasma rarAk+Sha sa tring ya phaT/ sarba dz+wa la ra hring ya phaT/ sarba sarba ba ka hring ya phaH/ sarba nA gA nar hr-i dam pa/ hU hA phaH
126b5(rgyud): da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ A bi sha A bi sha/ a dany+tsa me kAr+yaM/ ku ru badz+ra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA// gas sngags gsum pa'o// na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya/ dzaSh+NI ha~M/ ta
126b6(rgyud): ra bA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha khan d+ha ban d+ha swA hA/ khro bo bdud rtsi thab sbyor rgya gsang sngags bzhi pa'o// de nas 'di dag gi snying po
126b7(rgyud): yod pa gang gtan pa dang / bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrubs ni bdag go gsang sngags thams cad garten cing legs par bzlas brjod bgyis pa dang / bsgrubs par 'gyur
126b8(rgyud): bang bshad par 'tshalo// de la 'di ni bdag gi snying po leg so// oM a mri te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi bab sbyor gyi snying po'o// rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi bab sbyor gyis gseng sngags rnam
127a1(rgyud): bshang ma thag tu sa chen po 'di ni rnam pa drug tu g.yo so// log 'drer rnams kyang skrag ste/ skyabs med cing rten med par gyur nas de bzhin ga bye
127a2(rgyud): pa'i thang du song ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes de skad du smra zhing mgo
127a3(rgyud): thuphur du btug so// kye kye log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i ngag nyon cig/ rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar bas khyod kyi mgo bshags sa re/ ngas ral pas
127a4(rgyud): po can rnams kyi gsang sngags kyis lha'i nyo stong gi bar du log 'dren rnams bcom pa dang / btubs pa dang / brdungs pa dang / gzir ba dang / bskams pa gang
127a5(rgyud): yin pa re dran par gyis shig/ nga'i mthu dang brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po dran par rgyu sa shig/ gang 'ad gsang sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa
127a6(rgyud): dang / sgrub pa dang de srung ba byed pa de la glags ma tshol cig til smras pa 'am/ zas ma ngan pa za yang rung / grong gi chos spyod kyang rung ste/ rig pa bde sgrub pa la glags
127a7(rgyud): mtshol cog/ zan za ba'i tshe yang kham dang po sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o// nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe lan bdun brjod na de'i phyir bzhin rtag tu 'bring // log 'dren
127a8(rgyud): rnams kyang glags mi tsho lo// til dang / sran chung dang / 'bras dang / spen tsa yang rung / snum khur bar ba ta dang / la bug kyang rung ste/ khams cad kyang zar zin kyang nga'i gardza
127b1(rgyud): sngags 'dzin mde thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang yon+ta dpag tu med par shes par bya'o// 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi snying po rdzog so// @#/ rgya ga
127b2(rgyud): skad du/ kro d+ha b+hur kum kA DU rA dzi sto tra man+ta/ bod skad du/ khro bo'i rgyal po rma brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngags dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// oM b+hu ra kro ma hA
127b3(rgyud): pra Na ya/ b+hu ra tsi b+hu ki ma nA si/ u tsu sma kro d+ha hU hU paT phaT swA hA/ phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal bstod// khro la khros pas khro bo che// sangs rgyas sa
127b4(rgyud): sngar sangs rgyas// chos sku longs sku sprul pa'i sku// rme brtsegs zhes bya ba dag phyag 'tshal// bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar dbus na// pad+ma zhi zla'i gdan la bzhugs// 
127b5(rgyud): ljang nag chen po rma ba can// zhal gsuM ma pa la phyag drug ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar/ dbus ldang ba// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i mcheb
127b6(rgyud): 'byin// mi gtsang bdud rtsi sman bzhin gsol// g.yas pa rdo rje ral gri bsnams// g.yon pa zhags pa lcags kyu'o// ba mo bsdigs mdzub thugs khar ba
127b7(rgyud): smag cang med pa'i las dag brtsor// bdug pa sbrul gyis dbu lus rgyan// 'jigs sngangs med par brtul zhugs spyod// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 
127b8(rgyud): gtsang ba ni gtsang bar mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'jigs pa kun las skyob par mdzad// khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod// nang dang rims
128a1(rgyud): / las srung bar mdzad/ khro rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod // mo gtsang zas dang mi gtsang gos// thams cad srel bar byed pa'i mchog/ lha dang klu dang gnod
128a2(rgyud): sbyin gdon// thang ma lus dga' bar mdzadanang dang rims dang nga la ka yams// srung ba'i las mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod// bdag la srung ba mdzad du gsol// mi gtsang ba rnams
128a3(rgyud): gtsang bar mdzad// sme ba rnams ni mi smar mdzad// lci ba rnams ni yang par mdzad// dog pa yangs par mdzad la bstod // khro bo'i rgyal po sma brtsegs khyed// sangs rgyas kun gyi
128a4(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs// gang dag khyed la mos rten rnams/ lus bde sems ba dbang po bde// bde ba'i lha la phyag chalo// lus ngag sems dag dbang po dag/ 
128a5(rgyud): dag pa'i lha la phyag 'tshalo// lus gtsang sems pa/ tsang dbang po gtsang // gtsang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshalo// sa dang sems dang dbang po dang // dang ba'i lha
128a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// lus gsal sems gsal dbang po gsal// gsal ba'i lha la phyag 'tshalo// lha klu yi dgas 'dre srin sogs// gnod spyon 'byung pos 'ang pos na// 
128a7(rgyud): sdug bsngal zhi nas bde bar 'gyur// gangs rgyud bzhin du dkar bar 'gyur// shel dkar bzhin du gtsang bar 'gyur// me long bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur// nam mkha' bzhin
128a8(rgyud): du deng bar 'gyur// sa dang mkha' la 'khod po ya/ lha klu le sogs sde brgyad kun// dge ba'i bsam pas 'khor 'gyur te/ gzhan la ma gnod zhi bar mdzad/ khro bo rgyal ba
128b1(rgyud): sma brtsegs la bstod pa'i sngag so// @rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA ba la nA ma ma hA yA na su tra khong skad du/ 'phags pa stobs po che zhes bya ba zag
128b2(rgyud): pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub senga' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rib tang zung chen po mtsha
128b3(rgyud): ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub seng songa' chen po log na rdo rje sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ bkur nas mngon par dga' bar bya
128b4(rgyud): pa yang de nyid du 'dug par gyur to// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyag gis sen rnams dbugs 'byin cing shar phyogs na me lce kun tu 'bar ba
128b5(rgyud): phreng ba'i pad+ma'i gdan la bzhug so// bcom ldan 'ang sa kyi g.yas logs na stobs po che lags pa bzhi pa lag pa gcig na ni rnga yab thogs/ lag pa
128b6(rgyud): gcig gis ni phyag 'tshal/ g.yas pa ni ni be con thogs/ g.yon pa na ni zhags pa thogs pa/ skra khams pa gyen du brdzes pa/ mig dmar ba'o// de'i 'og na ni bac+doMs rdo rje
128b7(rgyud): 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa'o// g.yas ni ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po gnod mdze so// g.yon na ni bdud rtsi zab sbyor ro// de nas snying po rnams ni zla ba khams pa lta bur
128b8(rgyud): snying po ni ki li ki li la dang 'gro lding ba'i gzungs dang / lus dmar po dang rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa dang / rdo rje'i rgyan chen te spring ba'i mchog/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po drag
129a1(rgyud): bo chen po dang / nyen pa na ni 'phags pa mA ma ki'o// 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi 'og ma ni rdo rje'i lcags kyu nga// rdo rje lu gu rgyung ngo // sgo'i nang logasum
129a2(rgyud): khro bo rdo rje'i thob dang / rdo rje'i be con gnyis mngon du phyogs par bzhago// g.yon logasu ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzags dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas
129a3(rgyud): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logasu ni gos dkar mo'o// de'i 'og tu ni sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can no// g.yon du rig sngags kyi rgyal po rta mgrin dang / de las
129a4(rgyud): pa byang chub seda' senga' chen po brgya phrag stong dang ngo // de bzhin du shar phyogasu ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / yul 'khor srung dang / dbang po'o// me'i phyogs na ni me'i
129a5(rgyud): drang srong chen po rnams kyis bskor ba'o// lho phyogasu ni gshin rje dang / khyab 'jugo/ bder bral phyogasu ni sra na po'i bdag po ma mos bskor ba'o// nub do// 
129a6(rgyud): su ni klu'i bdag po klu la sogs pas bskor ba'o// rlung gi phyogasu ni rlung lha 'khor dang bcas pa'o// byang phyogasu ni lus ngan po 'khor dang bcas pa'o// dbang bdagi phyogs
129a7(rgyud): su ni dbang bdag tshogs kyis bskor ba'o// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / khyab 'jug dang tshangs pa chen po dang / de la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lho'i bu
129a8(rgyud): tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang ngo // sangs rgyas bac+doMs 'khor dang bcas te snga ma bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang
129b1(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje mdo sde 'di sgrub pa po 'di la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o// dkon mchogasum la phyag 'tshalo// gnod sbyin gyi
129b2(rgyud): sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshalo// oM ki li ki li badz+ra/ kI lI kI lA ya swA hA/ spyi gtsug la swA hA/ dpral ba la swA hA/ mig la swA hA/ drag shul can la swA hA/ 
129b3(rgyud): tu drag shul can la swA hA/ rdo rje'i zhags pa la swA hA/ lus dmar po la swA hA/ lag na rdo rje la swA hA/ lag na zhags pa la swA hA/ leg na ral gri le swA hA/ lag na dgra sta la swA hA/ 
129b4(rgyud): gzhu 'dzin la swA hA/ gtun shing 'dzin la swAhA/ lag na 'khor lo la swA hA/ lag na mdung rtse gsum la swA hA/ snying po la swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po la swA hA/ drag
129b5(rgyud): la swA hA/ kI li kI lA ya swA hA/ byis pa ki li ki li la swA hA// dmar po kI li kI la la swA hA/ stobs po che la swA hA/ ral pa can la swA hA/ gsus 'phyang ba la swAh+ma/ 
129b6(rgyud): khro tshal ba la swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ srin po la swA hA/ srin po ya mu ra la swA hA/ drag po chen po laM swA hA/ sprin la swA hA/ r-i 'dzin la swA hA/ ri btang bzung 'dzin la s+t+wa~M hA/ rdo rje'i
129b7(rgyud): con la swA hA/ 'dzegs byang chen po laM swA hA/ lus 'jigs byed la swA hA/ pi sngags byed la swA hA/ rdo rje'i lu gu gyung la swA hA/ rdo rje'i gtan pa la swA hA/ rdo rje lus la swA hA waM
129b8(rgyud): lding ba la swA hA/ bdud rtsi la swA hA/ dka' bub 'dzin la swA hA/ lcags kyu la swA hA/ don yong laM swA hA/ gtsug tor rgyal po la swA hA/ mdog dkar po la swA hA/ sngo bsangs mdog
130a1(rgyud): la swAhA/ 'phyung po la swA hA/ glang po la swA hA/ ba glang 'phel gyi lag pa la swA hA/ bdud kyi rnar 'phrul pa la swA hA/ sbrul gyi ske rags can la swA hA rdo rje
130a2(rgyud): phur pa la swA hA/ lag pa gnyis ka la swA hA/ a rdo rje la swA hA/ 'bar ba'i 'od byed pa la swA hA/ blo gros brtan pa'i rdo rje la swA hA/ myu gu la swA hA/ 'od byed la swA hA/ rdo rjesarba8/ 
130a3(rgyud): 'joms pa la swA hA/ rdo rje'i dra ba la swA hA/ rdo rje 'jigs byed la swA hA/ rdo rje khu tshur la swA hA/ sprin rdor 'thor ba la swA hA char pa rnar rton pa la swA hA/ rdo rje lugs kyu la swA hA/ dzaM
130a4(rgyud): snying po la swA hA/ rdo rje nye ba'i snying po la swA hA/ mthe bo'i rgyal po la swA hA/ be con gyi rgyal po la swA hA/ go cha'i rgyal po la swA hA/ oM d+h+r-i i/ dkon mchog gsum la bya/ 
130a5(rgyud): 'tshalo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la// ga na rdo rje drag po phyag 'tshalo// oM hu lu hu lu/ Sh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ a mr-i te hUM phaT swA hA/ oM a mri ta/ 
130a6(rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA/ yul 'khor srung la swA hA/ mig mo bzang la swA hA/ 'phags skyes po la swA hA/ lus ngan po la swA hA/ dbang po li swA hA/ maM la swA hA/ drang srong chen po thaMd la swAhA
130a7(rgyud): nyi ma la swA hA/ zla ba la swA hA/ gshin rje la swA hA/ khyab 'jug la swA hA/ srin po'i bdag po la swA hA/ klu'i bdag po la swA hA/ rlung lha la swA hA/ dbang bdag la swA hA/ dbang bdag/ 
130a8(rgyud): chung ma la swA hA/ brgya byin li swA hA/ nor lha'i bu la swA hA/ rdo rje chen paM la swA hA/ tshangs pa chen po la swA hA/ sa la swA hA/ dbyings can la swA hA/ lha mo dpal la swA hA/ lha mod
130b1(rgyud): thub bzlog la swA hA/ rigs sngags chen po stobs po che'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di dkyil 'khor gyi gnas 'chang zhing yid la byed na srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyu
130b2(rgyud): las thang 'grub par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun thaMd la phyag 'tshalo// gnas brdar blo gros chen ba
130b3(rgyud): radwa ti'i bu la phyag 'tshalo// byams pa la sogs pa byang chub senga' thang la phyag 'tsha lo// yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshalo// yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la bag
130b4(rgyud): 'tshalo// rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la sauphyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni ki li ki li/ ma hA ki ki li ki la/ d+hi kaM/ ka Ta ka Ta ka Ta/ ma hA ka Da/ shaum
