130b7(rgyud): he/ phaT phaT phaT/ sha ba ri shaM ba ri sha ba ri/ ma twe gi/ tsaN+Da li/ hu hu hA/ dzu hu dzu hra dzu hu/ sa pre t+yat+san/ tsi li li tsi li tsi li/ paT phaT phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ tiSh+Tau wi tiSh+Tha
130b8(rgyud): ba tiSh+Tha tha/ mA ti kra ma tha/ mA tAM gi/ hUM hUM hUM/ 6/ gal te mi 'dug ni lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / kha dang / mig pa dang / mig dang / snying dang / ngag bde bcing // 'brog go// dz+wa la
131a1(rgyud): dz+wa la/ du d+hu dre d+hu du d+hu/ be d+hu ba d+hu be d+hu/ nI la nI la nI lA ga badz+ra d+ha ra/ stobs po che zhes bya ba'i snying po dran par gyis shig/ ko Ti ko Ti ko Ti ni/ sarba b+hU taH
131a2(rgyud): badz+ra mA li/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ badz+ra ar+tha hA saM/ tsad+hu na rU mar+d+ha/ ku ru ku ru ku ru/ hu ru hu ru hu ru/ sen chen po dran par gyis shig/ hUM hUM hUM/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsatA tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/ ma hA tsatrU~M/ 
131a3(rgyud): hu rbu hAn+du huNu mu ru mu ru mu ru/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ badz+ra pA Ni/ ha na ha na a ma sar+b+ba sha trA Sh+TA na/ muN+Di tA Da ya phaT/ ku ru ku ru kr-i ru/ lag ra rdo rje'i las dang 'gal bar ma byed
131a4(rgyud): dam tshig las 'gal bar byas na dam tshig dral ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bslus par 'gyur// gsang sngags kyi gzhi ni 'di rnams yin// cu tsuM rbu/ 
131a5(rgyud): ra ha ra/ phu Du Tu phuT Tu phuTo Tu/ ta pa ni ta pa ni ta pa ni/ ba tsa ni pa tsa ni pa tsa mi/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po nga bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dran par
131a6(rgyud): gyis shig/ tsi lo tsi li tsi li/ phu lu phu lu phu lu/ phu phu phu/ bcom ldan 'das gral te bdag gi snying po 'ding dang 'gal bar bgyis mde bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsum
131a7(rgyud): pa'i mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan par gyur cig/ dar phu/ car phu/ nar phu/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshalo// bdag la gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub
131a8(rgyud): par gyur cig swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin 'khor dang bcas pa la phyag 'tsha lo swA hA/ rdo rje 'dzin gzi brjid chen po la phyag 'tsha lo swA hA/ oM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas de'i cha bzhi
131b1(rgyud): / gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i 'od zer kun tu 'bar ba'i snang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig cen gyi khams las
131b2(rgyud): 'das nas bdud kyi khyim thang kun tu 'bar rab tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te/ me lce gcig tu gyur par kun tu snang ngo // de ltar gyur pa dang / bdud sdig can ral gri dang / 
131b3(rgyud): 'khor lo dang / gzhu dang / mda' la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rnams lag na thogs te bgegs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa du ma byed do// de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can bdud kyi
131b4(rgyud): ris kyi lha'i bu ba dang lhan cig tu bdud kyi rnar 'phral pa chen pos bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs pa der dong ngo // de nas de ltar gyur pa dang / khro bo 'chol ba mngag dmar gyi/ 
131b5(rgyud): sbrang rtsi ltar mig dmar ser po/ mche ba ga tsigs pa/ mi bzang pa/ skra khams pa gyen du brdzes pa/ swakham pa gyan nga brdzas pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na becon no// 
131b6(rgyud): ga lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa/ sbrul gyis rgyan pa/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos pa/ shar phyogasu 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bye ma ste
131b7(rgyud): 'das shing de bzhin du lho dang nub dang / byang gi phyogasu yang kun tu sna // de nas bdud sdig can dang / bgegs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgya khro'i tshal pos 'dar bar gyur to// 
131b8(rgyud): bdud sdig can myos shing gzir te phongs nas srog la mi lta ba dang / gas ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes zhags pas bcing ba lngas bcangs// de ltar gyur pa dang / de'i tshe 'bab
132a1(rgyud): bral dang / dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi spos dang / me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / kha ngan sna tshogs la sogs
132a2(rgyud): pas/ bcom ldan 'das la ci rus kyis mchod ras phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo do// de nas byang chub seMnga' senga'i chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ra rdo rje sangs rgyas thad/ 
132a3(rgyud): kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ mngon par dga' bar byas ras/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rje su thugs rang ba mdzad bas sems can thams cad kyi don dang / lha dang ma rnams
132a4(rgyud): kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir rig sngags ma ga gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas don 'dod pa thams cad sbyin pa zhes bya bar stobs dpag tu mang bas
132a5(rgyud): pha rol gnod pa/ stobs po che stobs chen po'i rig snga gas kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis gzhi 'di ngag smras// gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ 
132a6(rgyud): 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ bista stang du byed dam/ bla mar byed ngam/ rim gror byung ngam/ mchod par byang na dkyil la
132a7(rgyud): thang du zhugs par 'gyur// pha rol gyis byas pa'i gsang sngags thang bshig pa dang / bcom pa dang / bsgyel bar yang 'gyur ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis rig
132a8(rgyud): sngags mchog gi rgyud chen po'i nang nas 'byung ba smra so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje ji com ldan 'das kyis rjesu thugs rangs pa mdzad pas ngor 'dod/ 
132b1(rgyud): ba thod sbyin pa zhes bya ba stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa/ stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi smras pa// / oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsam
132b2(rgyud): tha bi d+hi sa~M ya/ dza Ti la bo dang/ u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
132b3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu sto
132b4(rgyud): tam/ rim gror bgyid ngam/ mchod par bgyid na dkyil 'khor thams cad dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag ra rdo rjes yang gsol pa/ stobs po che'i
132b5(rgyud): snying po 'dzin pa lir gnod spyir ma/ gnod sbyin gyi bu ma/ srin po 'am/ srin po'i bu 'am/ grul bum mam/ grul bum gyi bu 'am na mkha' lding ngam/ dma'
132b6(rgyud): lding gi bu 'am/ klu 'am/ k+Sha'i bu 'am/ dri za 'am/ dri za'i bu 'am/ sha za 'am/ sha za'i bu 'am/ smyo byed ngam/ smyo byed kyi bu 'am/ mkha'agro 'am/ mkha 'gro'i bu 'am/ sgrub pa 'am/ 
132b7(rgyud): sprul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa dang / brjed byed dang / lus srul po dang / ro langs la sogs pa dang / gnon pa'i gdon tha~Mng dang / brjed bang la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad
132b8(rgyud): kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang po pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje leg so lag
133a1(rgyud): so// stong pa nyi // don dam pa stong pa nyi // phyi ma'i mtha' stong pa nyid// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid// 
133a2(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje sa 'di skad ces gsol to// gang mdo sde 'di rab tu ston pa de mchod par bgyi ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / rim
133a3(rgyud): gror bgyi ba dang / bskor bar bgyi ba'i 'osu 'gyur ba lag so// de nas bac+doMs lag na rdo rjes stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon pa stobs po che'i gsang sngags kyi
133a4(rgyud): gzhi smras pa/ oM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ la ga na mdung rtse gsum thogs pa drag shul can/ hUM hUM hUM/ paH phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ta na~M rA da/ hUM hUM hUM/ oM o o/ phaT phaT phaT/ 
133a5(rgyud): stobs po che la swA hA/ oM/ rdo rje khro stobs tha che/ ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bi kir/ bi d+h+wan sa ya dza Ti li bi dza/ u tsuSh+ma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM dz+wa la dz+wa la/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ swe b+ha ya/ 
133a6(rgyud): swA b+ha ya/ du rA rA duSh+TA na ni bA ra ya/ bdag la bsrungs shig srungs shig swA hA/ oM a nan+ta bi dza ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da/ hUM phaT swAhA/ oM d+h+r-i ga hUM phaT/ oM shI ra ye/ shai ri mA li ni/ si
133a7(rgyud): ni si mi shi shi ni shi shi ni/ oM sar+b+ba At+ma dza/ ma hA ta dza badz+ra/ a sha ni badz+ra/ pA sha a nu/ pra bi sh+ya/ sar+b+ba duSh+TaM/ staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya/ hUM phaT/ oM hUM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM/ oM a man+ta / bi dza sa
133a8(rgyud): ya ma hA tsatAM/ hUM ga/ oM phaT phaT phag badz+ra kro d+ha hU dag/ oM badz+ra ka d+ha ka ri ka ra ka ra/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ hU phaT/ oM bidz+ra kr-i d+ha/ ma hA ba la/ d+ha ki d+ha kadz+wa la dz+wa la hU~M Ti/ oM bi pu pa yA
133b1(rgyud): badz+ra bany+dza ra hUM phaT/ oM ki li ki li/ badz+ra badz+ra b+hu ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ A kaR+Sha ya/ hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ nga ra nga ra/ bA ra ya dA ra ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra
133b2(rgyud): dA ma hA ba la/ ha na ha mang ra da ra/ dA ra ya dA ra ya/ pi Ta ya pa Ta ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ta Ta ta Ta/ ta Ta ya tA Ta ya/ hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la
133b3(rgyud): dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dz+wa la pradz+wa la/ di pya dipya/ dI pa ya dI pa ya/ hUM phaT/ oM tsu ru tsu ru/ u nr-iSh+ma kro d+ha/ shi kha ra ha ra ha ra/ hUM phaT/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// gnod sbyi
133b4(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po lag ma rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshal// oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha ma hA tsatA/ ha nad ha pa tsam tha ki ra/ bi d+h+wan sa ya/ bac+doMs chung gshegs chur gshegs/ 
133b5(rgyud): ha na ha na/ ha ra ha ra/ da ha da ha/ pacab tsabi d+h+wa na sa ya bi d+han sa ya/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi bdag pos mchod pa bad kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa/ gzi brji
133b6(rgyud): chen po/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ku ru ku ru/ g+hu ru g+hu ru/ kur+m+ma kur+b+ha ma hA kurba/ bi kurma/ ku nan+ti ku nanI/ na Ti na Ti/ shi ni shi ni/ khi ni khi ni/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ku ru ku ru/ tuT tu
133b7(rgyud): Ta tuT Ta tuT Ta/ traT Ta traTaT/ tu ru tu ru/ 'byung po'i bdag po/ klu'i bdag po/ lha ma yin gyi grong khyer rnar 'joms par byed pa khro bo tshol pa stobs po che/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ ka
133b8(rgyud): kar/ ku ru ku ru/ su ru su ruHhUM phaT/ ha na ha ma hUM ga/ da ha da ha hU phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ hri dI hU~M hUM/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ oM tsu lu tsu lu sA hA/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la
134a1(rgyud): s+tha da?m+b+ha sad+d+ha ya saHya/ mo ha ma mo ha ya tru paT/ o haH/ sa ras pa thos rab sa pa/ g+hA ta ya g+hA tas/ mdzes pas ma hA sa pa hUM/ 
134a2(rgyud): oM dz+ra bo rngam hAb la/ sa ra ha ra/ kha kha/ lA~M si ShA hi/ nA sha ya nA sha ya pU kau hU~M hU mA mA/ mA ma phaT/ a d+hiki krod+ha mang dag la bsrung shig bsrungs shig sa hA/ a/ 
134a3(rgyud): ba la/ badz+ra d+ha ra/ ka ra ka ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha dzA phaT+Ta swA hA/ oM dz+wa la gra se/ u nurl-i sa ga ro hU~M/ rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag kyang spong ba dang / yongasu srung ba dang / bsgrub pa
134a4(rgyud): dang spyad par byed par 'gyur// lag na rje rjes smras pa/ gang gzungs 'di 'chang ba mi dgi bar 'gyur// drag mo gnod par 'gyur/ shi ba sos par byed par 'gyur/ dgran
134a5(rgyud): kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur// bu mang bar gyuro// sa phyogs kyang 'gas par 'gyur ro// gsang sngags bang 'grub par 'gyuraro// las thams cad kyang nus par
134a6(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gdug pas zin pa rnams la ni sbyor chus 'tshe bar 'gyur// dug zad kyang dag ma yin par byed par 'gyur// mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang / bu mo yang bde ba
134a7(rgyud): bcas par 'gyur// mdo sde 'ad zhag gsum bcangs na rgyas par 'gyur// zhag bdur bcangs na zhi ba chen por 'gyur// de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang bdag rig
134a8(rgyud): sngags 'chang bye ba phrag dri mas bskor ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nas langs te/ byang chub so nga seMde' chen po gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa la mam
134b1(rgyud): bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sede'i sede' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra so// stobs po che'i bstan pa thogs pa med pa/ stobs dpag tu med pas pha rol gnon
134b2(rgyud): pa/ lag na rdo rje dga' ga/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / tshangs pa'i dbang pos phyag byas pa/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / ro langs dang / lus srul po 'jigs par byed pa
134b3(rgyud): smyo byed dang / skrong ba dang / gsong ba dang / skam byed dang / sgo glegs dang / 'khrul 'khor dang / gtan pa dang / rdo rjes rnam par 'joms pa las thams cad byed pa/ dkyil
134b4(rgyud): 'khor gsang ba dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshad du gsol// de na sa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis 'byung po'i bdag
134b5(rgyud): po dbang bdag la 'byung ba'i bdag po la gso// legaso zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'angs kyis rdo rje sbar te/ rdo rje la bzhugs pa'i tshul gyis
134b6(rgyud): bzhugs nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnar gzigs nas rdo rje mi bzad pa khro bo chen po bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa zhes bya ba'i
134b7(rgyud): ti 'dzin dang / sems can bang la cher snying rje ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 'od zer 'bar zhing snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos bad kyis dga' ba kun tu sto/ 
134b8(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / bdud thams cad kyi yul 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / san par kyi yul
135a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / chos kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin dang / stobs
135a2(rgyud): po che zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin to// de ras bcom ldan 'das lag ma rdo rjes sdom bag can du rdo rje spar te/ de nas rdo rje pad+ma la gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ bde dang ldan
135a3(rgyud): pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas rdo rje mi bzang ba khro 'chol pa lus sbrul gyi ska rags kyis rgyan pa dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms
135a4(rgyud): par zhug so// zhugs ma thag tu khro bo'i tshol pas bgegs bye ba brgya stong brag du ma 'ang ri te gzir bar bdag nyid kyis mthong ngo // de dag tshig nas sme zhing srog btang ste/ 
135a5(rgyud): sreg pa'i bskal pa snyam du sems shing nyams thag pa'i skad kyis dus te byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje'i gan du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das
135a6(rgyud): yongasu bskyab du gsol/ byang chub seng yongasu bskyab du gsol bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro ba 'chol bas gzir cing myos te 'phangs ras
135a7(rgyud): srog la yong mi blta'o// de nas byang chub senga'i sanga' chen po lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la smras pa/ kye ma'o khro ba chen
135a8(rgyud): po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// ma thu che ba'o// de dag gis 'di skad ces smras// bcom ldan 'das de nga bzhin te/ kye ma'o khro ba chen po 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// ma bu che ba'o// 
135b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub seng la seng ba chen po lag na rdo rje seng+ge'-i sta stangs kyis bltas nas 'byung po'i bdag po'i khro ba 'tshal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang bcas
135b2(rgyud): smras pa/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsam tha ba d+ham sa ya/ dza Ti la bo d+ha ra/ u rbuSh+ma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ a e mA hA swAhA/ grogs po dag gang la la zhig khro bo spobs
135b3(rgyud): po che'i di'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs na de'i don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'cha bas dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// nga'i lus la drag po'i las dang / nad
135b4(rgyud): zad kyis mo tshugs par 'gyur// de la bgegs dang mi dang rnam par log 'dren gyis glags rnying par mi 'gyuraro// skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// dag
135b5(rgyud): thams cad med par 'gyur// 'dir zhugs na gsang ste gas thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// khro bo thams cadatshi ga yang lhun gyis grub pa nyid du 'grub
135b6(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// 'dir dbang bskur na bkra mo shes pa thaMd las rnam par grol bar 'gyuraro// dpal gyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo chen po lan khris sngar
135b7(rgyud): sbyang bar byas te khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor byed pa byas pa gzo ba/ rgyud shes pa/ gso sbyong gau yan lag brgyang dang ldan pa gsum la skyabasu dong ba/ byang chub kyi
135b8(rgyud): sems dang ldan pa khyams pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ snying rje can du gyur pa/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba/ dbang bskur ba/ bla ma rnams kyi lung byin pa/ gang bdud bde dang / spang
136a1(rgyud): ba'i sems rnar 'jig par byed pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs pa che zhes bya ba 'di b.rang ba dang klog pa de bdud dang / dgra bad kyis mi tshugs pa
136a2(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang yi dgas dang / sha za dang / lus srul po dang mkha'agro dang / brjod byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa la sogs pa thad da
136a3(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyu ro// dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las bar par 'gyur ro// bsod pa dang / bicing ba thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// 
136a4(rgyud): bcad pa thams cad las thar par 'gyu ro// rmugs byed dang / rangs byed dang / rmongs byed la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa ba las thar bar 'gyuraro// klu'i 'jigs pa thams ca
136a5(rgyud): las bar bar 'gyuraro// bkra mi shis pa thams cad lasathar par 'gyur ro// seMn dbul po gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dus gsum du 'chang
136a6(rgyud): ngam/ klog gam/ yid la byed ngam/ rjesu dran par byed na dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par 'gyuraro// lo nyes pa byung ba'i cha/ stobs pa che lan bdun bklags ma
136a7(rgyud): sprin chen po las char 'ba'o// gal te char mi 'bab na sprin gyi lha rnams kyi srog skam par 'gyuraro// klu'i rgyal po nag po dang / klu'i rgyal po 'khor lo dang / klu'i rgyal po mtha'
136a8(rgyud): yas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi sprin chen po las char 'beb so// gal te char mi 'bebs na srog bskams par 'gyuraro// gong du smos pa'i cho ga bzhin du mchog kyi
136b1(rgyud): cha'am/ rlung gi ngogs sam rgya mtsho'i 'gram mam/ mchod rten gyi gnasu// byang chub seng se 'a chen po lag na rdo rje la mchod pa chen po byas te/ tsan+da dmar po dang / kar
136b2(rgyud): bi ra'i me tog dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / a ti mu kA ka me tog dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dmar po la sogs pa 'am/ bum pa spos chus bkang ba la sogs pas
136b3(rgyud): mchod pa byas te/ gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa de g.yul ngo thams cad du zhugs kyang pha rol gyis mi tshugs par 'gyu ro// sems cad thams cad dga' bar
136b4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// bkra mi shes pa thang las rnam par grol bar 'a gyur// stobs po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la brtags te/ g.yul ngor song na pha rol gyis mi tshugs
136b5(rgyud): par 'gyur// gsang sngags grog la bris te spyi bor ba tags na g.yul ngor mtshon cha rnams me tog bzhin du lhung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bdud nges bac+doMs
136b6(rgyud): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas stobs po che zhes bgyi ba ci lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs
136b7(rgyud): che zhes bya ba ni de bzhir gshegs pa'o// skabs po che zhes bya ba ni chos// stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phung po'o// stobs po che zhes bya ba ni chos kyi chu'o// 
136b8(rgyud): spongs pa che nas bya ba'i theg pa chen zas// spangs pa che zhes bya ba lag rdo rje'o// de nas bdud sdig car gyis spras pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag pa lag mdzu rgya
137a1(rgyud): leg so// skyabasu mchi'o// sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das legaso leg so// dge bsnyen gyi yan lag gzung
137a2(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// bde dang thar dang mtho ris dang / mkhas pa dag dang sen ni/ dam pa kun la phan pa'i phyir/ stobs po che ni gzung bar bgyi/ de nas bdud sdig can ches la 'ga' zhing sde
137a3(rgyud): bde ba dang rangs gzigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che'i mdo sde 'di ni sems can dmyal ba dang / dung
137a4(rgyud): 'gro dang / yi dgas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal las thar par byed pa'o// de bskal pa stong phrag nyi shu ra lha'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur// kha skal pa
137a5(rgyud): mtha' yas par gling bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los phra sbyar bar 'gyuraro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog par byed do// rig sngags
137a6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po stobs che'i snying po 'di ni gtsang sbra can nam/ gtsang sbra med pa 'am/ sbyang bar byas pa 'am/ sbyang bar ma byas pa 'am/ 'khrig pa'i chos la sten pa la 'a
137a7(rgyud): 'grub par byeng ngo // de la bar chad du mi 'gyur// de nas rab 'byor 'khor de nyid na 'dug par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che ji lta
137a8(rgyud): gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ni ci zhig stsol ces gsol ba dang / bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje la dri ba dris shig/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje rig sngags
137b1(rgyud): kyi rgyal po stobs po tsha ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ dam pa ni ci zhig sbyin par byed/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'bru sbyin par byed do// gos sbyin par byed do// dngul sbyin par bye'o// 
137b2(rgyud): gser sbyin par byed do// ba glang sbyin par byed do// dam pa gang 'dod pa'i dam po de sbyin par byed do// rab 'byor gyis smras po/ spyi'i 'bra smra zhes bya ba 'am/ lag na rdo rjes
137b3(rgyud): smras pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin to// sems can nyon mongs pas bsgribs pa rnams ni 'bras bu'i dusu gar so// 'bra spu'i dus kyi yon gyi don du gnaso// yon gyi don gyis bla na
137b4(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam la 'jog par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lag na rdo rje legs leg so// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid ldan pa ste/ stobs
137b5(rgyud): che ni shes rab ldan// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid phun sum tsho gas// spyi nas dbang bskur yid kyang gzhungs// mtshan dang yang dag ldan pa ste// sprin dang tshul khrim
137b6(rgyud): shes rab che// rdzu 'phrul che zhing stobs kyang che/ dbang cher grags shing bsod nams tshe/ yon tan rtse mo stobs po che/ mdo sde 'di la dbang bskur phyir// sangs rgyas brgyad
137b7(rgyud): stong dar gshegasaso// byang chub songa'i lag na rdo rjes mdo sde 'di nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa'i lag pa spro bo'i bzhag ste dge ba byed par 'gyur ro// gang gis gzungs 'di sa la
137b8(rgyud): ri 'am/ klung gi ngogs sam/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du bcangs na 'jigs pa tha~Md kyis 'jigs pa med par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sengar lag na
138a1(rgyud): rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de bro dang ma mchis
138a2(rgyud): par lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rjes yang / gsol pa/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
138a3(rgyud): pa/ mdo sde 'a'odi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ chos kyi nyi ma zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ chos kyi zla ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ ngor tha~Mng grub
138a4(rgyud): ba ces bya bar yang zung shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha mas cad kyi chos kyi sprin ces bya bar yang zung shig/ sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa'i gzungs
138a5(rgyud): sngags zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rig sngags 'cha dbang grub po'i rgyal po zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar yang
138a6(rgyud): zung shig/ chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon du 'gro ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che zhes bya bar yang zung
138a7(rgyud): shig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'cha ba dang / klog pa dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / bsti stang du byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / 
138a8(rgyud): rim gror byang ba dang / mchod par byed pa nges 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sengar rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyuraro// 'das
138b1(rgyud): pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi mchod rten sku gdung dang bcas pa la mchod par byas par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das le/ 
138b2(rgyud): so leg so// shin tu zab pa'i chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul gyi yin+da gyi rgyan gyi chos bstan pa gzung bar brgya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag ma
138b3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu gang mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de la sdang ba'i sen rnams chu 'gram gyi shing ltar ma rungs par 'gyuraro// spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa
138b4(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / kha ngan sna tshogs la sogs pas ma tshong pa byas na bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de la bar chod mi 'byung ba
138b5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// mdo sde 'di gnas gang yang rung ba na 'chang na lha dang / mar bcas pas mchod pa byed par 'gyuraro// rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che bgegs
138b6(rgyud): dang / rnam par lag 'dren thad 'ching ba yod la byed na sangs rgyas brgyang spong dang / byang chub senga' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / drang srong chen po rnams dang / lha dang / 
138b7(rgyud): klu dang / dri bar bcas pa rnams bgyes dga'o// stobs po che gzungs sngags 'di la dgyes pa'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub bas 'di skad ces
138b8(rgyud): stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje su mdo sde la gus par mi byed pa de dag sen dmyal ba chen po brgyad po ngag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na
139a1(rgyud): rdo rje su mdo sde 'di la gus par byed pa dang / rim gro byod pa dang / mchod pa byed pa de bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyuraro// yi ge 'dri
139a2(rgyud): 'am/ tshig mnyan na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ thub pa'i chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ shin tu phra ga shin tu zab
139a3(rgyud): pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sems can rnams kyi nang nas gang log par sems pa de myos par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
139a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje san rnams kyi don gyi phyir mdo sde 'di bshad par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa ba sal ba dang / zhi bar bya ba dang / rgyas par bya ba dang / dbang
139a5(rgyud): bskur ba dang / bkra mi shis pa bde las thar par bya ba dang / dpal gyi byin gyis brlabs par bya ba dang / sdig pa thams cad byang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad
139a6(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba'i phyir bshad par bya'o// de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad stong dang par mdzad nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya ba
139a7(rgyud): pa la lan gsum bskor ba mdzad de/ thal mo sbyar nas legs par rab tu bshad po legaso zhes mngon par bgyes par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas
139a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas de dag la slar gsungs pa// bcom ldan 'das dag legs par rab tu bshad pa legaso lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs po che'i
139b1(rgyud): gsang ba'i chos bstan pa 'di'i mthus byang chub senga' lag na rdo rjes sdang ba bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad kyi stong 'dar zhing 'gul bar mtho // dkom
139b2(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ oM ha na ha na badz+ra badz+ra/ da ha da ha de ha badz+ra/ ba tsa pa tsa
139b3(rgyud): ma tha ma tha badz+ra/ dz+wa la dzA la/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ ka Te ka Ta/ dza ye bi dza ye/ a dzi te/ oM ba rA dzI te/ ma ra sau n+ya ba marda ni sAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba
139b4(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes rnam par log 'dren thang bsdigs shig/ chings shig/ chings shog/ rnar tshoms shog me grub pa rnams grub par gyis shig/ grub
139b5(rgyud): pa rnams dul bar gyis shig/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'bab pa ra gyis shig/ lha dang / klu thams cad tshur shog chung
139b6(rgyud): chung shog/ ngas stobs po che khro bo'i mthus dge bar bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las 'das nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo
139b7(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs 'du byed
139b8(rgyud): kyi mi rtag ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags// bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyon cig/ 'du byed thams cad ni
140a1(rgyud): dri za'i grong khyer dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni klog dang sprin dang 'dra'o// 'du byed bde ni khyim dang dbu ba dang 'dra'o// 'du byed bangad ni mar me dang 'dra'o// 
140a2(rgyud): 'du byed thams cad ni chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thad ni chu shing dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ni ri mo'i rnam pa dang 'dra'o// 'du byed thams cad ri me tog dang 'dra'o// / 
140a3(rgyud): 'du byed bde ni rmi lam dang 'dra'o// 'du byed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi 'khor lo dang 'dra'o// 'du byed 'di dag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi klung dang 'dra'o// 'khrug
140a4(rgyud): par 'gyur bas rgya mtsho dang 'dra'o// skar me dang 'dra'o// seni rnams ni 'du byed 'di dag skye bar mi sems/ mi ma thong mi shes mi 'jal gyi/ de bzhin ga bya
140a5(rgyud): pa nyid kyis gzig so// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'ja'o// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// 'du byed thang ni stong pa nyid du mtshan nyid cig pa
140a6(rgyud): mkhyen to// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du
140a7(rgyud): mkhyen to// chen po spyod pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// de bzhin nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mkhyen to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mtshan nyid 'di nyid
140a8(rgyud): zhing mtshan nyid 'di shes te/ spyod po'i byang chub singa' rnams ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzang ba dang / brtson 'grus dang // 
140b1(rgyud): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// mtshan nyid 'ang nyid shes pa ni byang chub sanga' zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub senga' sanga' chen po 'phags
140b2(rgyud): pa spun ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'odas la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
140b3(rgyud): mdo sde 'di mtshan nyid gang gis na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bgyi/ bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de bzhin
140b4(rgyud): gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes
140b5(rgyud): bya'o// mdo sde 'di yongasu nub pa'i tshe de bzhin gshig/ sa pa'i bstan pa yongasu nub par 'gyur te/ mtshan nyid nges rang bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa
140b6(rgyud): bya'o// mdo sde 'di 'tsho zhing sdong mang bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang 'tsho zhing sdong ngo / mtshan nyid des na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin rgya
140b7(rgyud): pa bad kyang mdo sde 'di nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan nyidang des ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhes bya'o// de nas 'phags pa spyan ris gzigs dbang phyug
140b8(rgyud): ldan 'das la rje su yi rang nas bka' lung bzhin gyi zhing / su mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i gan du mtsha'o zhes gsol pa dang / bac+doMs kyis bka' stsal pa mdo sde 'di nyid
141a1(rgyud): kyis mthus sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sede' thams cad la dang / lha thams cad 'ong ngo // lha thams cad kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// legaso lag so/ 
141a2(rgyud): cag kyang dam pa stsal bar mngon par dga' ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub seMng bad kyang dam pa 'di nyid stsol bar mdzad par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa
141a3(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po lagar rdo rje spobs po che'i gsang ba po'i snying po mi sems can thams cad la bang babang spyor par byed pa'o//  ras bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sengab sa

141a8(rgyud): dang klog pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad srasu 'du shes bskyed ngo // 'khor de zhing du 'chi ba'i dus byas nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'jig par mdzad/

153a3(rgyud): ba'i de ma thag tu ni// phyogs bcu'i rog sngags 'chang ba rnams// ngo mtshar bskyed nas thal mo sbyar// bde ba'i snying po shin tu legs// lagaso lags rdo rje 'dzin// gang la
153a4(rgyud): bde bskyed dpal thob byed // bdag cag rnams la thug rje yis// rgyud kyi snying po 'di bshad pa// rje chen legs ngo mtsharache/ 'phags pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtog pa
153a5(rgyud): las sbyin bsreg gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 'phags ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud rtog pa u r+yan nas byung ba rdzog so// / paN+Di ta a tu la dA sha badz+re zhus nas/ 
153a6(rgyud): bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur ba'o// / @#/ rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra dun+da nA ma nA ga sa ma ya/ bod skad du/ rdo rje mchu
153a7(rgyud): zhes bya ba klu'i dam tshig/ thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po g.yog 'khor na bzhugs te/ 'khor 'dus pa tsha
153a8(rgyud): po 'jog po la sogs pa klu'i 'khor dang / lha dang mi'i tshogs kyi 'khor chen po la sen rnams kyi don chen po'i phyir te/ bsam pa dang re ba thang yongasu bskor ba bde
153b1(rgyud): bar byed pa'i chos ston to// de nas grong khyer de nas bram ze'i khye'u khyab ma spyan zhes bya ba phyug pa nor che ba/ long spyod che ba/ rdzas dang yo byad mang po phun sum tshogs pa/ rig rgya
153b2(rgyud): dang rig byed kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa/ sngags la 'jug pa/ sngags grub pa zhig 'dug ste// de yang yang dang yang du klu 'gugs zhing me'i sbyin bsreg byed do// bram/ 
153b3(rgyud): de'i lo smin kar char chad par gyur nas// nges nga rgyal gyi sgras sngags brjod pa dang 'thun pas 'di skad ces bdag gis char pa'i rgyun dbab cing klu dgug par bya'o zhes smra/ 
153b4(rgyud): / des ma'i sbyin bsreg bya bar bshams nas til dang 'bras dang / yungs kar rnams 'bru mar tsha ba dang / bsregs te sbyin sreg bye'o// de nas klu mi srun pa zhig gi/ 
153b5(rgyud): gzugs byas te/ ngas lpags kyi phung bu la bsngags nas klu spyi bor btab pa dang / klu'i spyi bo gas nas sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen por gyur to// klu de yang cher
153b6(rgyud): 'khrugs te khros nas skad cig bang cig yud tsam de la klus khyab par byed pa'i shugs kyis cher gnod cing rdul 'byung ba'i 'od zer tshab rang gi lus las bkyes
153b7(rgyud): gnod pa chen pos khebs par byas nas bram ze de'i zhing tshig par byaso// de yang lce 'bab pa'i char gyi rgyun chen po bram ze'i lus la phab nas bram ze de mgon med// sgyu
153b8(rgyud): meng dpung gnyen med de/ me'i sbyin sreg byed pa btang nas de bcom ldan 'das la mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyen btsal te/ 'bros par bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'a
154a1(rgyud): kyi drung du brgyugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
154a2(rgyud): 'das klu khro bo bdag gi srog ma rungs par 'tshal te skyabasu yang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bsgrub tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bskyab du gsol// de nas bac+doMs
154a3(rgyud): kyis bram ze chen po de dbugs phyung nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bram ze chen po mi 'jigs shog/ ngas khyod kyi mgon dang / skyabs dang / dpung gnyer bya'o zhes bka'
154a4(rgyud): stsa la nas cang mi gsung bar bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gdod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
154a5(rgyud): gzigasu gsol// mngon sum du gyur bzhin du yang kA mi bgrungs pas lo tog ma rungs par bgying ma/ bcom ldan 'das khyod yongasu mya ngan las 'das kyi
154a6(rgyud): slad na slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can thams cad kyi rten ni su lags/ ji ltar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das me tog thad kyi don du lo tog rnams chog par mi 'gyur ba
154a7(rgyud): dang kun tu srung ba dang / rab tu 'phel bar bgyid par gyur pa lo tog yongasu skyong zhing klu bzlog pa de bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po la

154b1(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yod de nges bshad par bya'o// des myur du gnod pa bkag pa'i phyir lo to//

154b6(rgyud): slad du gzungs chen po 'di'i sngags kyi tshig bshang du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snying po 'di bka' stsal to// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ sarba bud+hA nA na/ na mo b+ha ga pa

155a1(rgyud): ti/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra sa ran+ti/ sarba sa dri s+ya ra nA ma dri ba na ya dri/ pu ya pha la phaT/ dra san+d+hu ra Ni/ a pa sarbAn+tu sarba nA ga to sha sarba ba b+ha ba
155a2(rgyud): b+ha ni// be ga ta be ga ba ti swA hA/ hUM hUM phaT/ nA ga bi sa ra Ni phaT/ dz+wa la mA lo ni phaT/ dz+wa la mA li ni phaT/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyis klu bde dang / klu mi 'grungs

155b2(rgyud): der bcom ldan 'das klu gtse bar mi bgyid do// gang na snying po gzungs 'dis srung bar bgyis pa dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang bar bgyis pa dang /

155b7(rgyud): bya ba las thams cad byed pa dge bar bya ba brjod par bya'o// lo tog la gnod par byed na/ de'i tshe rig pa 'dzin pas zhing gi dbus sam khang snang ngam// gnas mngon
155b8(rgyud): bar dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas l-i phyogs bzhir bum pa bkang ba bzhi bzhagau/ me tog sil mas gcal dkram su bzhago// gzugs 'khyil pa bdun bya'o// 
156a1(rgyud): 'bras las byas pa'i 'khyil pa bdun byas te// gzugs re re zhing yang gzugs nyi shu rtsar bya'o// 'bras dang 'o thug bsres pa dang / zho dang / 'o ma bzhag

156a3(rgyud): byung ba lnga dang 'o ma dang chus dgang ngo // yungs kar dang 'bras yas blugs par bya'o// sngags lan drug cur yongasu bzlas par bya'o// seng ldeng gi phur bu bzhi dang // lcags kyi
156a4(rgyud): phur bu gcig bya ste/ thams cad sor brgyad kyi tshal du bya'o// kha ser skya'i lci ba 'am/ bag phye las byas pa'i klu'i gzugs bzhi bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi grwa

156a7(rgyud): bya'o// phog por re re ste lnga bzhag par bya'o// yungs dkar dang / pra yongasu bsres pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor ro// gzungs 'di bris
156a8(rgyud): la rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir gzug so// zhing gi dbusu yang gzug so// bskyed mos tshal gyi dbu su yang gzugasaso// de bcugs ma
156b1(rgyud): thag tu phyogs bzhi kun nas ri sul chen pos mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro// ji srod du phur bu ma byung ba de srid du mtshams bcang ba chen por 'gyur ro// lo tog thang dang / me tog
156b2(rgyud): dang / 'bras bu thams cad legs par bsrungs par 'gyur// tha na 'dab ma gcig kyang bskams par mi 'gyur na/ yal ga dang / sdong bu bskams par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ 
156b3(rgyud): srog chags kyi rigs ri dgas dang bya thams cad kyang kha bcings par 'gyuraro// ma rungs par byed kyang mi nu so// gnas der rlung dang / sgron dang / ser ba dang / sang dang dus ma yin

158a6(rgyud): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smra so// na ma b+ha ga ba te shAkya rA dzA ya/ ta bA ga tA ya/ na mo a ka tA ya/ ma hA ri'i ya/ tad+ya thA/ kA mo ru li/ tsal tsa la/ tsar ngo ma
158a7(rgyud): ban+d+ha ni/ nA sha na/ da ha da ha/ su mu ri tsa raM sarba dub+hin ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ma du nA ban+d+ha ni/ sa ra sa ra Ni/ kU k+Sha k+Shu/ ma Thi shu ra bi sa ra sa ra/ ha li hu l-i/ du ti hu ti/ sa ra ma ni/ sa ran+tu/ sarba pA pa bA

158b1(rgyud): bub tu 'gyel nas bcom ldan 'das la skad kyis gsang mthon pos smre sngags 'don te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ma rungs lag so// drang srong gi dmod pa bab par gyur to//

158b8(rgyud): 'di lan bdun stong bzlas pa dgyi ste/ bzlas pa tsam gyis klu gnod par sems pa thams cad tsha bas gdungs par 'gyur// rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa'i bar gyi srog cha/ 
159a1(rgyud): kyi rigs thams cad dmed pas gdungs par gyur te thams cad 'byor ro// slar yang phyogs der lo tog la gnod pa mi bgyid do// srog chags kyi

159a5(rgyud): la banod sbyin gyi sde dpon cher po lagar rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsel po slad ma'i tshe slang ma'i dus na rjes srung bar 'gyid/ yongasu srung bar bgyid na/

159a7(rgyud): cho ga rdzogaso// // de nas de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das zham ring chen po dang / 'khor 'dus pa chen po dang / bkod pa chen po dang / yon yod pa'i mthu chen po dang
159a8(rgyud): 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pas rgyal po chen po rnam pas kyi bu'i gnasu gshegasaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam thos kyi bu'i gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig
159b1(rgyud): tu bon pa dang / sa phyogs de na 'brog gi nags nyi shu pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ nags de'i mthongs na rdzing bu zhig yod la/ rdzing bu de'i mthus lhung lo can gyi pho brang 'khor gyi/ 
159b2(rgyud): zhong dang / kur dga' dang / nags dang / 'dab ma dang / me tog dang / 'bra s+phu rnams kun tu tshim par gyur to// skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / ba lang dang / rta dang / rta rgan/ 
159b3(rgyud): ma dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / skye ba'i tshogs thams cad bde bas tshim par gyur to// rdzing bu de yang phyogs bzhi kun tu rgyar dpag tshad gnyis kyi chang do// 
159b4(rgyud): bung yang me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang ku mu dang / bu na da ra ka sna tshogs kyis kun tu khebs shing / nya sna tshig sa dang / chu bran dang nya ming dang chu srid byis pa

160b3(rgyud): rgya mtsho dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba bac+doMs gang na ba der dong sde lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to//

164a8(rgyud): dang / ba sha sha bsres te bu ram khu bas sbrul la shes rab can gyis sngags lan brgyad cu bzlas te/ ril bu rgya shug gi 'bru tsam du byas la char mi 'bab pa'i dus na ril/

165a7(rgyud): rnam par 'tshe bar bgyid pa rnams kyi don du dam tshig ma 'tshal ba rnams bzlog pa'i sngags kyi tshigs bshad par 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol// 
165a8(rgyud): klu'i bdag po dag ngas dam tshig gi sngags byin gyis brlabs kyis da shod cig/ na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya mu ne ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ tad+ya thA/ b+hu dze b+hu dze/ sa ma ya b+hu dze/ tatwa b+hu dze/ sa
165b1(rgyud): man+ta A kA ra b+hu dza/ pu ru du ru swAhA/ sa ma ya ba la ne swA hA/ nA ga ma ra sany+tso ra ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das slangad mi'i cha slang mo'i dus nakU mi bkrung ba'ang slar bzlog pa'i slad du bdag
165b2(rgyud): cag gis klu'i dam tshig gi sngags 'di bshang // ha cang char che ba'i tshe dang / char dkon pa'i tshe dang / sang dang / ser ba dang / ser ba 'bab pa'i tshe sngags 'di dran par bya'o// brjod par
165b3(rgyud): bgyi'o// de nas kA bang bskul bar bgyi'o// rig pa 'dzin pa nges shin tu khrus bgyis te gtsang mar bgyis la/ gos sar pa bgos te klu'i gnasu mchi bar 'gyi'o// klu'i gnasu
165b4(rgyud): ci 'byor pa'i spos kyi dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs ma/ sku ga dung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten dkyil 'khor de'i steng
165b5(rgyud): du bzhag ste spos chab kyis bkru bar bgyi/ me tog dang / bdug pas mtshang bar bgyi// klu kun yang bkru bar bgyi'o// sku bsil ba'i cha ba de la lan brgyad
165b6(rgyud): yongasu bzlas pa bgyis te/ de'i nang du yungs kar stsal nas mtsha'u de'i nang du bo zhing phyogs bzhi nas bdug pas bdugs na/ de pho ma thag tu skad cig de la klur gnas

166a3(rgyud): po 'bab par 'gyur// ha cang yang char che ba'i dus na 'bras yos dang / yungs kar la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te na mkha' la gtor na char chen po bzlog par 'gyur// badz+ra

166b3(rgyud): pa/ gser gyis klubs pa drag po'i gzugs can/ 'gying bar lta ba/ klu'i dbang po gangan du bting ba/ g.yog 'khor mang po thang dang lhag so// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rje gnod

166b5(rgyud): song ge'i khri la bzhugs pa/ khang pa brtsegs pa na zham ri nga chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang ldan pas

171a7(rgyud): bdun bzlas pa byas ti phyogs bzhir btor zhing steng dang 'og tu yang gtor na sang dang / rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba thams cad la kun nas dpag cad tshun chad du mtsham/

171b1(rgyud): dang / gcin blangs la sab ta bis ka dang / bag phyed dang / thang bsres la lan dgu rtswa gnyis bzlas pa byas te/ de nas klu mgo lnga pa bya'o// mgo gdengs ka can gyi skyil mo dkrung bcas

177a5(rgyud): ces bka' stsal to// klu'i rgyal po dag de ltar gyis shig/ yal bar mi btang shig/ de nas de'i 'og tu chag bya bar brjod par bya ste/ sngags 'di dpa' bo gcig/ 
177a6(rgyud): pu ni/ las kun byed pa dge ba ste/ shes rab can gyis lan cig dran/ dgos pa thad byed par 'gyur// mthon po'i gnasu mkhas pa yas// sgra skad chen po brjod par bya/ gnas
177a7(rgyud): gang dang gang du sgra bsgrags pa de dang der dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang / sad dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / glog thaMd kyis mo tshug so// sus kyang byin 'phrog par mi nuso// gtso bor mi nus// 
177a8(rgyud): gnas 'thon pa'i ro 'om/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang shin tu mtho ba der rig pa 'dzin pa gtsang mar byas te/ gos gtsang ma dkar
177b1(rgyud): bgos la kha shar phyogasu bltas te/ ba'i lci ba dang 'jim pa bsres pas dkyil 'khor khru gang gru bzhi pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbu su mnga' gang tsam pa cig bcu
177b2(rgyud): te/ sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir seng ldeng gi phur bu sor brgyad pa gtsugs te/ sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas la tshon sa
177b3(rgyud): lnga pa'i skud pas lan gsuma'i khras par bskor ro// dkyil 'khor gyi dbus bog por bzhag la lan bdun bzlas pa'i bdug pas 'dug/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa
177b4(rgyud): la yungs kar gyis gtor ro// me tog sil mas gang bar gtor// phyogs gzhar gtor ma'i bum pa bzhi bzhago// dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu gtor ma bzhag par bya ste/ 
177b5(rgyud): zho dang / 'o ma dang / 'bras bcos pa dang / bu ram dang / sha ka ras gang po// chu dang yungs kar la sngags la na lnga brjod de// phyogs bzhir mtshams bcad par bgyi/ 
177b6(rgyud): zla ba nya la sbyor ba bya'o// skad cher bklags la phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang 'og tu yungs kar gtor zhing klu thad kyi so so'i ming nas brjod na/ cho ga 'di byas ma thag tu 'dus ma na
177b7(rgyud): ba'i rlung dang / sbyin dang / ser ba dang / klu mi srun pa tha~Mng bcings par 'gyur/ bub par 'gyuraro// ltas ngan pa dang / yems kyi nang dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'gro ba dang / gdon dang 'byung po dang / 
177b8(rgyud): sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thing rgyang ring du spangs par 'gyur// dpag tshad cig khor khor yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyuraro// nang bde dang / na ba zang dang / gnad par sems
178a1(rgyud): pa dang / rab tu gnong par sems pa dang / phyir rgol ba dang / phyir gnod par byed pa bad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur// me tog dang 'bras bu dang /  tog 'a
178a2(rgyud): legs par yongasu 'grub par 'gyur/ legs par yongasu smin pa dang / ro zhim par 'gyur ro// sa bon legs par btab pa thaMng legs par 'khrung bar 'gyur ro// gshed byad dang / 
178a3(rgyud): las dang / byang snyems thang rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// ji srid du phur bu ma phyung ba de srid du mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro// de srid du klu zad char gyi
178a4(rgyud): rgyun 'babaso// me tog dang / 'brasdu dang / log zang legs par yongasu rgyas par 'grub par 'gyuraro// gang dang gang du dgos par 'gyur ba bde lan cig dran
178a5(rgyud): par byas na 'grub par 'gyur/ spra tshil las nam mkha' lding gi gzugs sor brgyad po skyil mo krung brtsas pa/ 'dab ma brkyang ba/ klu rgyal gdan du gting ba mgo
178a6(rgyud): dgu pa mgo brgyad du thogs pa klu mgo gsum pa lag pa g.yas na thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba lag pa g.yon na thogs pa/ gser gyis g.yogs pas byas te/ 
178a7(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du tshon gyis ri mo bris laM/ stan sna tshogs kyi steng du bzhag la/ nyin zhag gcig la sngags stong brjod do// nam lus kyis mi thub pa'i tshe kha zas dkar po bza'o bar bya ste/ 
178a8(rgyud): yang khrus byas la bsgrub par bya'o// gu gul gyis 'du'o/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma ci 'byor pa sbyar ro// mar me btang la de'i mdun du nyal na ston par 'gyur zhing las
178b1(rgyud): brjod par 'gyur ro// mchog thang sbyin par 'gyur/ las thams cad byeng bar 'gyuraro// ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyuraro// lang long med pa'i gnasu bzhag la/ nam than pa byung ba
178b2(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pas blangs te/ klu'i gaun su bkur bar bya/ klu'i gnas mtsho ro bzhag la/ me tog dang bdug pa byin la/ yungs kar la sngags lan gsum bzlas te/ gnasu gtor na 'phral
178b3(rgyud): du klu bang char gyi rgyun 'bab sa// gal te 'phral du tshur gyi rgyun mi 'babs mdo'i phyir klu'i gnas kun tu na mkha' lding gis gang bar mthong bar 'gyur// gnas me lce gcig tu
178b4(rgyud): 'bar bar 'gyur// bye tshan mgo la 'bab par 'gyur/ chubaskams par 'gyuraro// ban pa byung ba'i tshe sprin la bstan mchar 'bebs par 'gyuraro// rlung dang / spri ngang / ser ba dang / sad pa
178b5(rgyud): char sprin la bstan na skad cig tu med par 'gyu ro// dpag tshad bdun gyi nang du phyogs bzhi kun tu ser ba mi 'bab cing / sad dang dus ma yin pa'i rlung gis mi chu/ 
178b6(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ thad thub par 'gyur// rlung 'khrag sa pa'i tshe lam gyi bzhi mdor bzhago/ yang na grong khor gyi sgo ro// yang na rgyal po'i sgor bzhago// des rlung bang mchod par 'gyur
178b7(rgyud): rlung chen po rnam par 'bar rlung yang chad par 'gyur// phyis ldang mi nus// bstan pa thag tu klu tha~Md 'bros par 'gyur// rdo rje mchu'i gzungs las bde byed pa na mkha' lding bklams
178b8(rgyud): pas grub pa mchog tu 'grub// de ras tshangs pa dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po dang/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas bcom ldan 'das la lar gsu/ 
179a1(rgyud): bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thaM tshogs pas kyang rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu zhes
179a2(rgyud): bgyi ba'i gzungs brjod par bya ste/ klu thad kyi snying 'phrog pa/ snying 'gems pa klu mi srun pa'i rigs phung bar bgyid pa/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba bad sel ba/ lo tog dang / me tog dang / 
179a3(rgyud): 'bra sgra bde sgrub pa 'bul na/ sems can thams cad la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du kha com ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa dang / 
179a4(rgyud): khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal na chen po bzhi dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag sems can thad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir
179a5(rgyud): ngas byin gyis brlabs kyis brjod cag/ de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis gzungs 'di smraso// na mo rat+na tra
179a6(rgyud): ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ shAkya mu na ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+d+ha te samyak+saM bu d+hA ya/ na ma shUN+Da badz+ra d+ha rA ya/ ma hA ba la ba rA krA mA ya/ na ma s+t+rai lokya mur+d+ha ye/ na ma sh+tsa tur NaM/ na mo badz+ra sha ni dzA la
179a7(rgyud): ta ro traT+Ta ha sA ya/ dz+wa la ma hA ba la bIr+ya pa ra kro d+ha rA brah+me dza bAh+ma sa ra d+hi b+ho nA gu a d+hi ba ti bi sa ra ta bi sa ra ta/ ma re brah+ma dAn+d+he nA ma mAr+d+ha nAm/ pra ta ya hUM hUM phaT/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bik+ShA tsakra hasta na
179a8(rgyud): bo shA nAM gan du ma ti biSh+Nu n+yakre shri ts+tshin+na mi/ tu ti tu ti/ l-i l-i li li hUM hUM phaT/ mu hu mu hu mu h+yan+tu sarba duSh+Ta nA gA nI/ s+pho Da ya hri da ye mo he shwa ra dz+wa li ta tre shU la d+ha ra/ ha na ha na hUM hUM phaT/ 
179b1(rgyud): mu tsi mu tsi tuti tu li b+ha ba b+ha ba kI No k+Sha na k+Sha ma tsa tur+N+Na ma ri tsi nam dz+wa li ta sh+tsak+ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hUM hU pal/ s+phu ra sA ru/ bi s+phu ra bi sA ra/ tsar tsa ra/ nA sha ya/ duSh+Ta nA ga hr-i ya/ swA/ 
179b2(rgyud): ya hUM hUM phaT/ sa ha ra sa ha ra/ du byin yi sha na kha ti nA gaM na shI ti ba d+hu dz+wa la bAsmiM ku ru hU~M hU phaT pheM naM sa ma ya ma nu sma ra b+hi nA ga a d+hi ba d+he badz+ra ba ya b+ho bo tuti tu Shi hUM hUM phaT pa
179b3(rgyud): par sod+hi/ badz+ra A shAn min sha ye pU phaT sahA/ sarba nA ga hring yAn khaM s+pha Ta sa hU baNi swAhA/ bud+d+ha bi lo ka d+ha ye sAhA/ prah+ma ya sAt+ma/ biSh+Nu mur+yA swAtwa/ ma he sha ri dz+wa l-i ta
179b4(rgyud): lA ya sAhA/ sa ma hA rA dza sa ma ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ b+hu dze gA ya swAhA/ nA ga a dI pa ta ye swA hA/ oM d+hi ro d+ha ri swA hA/ dz+wa la taM bAka tA ya swA hU~M/ ro ma hA ra nA sha ya swA hA/ dzu tri
179b5(rgyud): tidzA ti swAhA/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT swA hA dza nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i lce 'bab pa'i mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungasal de brjod ma thag tu k+Shu pa~M srun pa bang lus rul te dri mi zhi
179b6(rgyud): par gyur to// lus shig shig por gyur cing / sha bkras btab par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
179b7(rgyud): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis spang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni brlag/ bac+doMs sman cang 'dzam+bu'i gling gi san rnams la 'chab
179b8(rgyud): mi 'gyi // gnod par mi bgyi 'o// bac+doMs rdo rje 'bar ba'i lha 'bab pa'i mchu'i gzungs 'di brjeng pa der / bcom ldan 'das klu pad gnod par sems shing mi 'chi ste/ kha ra lta bar yA
180a1(rgyud): mi bgyid na 'jug pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// de nas 'di'i cho ga brjod do// gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyis klu bad kyi lus dum bu dum bur 'brul// lus
180a2(rgyud): dri mi zhim par 'gyuraro// yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te phyogs bzhir gtor na klu bad bcings par 'gyuraro// dpag tshad bdun kho ra khor yug tu mtshams bcangad par
180a3(rgyud): 'gyuro// rdo rje la lar brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa byas te/ klu bzlog par bya'o// lan cig brjod na rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba bde ldogo/ thams cad med par 'gyuraro// dran pa tsam gyis so/ 
180a4(rgyud): ba thams cad skad cig tu med par 'gyuraro// gal te 'bab na yang yud tsam gyis chur 'gyuraro// ser ba 'ang ba bi'i dus na rdo rje bskor na phyogs gang du bskor ba dang se
180a5(rgyud): ba 'drims par 'gyur te/ phyogs der sor ba mi 'bab par 'gyur ro// nang par dben par song ste/ nang du yang dag 'a rngog tu zhugs la skyil mo krung gi phyag rgya bcings te/ swaH
180a6(rgyud): 'di lan sum cu rtsa gnyis brjod de brjod ma thag tu rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba 'ad med par 'gyuraro// rlung tha~Md rnam par 'jig par 'gyuraro// mi 'byung bar 'gyuraro// yungs kar phyogs bzhir
180a7(rgyud): gtor na lo cig khyad kor du mtshams bcad par 'gyur// rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba bang bcings par 'gyur ro// klu pang dbang du 'gyur ro// bu dang cha bo 'khar dang bcas pa rgyun tu rgyun ma
180a8(rgyud): 'chang par phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro// las thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// dril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ ser ba 'bab pa'i dus na dgrol na klu mi sran po thams cad
180b1(rgyud): kyi glang ba 'gas par 'gyur// namakha' las sa la lhung bar 'gyur te/ las thams cad byeng bar 'gyuraro// gzungs 'di na thang du thogs pa med par 'gyur// de nas bcom
180b2(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis mamakha' lding gi dbang po chen po dang / tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la leg so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ tshangs pa chen po sems
180b3(rgyud): thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / klu mi srun pa dang / snying rje mang pa/ 'tshe ba rnams gdul ba dang / char bcad pa dang / chang pas bcad pa'i phyir khyod kyis rig pa chen
180b4(rgyud): po'i gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di brjod nas 'jam+bu'i gling du bzhag pa legaso legaso// de nas klu'i rgyal po chen po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po chen po rnam par kun nas
180b5(rgyud): bskor ba dang / gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po che na po gzi brjid che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / gzhan yang klu mi srun pa bye ba phrag du ma dag bcom ldan 'das pa
180b6(rgyud): la ba dar dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'ad sa kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
180b7(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pas slang ma'i dus ni 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog dang / lo ma dang / yal ga rnams srung bar 'gyi'o// yongasu bsgyud
180b8(rgyud): bar bgyid do// rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / sang dang / tshang ba thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// dus dus char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'chalo// rang gi mena'i yi dam gyis de bzhin
181a1(rgyud): pa'i dam tshig bskyang bar 'tshalo// sen thams cad kyi re ba yongasu rdzogs shing bsam par grub par 'tshalo// mi 'tshe bar 'tsha lo// bac+doMs gal te cha
181a2(rgyud): ga'i rgyal po 'di las gong du sngags dang / gzungs ji skad bshad pa'i yon tan gyi khyad par rnams dang / 'gal bar bgyid na/ bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par 'chang rgya
181a3(rgyud): bar ma gyur cig/ 'di ni bro bar bya ste/ tad+ya thA/ ba ki tsa ti/ shu li shu mu li/ sha sha shu shu/ ti ti bo ro ti/ hu yu hu yu/ du ri ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni kA'i man
181a4(rgyud): lags te/ slad ma'i cha slang mo'i dus na klu mi sman pa rnams 'dzag par 'gyod de// phan pa dang / phan pa che bad pi dus ma lags pa'i char dang / rlung dang / 
181a5(rgyud): sprin dang / ser ba dang / sad dang / dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang / glog byung na/ ri 'am khang pa mthon po'i steng du rig pa 'dzin pa kha shar phyogasu bltas te/ man
181a6(rgyud): 'di dag gis bstod de lan bdun brjod la/ chu dang yungs kar bsres par phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o// gtor cing dran ma thag tu klu thams cad kyi lus rnams dus bu brgya
181a7(rgyud): 'chad par 'gyuraro// gyes par 'gyur ro// 'gags par 'gyur te/ de'i slad du char gyi rgyun 'beb so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ klu'i rgyal po khyad kyis de ltar
181a8(rgyud): byos shig/ rdo rje mchu'i cho ga rdzogaso// / #/ bod skad du/ rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs bde mkhyen pa la phyag 'tsha'o// de nas tshangs
181b1(rgyud): pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
181b2(rgyud): ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad 'dus nas klu thams cad kyi snying 'phrog par bgyid pa/ snying 'gems par bgyid pa/ klu ma rungs pa rnams kyi rig
181b3(rgyud): phung bar 'gyur ba/ rlung dang / ser ba'i sbyin bang bzlog par bgyid pa me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog bde 'byor par bgyid pa rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs
181b4(rgyud): brjod par 'tshal gyis// bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i slad du byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
181b5(rgyud): tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug dang rgyal ba chen po bzhi la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu rnams ngas ser thams cad kyi don dang / 'phags pa ba
181b6(rgyud): kyi bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis khyad kyis smros shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhis
181b7(rgyud): gzungs sngags 'di smras te/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das shAkya bub pa la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
181b8(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje 'dzin drag pa la phyag 'tsha lo// pha rol gyis gnon pa'i mgu ba che rnams la phyag 'tshal// 'jig rten gsum gyi
182a1(rgyud): gtso bo la phyag 'tshalo// rgyal po chen po bzhi la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje gnam lcags 'bar ba ma lungs pa drag tu rgod pa la phyag 'tsha lo// ma tha ma
182a2(rgyud): br-im ba pra ma ba/ dz+wa li ti/ bi kr-i gau badz+ra dza ya dza ya/ ma hA ba la b+h+yo ra bI ra pa ra kra ma kro d+ha ra dza/ pra ma b+ha pu pu ma/ pra ma swa re/ b+ho b+ho nA ga di bi re/ byi sa ra ma d+ha pra ma d+ha ra d+ha ma
182a3(rgyud): mU ra d+ha nAm/ s+pho Ta yA ma/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ bar+d+ha sakra hr-i d+hA ni b+ho pa ma nA ge na dra/ ma ti kra ma ba bar+Na tsakr-i Na/ shi ri tsan ta ma/ NihUM hi hU~M ti l-i hUM hUM phaT phaT mu du mu du mu
182a4(rgyud): rkyen hU~M/ sarba duSh+TAr s+pho Ta ye/ hring ya/ ma he sha ra dz+wa li ta/ tri shU la d+ha ra d+ha ra ha na ha na hUM hU~M phaT phaT/ mu tsi mu tsi/ du ngi ba b+hA ba b+h+r-i/ k+Sha Ni k+Sha Na tsa tu ra NA na ma dA rA/ 
182a5(rgyud): dzA nAn/ dz+wa li tra shaM ka ti/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ hUM phaTas+t+ra ra s+phu ra/ bi s+phu ra bi s+phu ra bi s+phu ra/ tsa ra rbaM tsa rarba tsa ra rba/ nA sha ya duSh+TAn nA hr-i da ya/ s+pho Ta ya/ hUM hU~M phaT phaH
182a6(rgyud): duSh+Ta A shA ni/ b+hu ta ma ga shaM bIr+ye dz+wa laM/ dzAsmai ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ b+ho nA gA d+hi pa ti pi tsin tu/ bi bo ya/ b+ho b+ho tuM/ ti tu ti tu/ hUM hUM phaT phaTi swA hA/ badz+ra
182a7(rgyud): A shA ni nA sha ya hA hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sarba nA ga hrid yA naM/ bi s+pho Ta kA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ bud d+ha bi lo ki ti ya swA hA/ brah+ma ya swA hA/ biSh+Nu mu ru ya swA hA/ ma hi shwa ra dz+wa li dz+wa li ta
182a8(rgyud): tri shU lA ya swA hA/ tsa tu ri ma hA rA dza se ma d+ha rA ye swA hA/ bi tsag ti ya phaT swA hA/ oM do ra~M di rau swA hA/ dz+wa li ta bA ka tA ya swA hA/ rdzu tidz+ra t+yai swA hA/ phaT phaT/ rdo rje 'bar ba gnam lcag
182b1(rgyud): mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di bos ma thag tu klu ma rungs pa thams cad lus rul nas dri zhim pa mnam par 'gyur ro// lus sor zhig cing 'pho bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan
182b2(rgyud): 'das kyis zhabs la gtugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bskyab du gsol/ lha dang / 'jig rten du bcas pa bad kyis smad par gyur/ bdag cag ni ma
182b3(rgyud): rungs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das slan chad 'dzam+bu'i gling du sems can rnams la gnod par mi bgyid/ 'gum par mi bgyid/ chung ngu na mig kyang lta bar mi bgyid na skabs
182b4(rgyud): lta ba lta ci smos/ rgya mtsho klu'i rgyal po dang / klu rgyal po gdugs lta bu dang / klu'i rgyal po mthu che ba dang / mngangs che ba dang / ma rungs pa la sogs te/ klu bya ba khrag
182b5(rgyud): khrig brgya stong gis bcos kyi zhabs la mgo bos gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas/ klu bad kyis dus phyi ma 'i tshe 'dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can bde le gnod par
182b6(rgyud): mi bgyid / me tog dang / 'braspu dang lo tog dang / lo ma dang / yal ga bang srung bar bgyid/ rlung dang / ser ba thang dgag par bgyid/ dus su su char dbab par 'gyid par rang gi
182b7(rgyud): tshig gi yi dam dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rjesu srung bar bgyi'o// sam thaderare ba yongasu skong ba dang / yod la bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyid/ gnod par mi
182b8(rgyud): bgyid // bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag la 'gal bar bgyid na/ bdag cag byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/ khro'i tshig kyang
183a1(rgyud): 'di lags te/ tad+ya thA/ o ta gi tsa gi/ g+hu li g+hu li/ mu li sha sha gu gu/ shA tI khI ra ma ti/ hu lu hu mu swAhA/ chang che ba'am/ chang mi 'bab pa 'am dus
183a2(rgyud): yin par char 'bab pa 'am/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba dang / grang ba'i rlung dang / gnam lcags lhung ba'i tshe rig 'dzin gyis bri tshig 'di khang tog gam/ sa mngon po 'am/ ri'i sa
183a3(rgyud): du yang rung / kha shar phyogasu bltas te/ lan bdun skad chen por bzlas/ yungs kar la lan bdur bzlas te gyen du gtor na/ gtor ma thag tu klu bde dum bur 'gyur zhing / 
183a4(rgyud): nan tan byas pas myur du char 'bab so// gzungs 'di nyi da kyis dril bu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/ yungs ka ra la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas nas/ nar
183a5(rgyud): tur drag por byas te phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams bcad pa 'gyur// rdo rje gnam lcags mchu lan brgyad dubazlas pas klu dgeg par bya// lan cig dran pa
183a6(rgyud): rlung dang ser ba slar bzlog par bya'o// gnam lcags lhung na yang chur 'gyur// rdo rje bskor na phyogs gang du bskor ba der serab 'byol lo// nang par sdigs sa dben par 'dug ste/ 
183a7(rgyud): sngags 'di lan sum curtsa gnyis bzlas na/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba yang 'gag par 'gyuraro// klus gnod pa mi byed cing phyis kyang mi chug so// yungs kar la bsngags te
183a8(rgyud): phyogs bzhir gtor na lo gcig gi bar du mtshams bcad de/ rlung dang / sprin dang / ser ba yang mi g.yo'o// ngag nyan cing kun tu srung ba dang / las byed par 'gyur ro// sngags
183b1(rgyud): rtsa gcig bzlas te/ dril bu dkrol na klang ba 'gas shing sa la ltung bar 'gyur te/ gnod pa byed pa se lo// mchod pa tshul bzhin bsngags par byas te/ skad gsal bar bklag
183b2(rgyud): te phyogs bzhi steng 'og tu yungs kar gtor na/ ser ba dang / rlung dang / klus gnod par byed po bcings par 'gyur/ ltas ngan pa dang / mi dge ba dang / bkra mi shes pa dang / ga
183b3(rgyud): dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po yang phyir bskrad par 'gyur// dpag tshad khor khor yug tu mtshams bcad par 'gyur/ nad dang gnod par sem
183b4(rgyud): pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra 'gegs bde bzlog par 'gyur// lo tog dang / 'brasdu dang / khu ba rgyas pa dang / smin pa dang / che bar 'gyur/ 'byung po dang / gan
183b5(rgyud): pa bde kyis mi tshugs par 'gyuraro// rdo rje gnam lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzung rdzogs// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya lo ta duN+Da ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 
183b6(rgyud): 'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub soda' tha~Md la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis bos pa dus gicag ni/ bcom ldan 'a
183b7(rgyud): yul ma ga d+ha na rgyu zhing / asmr-i'i tshal du gshegs te byon nas/ a mra'i tshal du lus 'phags ri'i dbang po'i brag phug na bzhug so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ 
183b8(rgyud): bac+doMs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lha'i dbang po brgya
184a1(rgyud): byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bac+doMs lha ma yin rnams dang / mi rnams ni bstan pa la gnod pa bgyid pa ste/ bcom ldan
184a2(rgyud): 'das lha ma yin dang / 'khor du myi mthogs pa'i bstan pa la yun ring bar gnod pa'i phyir rgol ba'i ngagra lag na// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhi bas mo 'dul na bdag le
184a3(rgyud): drag pos 'dul ba'i chos bstar du gsol/ bag pa'i chos dgra srung du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces

184a7(rgyud): byed mi'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / bram ze'i srin po dang / 'byung po dang / ro langs dang / byi'i gdon dang / srul po dang / nam gru dang / gnon pa'i gdon dang /

184b1(rgyud): gdon phung bar byed pa/ zas kyi rigs mi 'thun pa zab phung bar byed pa/ rims nang ba dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus

184b4(rgyud): pra me ti tra/ gai le bo le le bos se/ mat+ta pa da te/ khA ra tAM/ khA ra Na tA nA gA ma nA ga pu ga Ne/ mo na pra tI mo naM kA li pra kA la tsit+taM/ ma hA tsat+k+r-i pra ta tsaN+Da/ be ge so na

184b6(rgyud): bi ha ma/ sarba dra bya bra duSh+TA na/ nA sha ya sarba ar+d+ha ya pra do hU phaT/ sngags 'di brdung ba tsam gyis phyogs bcu kun tu g.yas/ rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul

184b8(rgyud): mig/ rdzing bu/ lu ma/ 'dab chu/ gzhan dgur bu ram/ spang shing mngang / sha ka ra/ kU sman sna tshogs 'o ma la bsngags la gtor ro// de'i phyir sar po chen po'i'abeb so// mi

185a4(rgyud): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dang gang gos yid rtse gcig du bya'o// dge slong ba dang / dge slong ma dang / ngag tshul pa dang / ngage tshul ma 'am/ dge bstan pa 'am/ dge bstan
185a5(rgyud): gang yang rung ste bstan pa la gnod pa bzla ga pa'i phyir yid la zung shig/ chongs shig/ de skad ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / lha'i dang
185a6(rgyud): po brgya byin dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lcags mchu zhes bya /

185b7(rgyud): par byed pa nang medang rkang gnyis pa dang / rang ba'i bdelas par byed pa dab cang phung ba dag lnga dang ma 'a ldi kyi khyed ma'i bu dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / 'gro ba drag shul du spyod pa rab tu 'chi

186a3(rgyud): ga shar shar phog/ nA ga rak+Sha pheM ba ra tsi sri badz+ra hUM ma phaT/ drag po yul khams kyi dgrar gyur pa bzlog pa/ mes gtong ba'i thog smang lnga 'bebs pa/ lha'i dbang po bad zil gyis

186a7(rgyud): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bac+doMs 'dam bu'i khrod na/ gzings pa'i 'dug gnas na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka'

188b7(rgyud): snying po 'di nyin re zhing dus gsum du 'don par byed na/ bdag de'i slad bzhin du rtag tu 'brang bar 'tshal// de'i dgos pa zad kyang bgyi'o// zas dang / gos dang / dbyig dang / gser pa
188b8(rgyud): nong dang 'bru dang / dngul ngag kyang stsal bar 'tsha lo// de don thad kyang 'grub par 'gyi'o// sen bde kyang de'i dbang du 'gyur bar bgyi'o// nga'i bya ba sna tshogs pad kyang mong la sgrub pa/ 
189a1(rgyud): 'tshal te/ 'jig pa dang ldan pa ni ma gtog so// na mo rat+na tra yA ya na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ta ya/ s+yang ya baM dam hi la~M ma Ni \u0f7f dra/ hi
189a2(rgyud): hi li/ ma Ni b+ha dra/ ki li ma Ni b+ha dra ki l-i ki li ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsi li ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsi li tsi li ma Nib+h+ra dra/ tsu lu ma Ni b+ha pra tsu lu tsu lu ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu ru tsu ru ma Ni
189a3(rgyud): b+ha dra/ tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tu ru tu ru ma Ni b+hA dra/ ku ru ma Nib+hadra/ ku ru ku ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ su ru ma Ni b+ha dre/ su ru su ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ sarba an+t+ra ma me sa d+ha ya sAhA tad+ya bA/ pU tra ne su pUH
189a4(rgyud): ne/ su ru me/ su rA thaM/ sasma ba taM/ hi la kaM/ hi la kA li/ puH/ sing d+he b+ha dra/ hi li li hi li swAhA/ e hi ko NiSh+ka e hi so niSh+Ta/ e hi go narl-i swAhA/ lan bdun stong ba
189a5(rgyud): brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'di'i cho ga ni 'di yin te/ zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga la gcing spa byas la/ dus gsu ma du a ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs te/ lan
189a6(rgyud): bdun stong bzlas brjod byas na gser rnyeng par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa nor bu bzang po'i gzungs zhes bya ba rdzogs// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA kA ra si ha dang / lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he k+Sha
189a7(rgyud): dbang pos bsgyur ba// #rgya gar skad du/ ma Ni b+ha drA ya yak+Sha se na kalpa/ bod skad du/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nor bu bzang po'i rtog pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub si
189a8(rgyud): thaMd la phyag 'tsha lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ya/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ b+ha ga ba ta/ kha tsi tastA/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma tsi ram/ 
189b1(rgyud): yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye tu lu hu lu/ ma Ni b+ha pra/ tu ru tu ru ma Ni b+ha dra/ tu ri tra Ti ma Ni b+ha dra/ tsu Ti tsu Ti ma Ni b+ha dra/ ni Ti ni Ti ma Na~M b+ha dra sA hA/ tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med/ smyu ba
189b2(rgyud): chog yod ma yin/ arka dang ni tshim pa gnyis/ gang yang rung ba'i shing la nor bu bzang ba'i gzugs byas la de'i mdun du gnas te/ me tog la sogs pa rgya che ba bad kyis
189b3(rgyud): mchod pa byas shing gnas shing gnas la/ nyi ma gung gi dusu yungs kar dang tsha ba'i mar gyis bsdoms la nor bu bzang po la byug par bya zhing / rig pa stong phrag brgya bzlas na ga
189b4(rgyud): gyi dong che brgya rnyeng par 'gyuraro// de yang btang bar bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ du hu ku tsu/ chu ru tsu ru/ sha ba ri ka ma Ni b+ha dra sAng+ge/ bya rog
189b5(rgyud): gi skad mi grag par phyugs kyi ko ba tsam gyi mjal byas/ la lan gcig bzlas pas me tog brgyad brgya 'bul ba rabyed do// zla ba gcig na gser sreng gcig
189b6(rgyud): rAng par 'gyur// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo ma Ni bA drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha swe nA ba ta ya/ tAd+ya thA/ b+hU ma ri b+ha ma ri/ suSh+TA suSh+ku/ yak+She me b+ha drA/ sI Da ya sI Da ya/ a pA ta ya/ u pa dA
189b7(rgyud): ya swA hA/ nag pa'i phyogs kyi chos gcig nas bzung ste/ ji snyed dkar po'i phyogs kyi chos gcig gi b.reng byas te/ nyi mo shar ba'i bar du len nyi shu rtsa lnga brjod na gser gyi dong che ste
189b8(rgyud): na mo rat+na tra yA ya na ma bai shra ba tA ya/ rat+na me b+ha ma bA ha yaM swA hA/ nyi ma ro re bzhin snga bar langs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas mazla ba gcig mdong rtse gsum ster bar byed// na mo b+ha ga/ 
190a1(rgyud): ba te A dit+ya a bi ma sri ka si lu ba to si swA hA khung med dang / skye dra'i gzugs byas la ku shi'i mtshon gyis bcang na spyugs pa'i nad zhi bar byed// na ma
190a2(rgyud): bi ri ts+ya t+ya bu mdza la s+ya ti mi gau laM phu/ skud pa dmar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bsngags te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig byas la rkang pa la bcings na rde'u meng bar byed// na mo rat+na
190a3(rgyud): yA ya ba la ka ha lau ma hA le swA hA/ bud med gang la khrag rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab ma khrag la lan nyi shu rtsa ga cig bsngags te mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig yongasu bzlas te/ rked pa la
190a4(rgyud): ratshangs ma khrag 'ang ba 'gyur/ oMn+ta b+h+yaH sa / mjil ma la yang su bsngags te nu mo'i gnas snrubs zhagal snga ba dkyil la bar skyes []
190a5(rgyud): bzhag la gang na yod pa dgos pa bad kyi ming bris te/ ta la'i lo ma la lan gsum du bzlas la ta la'i lo ma gzha na gyis dkris te bsregs la lag pa la de
190a6(rgyud): bal ba rnyas na rkun mas mi mthong bar 'gyur ro// gnas skabs kyis gzhan gyis las kyang cung zad brjod par bya ste/ hUM yig las byas rdo rje can// dur khrod gan su zhugs par bya// 
190a7(rgyud): legs par bzlas pa shes bya la// nub mo byung nas dngos grub la/ 'dir ni grogasu gsol ba gang po// des dur khrod kyi ras blangs la// khro zhing mig dmar bas dri zhim pos lus la
190a8(rgyud): byugs la dur khrod kyi sol ba blangs te bsgrub bya bri bar bya'o// thal ba dang / sol bas yan lag yang dag par bkang ste/ yan lag bkug la bcug ste/ bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan
190b1(rgyud): gyi lus kyi snying kha'i pad+ma dkar po la bzhag par bya'o// 'phral du 'byung ba'i 'o khrag dang / dug dang bsres te/ 'bras kyis kha chos kyi khu ba dang bcas pas mdzes par byas la
190b2(rgyud): lus po 'am/ rus pa dang bsres te yang dag par gtor la bsdus te dril la skud pa phra mo nag pos mig bkab la dkri bar bya'o// sol bas phyi rol byugs la dur khrod du brkos
190b3(rgyud): te bcug la bdag gis bas dze zheso// brkos pa bkang ba'i steng du lag pas rdo rje'i mtshan ma byas la bal bar bya'o zhes sngags kyis bzlas par bya'o// hA suM b+ha ni sum b+ha/ hU~M gr-ih+Na
190b4(rgyud): gr-ih+Na/ hUM bru~M h+NA pa ya hA gr-ih+NA ba ya/ hUM A na ya ho// bla ga pam cho ga ma hA phaT/ hUM hA hU~M pha/ a su b+ham su g+ho/ ts+tsha gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na/ gr-id+ha pa ya/ gr-ih+NA pa yai/ hUM mA ra ya tshig mi hA
190b5(rgyud): sngon du bskar paM khri cho gcig bya'o// oM oM mi du tIr sam ka d+ya a ga ne kra tsan+d+ra sair sha ya tsa tur+d+ha/ ma sta ka tsata/ sa hA sha ya/ na ku la' tsa sh+tsa sar pa sh+tsa
190b6(rgyud): ye/ be ta la sh+ya tse masta ke/ ha na ha na/ da ha nga ha pa tsa pa tsa/ cho ga mo dang che ge mo phye zhig ma ma ba sha ma ga tu swA hA/ nag pa'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad la maung gi gzugs brnyan pas
190b7(rgyud): sku cha'am/ yungs kar gyis gang gi ming nas bzungs nas sbyin sreg byas na de 'breng par bye'o// oM tsa mur+the ni me b+he dra pa ta sau ta pa so// sa sh+ya ni ma ba sh+ya ma hA Ad myam/ pra t+yaM k+Sha
190b8(rgyud): b+haNI pa ni che ge mo dang che ge mo ga tatsang pro tir b+ha ya tu to cang / ka la ho b+hi ba tu khi pi tsi ta oM sa ma ga ma swA hA/ nag po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad dam/ tshes bcu bzhal brtsams ten
191a1(rgyud): pa'i yam shing gis nub pa bdun gyi thun mtshamasu sbyin sreg byas na// zhagasum na 'byed par 'gyuraro// pha mas kyi nag shing dang / rus gong la gzugs
191a2(rgyud): brnyan byas te/ rang gi ming gnyisu dug dang / khrag dang / skye tshe dang / nim pa'i lo mas phyugs la rgyab dang / rgyab tu sprad de/ mi ro'i sgras bcings na skye 'gro bde kyang 'byed par byed na phal
191a3(rgyud): bi'i mi lta smos kyang tsa dgos/ oM smA sA na pi shA tsa bau dr-i ShA ya hUM phaT/ mi ro'i skra la lan brgya bzlas la bcings par bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na yai/ ma hA ya
191a4(rgyud): k+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ oM bo d+hu nA da ya hU~M phaT/ 'di yisra sngon du bsnyen pa ni stong phrag bcu gnyis byas te/ de nas byis nau arka'i shing gi lho phyogs kyi yal ka la bzung sa kha
191a5(rgyud): sbyor du byas la de la sngags 'dis bsrung ber bya'o// oM ma hA ba la a tsa la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha khi DA ya bA~M rAya/ ti la kA ma rU pa hU~M phaT/ rgyal rigs rje'u rigs khram
191a6(rgyud): zo'i rigs/ dmangs rigs// dman rigs/ yig mkhon gyi rigs/ tshong po'i rigaso// rigs rkun pa yang lho phyogasu gtogs pa'i shing ro bsregs pa'i sa ru dur khrod kyi me bsre
191a7(rgyud): twe khong bu'i khrags bsad la/ de'i sol ba la srung ba byas te/ sngags 'di yis lan brgyad brgya ru bzlas te/ oM na mo b+ha gaN+Di ta/ a na ya t+ye gi hUM phaT/ phyis ni rtsa ba'i sngags
191a8(rgyud): kyi brgya phrag brgyad kyis mngon par bsngags te/ gong gi ming bris pa de sha zas bzung bar 'gyur// ji snyed kyi sngags mkhan kha cig gis grol bar byed pa 'dod pa thad kyis kyang / 
191b1(rgyud): 'grol bar byad mi nuso// de'i mong byis ma grol bar 'gyuraro// nim pa la gnas pa'i bya rog nag pa'i chang la nyi ma'i gung la mar nag gis byugs la/ tsa skam pos des de la mar na/ 
191b2(rgyud): byugs pa rnams dur khrod kyi mi la legs par bsregs te bsdus ma de'i thal ba thug po byas la khang pa'i thog 'og tu gzhag par byas ma/ de'i khyim la dro'i char ba 'bab par 'gyur
191b3(rgyud): oM a na la ba shA tsa ba/ yu sa ga ma he/ pi shA tsa swA hA/ sngon du byi snyen pa khri tsho gcig bzlas la/ de nas u dum pa ri'i rigs kyi ming brjod pa ma nyams pa nyid du 'gyur// gal
191b4(rgyud): gyur na byung la de'i dum bu byas te/ dugu la sog/ sa pa dang / ldan pa'i ske tshe dang bcas pas sbyin bsregs bya ste/ blo dang ldan pas dag po nyams par 'gyur ba'i chang ngu'o// don
191b5(rgyud): yod pa'i gzungs ni yongasu pos ma bya ste/ ban+d+ha ka/ yi me tog dri zhags bsnams pa yi// yang dag khros pas sngags kyi mngon du rab byas la/ bya rog bshog pa dag
191b6(rgyud): de dus bya ba ni// paTakyai yi ge rnam par dgang // g.yas pa'i sor mo la ni yo ge dgod / zhags pas bcings la bag ni ring po ru// mi 'dod bzhin du khyer la sngags kyi bzlas pa bya
191b7(rgyud): ni 'gas pa'o// 'i se gol gyis 'di ru khyed kyis yod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba'i ngag gis bzlas pa bya'o// bzlas pa rdzogs nas bya rog nag pa'i sgro ni bsgrub pa bya phyogs na yongs
191b8(rgyud): sa ru bzlas la bskuro// sngags ni phaT hrIHhUM hUM phaT che ge mau skrod cig phaT/ g.yon pa'i lag pa la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas la/ lci til gyi bal ba khu tshur gyis bzung ste
192a1(rgyud): brgya phrag brgyad kyi bar du bzlas pa dgra bo'i khyim du bsgyur nas phyir mig mi lta bar song la de ma thag tu skrod par byed do// oM na maHku la ni ku li ni/ ki li ki li/ 
192a2(rgyud): gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ uts+tsha Ta ya uts+tsha Ta ya hUM/ skyes pa'i ngar gdong g.yon pa'i rus paM la 'beb chen gyi tshon gang gi tshang la phyag bzhi pa mtshon cha bdade dang ldan par byas pa'i bgegs kyi
192a3(rgyud): bdag po bya'o// mtshon cha'i mngo ni g.yas kyi phyag na dgra sta dang zhags pa'o// g.yon gyi phyag mthong ba dang rtse gsumo// dug dang rgyam tsha dang / skye tshe la sogs pas bris pa ni ta la'i
192a4(rgyud): lo ma la sngags bris te bkri ba ni kha thur du bstan te sba ba 'am/ yang na spo'i phyogasu brkos la sbas te/ zhag bdun du byas na de ma thag tu skrod par 'gyuraro// phyung na bar ba
192a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// de nyid kyi sngags ni/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsa thA badz+ra pA Na ya/ ma~M hA yak+Sha saM nA pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ dzata ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i ta kuH
192a6(rgyud): l-i kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ gardza gardza/ bai s+pho Ta ya/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nar bi nA ya kA nAM/ ma hA ga Ni/ bi te dz+yo bi ta/ an+ta ka rA ya swA hA/ de ltar sngags ta la'i grwa
192a7(rgyud): ga la bris te/ brkos l-i s+phi bar bya'o// oM kA ka ka ra ge kA kAM kA kA par+t+ti bo sa ri Shi che ge ma'i hring ye dr-i sh+ya gan+d+ha/ kA krI ya thA su khaM ur d+ha mu khai swA hA/ saM ha ra dang / sngon shing la
192a8(rgyud): brgya phrag brgyad kyi bar du bzlas te/ sgo ru brkos te sbas na/ gang gi ming byas pa bya rog bzhin du rgyu zhing skod par 'gyuraro// oM na maHkr-iSh+Na sha ba ri ya me se/ shro Ni ti/ b+ho dzo nA ye/ han/ 
192b1(rgyud): han/ da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa/ che ge ma dz+wa ra Na grih+NA pa ya a shu hUM phaT/ rims kyis phag mo gza' mig dmar gyis du su shing nim pa'i lho phyogs kyi rtsa ba la sku gzugs byas la chab
192b2(rgyud): gsum gyi bdugs pas bdugs na 'dzin par 'gyur// gu gul gyis bdugs na grol bar 'gyu ro// oM d+hu ni tsatA swA hA/ mi'i mgo bo'i sgra bzung la gtum po dbang phyug rkang pa la
192b3(rgyud): drung na/ nyi ma kha cig la rims bskyed// snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam pa/ de'i steng du yi ge baM dkar po las char dbab par bsams na spong khar zug gzer byung ba
192b4(rgyud): par byed// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ a ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA sa twA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ oM ka Da/ bi ka Te/ ka Te/ ka ro Te/ bAr+ye swA hA/ 'phags pa spun
192b5(rgyud): ras gzigs phang phyug bla ma sang+ga sgra'i sngags 'dis 'ab gas pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi mdun du lcibs dkyil 'khor brgyad byas te/ de ci bo'i lhag
192b6(rgyud): ma la lan bdun du bsngags pa la lus la nad yod pa'i sa ru byug pa'o// zhag bdun na nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// gal te zhi bar ma gyur na de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bac+doMs bang gi dgongs par gyur pa
192b7(rgyud): yin// zhes byang chub seMda'i sanga' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sme'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa tA ye/ so b+ha so kr-i ni ya/ so ro ta swA hA// gnod gnas kyi
192b8(rgyud): snying po mchog tu grub pa 'di nyid pus me'i bar tsam tshur bcug ste gnas na// 'bume phrag cig bzlas pa byas na nor ster// nim pa'i shing gi rang bzhin la sor bzhi pa'i nor bu bzang ba'i
193a1(rgyud): sku gzugs byas te/ gso sbyong ldan pa'i lnga bzos tshen rtsis thug par bya'o// mchod pa dang gtor ma'i lte bar spyod pa byas la du ba med pa'i sol ba'i me la bum
193a2(rgyud): gsum du smos kyi sbyin sreg stong phrag brgyad byas na phyug po chen po dbang du 'gyuraro// na maHka pA le shwa rA ya dzo hu tu hu ru mu hu rI yau swA hA/ sngon du bsnyen pa khri byas la de nas 'bras sa
193a3(rgyud): ba'i khang par yongasu bzlas pa tsam dang / bong pa bcug pa tsam gyis 'bras kyi so ba 'phel bar bye'o// gi wang gis gro ba la nor rgyun mo'i gzungs mngon par bsngags la bal ba
