246a7(rgyud): gzugs byas te de'i mdun du 'dug la nyi ma phyed kyi dusu dr-i dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas nas/ yungs kar gyi tsha ba'i mar rag dang / btags pa'i ril bu byas
246a8(rgyud): te/ nor bu bzang ba'i ltor bcug nas rig pa stong phrag brgyad bzlas na dong rtse brgya rnyed par 'gyuraro// de nyid du zad par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa ba'i sngags kyi
246b1(rgyud): rtog pa gsungs pa/ gang gi lo ma bcos pa za ba dang / bsod snyoms kyis 'tsho zhing 'bum phrag gsum bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du rgya che ba'i
246b2(rgyud): mchod pa byas nas stong phrag brgyad du bzlas pa byas nas nor mang po rnyed par 'gyur// zla ba drug tu chu nang du chu'i sbyin sreg byas na stong phrag brgya rnyed par 'gyuraro// ji ltar 'byung ba
246b3(rgyud): bzhin dkar gsum gyi gtong ma dang mchod pa phul la a shwat+tha'i yam shing gi zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsi spag nas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na bar snang las sgra bos pa
246b4(rgyud): yod la 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa dang / sems kyis byas pas tshogs par 'gyur// / de bzhin du la sa sna tshogs gzhan 'grub ste/ ring bsral
246b5(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas/ dkar po dang / nag po phyogs la bsod snyoms zi zhang re mos smyung bar gnas nas gtor ma dang / mchod pa cho ga
246b6(rgyud): bzhin byin nas/ til nag po la zho dang mar dang / sbrang rtsi sngags la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na grong mchog bcu gnyi sa rnyeng bar 'gyur ro// bag med pa las ma grub na/ 
246b7(rgyud): stong phrag bcu'i nang nas grong gcig rnyeng par 'gyur// chu bo'i 'gram du nor bu bzang po bzhag nas mar dang / 'o bug za zhing mching rten gdung dang ldan pa la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas nas
246b8(rgyud): gnam stong la mtshan mo spang bar gnas pas dza ti'i me tog la stong phrag brgyad du re re la mngon par bsngags nas mchod rten la phul na nang par phyugs stong phrag gter
247a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// bsod snyoms za zhing rigs gtsang ma la dus gsum du khrus byed cing 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas nas nag po'i phyogs kyi brgyad la mtshan
247a2(rgyud): mo sbyang bar gnas la/ 'dzam bu'i yam shing la me sbar la nA ga pus pa zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsis sbags nas stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas pa dang / mdar gsum gyi bshos
247a3(rgyud): gcing ma dang / gtor ma byin nas sbyin sreg yongasu rdzogs pa dang / bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'ongs nas nga yas ci byed ces smra bar byed do// de la smra ba dong rtse lnga bon cig ces smras
247a4(rgyud): ba dang / de ltar bya'o zhes zer nas mau snang bar gyur te/ nyin re bzhin du gter bar 'gyuraro// lhag ma med par zad par bya'o// pad+ma skyes pa'i mtsho'i 'gram du phyin te/ chu dang / 
247a5(rgyud): bcas pa'i phyi za ba 'am/ yang ji ltar rnyed pa'i zas za zhing nor bzang po'i kho phyir bstan par bzhag la gsol ba bta ba na/ ji srid du slong phag brgya rdzogs par bang
247a6(rgyud): ma'i sprin sreg byas na de'i rjes la dpal pad+mo 'ongs te/ 'ongs pa la de la pad+mo nya bor phul nas dri dang bcas pa'i chu'i arga byin na nges smras pa/ bu ci zhig bya zhes smras na/ sgrub
247a7(rgyud): pa boso smra bar bya ste/ gter mang po bdag la rab tu stsol cig/ de ltar ba'o zhes zer nas mo snang bar 'gyu ro// de nas gang du 'gro ba dang khyer nas phyin pa de zad pa med par 'gyur
247a8(rgyud): ro// nor bu bzang po'i mdun du zla ba byed du bzlas nas ji srid zla ba nyid nub mo sbyang bar gnas pas sha ming po'i gtor ma byin nas/ de nas nor buzang po'i snying khar ming med
247b1(rgyud): bzhag nas ci srid du bzlas pa de srid du g.yo bar 'gyur ro// de nas nyin re bzhin du stong rtsa lnga re ster bar 'gyur ro// lhag ma med par zad par bya'o// dur khrad chen por byin nas dur
247b2(rgyud): khrod kyi thal ba la mchod rten byas te/ bsod snyoms za zhing dus gsum du khrus byas nas 'bum phrag gsum bzlas nas nag pa'i phyogs kyi bcu bzhi la mtshan po sbyang bar
247b3(rgyud): bas bcom ldan 'das la rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas nas lhag ma med par rab tu zad par bya'o// dur khrod chen por nor bu bzang po la sha ta pus pa phul la/ a ga ru dang / du ru ka
247b4(rgyud): bsres pa'i bdug pa phul te/ gdod phyin ci log tu bzhag nas ji srid mtshan phyed pa de srid du bzla so// de nas sha za'i bdag po rang 'ongs pa dang / sngar bzhag pa'i gto
247b5(rgyud): ma phul la 'khor rnams la char yang dbul/ de ras sgra ba pa pos gsol ba gdab par bya'o// de nas de mgu'o/ zhes smra'o// sgrub pa pos smras pa/ nyi ma ra
247b6(rgyud): g.yog ra ra byin cig/ da ltar bya'o zhes zer nas mi snang bar gyur to// da ras mngag gzhug pa la sogs par rab tu sbyin// gzhan yang ngo bzhin gshegs pa las kyi tshogs bya
247b7(rgyud): ba gsungs pa/ ri'i rtse mor 'jigs te/ khru gang tsam gyis nor bu bzang po bzhag nas 'o ma dang / 'o bug za zhing dus gsum du khrus byed cing 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas nas
247b8(rgyud): nga nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi nyal bug pa'i mtshan mo gsum du smyung bar gnas nas/ nor bu bzang po la rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas pa dang / gtor ma'i cho ga rgya che ba byas nas
248a1(rgyud): ku shi'i shun bu dag byin nas ji srid sgra grags pa de srong du bzlas pa bya'o// de nas de ma thag tu gnod sbyin thams cad nye bar 'ongs nas de rnams
248a2(rgyud): me tog dmar po dang / dri dmar po dang / arga sbyin par bya'o// du ru ko'i bdag pa yang bdug par bya'o// de nas gnod spyor nges legaso zhes bya ba byin nas smras pa/ ngas khyod la
248a3(rgyud): byed zhes zer ba dang / de nas de la smras pa dang / nyid re bzhin mngag gzhug rab tu byin cig de ltar bya'o zhes zer nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa bsam gton tsam
248a4(rgyud): gyis gnas pa la ma mthong bar 'khor gyis bskor na sa gnas// gang dang 'dod pa der khang pa brtsegs pa dang / lci'i bzhod pa sprul te/ stong phrag gcag dang
248a5(rgyud): bcas pa la rab tu 'dod pa'i zas rnams ster bar 'gyuraro// nyin re bzhi nga gdod sbyin mar sprul zhing 'ongs nas tho rangs kyi dusu 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi
248a6(rgyud): tshe lo stong du 'gyur// rgya mtsho'i 'gram du nor bzang po'i gzugs brnyan bzhag ste/ bsod snyoms zi zhing 'bum phrag bzlas nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi ches lnga la thug pa
248a7(rgyud): nub gsum du smyung bar gnas pas rgya mtsho chen po dang nye bar phyin nas ci sring rgya mtsho chen po rang 'ong ba de srod kyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o// mdun du rgya mtsho chen po rang 'ong ba
248a8(rgyud): de la dri dang mo ti ga gis mchod pa phul la a ga ru'i 'dug pas bdags la/ kye'i rig pa 'dzin pa mchog gang 'dod pa rab tu sbyin par smra'o// nges smras pa/ rgya mtsho
248b1(rgyud): por nga bogs pa med par 'gro bar gyis/ de ltar bya zar nas mi snang bar 'gyur// de nas rgya mtsho la zhugs na rgya mtshon yod pa'i nor bu rin po che blangs nas 'byung bar 'gyuraro// 
248b2(rgyud): rgya mtsho na yod pa'i kA rnams kyang dbang du 'gyuraro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas yang
248b3(rgyud): gnod sngon gyi dbang po dbyangs snyan gyi sngags gsungs pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya wa mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha saM nA pa ta ye/ ma Ni mi swA hA// rtsa ba'i dkar ba'i phyogs kyi brgyad
248b4(rgyud): ngam/ yang na dkar po'i bcu bzhi la/ nyin zhag gcig tu spang bar gnas pas ro hi ti'i nyal ba'i lci ba dang mar gyis byugs ras stong phrag brgyad spyir sreg byas na
248b5(rgyud): dong rtsa brgya rnyeng par 'gyuraro// gzhan yang nye bar mchod pa dang / sngon du 'bum mtsho gsum bzlas na/ nyam gong pa la zho dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsis mngon
248b6(rgyud): par byugs nas stong phrag bcu sbyin sreg byas na ngong che stong phrag rnyeng bar 'gyur// ma grub na yang kar sha pa ni stong phrag cig rnyeng par 'gyur ro// oM badz+ra dzaM b+ha la
248b7(rgyud): rnga len drA ya swAhA/ de nas yang nor bu bzang po bsgrub par 'dod na mchod sbyin gyi shing dkar po la nor bu bzang po'i gzugs brnyan byas la mched pa chen pos rab tu
248b8(rgyud): gnas par byas de'i mdun du a pa marga'i yam shing la mar dang / sbrang rtsis byugs la 'bum phrag tu sbyor sreg byas na/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu rnyed par 'gyuraro// pa ta la'i ma
250a1(rgyud): tog rnams kyis sbyin sreg byas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// til dang 'bras thug po che'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gser srang stong rnyed par 'gyur// 
250a2(rgyud): de ltar sha ta bus pa dang / gu gul dang / kun da dang / tsan dan dkar po dang / du ru kra la sogs pa de rnams raM re 'bum du sbyin sreg bsau na/ dong rtse stong phrag rnyed par 'gyur// 
250a3(rgyud): til dang 'bras kyi sbyin sreg byis na rgyal po dbang du 'gyuraro// nye'u ji ltar 'tshong pa kos la chu bo'i gzhung la lte ba nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs nas kha shar du bltas
250a4(rgyud): spyir sreg brgya pas na sum 'gyur gyi dong rtsarnyed par 'gyur ro// ras bal gyi sa bon la mar dang sbrang rtsas byugs nas/ stong phrag cig sbyir sreg byas na nyi ma bdu
250a5(rgyud): gyi bar la ras gcig rlang par 'gyuraro// rtag tu bzlas nagos dang bza' ba rnyed par 'gyuraro// 'bum bzlas ra dang rtse lnga stong rnyed par 'gyur ro// 'bum cho gnyis bzlas
250a6(rgyud): grong rnyeng par 'gyuraro// 'bum cho gsum bzlas na long spyod chen po rnyed par 'gyur zhing grong brgyad kyi bdag por 'gyuraro// be'u'i lci ba la spyir sreg byas na ba glang stong rnyeng par
250a7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// gzhan yang dud 'gro rnams kyi lus la zho dang sbrang rtsos spags la nyonyin re bzhin sbyin sreg byas na ra lug la sogs pa rnyed par 'gyur ro// ba glang gi lhas kyi
250a8(rgyud): nang du ku shi'i me tog par dang sbrang rtsis byugs na 'bum tsho gcig sbyin sreg byas na 'byung po dang sha za dbang du 'gyuraro// rig sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ji/ 
250b1(rgyud): ltar 'dod pa rnyed par 'gyuraro// yang ba glang gi lhas kyi nang du 'o ma dang 'o thug za zhing shri ra ba la'i yam shing la sbyin sreg 'bum byas na gang 'dod pa'i gsol ba btab pa de
250b2(rgyud): nyid yod par 'gyuraro// mtshan mo gsum du sbyang bar gnas la/ zla ba 'am nyi ma gzas gzung ba la ldong ros som/ go wang srang lngas a shwat+tha'i 'dab ma bzhi la g.yas
250b3(rgyud): bskor g.yor bskor du bzhag nas yang 'jagro ma bzhi g.yogs la ji srid dro bar gyur pa nga srid du bzlas par bya'o// du ba dang 'bar bas 'di ltar sa blangs na sa gsum
250b4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// ba glang gi lngas kyi nang ngam/ chu bo 'dus par bsod snyoms za ba 'am/ 'o bug za bas arga'i 'o thug mar sbrang rtsis byugs nas stong che lnga spyan
250b5(rgyud): bsreg byas na/ rang nyid kyi nor gyi bdag za nor bzang po nor gyi bdag po nor dang bcas pa mang nga bar 'gyuraro// nga mgu'o zhes de sma na mchog brgyad ga
250b6(rgyud): 'dod pa ster bar 'gyuro// rgyal po dang / gter dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis 'chag pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / klu dang gnod sbyin dang / srin
250b7(rgyud): po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / lus srul po rnams dbang du 'gyuraro// dranab tsam gyis mdun du 'dug par 'gyuraro// rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i son
250b8(rgyud): ni ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sa 'og tu 'jug pa dang / namakha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'og gi 'khrul 'khor rab tu 'jig pa dang / chu rengs pa dang / bcud len dang / char
251a1(rgyud): bcad pa dang / rje su bzung ba brgyad po 'di rnams la/ de'i mdun du gang na gang gcig blang bar bya'o// des gang ci 'dod pa de ster bar 'gyur// pad ma mar nga
251a2(rgyud): sbrang rtsis byugs nas 'bum du sbyin sreg byas na pad+ma ra gi'i nor bu rnyed par 'gyur ro// de ltar ud pa la sngon po dang / ku mu da dri zhim po dang ldan pas kha dog sna tshogs
251a3(rgyud): pa'i rin po che rnyed par 'gyuraro// yungs kar dkar po mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs la gang gi mang nas bzung nas sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur// til
251a4(rgyud): nag po la mar dang / sbrang rtsi sbags la 'bu ma du sbyin sregs byas na nor nye bar 'phel bar 'gyuraro// arga'i shing la me btang la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin
251a5(rgyud): sreg byas na nyi ma bdun gyis dang zhi bar 'gyuraro// dkar po'i tshes gcig nas brtsams nas sha ta pus pa dang / kun da dang / ta ka ra dang / baM sha ka dang / du ru ka dang / gu hu
251a6(rgyud): rnams ci ltar 'tshong ba nyos la mchod pa byas nas mar dang sbrang rtsir spags la stong phrag brgyad du sbyin sreg byas na nyi ma bdun na bdun 'gyur gyi nor rnying par 'gyuraro// 
251a7(rgyud): 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas na bdag dang / gzhan nye bar 'gyur bar byed do// yul srung bar 'gyur// na mau rat+na tra yAM ye/ na mo ma Ni b+ha drA ya/ ma hA yak+Sha sa na pa ta ye/ ki Ni ki Ni g+he/ 
251a8(rgyud): sba ba ne me d+ha ra sa ma ye swA hA/ arga'i mar khus ku mu de'i me tog sbyin sreg byas na rmi lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong bar 'gyuraro// ki Ni ki Ni g+ha Ta kaN+Da tsi tra mai/ d+ha
251b1(rgyud): ra yA swA hA/ don nges par ster na cho ga ji ltar brjod pa bzhi no// 'phags pa gnod gnas kyi dbang po ji ltar 'byung ba'i rtog pa zhes bya ba rdzogaso// rgya gar gyi mkhan po sgeg pa'i
251b2(rgyud): rdo rje dang / bod kyi lo tsAb dge slong rdo rje 'dzin pa rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya dze b+ha la~M nA ma any+dza sha tA ka/ bod skad du// 'phag
251b3(rgyud): ba gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyang ba/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin la phyag 'tshalo// de nas gnod sbyin 'brog gnas po// gser dag gis ni legs par rgyad// rin chen
251b4(rgyud): gyis ni rab mdzes shing // mau ni rab tu 'bar 'dra ba// lcang lo can du zhugs nas kyang // gsang bdag rdo rje 'chang ba yi// zhabs gnyis la ni rab 'jus nas// shin tu mnya
251b5(rgyud): gzhag dris pa ni// bcom ldan gnod 'dzin/ rgyal dbang po// gsang sngags tshogs ni kun gyi bdag/ rig sngags 'chang rnams kur gyis mchod// lha dang
251b6(rgyud): lha mid phyag byas pa// ma rungs 'dul la brtse na pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// mgon po sems can kun don mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi
251b7(rgyud): gsang ba 'dzin// ser rnams la phan 'dogs pas// snying rjes non pa'i yid kyis// yang dge rdzogs pa'i byang chub phyir// bdag gis kyang ni sems bskyed de// mi rnam
251b8(rgyud): nor ni nyung ba dang // bsod nams chung zhing dbang chung ba// mthong nas sdug bsngal chen po yis// rab tu gzir to gsang ba'i bdag/ de nas gnod sprid gyis smras nas/ ba
252a1(rgyud): gsang ba gsang ba'i bdag/ snying rjes non te smras pa ni// legs par nyon cig gsang ba pa// mgon po gnod 'dzin dpal dang ldan// sen kun gyi don du
252a2(rgyud): ba dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel ba bo// nor ra cag gi dbang phyug go/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad bsod nams ldan// dbul po'i nyes sdig sel byed pa// gang gi 'bye ma'i grangs sri
252a3(rgyud): kyi// rgyal mchog rnams kyis sngon gsungs pa// 'od zer brgya pa zhes pa yi// zhing na sangs rgyas nyi ma'i zhal// chos ston pa na bdag gis kyang // de ni rang gis sngon thos te// 
252a4(rgyud): dbul ba sel cing bsod nams ldan// de ni bdag gis shes rab kyis// sems can kun don brtson pa po// khyod la legs par bstan par bya// khyod ni ma'am bzhag rab
252a5(rgyud): tu 'on// 'phags pa lha dang lha min bla// shes rab ldan zhing chos la gus// snying brtse 'i bdag nyid bzo da pa brtan/ dbang po zhi ba dbang po thul// dge ba sdig 'jom
252a6(rgyud): shes rkyen can// nges shing dod kun sgrub pa po// mi gnod mi slu dpal dang ldan// mdzod bdag gzhan gyis mi thub pa// dkon mchog gsum gyis skyabs gcig pa// sangs rgyas
252a7(rgyud): kun gyis gzigs pa po// gter rnams skyod pa gzi brjid can// rtag sbyin nor ni 'phel byed pa/ rin chen 'byung gnas skye bo 'dul// chu yi bdag po chu 'bebs pa// gnod sbyin chu smra
252a8(rgyud): bdag nyid can// gter don nye bar ston pa po// gser gyi ri bo lhun po ste// dbul ba'i gdon las thar byed pa// dbang po nyo dbang 'gro ba'i mgon// chu yi dbang po sprin mdog can// 
252b1(rgyud): 'jig rten mig dang 'jig rten bla// nyi ma zla ba ther zug pa// nor chen rgyal po chen po ste/ lag na ne'u le rab gnas pa// gzhon nu seng ge tog can te// gnod sbyin chen po rdzu 'phrul che// 
252b2(rgyud): tshig gi bdag po bzhin 'dzum pa// gsong por snyan par sla ba po// bram ze 'dod pa'i lcags kyo ste// che ba ngor 'grub grub pas mchod// rig sngags 'ching ba 'khor los bsgyu
252b3(rgyud): ku be ra dang mi la zhon// bum pa'i lto can mig yangs pa// lha yi dri ldan yid ltar mgyogs// khyab bdag bde 'byung ror bzang sras// sems can rnams ni skyong la dga'/ 
252b4(rgyud): 'deng dgur sgyur gzugs yid kyi lnga// cod par nga yi rigs dga' ba// g.yor phyogs cong pan lag na byug/ lag pa brgya pa stobs po che// sa brgyad dbang
252b5(rgyud): byug lha yul pa// zla ba lta ba'i zhal mdog tsa ma// dedang dpon tshogs kyi bdag po ste// gnas brtan chong skal bzang ba// yid bzhin nor bu bum pa bzang // dpag
252b6(rgyud): bsam ljon shing mi yi bdag mchog don 'os pa gtso bo ste// mchog sbyin mi'i bung khyab 'jug pa// skyabs 'os bkra shis srung ba po// rin chen phreng bas rnam par rgyan// lA
252b7(rgyud): yi seng ge khri la bzhugs// byang chub sede'i dpal gyi bdag/ rab tu dar ba nor mi zad // seng ge'i rul gyis mthu rtsal can// ston pa 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// gtso bo
252b8(rgyud): tshong pa rigs kyi mchog/ pad+ma'i lte ba thub med rgyal// tshangs par spyod pa rgya mtsho che// gnod 'dzin bdag nyid che ba yi// ming brgya rtsa brgyad ngas bshad 'di// sdig pa bde 'joms ded
253a1(rgyud): cing // dbul ba'i nyon mongs sel byed pa// 'byor dang skal bzang skyed pa po// glang po rta nor 'phel byed pa// gza' dang rgyu skar rmi lam ngan/ lhas ngan sel bar byed pa
253a2(rgyud): ste// nags sel gal te grong dang ni// dur khrod yang na ri yang rung // mkhas pa gang na klog pa der// g.yul dang ngagra ni nyam nga ba// sbrul dang ma che chom rkun sogs// stag dang don dang
253a3(rgyud): 'dzags pa che// rgya mtsho bgrong dka' mi bzad las// mi ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// dbang po ma dang chu lba dang // gshin rje srin bdag rlung lha dang // nor sbyin dang ldan ku ba ra// nor bu bzang sras
253a4(rgyud): lnga rtsen dang / cad mo can dang 'brog gnas dang // lha dang gnod sbyin gzhan dag kyang / g.yel ba med par nyin mtshan du// rab tu dga' zhing srung bar byed// gang ni ming 'di klog pa der// glang
253a5(rgyud): chen rta dang ba glang dang // lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bras bu me tog rnams kyang 'phel// mi nid dang ni 'go ba'i nang // gnod pa kun las byung ba rnams// bde du ni
253a6(rgyud): bde legs 'gyur// lhag par byis pa rnams la shis// de la yi dgas klu rnams dang // ma mo dang ni gdon drag dang // mkha' gro ma dang mi 'am ci// srin po rnams kyang 'tsha
253a7(rgyud): mi byed// nad ngo cog las rnam par grol// de bzhin bde zhing nor dang ldan// bu ngag dang chu bo dang // dpal dang gtong ba rnams kyis rgyas// rigs mchog rgyal ba 'byung ba dang // long spyod chen/ 
253a8(rgyud): bi'i nang du skye// tshe dang ldang dpal dang ldan pa dang / nad med rims dang bral bar 'gyur// tshe rabs kun tu skye ba dran// lobs snyen bos pa 'dzin pa dang // byang chub se de'i yon tan ldan/ 
253b1(rgyud): bskal pa bzang po nyid du 'gyur// phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal gnod sbyin rje// gsang bdag khyod la phyag 'tshal te// ma rudus 'dul la brtson pa po// lag na rdo rje khyod la 'dud// sen
253b2(rgyud): dad la mnyes gshin pa// nor bzang sras kyi grags pa 'di// dbul ba'i nad ni zhi byed pa// rab tu bshad pa legs par gsungs// dor kun 'grub pa gsang ba'i sngags// bdag gis
253b3(rgyud): kyang ni 'dir dbul te// da ni legs par dran tsam gyis// ma ni dngul las grol 'gyur zhing // gzhan gyis mi tshugs srung bar 'gyur// dge rnams kyis kyang mi choms shing // bskal
253b4(rgyud): pa bzang dang skal dang ldan// lo brgya yang ni 'tshobar 'gyur// lha yi glang po rin chen dang // rgyal dang rgyal srid ngos rnams kyang // nges par myur du thob 'gyur te// rgyal
253b5(rgyud): rgyan tsha lam ma nas sa mU ldam/  mdzadza 'a dzi gakya ma pa / gas sa / 
253b6(rgyud): ma nu sma ra hriHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'phags pa gnod 'dzin gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa rdzogaso// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya mye kha la nA ma d+hA rat+ti/ 
253b7(rgyud): bod skad du// 'phags pa me kha la zhes bya ba'i gzungs// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis 'os pa dus gcig ni/ bcom
253b8(rgyud): lngar shAkya'i yul ser spyi'i gnas na/ shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe gzhon nu sgra gcan zin mal na nyal ba las srin po zhig gis spangs par byas par/ 
254a1(rgyud): gyur to// de nas gzhon nu sgra gcan zin de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas gzhor nu mang po rnams kyis mdun du bdar cing yongasu bskor te ser skya'i gnas nas
254a2(rgyud): byung nas// bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te spyan sngar 'dug nas duso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 
254a3(rgyud): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gzhon nu sgra gcan zin srung ba'i phyir me la kha la zhes bya ba'i rig sngags bshad kyis khyod kyis zung shig/ lha'i tshogs
254a4(rgyud): / klu'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang / na mkha' lding gi tshogs dang / mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang / lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs dang / sha za'i tshogs

254a6(rgyud): dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / drang srong 'dod cha gas dang bral ba rnams dang / gangs la gnas pa dang / phyog sa bcu na 'byung po gang dag 'khod pa dang / srin mo'i tshogs
254a7(rgyud): dang bA li da dang / kA Da li do dang / po da ri dang / grong rna dang / yid bzang dang / 'phrog ma chen po dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon cig/ rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyi srung ma/ shar phyogs/ 
254a8(rgyud): kyi phyogs chan srin mo 'phrog ma zhes bya ba dang / lho phyogs kyi phyogs chan srin mo glang sna ma zhes bya ba dang / nub phyogs kyi ma phyogs chan srin mo ral pa can zhes bya ba dang / byang
254b1(rgyud): phyogs kyi phyogs chan srin mo sa'i gtsug ces bya ste/ srin mo drag mo de dag re re yang 'khor bya ba drug cus bskor ba me kha la'i rig sngags las brjod pa de dag thams cad
254b2(rgyud): kyis srung bor gyis shig/ tad+ya thA/ g+ha na g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne g+ha ne/ g+ha ne g+ha ne kha ti/ g+hu me g+hu me g+hu me g+hu ne g+hu me g+hu ne g+hu me bu ti g+ha re g+ha ra g+ha ra g+ha re/ g+ha ri ri Ni/ g+ha ra ba ti/

254b4(rgyud): hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu hu lu/ ti li ti li ti li ti li ti li ti li ti li/ hi li hi li mi li mi li/ pe ta yab a ma ne/ ma bi sa re/ haM ha shi hi/ sa man+ta sa re/ a
254b5(rgyud): man+ta sa ra / pa ri kha sa me/ a ba d+hi sa man+ta brde/ g+ha me/ me kha le/ kun dga' bo me kha la zhes bya ba stobs po che ste rdzu 'phrul dang ldan ma// brtson 'grus che ba/ 'di ni rig
254b6(rgyud): sngags 'chang rnabs dang / 'byung po rnams dang / ro langs rnams las gang du yang bkag pa med kun tu thogs pa med par 'gra'o// kun dga' bo me kha la zhes bya ba'i rig sngags 'di
254b7(rgyud): ni sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir dang / bangade ba'i phyir dang / srung zhing sba ba'i bar du bya ba'i phyir 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung so// drang srong chen po gzhan dag
254b8(rgyud): gis kyang smras te/ kun dga' ba mau kha la'i rig sngags na sems can rnams la phan par bye'o// gang su dag sdig pa'i las dang ldan pa gzi brjid 'phrog pa/ sa la gnas pa de ngag/ 
255a1(rgyud): thams cad me kha lA rig sngags bos nas shin tu skrag ste/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnamasu 'gro'o// kun dga' bo mo kha la'i rigs sngags legs
255a2(rgyud): par gzung ba byas pa la kun nas dpag tshad bcu gnyisu srung ba gyis shig/ yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur bgyi/ sa

255a4(rgyud): bcing bar gyis shig/ sdang ba thams cad bzlog par gyis shig/ mi dang mi ma yin pa sdig par byed pa rnams 'tsher ma gzhug cig/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// gas spa
255a5(rgyud): kyi gzhi rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/ da nga cho ga ni de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal te/ me tog/ dang / bdug pa dag gsol nas skud pa bcing bar bya'o//

255a7(rgyud): ri mi sa ra/ rig sngags 'di ni thos na su// sa rnams bde g.yos par gyur// 'byung po'i tshogs rnams rab tu g.yos// lha tshigs rnams kyang lhags par gyur// klu yi rgyal
255a8(rgyud): bo rnams kyang lhags// 'byung po'i rgyal po rnams kyang lhags// bcom ldan byams pa'ang der phyin to// tshangs pa dang ni dbang po 'ang lhags// dbang phyug che dang gzhon nu dang / 
255b1(rgyud): gnyis ka der ni lhag par 'gyur// me kha la las gang su dag/ brjod pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang lhags// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
255b2(rgyud): byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'di la srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde leg su 'gyur ba dang / chad
255b3(rgyud): pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mi mdza' ba bzlog pa dang / mtshams dgum pa dang / ma kha las yongasu bzlog pa stsal par bgyi'o// tang thA/ a bat+ta na
255b4(rgyud): ban+da ni/ a bi gaT ni/ tsu lu tsu l-i/ u d+hA nAM/ sa man+te/ dAn+te/ ni mu tAM ni mi mu ni/ zhi ba dang bde lag su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// swA hA// sangs rgyas la phyag
255b5(rgyud): 'tsha lo// bde legasu gyur cig swA hA/ de ras mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas me kha la'i rig sngags kun nas 'dzin pa 'di ni 'khor gyi tshig 'di phu lo// s+yAd ya the dan/ ang gu
255b6(rgyud): la/ a du ra/ du du re/ sha~M khi shi khi shi khi sha khi/ ba re da ra nga ra/ ba ti/ mu tsa mu tsa bi mu 6/ zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i buM rab 'bab bral gyi
255b7(rgyud): me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phral ba/ s+yA ma the dan/ brAda?Sh+Te/ ru d+hi ra kaH/ gam b+hI ra/ du rAng sha/ na mu N+ye/ muH/ shAkya rA dza/ bde leg su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// swA hA/ na
255b8(rgyud): de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis ma kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yA ya be den/ so ga/ b+hai de De/ b+he da Da me/ da na ti li/ ti li mi li/ srung ba gyis shig/ bdi lags
256a1(rgyud): 'gyur bar bya'o// mtshamasu dgum pa'i bar du bya'o// swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe rgyal po lus ngar gyis me kha li'i rig sngags kyi 'khor bral ba/ s+yAng ya ba da
256a2(rgyud): g+hu me g+hu ma g+hu me g+hu ma g+hu me/ oM kaM/ mu ke/ dz+wa le/ nga le ma ti pha le/ sA re/ sa ra/ a d+hi pa ti/ zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA
256a3(rgyud): da ras de'i tshe rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis me kha li'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yA ya the dan/ d+ha d+ha ra d+ha d+ha re/ d+ha ra Ni/ d+ha ra Ni/ d+ha re/ a tsu te/ mu Ne/ mu ru/ zhi ba dang
256a4(rgyud): bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// swA hA/ mtshams dgum pa'i bar du rgya cher bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe rgya la po chen po 'phags skyes pos me kha la'i rig sngags
256a5(rgyud): 'khor phul ba/ s+yAng ya be da na/ a tA re/ paN+Da re/ ka ra ke pa ra pa tre/ ka ra ru tre/ ka ri d+ha re/ ka ra ka pa tra/ ru ru maM/ k+Shu k+Shu/ a k+Shi me/ bak+Shi/ zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar dargya
256a6(rgyud): swAhA/ mtshams 'gum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas rgyal po mog mi bzang gis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ snying ya be dar/ dza ma la dza ma la/ d+ha ri d+ha ridz+dza
256a7(rgyud): d+hi ro d+hi ri/ sa man+ta d+hi / zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtsham su dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu zla bas ma kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ 
256a8(rgyud): s+yad ya the dam a la he/ ta la b+he/ ma De bi ma Da~M/ d+ha ke d+ha ra ke/ sa ki ni/ ba ki ni/ zhi ba dang / bde lagasu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swAhA/ de nas da
256b1(rgyud): lha'i bu nyi mas me kha li'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya be dam/ oM bA de/ bi ma le/ pra b+hA sA re/ sha ha ras+t+rai/ ha sa ha sa ra smai/ a ta swa ra si/ zhi ba dang / bde legs
256b2(rgyud): su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i tshogs rnams kyis me kha li'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba// s+yA ya the dan/ ku ru ku ru
256b3(rgyud): su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ zhi ba dang bde lagasu 'gyur bar 'gyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe rgyu skar gyi tshogs rnams kyis me kha li'i rig sngags
256b4(rgyud): kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAd ya be ngan/ ta ma la/ ta la a had he A kA sha bi ma le/ zhi ba dang / bde lag su 'gyur ba'i bar du bgyi'o// mtsham su dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA/ dan
256b5(rgyud): de'i tshe klu'i tshogs rnams kyis me kha la'i ga sngags kyi 'khor phul gswA ya ba ngan/ oM la maM le/ a tsa le/ ba d+hi/ A shung ba d+he/ mo k+saM/ zhi ba dang
256b6(rgyud): bde leg su 'gyur ba'i bar du bgyi'o// mtshams dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas ngo'i tshe lha ma yon gyi tshogs rnams kyis me kha la'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ 
256b7(rgyud): s+yAng ya be nga na/ a d+h+wa d+ha ra/ bi bu de/ se buM te/ dan ti/ zhi ba dang / bde lagasu 'gyur bar bgyi'o// mtsham su dgum pa'i bar du bgyi'o// swA hA/ de nas de'i tshe gnod sbyin gyi snga
256b8(rgyud): dben nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis ma kha li'i rig sngags kyi 'khor phul ba/ s+yAng ya ba dan/ cha tsha ba ti cha cha ba ti/ ru ru dA rA/ u bI ra ba rA/ zhi ba dang / bde legasu 'gyur ba'i ba

257b1(rgyud): / kAg si/ du du/ Shi Ti ti thi/ ti mi li mi ti/ shi ti/ mi ti li/ ba ti pre tri pre tri te/ du hi ni/ a hA ni/ la he/ ba he/ ba Da be tha pa btsun pa 'di ni 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags te/ me kha la
257b2(rgyud): gzungs sngags kyi 'khor du phul ba lag so// srung ba dang / yongasu bskyab pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde lagasu 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba

258a1(rgyud): bo me kha la'i rig sngags 'di ni sprir 'ching ba/ rlung gnon pa/ tshar gcod pa/ bdag srung ba/ gzhan srung ba/ grong dang / grong khyer srung ba mtshams gcod
258a2(rgyud): pa ste/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po 'am/ yi dgas sam/ grul bum 'am/ sha za'am/ lus srul po 'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ spyod pa pa 'am/ kun tu rgyu dang / 
258a3(rgyud): gcer bu pa 'am/ 'tshe ba pa 'am/ mi thod can nam/ lus skya 'am/ mi 'am/ mi ma yin pas 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa'o// kun dga' bo me kha la'i rig sngogs 'di ni gsheng byed dang /

258a5(rgyud): dge sbyong gis byas pa gcod par byang ba'o// bra ma zes byas pa dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu dang / 'tsho ba pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// dbang phyu
258a6(rgyud): chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// tshangs pas byas pa dang / brgya byin gyis byas pa dang / lha'i dbang pos byas pa dang / rgyal po chen pos byas pa dang / khyab
258a7(rgyud): 'jug gis byas pa dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byeng ba'o// rgyal po chen pos byas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon gyis byas pa dang /

258b1(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas byas pa'i rig sngags gcong bar byed pa'o// lha gang bas kyang byas pa'i rig
258b2(rgyud): sngags gcod par byeng pa'o// ru khrod pa byas pa'i rig sngags gcod par byed pa'o// shing drung pas byas pa dang / ri drung pas byas pa dang / ri rtse bas byas pa dang sa pas byas pa dang
258b3(rgyud): nam mkha' pas byas pa dang / gnas bad pas byas pa dang / mis byas pa dang / mi ma yin pas byas pa'i rig sngags gtsong par byed pa'o// me kha la'i rig sngags 'di ni gcod
258b4(rgyud): pa'o// phyir gcong pa'o// phyis gcod pa'o// / na dga' bo gang gis me kha lo'i rig sngags 'dis srung ba dang / yongasu bsgrub pa dang / yongasu gzung ba dang / yongasu
258b5(rgyud): bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spangs pa dang / dug gzhil ba dang / mi mje' ba bzlog pa dang / dpag tshad da
258b6(rgyud): dpag tshang gnyis ma/ dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi bar du mtshams bcad par byas na/ gang me kha la'i rig sngags 'di las 'da' bar byed pa ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas
258b7(rgyud): pa dang tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i 'jig rten dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yor du bcas pa'i 'jig rten rangs ma mthong ste do ni gnas
258b8(rgyud): mdo// kun dga' ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang / bden par smra ba thams cad kyi bder ba dang / drang srong bad kyi bden pa 'ang
259a1(rgyud): la sen gyi tshogs 'gal bar ma byed cig/ kun dga' bo dus las 'da' bar mi bya ba lnga ni 'di yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang / chos
259a2(rgyud): kyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang / ngage 'dun gyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang / bden par spro ba rnams kyi bden pa las 'da' bar mi bya ba dang / drang srong gi bden pa las
259a3(rgyud): 'da' bar mi bya ste/ 'byung po thams cad dang / nang bde dang / mi thams cad dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi 'da' bar bya ba ma yin no// nad pade dang / 'byung po bad dang / sdang ba

259a5(rgyud): ma byed cig swA hA/ me kha la'i rig sngags kyi cho ga bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas la me tog gis mchod pa dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / lha bshos ngag phul nas
259a6(rgyud): phyir bsrung ba bya'o// gtsang mas gos gtsang ma bgos te/ ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs nas me tog bkram ste/ ci 'bor pa'i gtor ma 'am/ phye 'am/ pad+ma dang / bza'
259a7(rgyud): ba dang / btung ba dang / me tog bsregs pas bum pa bkang ba 'am/ snod bkang ba'i dbu su 'dug nas spos kyi rgyun mi 'chad par 'dug par bya'o// tra ku shas thad la byab par
259a8(rgyud): bya'o// bdag srung ba dang / gzhan bsrung bar bya ba ni skud paso// sprin bcing ba ni me tog sA ma'i shing dang / snang ba'i mar gyis spyir bsreg bya'o// rlung dang / char bzlog pa ni tsA
259b1(rgyud): mumadza'i lhas ma la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas te rtsa ba'i rig sngags kyis lan bdun btab nas/ mdzad pa bdun dor bar bya'o// lam grub pa dang / bde bar bya na chos gos kyi
259b2(rgyud): grwar lar bdun gsum bzlas brjod byas te mdung pa gsum dor bar bya'o// zas dkar gsum zos la nyin zhag gsum sbyang ba byas nas pad+ma dang / yungs kar dkar po la
259b3(rgyud): lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te grong dang / grong khyer mtshams bcad par bya'o// rig sngags bad gcong bar 'dod pa sa sna tshogs pa'i mtshon cha la lan bdun bzlas
259b4(rgyud): brjod byas te/ chu la bcad par bya'o// snod gsar par chu blu gros nas lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te khrus byas na log 'dren thang bcing ba byas par 'gyuraro// me tog dkar po dag
259b5(rgyud): la bzlas brjod byas te bsnun na dgu med par 'gyuraro// nang bdel shing ka ra bi ri'i lcug mas byeb par bya ste/ bdag srung ba byas na gang du gdon gyi phyir yang las
259b6(rgyud): bad bya'o// bab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyeng ba dang // rgyal ba'i pho brang 'khor du snu ma'i me tog gi 'bru mar gyis nang du a ta~M mu ta ka spyugs pa'i yam sreg gi shing la
259b7(rgyud): 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyis btab ste lan bcu bzhir sbyin bsreg bya'o// 'byung ba dbab par 'dod pas ra'i 'o ma dang/ shing a pa marga'i ya ma sreg shing dag la 'gro lding
259b8(rgyud): ba'i rig sngags btab ste lan lngar sbyin bsreg bya'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ched du sprin bsreg bya bar 'dod pas 'bras phug po che dang / ba'i 'o ma dang / ru r+Na dang / rgya ma tsha dang / 
260a1(rgyud): shing ka ra bi ra dkar po'i yam sreg shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya ste sbyin sreg byas na sen thams cad kyi cheng du sbyin sreg byas
260a2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// rnyed par bya ba'i don du ru rta dang 'bru mar las 'gro lding ba'i rig sngags kyis lan bduni bzlas brjod byas te gdong bskur nas smras pas gang bslangs
260a3(rgyud): ba de thob par 'gyuraro// thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa
260a4(rgyud): dang khyim dang khrug pa rnams kyis byug cing ci nus kyis lha bshos kyang dbul bar bya ste 'di dngos grub bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces/ 
260a5(rgyud): bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / gzhon du sgra gcan zin dang / bad dang ldan pa'i 'ja ra nga dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas
260a6(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa me kha la zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // srung ba dang @#
260a7(rgyud): cho ga dang bcas pas mi mjed kyi sen thang bsrungs par gyur cig swA hA/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te
260a8(rgyud): gtan la phab pa// 6// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bi d+yA rA dzA shA sa ma hA nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbugs chen po zhes bya ba/ sangs pa
260b1(rgyud): byang chub sengang thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'byung ba'i bdag po chen po// mche ba gtsigs pa ser skya zhes bya bas/ 
260b2(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'byung po thaMd kyi bdag po lags te/ bdag ni gleng bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mchis pa'i 'byung po thaMd la
260b3(rgyud): 'tshe bar bgyid/ rdeg par bgyid / 'ching bar bgyid / 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'phen bar bgyid pa/ yan lag dang / nyin lag rnams
260b4(rgyud): rnar gcod par bgyid lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ bdag bkres par gyur pa na/ dbugs gtong ste/ dbugs nges gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ku
260b5(rgyud): tu 'gengs par bgyid cing / bcom ldan ngas bdag mi da mi ma lags pa bad kyi gzi byin 'phro ga bar bgyid lags te/ dbugs chen pos sen
260b6(rgyud): rnams reg ma thag tu bro nang sna tshogs dgra/ 'byung lag so// bcom ldan 'das gang na rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbugs chen po zhes bgyi ba'adi spyod pa dang / 
260b7(rgyud): bdag gi dbugs kyis mi tshugs pa dang / 'byung po rnams 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ sangs rgyas ngong // chos dang / 
260b8(rgyud): dge 'dun rnams la phyag bgyis nas/ mgo 'am/ mgul du btags te/ 'chang ba der/ rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 
261a1(rgyud): 'dus pa las gyur pa'i blo nad rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bdag dang slan chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yid dam 'tshal lag so// dad+ya \u0f7f/ 
261a2(rgyud): Da Da ra Sha Ta ra/ ba ra tha ra kha~M ra kha tha ra/ ma ra ma ra/ ma ma ra/ ma ma ra/ hud+hu hu/ ha ha ha/ sa ra se ra sa ra/ tsu tsu tsu/ bu bu bu ki l-i kai li ki li/ sarba b+hU ta/ a d+hi pa ti/ 
261a3(rgyud): dra/ ba bA bA/ khu khu khu/ kA kra kra/ ya sa ya sa ya sa/ pAtA ra pA tA ra/ pA dzA raM/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ hu hu hu/ bdag la bsrungs shig/ bsrungs shig/ tsi li tsi li tsi li/ mi li mi
261a4(rgyud): li mo li/ khro khyo b+ho/ go ri gau ri gau ri/ bdag gi nang thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig swA hA/ ma hA shA sa swA hA/ ma hA b+hU ta// a d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ gau rA ye swAhA/ 
261a5(rgyud): u grA ya swA hA/ bdag bde legasu gyur cig/ de Sh+Ti ka rA la pi ga la A dz+nyA ba ya taM swAhA/ 'bigs po rig sngags kyi rgyal po dbugs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs/ 
261a6(rgyud): rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ben+d+ha ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// oM smar sna
261a7(rgyud): ra/ bi sman skar ma hA dza ba hUM zhes brjod cing rin po che brdang bas rin po che'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i char dpag tu med pa ma mkha'i khams gang bar bsam pa
261a8(rgyud): dbu'o// rin po che brdar ba'i gzung rdzog so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
261b1(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ oM b+haM Sha dz+ye byai 'adz+ye/ ma hA b+h+r-i Sha dz+ye/ b+he Sha dz+ye sa mung ga te swA hA// smad gtong ba'i cha sman la sngags kyis
261b2(rgyud): gdab pa rdzogs// // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshalo// na mo b+ha ga
261b3(rgyud): wa te rat+na ke tu rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ an+ta te/ sa myakle bu d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM rat+ne rat+ne ma hA rat+ne rat+na bIr+ya swA hA/ 'di brjod cing bskor ba gcig byas pa yang dpag tu med pa byas pa/ 
261b4(rgyud): 'gyur// khe skor ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// / rgyo gar skad du/ Ar+ya pre da kA rit+na rat+na tre ye nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bad skad du/ 'phags pa dkon mchog mchog gi
261b5(rgyud): ral bskor ba bya ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba/ btsa ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag
261b6(rgyud): 'cha lo// oM na mo da sha kr-iti kA sarba rat+na tra yA ya/ na maHpra dak+Sha su pra dak+Sha/ sarba pA pe bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ gzungs 'di lan cig brjod pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi dkon
261b7(rgyud): mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal zhing bskor ba byas par 'gyu ro// thig ma med pa nas bsags pa'i sdig pa bde dag par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// 
261b8(rgyud): dgra dang bgegs kyis bklags rnyed par mi 'gyuraro// nang dang gdon bde las bar bar 'gyuraro// bskor ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// / rgya gar skad du/ dak+Shi tI bi raM
262a1(rgyud): sho d+ha ni nA ma khong skad du/ yon yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sede' thams cad la phyag 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa phra/ 
262a2(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// byang chub seMde'i sa de' chen po rdo rje chen po dang ldan pa blo gros dang ldan pa'i 'jam da
262a3(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// na maHsa man+ta pra b+hA rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ aR+tha te sa myak+saM bud d+hA ya/ na mo many+dzu shri yaM ku ma ra b+hU tA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya ma
262a4(rgyud): hA kA ru ta~M kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM ni rA la mr-i ni rAHse/ dza ya dza ya la ba d+he ma hA ma te pan+te/ dkI ni bachen d+hA ya swA hA/ 'di lan gcig brjod pas sdig pa bde
262a5(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// yon mang po la spyad pa yang byang bar 'gyuraro// yon bdag de'i yon yongasu 'phel bar 'gyur zhing cho ga thad rdzogs par 'gyuraro// 'di brjod pas bar du gcod
262a6(rgyud): pa thad kyang mi 'byu'o// 'dul po lung las rnam par nges pa'i mdo las byung ba yon yongasu spyong ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / de nas yin yongasu sbyong ba'i gzungs// nam
262a7(rgyud): b+ha ga ba te/ su mai ru kalpa/ rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga ta yA/ aR+sha te/ samyakle bu da d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM kalpe kal+le/ ma hA kal+le/ kalpa pa ri sho d+ha ni swA hA/ gzungs 'di lan cig bzlas pas/ 
262a8(rgyud): rab tsam gyi yon yongasu sbyong bar byed par gsungs pas/ lan lnga 'am/ lan drug tsam bzla so// yon yongasu sbyong ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // dkon mchog gsu
262b1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshalo// dkon mchog gsum gyi rten la sngags 'di lan re brjod cing brkyang phyag re byas te/ phyag gsum byas na sde snod gsum thos pa dang / bsam pa dang / bsgoms
262b2(rgyud): po'i bsod nams dang mnyam par 'gyur ro// nyi ma re re phyag gsum byas na tshe 'di nyid la mthong ba'i lam gyi ye shes kyi ting 'dzin thob par 'gyuraro// de ma thob kyi bar du ma nga
262b3(rgyud): ma yin pa dang / 'byung po dang / nang rims kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// oM na mo many+dzu shri ye/ na maHsu shri ye/ na ma ut+ta ma shri ye swA hA/ phyag bya ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// 
262b4(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje drag po la phyag 'tshalo// i ri mi ri/ d+ha de me/ ba hu pha/ le b+ha be tu swA hU~M/ gos phrugs gcig
262b5(rgyud): la lan stong bzlas brjod byas te/ mi ya rab sa sam/ slob dpon nam/ gzhan gang yang rung ba cig la byin na zla ba phyed phan chad kyis gos phrugs brgya thob
262b6(rgyud): par 'gyu 'o// de bzhin du nor zas sam/ rkang 'gros gang yang rung ba rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o// gos brgya thob pa'i gzungs rdzogaso// // dkon mchog gsum la
262b7(rgyud): phyag 'tsha lo// oM mo kha mu khi tri mu kha/ ma/ tri mu khi/ ma hA sra mu khi/ ta thA ga ta mu kha sI ha na/ tshin+da chen+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ sa s+phA nA gas+ya sA he swA hA/ mad seng dang / parta ka dang / 
262b8(rgyud): gon ring po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa byas te/ bshags na mcher pa'i skran zhi bar 'gyur ro// batshom mang ngo // skran zhi ba'i gzung rdzogaso// 
263a1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sreg gsol
263a2(rgyud): thod kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// dad+ya bA/ du re du ro/ huT ga ta ne swAhA/ cho ga ni lag pa la bzlas brjod byas nas ldo gnyis nam zhu ba'i nang 'byung bar 'gyur// ma zhu ba'i
263a3(rgyud): nang 'byung ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// / 6// dkor mtshig gsum la phyag 'tshalo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo/ 
263a4(rgyud): ba'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs la phyag 'tsha lo// dad+ya thA/ dwi ri tiSh+Tha/ skAr bA cos/ mtshal ma tsa la swA hA/ lan bdun brjod de/ 'phags pa 'jam pa
263a5(rgyud): la gsol ba btab na mi bde byams par 'gyuraro// 'phags pa sdang ba bang rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzog so// / 6// dkon mchog gsum la phyag
263a6(rgyud): 'tshalo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tsha lo// oM ku mA ra ru pa d+ha ra ni bi shwa saM b+ha ba A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ la gul gu/ 
263a7(rgyud): b+h+rUM b+h+ya/ hUM hUM/ dzi ni dzi ka many+dzu shri yaM/ ta ra ya me/ sarba duHkhe b+h+yaHphaT phaT/ sa ma ya sa ma ya/ a mi tong b+ha bing b+he ba/ pA pa ma nA sha ya swA hA/ sdig pa thams cad
263a8(rgyud): rab tu zhi bar byed pa ces byi ba'i gzungs rdzogas+ho// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// oM ba ka ba tse/ dze b+ha na~M/ ste b+ha ni/ mo he ni/ sarba ro'abra
263b1(rgyud): ma ni swA hA/ shar phyogasu bltas te 'dugu la/ sngags 'di brjod cing rang gi lag pas sna bdun gdong la byugs nas tshogs kyi nang du song nas khros pa dga' bar 'gyuraro// khre
263b2(rgyud): bzhi par byeng po'i gzungs rdzogaso// // 'phags pa khros pa zhi bar byed pa ces bya bi'i gzungs// dpal chen mo la phyag 'tsha lo// ka ta bi ka te/ ro 'bra na ma
263b3(rgyud): gang khros pa'i mdun du brjod nang khros bzhi nas nges par 'ong ngo // khros pa zhi ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// na me b+ha ga ba ta/ 
263b4(rgyud): uSh+NI ShA ya d+ha re ran te swA hA/ ma bsgrubs kyang las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ gi wang las lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas dpral bar thig le byas na gang bltas pa
263b5(rgyud): de dga' bar 'gyur ro// mig rtsil lan brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te/ mig la brkus na gang dang phrad par bya ba de dga' bar 'gyuraro// chu khyod gang la lan bdun bzlas
263b6(rgyud): te 'brangs nam spangs par zas rnyed par 'gyur// tshogs pa'i nang du 'gro na bdag gis gos kyi mtha' ma nas lag pa g.yon pas bzungs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla
263b7(rgyud): brjod byas nas tshogs pa'i nang du song mtshig bcan par 'gyuraro// tshig bcan po'i gzungs rdzog so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ 
263b8(rgyud): a l-i kA li a le kA li mud tsi te swA hA/ kha nyi ma la bltas te/ chu la sngags 'di lan bdun btab ste/ phyogs bcur gtor na bdag bsrungs par 'gyuraro// bdag srung
264a1(rgyud): ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // 'phags pa yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tsha lo// na mo b+ha ga ba te/ 
264a2(rgyud): Sh+NI ShA ya/ d+ha ra da ra ni ha ye swA hA/ ma bsgrubs kyang bklags pas 'grub ste/ gi hang la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te dpral bar thig la byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// 
264a3(rgyud): laM bsngags te mig la bskur na gang bltas pa mig spang 'thun no// chu la bsngags te 'thungs na gzhan rnams zas ster snying 'dod ngo do// yid du 'ong ba'i gzung rdzogaso// 
264a4(rgyud): dkan mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// oM b+ha ga ba ti shru ti s+thi ti// ba lA ba pad+ma sid d+hi swA hA/ cho ga ni zhag bdun gyi bar du nang re zhing 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
264a5(rgyud): phyug gi spyan sngar chu khyor gang la lan bdun sngags kyis btab te 'thungs na/ nyin cig kyang yi ge sho lo ka sum brgya lob so// zla ba cig gi bar du byas na
264a6(rgyud): mi 'am ci dang 'dra bar mgrin pa snyan par 'gyur te/ the tsom za bar mi bya'o// mgrin pa snyan pa'i gzungs rdzog so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// bcwam
264a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ches grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / yud tsam gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+ya thA/ nak+Sha traM/ sarba tiSh+Tha
264a8(rgyud): mUr+yA/ na tra ni/ ma sa mi ta d+ha ni/ bab+han+da swA hA/ de'i cho ga ni phyogs gang du 'gro 'dod kyang rung ste/ nges lan bdun brjod nas song na don ba grub par 'gyur// den pa di grub pa'i
264b1(rgyud): gzungs rdzog so// / dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshalo// chos la phyag 'tshalo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshalo// na mo ha ri d+hi ya
264b2(rgyud): r-id+h+r-i ku/ ma ri/ gau ri/ gan d+hA ri/ tsat+tA li/ ma ti gau/ ka l-i ka l-i/ che ge mo zhig gi mo ha hi/ kha ra kha ra/ pa tsa pa tsa/ a ba d+ha ya/ mur tsA ya/ che ga mo zhig gi ma sha ma nA ya swA hA/ a
264b3(rgyud): b+hu b+hu bA/ dza la dz+wa la dzA dz+wa la ma nA me bi sarba se skA ra ka ri Ni dza/ ta le ta le/ dz+wa la dz+wa la swA hA/ 'di'i cho ga ni bklags pa tsam gyis ma bsgrubs par las bang 'grub par 'gyur
264b4(rgyud): klang nang dang / rims ldang ngu ba can dang / rol nges dang / gdon rnams pham par 'gyuraro// dran pa tsam gyis de dag zad kyis btang bar 'gyuraro// bkres na grong du song sA la
264b5(rgyud): bdun bzlas brjod pas te/ gdong la byugs na zas rnyed par 'gyuraro// lce la bzlas brjod byas na shags 'gyed pa'i tshe lan thabs par 'gyur ro// lo ma 'am ma dog gam/ 'bras bu la
264b6(rgyud): bsngags na su la byin pa de dga' bar 'gyuraro// las grub pa'i gzungs rdzogaso// // dug zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ bdud rtsi sman gyi lha mo nor gyi rgyun la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya
264b7(rgyud): thA/ oM su ru su ru ka kha ra bar ke/ bi ro he ri/ shud d+hi bi shud d+he swA hA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bden pa dang gzi brjid kyis klu'i dug dang / sbrul gyi dug dang / stsar
264b8(rgyud): ba'i dug dang / kha rlangs kyi dug dang / rtsa ba'i dug dang / gsan zin mche ba'i drug bco mo// dbyangs par bco mo// zhes brjod par bya'o// dug thams cad zhi bar byed po'i
265a1(rgyud): gzungs rdzogaso// / 'phabs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tsha lo// tA re tA re tA rA ya/ b+ha ga ba ti/ kham du mo tsa ni swA hA/ 'phags
265a2(rgyud): pa'i sngags de bzlas brjod byas na bcings pa las grol bar bya'o// bcings pa las grol ba'i gzungs rdzogaso// // 'phags pa bdud thaMd skrag par byeng ba zhes bya
265a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thob ba la phyag 'tshalo// oM sarba thA ga da ma Ni sha ta dISh+Ti/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+ha ma Ni ma hA ma Ni/ hr-ing ya ma Ni swA hA/ sngags 'di badz+rad

265a5(rgyud): byed pa'i gzungs rdzogaso// // ma 'byor bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags/ 'phag sa pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshalo// oM ubs ubs
265a6(rgyud): sum sum/ sarba nan/ rbad swA hA/ hUM phaT/ sha ma shAn ta~M ku ru swA hA/ lan gsum brjod de rma la mchil ma byugaso na rdos phog pa dang / mtshon brgyab pa dang / rtsa chad pa dang / kla
265a7(rgyud): pa chags pa rnams sos par byed do// rma 'byor bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogaso// // me'i zug rngu rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs bsil mdzad chu'i lha la phyag 'tshal/ 
265a8(rgyud): oM b+h+ra ma Ni b+h+ra ma Ni/ dz+ha ri b+hU ma Na swA hA/ zhes lan bcug brjod de mchil ma blugs rnams tshig pa'i zug rngu zhi'o// me'i zug rngu rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzog so//

265b2(rgyud): g.ya' ba'i nang sel bar byed// mkhris pa'i nang sel bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogaso// // bad kan gyi nang sel ba'i gzungs sngags/ 'phags pa spyan ras gaH/ 
265b3(rgyud): dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalo// oM shAn ti shAn ti/ bi ti shAn tiM/ sarba bi ti su la myags swA hA// zas ma zhu ba dang / spos pa dang / skran nang dang / chu dang / khrag sgyogs pa dang /

265b5(rgyud): sngags/ na mo hi sh+'u he ke swA hA/ lus la nang 'dun rang khong skems kyis btab pa bsil yab la chus gtor te/ lan drug cu rtsa gcig bsngags nas
265b6(rgyud): de'i lus la g.yabs na rang med par 'gyur ro// kA ya'i nang sel ba'i gzungs rdzog so// // 'phags pa rims dang srog chags kyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba/ 
265b7(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// oM dza dza ri/ bar+Na sha ba ri swA hA/ na maHsing ha byA g+h+ra/ rak+Sha ta rak+Sha/ kha bin dra ma kho mo kha/ tsan ti ti ba ta ya/ ro ga ni dI pa ta ye sa
265b8(rgyud): dril gul lan bdun bsngags te/ gang gis sa phyogs dkrol ba dang / bya dang / gcan zin dang / srin bu dang / byi ba dang / rims nang bde bsrungs par 'gyuraro// rims dang
266a1(rgyud): srog chags kyis mi tshugs pa'i gzungs rdzog so// // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// lus kyi zag pa sbyin par btab pa'i gzungs mchil ma la
266a2(rgyud): o a shwe sma A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/ lung ba la/ oM a khra ra A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/ snabs la/ oM a b+hi g+ha na A ha re b+h+yaHswA hA/ lus kyi dri ma la/ oM a ma la A ha re b+hAHswA hA/ dri chen la

266a4(rgyud): byin pa'i bsod nams ci bsags pa tha~Md kyi don du byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o// 'di dag ni bla ma rdo rje gdan pas mdo rgyud ras byung ste/ ba ri lo ts+tsha bas bsgyur ba'o// 6// rgya gar
266a5(rgyud): skad du/ sarba mat+pal sA mA n+ya bi d+him gu h+ya tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi spyi'i cho ga gsang ba'i rgyud/ bde mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshalo// de nas
266a6(rgyud): gzhan yang gsang ba'i rgyud// dkyil 'khor dag ni bad kyi// spyi yi tshig rgyas pa dag/ mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub la sogs gang / de bzhin ga
266a7(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khar dang // rab tu gnas pa la sogs gang // pad mo rigs kyir bshang ba dang // 'jig rten dag la bzo phyir ngas// rnam par gnod pa la sogs pa// dkyil 'khor
266a8(rgyud): sum stong ngag dang ni// lnga brgyar bshad pa gang yin pa// dkyil 'khor de dag rnams kyi spyi'i// cho ga 'di ni ngas bshad de// de lta bas na cho ga 'dis// dkyil 'khor thams ca
266b1(rgyud): bri bar bya// slob dpon bstan bcos kun shes pa// tshul khrims ldan zhing snying rje'i bdag/ drang zhing bzod la gtsang sbra can// dang dang dran ldan snying stobs can/ skra mkhas mi 'dzi/ 
266b2(rgyud): sran thub pa// sgyu rtsal dag la mkhas shing gsal// mdzes dang ldan zhing de bzhan du// gus ldan dul la khong bzo ba// rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'// theg pa tshil mos pa can/ 
266b3(rgyud): gsang sngags spyod pa la bslabs shing // dkyil 'khor dag gi bye brag shes// slob ma dag gi tshul shes shing // de bzhid gsang sngags rgyud kyang 'dzin// rjesu gnang zhing dbang
266b4(rgyud): bskur la/ chog shes bzlas brjod lhur lan pa// slob dpon rigs la bsnyen bkur byas// dkyil 'kho ra thams cad khong du chud// gsang sngags kun dang bla ma dang
266b5(rgyud): de bzhin blo bur 'gror mchod byeng // phyag rgyal sogs bcing ba dang // dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'i las rnams nga// gsang sngags spyod po'i mchod pa la// slob dpor gyis
266b6(rgyud): na mkhas par bya// de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// sa yi phyogs kyi mtshan nyid de// sa gzhi ci 'dra bzang ba dang // mi bzang ba dag bsgrags pa'o// mngon dman can dang
266b7(rgyud): cher ma can// gyo mo dum ba can ngag dang // ngam grog rus pa sdong dum can// grog mkhar thal ba tsha rgo can// bsreg ma rdo dang rdul dang skra// srin bu grog sbur la sogs mang // 
266b8(rgyud): de lta bu yi sa gzhi ni// mkhas pas las rnams kun la spang / mapo dman snyoms shing gtsang la snur// zug rngu nyes pa rnam par spangs// shar dang byang du gzhol ba yis/ 
267a1(rgyud): sa gzhi las rnams kun la shis// dang por pus nub tsam brkos la// sa de nyid kyis dgang bar bya// gal te lhag par gyur na ni// dngos grub dag ni yo
267a2(rgyud): par bshad // de las bzlog par gyur na ni// sgrub pa pos ni las mi brtsam// brtsams na sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhi // lags pa dag kyang mi 'pho'o// dkyil 'khoras ni
267a3(rgyud): gang dag gi/ nye 'khor dag na chu mod pa// de ni shis shing dngos grub thob// chu dkon pa ni mkhas pas smang // kho ra khor yug sna tshogs shing // me tog 'bras bu lo mar ldan// 
267a4(rgyud): ma can gyi shing yod pa kyi la 'khor da ga la rab tu shis// kho ra khor yug shing ldan pa'i/ sa gzhi yon tan kun ldan pa// nye 'khor na yang chu
267a5(rgyud): yod pa// dkyil 'khor dag la las de shis// zhi ba'i las las gzhi ni// dkar po dag tu brtag par bya// rgyas pa'i chang du dmar ser bya// drag shul spyod la nag
267a6(rgyud): gang du chu ngogs pad+mo yi// mtsho dang rgya mtsho nye 'khor dang // chu yi gling ma nyams dga' bar// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// ma me'i gnas dang dur khrid dang // dben pa'i
267a7(rgyud): dang khang stong dang // nyams mi dga' yi yul gang yin// de dag du ni mngon spyod bri// ri rtse dang ni ba lang lhas// mchod rten sku gzugs khang pa dang // de la sogs pa'i phyog
267a8(rgyud): ngag tu// rgyas pa yi ni dkyil 'khor bri/ mchod rten chen po nyams dga' dang // dben pa chen po'i gnas ngag dang // ri bo'i rtse mo rgya chen gyis// dngos grub dkyil
267b1(rgyud): bri bar bya// ri rtse dag dang ri bo dang // ri yi zom dang phug dag tu// lha min dag ni 'dod pa yis// sa 'og rdo rje dkyil 'khor bri// pad+ma'i kha ni bye ba'i tshal// dang skya dag ni sgra sgra
267b2(rgyud): par// rgyal srid 'dod pa'am nor 'dod pas// dpal gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad bri// ma me'i gnas dang ri rtsa dang // lha rnams kyi ni gnas ngag tu// gdon dbab pa
267b3(rgyud): 'joms byed pa// rdo rje lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor bri// lam gyi bzhi mdo chen po dang // mchod rten phyag na rdo rje yi// mdun du sgrub pa pos yis ni// khro rgyal dkyil 'khor bas
267b4(rgyud): 'joms bri// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gnas ni bzang po gzhan du yang // mkhas pa yis ni khyad par du// thams cad bri bar bya ba yin// rab tu gnas
267b5(rgyud): sogs dkyil 'khar kun// mkhas pa yi sa ni khyad par du// pad+ma'i mtsho yo nye 'khor du// cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya// ri yi rtse mor mkhas pa yas// mad
267b6(rgyud): las byung ba'i cho ga bzhin// rnar gnod sogs dkyil 'khor kun/ khyad par du ni bri bar bya// rnam par nges pa'i gnas 'di ni// khyad par du ni bstan pa yin// rab tu
267b7(rgyud): bsgrims te thams cad la// sa ni rnam gsum yongasu brtag/ khyad par phun sum ma ldan na// spyi yi las kyis bri bar bya// phur sum tshogs par kur bzang ba'i// tshogs pa
267b8(rgyud): dag ni rnyeng par dka'// mdor na sa gzhi mnyam pa dang // mngangs snum shar du gzhol ba zhing // chu mang ldan pa'i gnas dang ni// ljon shing bzang bas brgyad pa dang / bdag
268a1(rgyud): gi mig yid mgu ba dang // 'tshe meng zug rngu spangs pa ni// dkyil 'khor gan su shis pa ste// mi yi dngos grub kun pob byed// drang srong gnas dang ba glang lngas/ 
268a2(rgyud): phug dang ri yi rtse mo dang // sa gzhi gang na 'bas pa dang / khang 'og dang ni rdo la ba dang // mchod rten drang dang 'bab chu'i gling // mtsho rnams kyi ni 'gram dag tu// sa gzhi spang zhing brtag pa
268a3(rgyud): dang // nan tan du ni bya mi dgos// der ni zug rngu dbyung mi dgos// 'bas par bcag kyang der mi dgos// mtho dmar la sogs skyor rnams kyang // der ni dogs pa bskrad mi dgos// gzhug
268a4(rgyud): mar gnas pa'i sa gzhi la/ byi ngor legs par byas nasu/ lag pas bram zhing gsang sngags bzlas// de yi spang ba de yin no// zug rngu'i nyes pa bar ni/ gal te 'byung bar
268a5(rgyud): mi nus na// der ni gsang sngags kho nas ni// sbyangs pa la gas par byas par 'gyur// brtad par 'gyur ba'i las rna mas dang // gdon rnams tshar bcad la sogs/ 
268a6(rgyud): dang // drag shul spyod pa dag la yang // sa ni brtag par bya mi dgos// dkyil 'khor sa gzhi cho ga la// khro bo kI li kI la yis// ba yi rnam lnga la bzlas pa'i// gsang gtor byas
268a7(rgyud): na sbyangs par 'gyur// gzhan gyis mi thub la sogs pa// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor nyid kyis spang // phyag na pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor kun// sa gzhi sbyang bar bya ba ni// zhi ba 'dren pa zhe
268a8(rgyud): bya yi// dpal mos cho ga bzhin du sbyang// phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor rnams// khyad par rdo ni khro bos spyad // las bya ba thams cad kyang // cho ga bzhin du 'di yis bya// rgyal gyi/ 
268b1(rgyud): gtsug dang zhi ba'i 'dren/ khro bo stobs chen zhes bya ba// 'di gsum rigs ni gsum car gyis// las rnams kun la sbyar byas te// sa sbyang ba dang srung ba dang / slob ma sta gon gnas
268b2(rgyud): pa dang / bgegs rnams bsal dang dri ngag dang // me tog mngon par bsngags pa dang // de la sogs pa'i las kun la// bsgrims te sbyang bar bya ba yin// so so'i rgyud la las
268b3(rgyud): dang ni// gsang sngags rab tu bsgrags pa gang // sngon zla 'bring po'i nya nas ni// dpyid zla ba chungs nya yi bar// 'di yi nang du mkhas pa yis// dkyil 'khor cho ga bzhin du gyi
268b4(rgyud): bgegs kyi dkyil 'khor nang bcad dang // de bzhin sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ dpyad mi dgos par dbyar yang ni// mkhas pas dus bzhin bri bar bya// slob ma
268b5(rgyud): dbang bskur ched du ni// dkyil 'khor yongasu bsgrags gang nga pa// gnang ba'i dkyil 'khor gang yin dang // dam tshig dkyi la 'khor gang yin dang / 'byor po'i chang de sgrub
268b6(rgyud): pa dang // chen po'i dkyil 'khor gang yin pa// de dag thams cad mkhas pa yis// zla ba bdun po dag la bya// yul dang dus dang slob ma dang // bdog pa'i yon tan shes bya ste/ 
268b7(rgyud): mkhas pas dbyar yang dkyil 'khor gyi// las ni cho ga bzhin du bri// dri dang me tog bdug spos dang // lnga bshos sbyin sreg las kyi rnams// phongs par gyur kyang ma dbri sa/ 
268b8(rgyud): byin nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// tshes grangs ngan dang dus min dang // gnas min cho ga mi ldan par// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mi bri'o// bris na ngogs pa med par 'chi/ 
269a1(rgyud): mkhas pas ji ltar bshad ba yi// zla ba yar gyi ngo ngag la// zla ba 'a'am bcu gsum 'am// tshes brgyad dag gam bcu bzhi 'am// ches bcu dang mi bcu gcig
269a2(rgyud): yang na yar gyi ches gcig gam// ches lnga 'am yang na tshes bdun nam// yang na ches grangs gsum la'ang rung // nyi ma bcu po 'di dag la// dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrims
269a3(rgyud): / mar gyi ngo'i dus mtshams la'ang // dkyil 'khor bri ba 'gal ba med// tshes lnga 'am yang na tshes bdun nam// zla ba nya la khyad par du// phyag na pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ cho ga
269a4(rgyud): rnams ni bya bar shis// sa yi 'og gi dkyil 'khor dang // drag shul gyi ni las rnams dang // khro bo rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gang // de dag mar ngo la yang bri// zla ba nya la khyad par
269a5(rgyud): du// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar shis// dbying zla 'bring dang ba chungs la// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor chen po bri// gang che yo byad ldan pa dang // gang tshe dad pa bango ba
269a6(rgyud): nga// gang che las la brtson gyur pa// de yi tshe yang dkyil 'khor bri// gang che 'tsho ba kun mong cing // me tog mong pa la sogs pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i dus shes pa
269a7(rgyud): de yi tshe yang dkyil 'khor bri/ gang che slob ma'i bsnyen bkur gyis bla ma dag ni mgu gyur pa// de tsha de la gnang bas na// dbang bskur ched du dkyil 'khor bri// nyi ma zla ba gzas
269a8(rgyud): zin dang // ya mtshan che ltas byung ba dang // cho 'phrul gyi ni zla ba la// bsgoms te dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// snga dro rgyas pa brjod pa ste// nyi ma gung la drag shul spyad// dgongs kar/ 
269b1(rgyud): zhi ba blo can gyis// cho ga bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri// dkyil 'khor dag ni ma lus pa// nyi mtshar ces nub nas brtsam// nyi ma shang bar ma gyub par// mchong nas gshegs
269b2(rgyud): gsol bar shis/ khyad par can gyi cho ga ni// lha dus bya ba dus bzhir bshad // gzhan du chos ga nyams pa'i phyir// dngos 'grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// spyi yi dkyil 'khor
269b3(rgyud): ldan pas// na ma yaud nyin par mi bri'o// nyin par bris na de rag tu// sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar 'gyur ro// dgongs mgo gcugs nas nam phyeng na kau drag shul spong par
269b4(rgyud): gyur pa yin// mtshan po dus las 'das pas na// nyes pa mang po 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan mo rab tu zhi ba'i phyir// spyir na 'dod par bya ba yin// dam tshig
269b5(rgyud): ngag la sogs pa'i las// de lta bas na mtshan mo brtsam// bi ma nub na lha rnams ni// nges par byin gyis brlabs kyis 'du// gzhan dag kyang ni khyad par du// byir gyis
269b6(rgyud): rlob par byed par 'gyur// cho gas spyan drangs gsang sngags dang // lha dang nyi ma nub pa na// phan par gzhed pas dkyil 'khor du// nges par byin gyis rlob par mdzad// yang
269b7(rgyud): ngag zhi ba'i sems kyis ni// dus dang tshes grangs zhi ba la// sngags kyis spyan 'dren byang pa ni// bsams pa'i dngos grub bob par 'gyur// phur bu dang ni zla ba dang // pa
269b8(rgyud): sangs dpa'i ma bzung // gzhan la rab tu drag po yi// las ni kun tu brtsam par bya// rgyal dang skrag dang sa ga dang // me bzhi nag pa ba skad dang // snron la sogs gsum
270a1(rgyud): sa ga ni// dkyil 'khor dag la rab tu shis// de la sogs pa'i zhi ba dang // rgyu skar dag ni bzang po la// blo dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor bri// drag po la ni rba
270a2(rgyud): bo bri// 'bebs ldan rnam rgyal rgyal byed dang // gsal dang dmar ldan nong can dang / bzang mo chu lce tshangs ma dang // nges dang bkra shis khyab 'jug dang // skye dgu'i bdag dang
270a3(rgyud): tha skar byams// tshig bzang ba ba sangs pa'o// yud tsam rnams kyi rgyud kun gyi// bya ba'i cho ga rnams las shis// de dag la sogs bzang po dang // byed pa bzong la rtag tu bri// mi
270a4(rgyud): bzang ba la brtsams pa'i las// gang du ci yang mi 'grub bo// de lta bas na yung tsam dang // ches grangs rgyu skar byed pa dang // rmi lam bzang po brtag par bya// bzang po dag la
270a5(rgyud): las brtsam ste// bzang po min la brtsam mi bya// bzang po min pa'i las rnams kyang // bzang po nying la brtsam parabya// lhas ni bzang dang mi bzang bas// grub
270a6(rgyud): pa dang ni mi grub ston// de lta bas na brtsams pa la// mtshan ma rab tu 'bade brtag/ nga nas gzhan yang sa ngag ni// sbyang bar bya bar rab tu bshang // zhag bdun gyi ni nang
270a7(rgyud): logasu// ji ltar rig pas srung byas te// gzhor gyi sa ni bzlog byas shing // de nas zug rngu dbyung bar bya/ zug rngu bcos pa'i sa gzhi ni// las byas pa reg 'grub ma
270a8(rgyud): 'gyur// zu rngu nyes pa rus pa dang // kye mo dang ni bal ba dang // sdong du ma dang ni cher ma dag/ rab tu bsgrims te ma lus dbyung // de nas phobs bong ba dag/ bkrum nas zhib ma
270b1(rgyud): byas te bcag/ de nas pa yi gcin gyis ni// yang nas yang du gang ba bya zhing // lag mthil lta bur mnyam byas shing // ba yi lci ba chur sbyangs nas// shar phyogs nas ni mgo
270b2(rgyud): btsugs te// blo dang ldan pas legs par byugs// de nas de yi dbus ni// khung bu cung zhig brkos nas dang // 'bru rnams dang ni rin tshon kun// sngags kyis ba ta ste galca/ 
270b3(rgyud): par ba// de ltar sbyangs shing dbyig dag gis// dbyig dang ldan par byas nas ni// blo dang ldan pas ci rig par// sa gizhi yongasu gzung bar bya// yang dag bsdams pas
270b4(rgyud): zhag gsum na// las kun byeng pa'i gsang sngagos dang / gang gi dkyil 'khor gang yin pa// de dag gis ni yod sa gzung ba// gcig gis dri yi chu yis ni
270b5(rgyud): ngosu bsang gtor bya ba ste// gcig shos kyi ni lag pa gnyis// sa la bram ste mngon par bsngags// blo yis yongasu gzung byas na/ gnas ni yongasu gzung ba
270b6(rgyud): las kun byed pa'i gsang sngags kyis// de nas slob ma yongasu gzung // bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba'i skung // blangs ras bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzlas// slob ma rnams ni blos
270b7(rgyud): bsams nas// mnyam par gzhag ste mdud pa bor// de nas slob mas yongs bzung nas// las la bgegs ni mang bar 'gyur// sa ni dkyil 'khor bri yi tshe// 
270b8(rgyud): nub lta bu sta gon gnas// 'og ma nyi ma shar ba'i tshe// sa phyogs kyi ni cha dag brtag/ de nas dkyil 'khor dgod pa dag/ yid kyis legs par yongasu brtag/ sngags
271a1(rgyud): rgyud dag las 'byung ba'i zas// bzang la gtsang zhing snum bag can// rje su 'bur zhing yang 'ong ba// slob mar bcas par ran par bza'// de nas nub kar khrus byas
271a2(rgyud): shing // gtsang la gos ni dkar po bgos// bla ma slob ma dang bcas pa// dkyil 'khor drung dungu dor bar bya// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i sa gzhi ni// byi dor legs byas legs byugs pa
271a3(rgyud): khro bo chen pos bzlas pa yi// spos chus bsang gtor byas pa la// dbu su sta gon gnas pa dag/ rigs rnams kyi ni snying pos byas// dkyil 'khor bdag pa'i gsang snga/ 
271a4(rgyud): kyis// las rnams bde bya bar bshad// sa gzhi'i steng du byug spos kyis// dkyil 'khor sor grangs bcu gnyis bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rig sngags kyis// lag pas tha
271a5(rgyud): zhing lan bdun bzlas// de nas gtso bo lha rnams ni// ming gis yid la bsams nasu// byug spos me tog la so gas pas// snying pos ci rigs mchod par bya/ 
271a6(rgyud): lha bshos dag kyang dbul bar bya// bdug spos mngon par bsngags pa'ang 'dul// de nas can ngan sbyar ba yi// chu la mngon par bsngags bya zhing // de la me tog gis
271a7(rgyud): gtar na// cho ga bzhin du 'dug pas 'dugs shing u dum bar 'am// a shwat+ma ni rma med pa// ha cang mi sI ma mi phra ba'o// sor grangs bcu gnyis chang ngu bya// spos kyi chus
271a8(rgyud): ni legs par bkrus// skud pa dag gis rnam par dkris// spos kyis byugs shing bdug pas bdug/ lag pas bram shing rigs kyis ni// snying po lan grangs mang
271b1(rgyud): 'am// yang na lan bdun bzlas brjod pa// slob ma rnams kyis grangs las ni/ so shing la sogs gsog par bya// so shing mgon zhags bsnyams byas la// thor rtag
271b2(rgyud): ni mgor byas nas// rtse mo nas ni btso' bar bya// de nas mkhas pas gnas dang mi// bdag dang slob ma brtan bsrungs nas// lha rnams tha legs mchod de// dang por
271b3(rgyud): bgegs ni zhi ba'i phyir// mar las brtags pa'i yams shing dang // mar dang sbyar ba'i til dag dang // mar gyi bsregs thugs sbyin bsreg bya// 'bras chan zhor sbyar sprin
271b4(rgyud): bsreg bya// de yi 'og tu snying po ste// de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ni// zhi ba'i rig sngags nyid kyis bya// de nas slo ba ma legs brtags te// s+ya gon gnas pa
271b5(rgyud): tshul bzhin bya// slob ma rigs bcun gtsang sbra tsan// snying stobs che zhing chos lhur lan// dad pa che zhing bzod dang ldan// dran dang ldan zhing mkhas pa ste/ dran can chel
271b6(rgyud): mdongs sol can// brtan zhing dul la snyan par smra// sgra mkhas pa la blo bsgyel can// yang dag shes shing byas pa gzo// blo dang ldan zhing spobs po che// chen por 'dod
271b7(rgyud): cing nga rgyal med// mdog dang gzugs dang nang tshon bzang // bstan bcos dag la goms par byas// ha cang mi ring mi thung la// de la sogs pa'i yon tan dang // ldan pa'i
271b8(rgyud): blo can slob mar shis// rang bzhazhin ngan gtum g.yon can dang // snying rje meng cing ngan pas 'tsho// yan lag nyams dang yan lag lhag/ ha cang sbom dang skam dang ldan// 
272a1(rgyud): mig dang ra gdod ni khro gnyer can// kha dog 'byes shing yan lag rnams// mtshan dang ldan pa ma yin pa// de 'dra'i slob ma skyon mang ba// slob dpan
272a2(rgyud): gyis ni spang bar bya// sha tshugs ma lags yon+ta med// rigs dman zhing ni ngan pas 'tshe// nang bu can dang med pa'i// slob ma rnams ni yongasu spong // bdag nyid ngan pa/ 
272a3(rgyud): mi gang dag/ smad 'tshong ma le rab gdung zhing // chang dang can dang rgyan la sred// de dag rtag tu yongasu spang // dkon mchog gsum la sems dad cing // tshul khrims kyi ni sde
272a4(rgyud): pas bsdams// theg pa che la lhag mos pa'i// slob ma yongasu bzung bar shis// slob ma yan lag ma nyams dang // lhag par yon tan ldan pa dang // nad med rigs ni
272a5(rgyud): btsun pa dang // dad cing brtul zhugs brtan pa dkom//  kon mchog gsum la gang dad cing // theg pa chen po'i lugs la dga'// bsod nams 'dod pa'i
272a6(rgyud): sems can ni// chen po de dag mdor gzung ngo // bde bshegs gsang sngags sgrub pa la// don gnyer brtson pa'i slob ma ni// gzug sa can yon tan mi ldan yang // blo dang ldan pas
272a7(rgyud): gzhug par bya// dkyil 'khor cho ga 'khor bzhi po// theg pa chen la dga' ba'i bdag/ rang gi bslab pa la brtson pa// kun gyi cho ga yin par bshad/ kha cig gsang sngags bsgrub
272a8(rgyud): phyir//  las gzhan pa bsod nams 'dod// gzhan dag 'jig rten pha rol don// 'di ni dkyil 'khor 'jug par byed// 'jig rten pha rol med du ni// dang pa chen po bsgyud byas nas
272b1(rgyud): blo ldan dkyil 'khor 'jug bya yi// tshe 'di 'bra spu 'dod mi bya// 'jig rten pha rol dro ni// skyes bu tshe 'di 'bras rgyas pa// de ltar tshe 'di 'dong ba yi// 'jig rten pha rol rgyas mi
272b2(rgyud): 'gyur// mkhas pas slob mo gcig gam gsum// lnga 'am yang na bdun dag gam// nyi shu dag ni lnga yi bar// zung du ma gyur slob ma gzung // de las lhag pa'i slob ma dag/ yos
272b3(rgyud): su gzung bar mi sheso// mdor na slob ma phan tshu ngu// nang mi gshin pa mi bzung ngo // gcig la gcig ni sems bzang zhing // zhi rdul bla ma la phar pa// 'phags pa'i yul
272b4(rgyud): la rigs skyes pa'i// slob ma 'dor na gzung bar bya// ngag bsreg par bya ba yis// zas ni za gcig bza' ba ru bya// de yi nub mo ci nus par// de bzhin sdo
272b5(rgyud): pa 'dzin du gzhug/ gtsang ma gos dkar bgos pa yi/ slob ma de lta bu dag gi/ shar phyogs kha bltas 'khod pa la// sta gon gnas pa brtsam par bya// dang po gsu
272b6(rgyud): la skyabasu btang // de nas bla mas byang chub sems// ma bskyeng ba ni bskyed par bya// bskyed pa dag kyang dran par bya// de nas khro bos bzlas pa yi// spos chu mgo l-i gtor bya zhing //
