375a3(rgyud): nas// de bzhin du ni byang chub sems kyang bskyad // ser sna dregs dang rgyags pa rnams spangs te// dkon mchog gsum la dad pa bstan par bya// rdo rje'i rigs shes brjid
375a4(rgyud): pa rgya chen dang // nga l-i yang ni rad cing dga' bar bya// tshig rtsub phra ma khal pa smra ba dang // gzhan gyi bud medar bgrod dang brdzun smra zhing // rku dang gzhan gyi srog gcod gnod
375a5(rgyud): byed dang // chang dang byed pa rtag tu spang bar bya// / rmongs pa gang gis lus dang ngag dang ni// de bzhin yid kyis bsod nams bsags byas kyang // kha log par lta
375a6(rgyud): bas bcom pas na// de yi rnam smin mo 'dod 'bras bur 'gyur// dper na sa dang chu dang dus ldan yang // sa bor tshig pa myu gu mi skye ltar// de bzhin mi shes log lhas bcom
375a7(rgyud): pa yis// sems las dge ba'i chos rnams mi skye'o// de phyir log par lta ba rnams spangs te// yang dag lta ba la ni bsten par gyis// rtag tu sems ni dge ba bcu dag gi/ 
375a8(rgyud): chos kyi lam la gnas par byas na legs// lha dang lha min sha za khrag 'thung ba// mtshan mo rgyu ba mi bzang 'jig rten na// sen rnams la gnod pa byed cing rgyu// bzlas brjod
375b1(rgyud): brtson pa'i sems ni g.yeng bar byed// de dag rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir// nga yi gsang sngags rigs pa'i tshogs mthong na// skrag par byed snyam du ngogs skyes pa/ de phyi
375b2(rgyud): zlos pa'i sems ni g.yengs par byed// de ltar gnod byed de dag gzhom pa dang // bdag nyid 'byor par bya phyir ngas gsungs pa'o// dkyil 'khor lho dang lha min gnas gyur pa/ dam
375b3(rgyud): tshig ji bzhin bsod nams don du lci// sna tshogs pa'i gdon rnams gnas pa la// gang zhig rnam pa sna tshogs las byed pa'o// dkyil 'khor de ni gnod byeng gzhom pa'i phyer/ 
375b4(rgyud): mi yis rab tu bsgrims nas 'jug par bya// gang yang rig pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa dang / khro bar dkyil 'khor du yang 'jug par bya// der ni dam tshig snga
375b5(rgyud): tshogs ngas bshad pa/ sdig pa gsal bya ra rgyun du lta bar bya// rdo rje'i rigs gtso bo mo yi tshogs// rig pa mang pos bsnyen pa'i lha mo // bzlos pa mthongan
375b6(rgyud): 'gegs rnams phung ba dang // rngam pa 'don cing shin tu skrag par 'gyur// ji lta ji ltar dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang // de lta de ltar rdo rje'i rigs bstan dang // rig pa'i tshogs pa
375b7(rgyud): bsnyen pa'i bsod nams kyis// de yi lus la lus kyi byin rlabs 'jug/ mi tshugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid de mthong dang // sa phyogs rdo rje'i me 'bar ngo shes nas// lnga klu lha min
375b8(rgyud): gnod sbyin grub pa rnams// bzlas brjod byed pas smag nas 'byer bar 'gyur// nga yi dam tshig mthong ba'i bu dag gis// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pas bshad pa yi// gsang
376a1(rgyud): sngags de ni ma bsgrims bzhin du 'grub// bgegs rnams bde brlag par byed par 'gyur// rigs dang dam tshig ma mthong snying rje med// de bzhin byang chub
376a2(rgyud): sems ni mi bskrad cing // sangs rgyas ma dang lha gzhan la brten pas// nga yis gsang sngags bzlas na phung bar 'gyur// bsam pa zhan cing nyams kyis mi lcogs pas// / 
376a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de kun blta bar mi nus na'ang // de la gang yang rung ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// tshig tsam zhig kyang dad pas mthong gyur na// gnod sbyin tshogs dang mtshan mo rgyu ba
376a4(rgyud): sa bla'i gdon rnams kun dang klu dag dang // lha la sogs dang 'gegs dang log 'dren rnams// brtul zhugs gnas pa de la glags mi lta// dper na me tog
376a5(rgyud): sa bdag la// brtenas skyon med par ni skye ba ltar// de bzhin tshul khrims brten nas chos dkar mchog/ snying rjes chus brlan pas ni rnar skye// rgyal ba ngas gsung
376a6(rgyud): thar ba yang // tshul khrims rnam dag 'dul ba ma lus las// sngags pa khyim pas rtags dang cho ga spangs// lhag ma rnams ni nyam su blang bar bya// de ltar sdig pa'i chos las
376a7(rgyud): rnam grol nas// bde bar gshegs pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos// dag cing grol ba dang ni ldan gyur pa// bzlas pa skyon mdo sde bklag par bya// gtsang zhing rab tu dben pa'i
376a8(rgyud): phyogasu ni// 'jim pa 'am ni bye ma las byas pa'i// bde gshegs mchod rten rten 'brel snying po can// sdig pa spyad pa'i phyir ni rtag tu gdab// ring bsrel can gyi sku gzugs// 
376b1(rgyud): mchod rten la// bstod cing dri dang phreng ba mar me dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan rol mo dang // mchog tu dang pa yis mi mchod par bgyi// nam yang 'khor lo gcig pa'i shing
376b2(rgyud): rta ni// rta dang ldan yang lam du mi 'gro ltar// de bzhin sgrub pa po yi grogs med na// lus can dngos grub thob par mi 'gyuraro// de ni blo ldan gzugs bzang gtsang sbra che// rig
376b3(rgyud): ni bcur zhing chos la gzhol ba dang // spobs pa tshe zhing dpa' la dbang po bul/ snyan par smra zhing sbyin phod snying rje can// bkres dang skom dang nyon mongs bzod pa dang // bram ze
376b4(rgyud): ngag dang lha gzhan mchod mi byed// sgrir zhing bzo la byas pa gzo ba dang // dkon mchog sum la dad pa gro/ gas po dang // da ltar ma lus yon ldan pa dag/ rtsod pa'i
376b5(rgyud): na shin tu dkoran pas na// yon+do phyed dang ban cha brgyad chatsam// de lta bu dag sngags pa'i grogs bor bste na// 'phags pa dpung bzangs kyis zhus pa'i le'u dang
376b6(rgyud): po'o// rang sangs rgyas dang bde gshegs nyid skyes dang // rgyal ba sngon chad gang ra bzhugs pa yi// gnas gang bsod nams ldan zhing yid dga' ba// lha dang lha min la sag+sa
376b7(rgyud): phyag byas mchod// gso sbyong sdom pa dang ni ldan pa yis// bdag nyid dag par bya phyir bsnyen par bya// de lta bu dag ma rnyed gzhan yang ni// chu bo chu klung 'bab chu mod pa dang // pad+ma
376b8(rgyud): ut+pa las ni rgyan pa'i mtsho// skye bo rnams kyang shin tu mi rgyu ba// dang zhing zhim pa'i chu ni mang ba dang // mi bzad gdon rnams kyang ni mi gnas pa// me tog 'brasdu gtsang ma ma/ 
377a1(rgyud): pa dang // sman ljongs ljon shing sna tshogs bkrigs pa dang // sa stengs gnas ma la shin tu gtsang ba dang // gang na stag gzigasang+geng+ga med pa dang // yid 'ong mnyam
377a2(rgyud): zhing tsher ma med pa dag/ mi yi dngos grub gan su bsgrags pa yon// grogs po grogs mkhar bal ba skra shad dang // nyal nyil sol ba tshwa sgo 'am brtsog can spang // der ni sa
377a3(rgyud): brkos sbyangs nas gnas brtsig pa// dril brtan zhing 'jim pas zhal zhal bya// shar ram byang ngam nub tu sgo gdod cing // lho phyogasu ni nam yang sgo mi 'dod// dri gtsang khang pa
377a4(rgyud): yi phyogs gcig tu// rgyal ba lam mchog rnam ston pa yis// ras kyi sku gzugs las phyir brtan par gang gas// yang ni shing gzugs legs mchod phyir bzhag
377a5(rgyud): tha ga pas btags 'jam la snyoms pa dang / thags bzang de bzhin skra shad med pa dang // kho lag che zhe ngam nyams kha tshar bcas// ras kyi gzugs nges mi
377a6(rgyud): la dngos grub ster// gtsang ma'i spos chus btab pa de la ni// tshon rtsi sbyin med sdong gsar blugs pa yis// khrus byas gtsang la gso sbyong bzung ba'i mi// mkhas pas ba
377a7(rgyud): lang spu yos bri bar bya// phreng ba bdug spos mar me phreng ba dang // byug pa dag gi sku gzugs cher mchod de// nub phyogs zhal bstan mo g.yo brtan pa gdags// de yi sgra
377a8(rgyud): sngar dngos grub brtsam par bya// gtsug phud bzhag nas skra ni bregs na su// 'byung khungs tshun gyis gos ni kha dog bsgyur// gos dkar dag gam shing lo 'am gso ma 'am// 
377b1(rgyud): zar ma shing shun rnams kyi gos bgo'o// slu ba 'am lugs sam 'jim pa las byas pa// dbyings ni legs shing mi rtsub 'jam pa dang // ma chags zlum zhing ma gas rnam
377b2(rgyud): pa// yid du 'ong bo'i lhung bzang bcang bar bya// ha cang mi nye ha cang mi ring la// bza' btung mong cing dmongs rigs mang ba dang // 'gro la mchod byed legs par gnas pa'i grong // pra
377b3(rgyud): ze phyi rol skye bo med par brtan// nga rgyal gyis ni nor pa'i bram ze rnams// rigs kyis rlom zhing snying rjer mi ldan pa// de dag bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten la// mchod pa mtho
377b4(rgyud): bgegs kyang byeng bar 'gyur// bram ze sangs rgyas pa las ji ltar dman// sbrang las bram ze dag las dam ngas rigs rnams// bsnyen bskur dang ni mchod pa 'byung bas
377b5(rgyud): / dmangs rigs kyis kyang gsang sngags ji ltar bzlas// lha dang 'gron mchod pa dang las drug dang / rgyal po dang ni me lha bsnyen pa dang // bu yi don du 'gro ba
377b6(rgyud): bya ba dag/ bram ze rnams kyis nges par 'grub pa yin// rgyal rigs rje'u rigs rnams kyang rang gi las// grub pas 'di la bcom ma byed ces// rdzun du smra ba sna tshogs sgron dgas
377b7(rgyud): bdag dang gzhan gyi sems ni sreg par byed// yan lag brgyad lam gnas pas rtag tu ni// nyi ma phyed mtshams tshun chad blang bar bya// bram ze'i dus ni phyi dro yin pas na// de phyiraT
377b8(rgyud): ze'i khyim du 'gro mi bya// dge dang mi dag ye shes bzung na mi// bram ze dmangs rigs ngag las khyad par med// 'on kyang 'gro ba'i blos ni bram ze dang // 'di ni dmangs rigs yin/ 
378a1(rgyud): zhes brtags par zad // bden pa'i lam dmigs dge ba'i rjes 'brangs na// dmangs rigs dag kyang rga shi med par 'gro/ log po'i lam zhugs nyes par/ 
378a2(rgyud): spyod ldan na// bram ze gang yin mi bzang dmyal bar lhung // lus can shin tu dri ma ldan pa dag/ 'di na gzhan gyis dgag par mi 'gyur te// de ni sdig pa rnar gsal ba dang / 
378a3(rgyud): bsod nams ma lus yongasu bzung ba dag/ dper na rma ni gso dang gsal ba'i phyir// nang pa dag la sman pa sbyin pa ltar// de bzhin 'dir yang bkres pa'i sdug bsngal/ 
378a4(rgyud): / khasal phyir rgyal bas kha zas bza' bar gsungs// la la lam gyis dub cing 'gro ba'i tshe// bkres skom gdungs pa rang gi bu yi sha/ za ba bzhin du rnal 'byor
378a5(rgyud): sems dman zhing // tshe dang rgyags phyir bza' bar mi bya'o// mang du blugs na rtsol med 'thob pa dang // de bzhin nyung ngus srang ni dma' 'gyur la// ran pas ska
378a6(rgyud): cig mnyam par 'gro ba ltar// lun can kha zas de ltar bza' bar bya// dper na khang snying mi zhig bya ba'i phyir// mi yis ka ba brtan po btsugs pa ltar// de bzhin lus
378a7(rgyud): kyis 'khrul 'khor gnas pa dang // shing rta mi bsku bzhin du kha zas bza'// 'dod pa'i khams ni kha zas kyis gnas zhes// rgyal bas chos gcig tu ni bka' stsal
378a8(rgyud): bas// lus ni chu shing bzhin du rig bya ste// sems ni bza rab tung sogs la chags mi bya// dbang po drug po yulas 'phrog pa dang // bde gshegs gsungs pa'i shes phra/ 
378b1(rgyud): bsrung bar bya// lhung bzed de dag las ni gcig thogs nas// mnya' shing gang du lta zhing gsod snyoms spyad// 'dzum zhing 'gro la smra zhing mig gzur can// yan lag thade yid
378b2(rgyud): 'brog byed pa'i gzugs// bud med gzugs ni mtshon cha 'debs 'dra bas// skyes pa'i sems ngag mngon du 'phrog par byed// lcags kyi thong lcags rab tu 'bar ba yis// 
378b3(rgyud): mig ni rjer bkab pa ches bla yi// nyes na dran pa nyams byang bud med kyi// dkyus rings mig can bzhin ni ma mthong bla// gang du dga' bar 'gro zhing 'dzin med la// sems kyis
378b4(rgyud): sems ni rdor 'dul bzhin du// rab 'a bring la sogs rnar spangs na su// mi smra bar ni gzhan gyi khyim du 'gro/ gang na ba gzhon be'u chung ba dang // gang skyes bu cha
378b5(rgyud): ni 'thung ba dang // gang na bu mo gzhon ste/ na rtse ba dang // de bzhin gang na gzhon nu rtse ba dang // gang na dag/ 'a ston khyim za byed pa dang // gang na skye bo mang po 'dus pa
378b6(rgyud): dang // gang na de bzhin rol mo byed pa dang // der n+ti skyes bu nam yang 'gro mi bya// bsod nams ji snyed khyer te 'od nas kyang // dang por ji ltar bde bar 'gro bar bya// rkang bkrus
378b7(rgyud): glo bur pa la byin nasu// lus srung phyir ni kha zas bza' bar bya// dusu zos nas dus gsum khrus byas te// phreng ba mar me bdug pa stod dang dri// sha chang med pa'i lha
378b8(rgyud): bshos phul nasu// ku shi ri khri la 'dug nas bzlas brjod bya// bdug pa byug spos la sogs ma rnyed na// dri zhim me tog sna tshogs dbul bar bya// smra ba arga bi la
379a1(rgyud): ba bri ha ta/ ku sha dri ngan yid du mi 'ong spang // greng dang 'dug dang ma log nyal ba dang // 'gro 'bras za glog bzlas brjod byed pa ma/ rje su dran drug so'i yon+d+ra dang // rig par bcas
379a2(rgyud): te rjesu dran par bya// 'phags pa dpung bzang kyis zhus pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o// // 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs tshogs ldan pa'i// sems ni 'khor ba yin par kun tu brdza
379a3(rgyud): nyon mongs rnam grol shel dang zla 'dra ba// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i mthar ni rab tu bsgrags// dper na dri med chu ni rdul sogs kyis// skad cig tu yang rnyog par byed pa ltar// de bzhin rnam gang ma
379a4(rgyud): med pa'i sems/ 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis rnyogs par 'gyur// bo ngo tsha dang dung shel ru rug sha/ lung tang pa d+ma'i snying po zhe nya zangs/ khar ba'i bgrang phreng brgya ni rtsa
379a5(rgyud): brgyad pa// de dag las ni bgrang phreng cig blangs te// de ni lag pa g.yas pas gzung ba 'am// lag pa g.yon pas bsgrims te mi 'khrul gzung // tshar re phyin cing
379a6(rgyud): nor bu re re nas// sngags pa yis ni rim bzhin drang bar bya// 'dug nas dbang po yang dag bsdams pa dang // lus kyang drang zhing brtan par bzhugs na su// phyis ni ma mchu shin tu mdzes pa
379a7(rgyud): yang // bskul zhing gsang sngags ci dgar bzlas brjod pa// sems ni glog dang sprin dang rlung dang mtshungs// rgya mtsho chen po yi ni rlabs dang 'dra// sgra can 'dod dgur yul la mngon dga' ba// 
379a8(rgyud): g.yo zhing 'phyan pa nges par gdul bar bya// gang tshe zlos ngoga'i sems ni zhi ba la// bsten pas gnyid kyis dran pa rmongs 'gyur na// langs nas bcag cing phyogasu blta ba dang // chu yis/ 
379b1(rgyud): gdong yang yongasu bkru bar bya// las kyi dbang bsgyur bdag po med pa dang // mgon med rten med tshe rabs gcig nas gcig/ lus kyi kha brgyud rjesu rab 'gro ba// de yi rje su dge dang
379b2(rgyud): dge 'brang // tshol dang mdza' bo shes dang ni dzir bral/ mi sdug pa dang phrad cing 'dod pas gdungs// ngan pa skye rgan 'chi'i sdug bsngal can// yul rnams kun tu song na med pa min/ 
379b3(rgyud): sbrang cha grangs bkres dang ngal la sogs// gang du song yang sdug bsngal nyid yin pas// yul la mngon dga'i sems re 'byung bas na// rnam rtog de dag rnams kyis bzlog par bya// 
379b4(rgyud): 'dod chags shas che mi gtsang sha tshil dang // lpags pakang rus blta bas rnar bzlog// byams dang snying rje'i chus gdab zhe sdang la// gti mug la ni rten 'brel lam gyis/ 
379b5(rgyud): shig na ni dgra yang mdza' bor 'gyur// mdza' bo dang / kyang dgar ni 'gyur ba nyid// de bzhin kha cig dag ni bar ma 'gyur// bar ma de nyid kyang ni dag por 'gyur// de ltar
379b6(rgyud): mdza' bshes 'gyur bar rig par bya// blo gros ldan pas nam yang chags mi bya// gnyen la dga' ba'i sems kyi rnam rtog dag/ bzlas nas dag la bde bar bzhag par bya// dang po zlos
379b7(rgyud): nas bzlas zin par dag tu// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs zhing ba dang / bud mod ma ning khye'u dang bu mo dang // sngags 'chang nam yang smra bar mi bya'o// ci ste dgos pa yango na sngags ga
379b8(rgyud): ba/ bzlas brjod zin na cung zad smra bar bya/ tsaste dgos pa yod na sngags g.yog dang // bzlas brjod zinin nung bar smra bar bye// smras nas 'dra ba bshang gci bor nasu zhu
380a1(rgyud): yi nang du zhugs nas khrus kyang byame tog dri ba stong mar me phul ba dang // tshul khrims 'artson 'grus dka' thub byas pa yi// dge ba de kun bla na med pa yi/ sangs
380a2(rgyud): byang chub blan med par bsngo// dper na chu klung rgya mtshor phyin pa na// lan tshwa'i ror ni gcig tu gyur pa bzhin// de ltar bla med byang chub bsngos pa yi// bsod nams rgyal ba'i rong ni gcig tu
380a3(rgyud): 'gyur// dper na skyes bu la las 'bra sgra'i phyir// sa lu bskyed kyis sog ma'i phyir min yang // sa lu rnyed nas bsgrims pa med par ni// sogs ma'i phung po zhal la 'byung ba bzhin// 
380a4(rgyud): de bzhin byang chub 'dra spu 'dod pa yi// bsod nams srub kyis long spyod phyir min yang // sogs ma'i phung po dag dang mchu rangs par ni// ma bsgrims bzhin du mi yi longs spyod 'gru
380a5(rgyud): tshe ring ba 'di legs pa'i thob pa dang / chos bzhin/ sgrub pa'i yul dag rnyed pa 'am// skyob pa med par 'gyur zhing 'gro ba yi// bsam pa rnams ni rtag tu rdzogs par bya/ 
380a6(rgyud): grags dang ma grags rnyed dang ma rnyed dang // bde dang sdug bsngal de bzhin stong smad dag/ sems kyis 'jig rten tshigs rnams rab bcom ste// sdig pa'i gnasu gyur pa spang bar bya// 
380a7(rgyud): dper na rgya mtsho skad cig tsam yang ni// mi yi ro dang lhan cig mi gnas ltar// de bzhin rnam rtog sems kyis sdig byas pa// sngags pas skad cig tsam yang gnas mi bya// dpar
380a8(rgyud): na rlu med khang pa'i mang du ni// mar me gcugs pa mi g.yo 'bar ba ltar// chu gcig sems kyis zlos la mngon dga' ba'i// lus la chos kyang nga bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur// stangs dang
380b1(rgyud): dang 'byong ba dang ni gar byed dang / glu len rnga rdung skye bo dbyas 'gyur dang // lhag pa'i nga rgyal 'dring dang 'dod chen dang // rgyal po dang ni 'dus la lha 'dod dang // dus mi gnying dang mi 'grub sba
380b2(rgyud): dang // bstan bcos ngan dang snyan gis klog 'dor dang // chags dang 'tshig dang drags dang rgyags pa dang // zha la 'dzin dang le lo g.yo sgyu spang // sha chang ke'u dang gtsang dang sgog rdog dang // 
380b3(rgyud): 'brumar til dang la phug su ra Na// 'byung po'i zlas dang lha bshos gtor ma dang // gu lang mchod byas gtong ma mi za'o// ngas ni sngags pas kha zas dkar gsum dang // rtsa
380b4(rgyud): sdong bu 'bra spu tshod ma dang // zho dang nas dang 'o ma mang ngag dang // 'bru mar tshigs ma dar ba'o kon dang // thug pa dag ni ba za' btung yin par gsungs// sha za srin po dag dang gan
380b5(rgyud): po dang // ro langs dang ni 'jigs pas sgrub pa dang // / lha min bu me'i 'khrul 'khor 'joms pa'i tshe// 'bru mar gas ma'i bza' ba mchog tu bsngags// de ltar bzlas
380b6(rgyud): brjod pa'i sgrub pa pos// nyin gcig bzhin du byas nas bzlas pa ni// phul nas cho ga bzhin du gshegastsol// nub mo ku sha bting nas nyal bar bya// byams pa snying rje dga' ba ba'
380b7(rgyud): snyoms ldan pa dang / bde gshegs chos dang dge 'dun bcas pa dran bya ste// shA ri'i bu dang ngal btud nas thal sbyar nyal// de ltar sngags pa'i sdig pa mtha' dag zad par bya// 'phags
380b8(rgyud): pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u gsum pa'o// / sgrub pa pos ni nges par bcang ba yi// rdo rje de dag gang yin bshad par bya// sor bcu bcu gnyis bcu drugu bco brgyad dang // 
381a1(rgyud): mchog gi tshad ni son yang nyi shu'o// gser gyi rdo rje rig 'dzin nyid dang ni// sa rnams thob par bya phyir rab tu shis// rgyal po'i don du dngul gyi mchog yin te/ 
381a2(rgyud): zangs kyi rin chen 'byung ba'i klu sgrub par// lha min dbang po'i 'khrul 'khor gzhig pa dang // phug tu 'gre la rdo rje'o// ngan kun grub pa la ni lcags gsum gyi// gsang ba'i sde gzhom
381a3(rgyud): pa la lcags kyi'o// gdon gzhan la ni seng ldeng dpal dang tshe// nad med nor rdzas la ni bil ba'o// gnod sbyin ma mo'i sgrub la ma du shing // chos kyi don la a shad las byas shing // 
381a4(rgyud): gsal shing rtse mo'i ngagra rnams gzhag pa la// min mas bsad pa la ni mi rus kyi// shel las byas pa mig 'phrul chen po la// dbyer phyir 'jim pa las byas rab tu
381a5(rgyud): bsad cing bskam pa ba ru ra yi shing // sha za sgrub pa la yang rtag tu shis// lha dang gnod sbyin dri za sgrub pa la// / sgron shing las ni byas pa'i rdo rje'o// ci ste kU ni
381a6(rgyud): du byed 'dod na// de che klu shing rtsa ba las byas pa'o// gzugs bsgyur ba yis las byas pa ste// ro langs sgrub pa la ni ka dam pa'o// pu na ka dang ra rdza oMrga dang // a shang shing gi rdo rje
381a7(rgyud): nor gyi phyir// gla ba a mr-i shri bar+Na ba yi// ardzu la sogs pa la sa byas pa dag/ mi rnams g.yul las rgyal bar bya phyir ro// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa thob bya'i phyir// can dan kar
381a8(rgyud): bo dang ni dmar po ste// dbyibs legs 'jam zhing ma nyams rma mang po'i// rdo rje rtse lnga sra ba bcang bar bya// dang po zlos tshe de ni thogs nasu// bzlas brjod zin nas myur ba kho nar yang // 
381b1(rgyud): / ngang pa'i sems kyis phyag byas dri sogs kyis// mchod nas rdo rje rgyal ba zhabs drung bzhag/ nga yis rigs kyi gsang sngags sgrub pa pos// rdo rje med na 'grub par mi 'gyur// de las ga
381b2(rgyud): kyang rnyed par ma gyur na// khu chung cangs nas rtse gcig sems kyis bzlas// ldong res gi wang ral gri a dza na// spangs ma ba bla zhags pa li khri ba cag/ mar dang shu dag 'khor lo rdo rje ma
381b3(rgyud): lpags pa go cha mdu na rtse gsum pa// rdzas ni bcu bdun bsgrag pa de rnams kyis// grub pa rnam pa gsum rnams thob par byed// rang sngags cho ga lhags par bshad pa gang // der yang
381b4(rgyud): grub pa rnam pa gsum du mthong // bgegs dang log 'dren grub par mi dga' ba// rig pa'i tshogs rnams kyi ni mdun na rgyu/ rig 'dzin brtson pa'i bdag nyid can dag la// rnam pa
381b5(rgyud): sna tshogs glags skabs tshol zhing rgyu// bgegs kyi rigs ni rnam pa bzhi yod de// sa stengs dag na 'khong ba'i bgegs rnams ni// rnar 'jig dang wa dang ne'u la
381b6(rgyud): dang // de bzhin so gcig pa dang rigs rnams bzhi// de dang de las 'phros pa mtha' ya so// sa stengs 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi gang yin// de dag g.yog 'khor mya ngan med pa yin// 
381b7(rgyud): yi g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag bdun rnams// de dag gsang sngags sgrub la gags byed do// wa yi rigs ni bye bo bco brgyad dag/ dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor te de rnams kyi// sna
381b8(rgyud): dpon glang chen gdong ste stobs po che// sa stangs mtha' dag kun tu gegs kyang byeng // so gcig rigs kyi sde dpon bcug 'chang ste// byi ba drug cu'i bgegs la dbang bsgyur zhing / 
382a1(rgyud): tshangs dbang khyab 'jug nyi ma zla ba rlung // de rnams kyis bshang sngags la gegs byed// ne'u le'i rigs gang yin pa rgya che ste// khrag khrig bye ba ther 'bum phrag stong dang
382a2(rgyud): de dag rnams kyi sde dpon gtsug na 'byung // nga yi rigs dang sngags la gegs byed do// dag 'byod pad+ma 'dra bar dkyus ring mig/ lnga rtsan sngags rgyud la ni gegs kyang byed// nor spyong
382a3(rgyud): ni gang yin gang po pa// rang gi rigs kyi rgyud la gegs kyang byed// sgrub pa po lo 'byor par mi dga' ba// brtse med rang rang rigs la gegs byed do// rang gi gsang sngags gzugs
382a4(rgyud): su rnam sprul nas// phreng ba dang ni gtor mi mngon du la na// lho yi log 'dron gyis byas de mthong nas// khros shing 'khrugs nas phyir yang phyogs par 'gyur// sngon ma
382a5(rgyud): sems ni 'jungs dang rmongs pa'i phyir// lha yis log 'dren bgegs kyi lugs 'di ston// lugs 'di lha dang klu dang grub pa dang // sum cu rtsa gsum lhas kyang
382a6(rgyud): bzlog mi nus// bgegs kyis 'jig su rung bar byas pa dag/ sngar bshad pas ni de dag bzlog par byed// bzlas brjod zin nas legs par srung ba dang // dkyil 'khor mang byas
382a7(rgyud): bsgrub la 'jug par bya// gzhan du mchod pa cho ga med pa dang // bzlas brjod sbyin sreg cho ga bral ba 'am// gang zhig rtag tu sems ni 'di ltar sems// rig pa gang zhig bang gis
382a8(rgyud): bzlas pa bya// yul dang rgyal tshogs gtam la chags pa de'i// lus la thogs pa med par rab tu 'jug/ 'di ltar phan tshun du ni 'gro ba na// rig pa 'dod pa'i sems dag ga
382b1(rgyud): bar byed// dper na chu nang grib ma spang ba ltar// de bzhin mi yi lus la 'jug par 'gyur// 'khru tshe gzhan la zlos pan yang gzhan// nyal na gzhan gyi me tog bdug pa dang // mar me
382b2(rgyud): dbul ba'i tshe na'ang gzhan yin la// sbyin sreg byed pa na yang bgegs gzhan 'jug/ dper na nyi zer me shel 'bab pa yi// rkyen gyis ma bsgoms ma ni 'byung ba ltar// de bzhin
382b3(rgyud): bgegs kyang lus la zhugs gyur na// 'dod chags me chen kun tu skyed par byeng // g.yo zhing 'gul ba zhes ni bya ba'i bgegs// chu nang skyes bu 'khrud pa'i tshe na 'dzin// dkris zhing
382b4(rgyud): lus la snyoms shing gnyid kyang che// de bzhin lus lci mchog tu khro bar 'gyur// de bzhin dri za zhes ni bya ba'i bgegs de ni dri dbul ba na lus la 'jug/ yul dang rgya
382b5(rgyud): po gnyen dang nor la sogs// snyom zhing bud med dag la chags par 'gyur// nag po lus che sa ni brtol nasu// bdug pa rab tu 'bul ba'i tsher 'jug/ 'jungs
382b6(rgyud): rang g.yo sgyu byed cing mi srun la// 'dod chen che la rab gtum khu tshur 'dzag/ mar me gtsug pung gcig pa gogs byed do// snying khar cha zhing gzer thabs sems nyams byeng // 
382b7(rgyud): 'greng ba'i chen gtsug 'byung 'jug 'gyur te// rims dang 'khrugs sprugs drag pos 'debs par byeng // me tog 'bul tshe me tog cher bgod pa// rang gi gnas skabs rnyed nas
382b8(rgyud): lus la 'jug/ rims dang cham pa lus tshigs na ba dang // grogs po rig dang rnar 'bral bar byed// bgegs kyis brlabs pa phyogs na lam min lam du mthong // spyod pa sAn/ 
383a1(rgyud): byed cing 'dod chags rnams kyis gdungs// blo bur smra zhing glog la don med kun tu 'phyan// dor du sgrub pa rnams la sems kyang yid gnyid byed// sems
383a2(rgyud): log par lta bas non pas na/ gsang sngags med cing mtho ris lha yang mang // bsod nams med cing sdig pa cung zad med// thar pa med cing 'chi ba'i rgyu yang med// skye bo don med
383a3(rgyud): nyon mongs dka' bub ces// sna tshogs kyal ba'i tshig 'di rtag tu smra// sen mos rtswa gtsang bong rdo 'jig pa dang // mtshan mo so yang khrag khrig 'cha' ba dang // bu mo bdag 'dod
383a4(rgyud): khyod ni mi rnyed cing // skyes pa bdag 'dod chung ma gzhar mi rnyed// dgos pa'i don mi 'grub cing mi dgos 'grub// gar yang 'gro dgos gnyid med mi yang brlam// / 
383a5(rgyud): bzhir stag gzig seng gi khyi dang phag/ bung bu rnga mo bya la sha za wa// bya rgod 'ag pa skyur mo me'u thung sprul// gcer bu ba la ris can dang mi nag po// khron skam
383a6(rgyud): 'og pa rus gong phung po dang // lcags dang rdo lung mi gtsang kha rul dang // kha bzhin bsgyur zhing ral gri mdung 'ogs pa// rmi lam 'di rnams rmis pa'i mi yang brlams// bgeg
383a7(rgyud): dang log 'dren rnar gzhig pa'i phyir// bdud rtsi thab sbyor drag shul las cad sbyar// sngags pa de yis gsang sngags lam zhugs pa// bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis
383a8(rgyud): yongs mi tshugs// phyugs lhas shing gau cag lha yi khang pa'am// lam gyi gzhi mdo'am khang stong nags tshal du// dkyil 'khor gru bin lham pa khru bzhi'i tshad// chom gyi
383b1(rgyud): pa sna tshogs ngag gis bris// phyogs kyi lha rnams gnas ni yongasu gzung // sgo bzhi pa la ku shi rtsa yang 'grom// bza' dang sha chang la phug la sogs bcas// 'bras chan pra
383b2(rgyud): bu mang po'i gtor ma sbyin// bum pa pad+ma dmar po'i mdog 'dra ba// nag po ra ri med cing rin chen bcas// sman dang 'bru dang spos chus bkang ba bzhi// ldum bus kha bkang ras kyis
383b3(rgyud): 'gul pa dkri// lus dmar po dang ki li ki la dang / 'gro lding ba la sogs pas brgyar bzlas te// dkyil 'khor khor yug du ni bzhag par bya// de nas byug spos bdug spos la so/ 
383b4(rgyud): dbul// bgegs kyis brlams pas shar phyog sa kha bsten te// dkyil 'khor dbus bde ba'i stan la bzhag/ bzlas brjod byas shing bum pa re ris bkrus// 'on kyang log
383b5(rgyud): 'dren rnams las bar par 'gyur// sgrub pa po yi mi ni 'ba' zhig la// bgegs rnams gzhig phyir phan par ma zad kyi// rgyal po'i 'khor dang bud med bud mdas
383b6(rgyud): bu mo dag dang rol mo mkhan rnams dang // bud med phal dang tshong pa rnams kyang rung // zhing pa rnams dang dbul zhing phongs pa dang // gdon gyis zin cing rims kyi btab pa dang // bus
383b7(rgyud): pa'i gdon dang me tog 'bras bu 'brog/ rmi lam smyo dang sems ni g.yang ba dang // dug kyang sel te khrus 'di dag par byang // 'phags pa dpung bzang gi zhus pa'i le'u bzhi pa'o// 
383b8(rgyud): bgegs kyis bsod nams ma lus zad par bye// de bas mi la gsang sngags 'grub mi 'gyur// ji ltar zla ba sprin las rnam grol ltar// de bzhin 'gegs las grol brda/ 
384a1(rgyud): gsal// dper na sa chu dus rnams bral ba yi// snod gnas 'bra spu me tog myu gu med // de dang ma bral myu gu lo ma dang // sdong bu dag dang me tog 'bru spu bsku/ 
384a2(rgyud): cho ga nyams shing yi ge gug skyed med// mchod pa med cing mi gtsang bzlas brjod byas// gug spring yi ge lhag par gyur pa yis// gsang sngags dngos grub rgya chen mi ster to// 
384a3(rgyud): dper na dbyar gyi dus na char sprin dag/ skye bo'i skal pa bzhin char pa legs par 'babs// de bzhin mi yi skal pa gzigs nas ni// 'dod pa bzhin du gsang sngags dngos gru
384a4(rgyud): stsol// yul dang dus dang tshig las rnams dang // sdig pa 'byung zhing bsod nams bsags pa dang // gus dang bzlas brjod kun la gzigs nas ni// de dag gsang
384a5(rgyud): sngags 'bras bu rnar stsol// ji tsam sdig pa mang pos rab gang zhing // ji tsam las dkar bsod nams ma bsags dang // ji srid cho ga med par bzlas byas pas
384a6(rgyud): de sring sngags pas dngos grub mi 'pho'o// cho ga nyams sam bar chad sngags gzhan bzlas// bzlas pa btang ngam gzhan la byin gyur na// dus gsum mchod pa la ni brtson byas
384a7(rgyud): nas// slar yang 'bum bzlas bsgrub la 'jug par bya// stong phrag cu 'am brgyad dam bdun nam bzhi// bzlas mthar de la mar gyi sbyin bsreg bya// yang na ma grags nas sam til
384a8(rgyud): nag gam// yungs kar mer dang bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg bya// lam+bu mi du grags sha ba la sha u dum seng ldang a shwang a ba~M mar// arga a sho ka dang ra rdza ka/ n+ya gro ba la
384b1(rgyud): a mra shi me yi// yam shing gzhon nu sor ni bcu gnyis pa// btsal nas zho mar sbrang rtsil btags nas// rtag tu me la sbyin bsreg bya bar bya// de ltar byas na dngos grub myur du
384b2(rgyud): 'bog/ gzhan gyi gsang sngags kyis gsang sngags gang // bcad dam bcings pas mnan par gyur kyang rung // ngo yi gzugs brnyan sa l-is byas na su// nga yi zhabs drung mad
384b3(rgyud): du grogs bzhag ste// sngags pas ki li kau l-i sogs snying pos// mar dang 'o mas de yis gzugs brnyan bkru// de ltar zhag bdun byas pas gsang sngags dag/ bcings pa
384b4(rgyud): dzi ni mnan las grol bar 'gyur// mchod pa la sogs chog ldan yang ni// ci ste gsang sngags 'bras bu mi ster// de'i gzugs drugu dang ska tshes byugs na su// ki li ka
384b5(rgyud): li 'gro lding la sogs pas// sngags kyis ngal yungs mar tshwa sprur pas// zhag bdun dus gsum sbyin bsreg las byas na// gsang sngags 'ongs nas rmi lam
384b6(rgyud): ngag tu ni// cho ga nyams pa 'am yige lhag chang ston// sngon ni gsang sngags lugs 'chang bstan mo kye// ji ltar rgya mtsho dus las mi 'da' ltar// sngags kyis gzhan gyis
384b7(rgyud): gsang sngags mi gnon cing // btsang dang bcad pa nam yang mi byed do// dper na byams pa'i mi yis mi gzhan la// che ge mo yi khyim 'dir phyin cad khyod// blta ba'i phyir yang
384b8(rgyud): 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes// rigs pa'i tshigs kyis rnar bstan pa dang // ngas kyang de yo tshig de mnyan nasu/ khyim du smra dang blta phyir mi 'gro ba'i// de bzhin gsang sngags gang
385a1(rgyud): ra ba'i sngags// bzlas pas gzhan gyi gsang sngags mnar mi bya// gsang sngags gcad dang bcing ba mi bya zhing // yi ge lhag chang gsang sngags ma sbyor/ 
385a2(rgyud): las rnams spyad pa gzhan du bsgyur mi bya// gnas rnams gzir bar nam yang mi bya'o// dbab dang bcing dang brdeg dang rmongs bya dang // yan lag mi gzhig rigs kyang mi brlu// 
385a3(rgyud): cing // sngags pos klu dang gdon lo sogs pa rnams// gzhan du bskrang bar nam yang mi bya'o// dgar dang bslad pa dang ni bsad pa dang // byis pa gdon gyis zin pa mi gas zhe
385a4(rgyud): rgya mos mnga' snying nga 'jol bu yis// sen mnod pa nams yang mi bya'o// dngos grub phyir ni rnam pa bcur gsu rangs te// sngags pa dang ni rang sngags g.yog dang rdzas
385a5(rgyud): brtson 'grus phyogs dang sa gzhi dus dang ni// yan lag rdzogs pa'i lha dang sems stob so// gzha na dag kha cig rig 'dzin grogs shes zer// gzhan da/ 
385a6(rgyud): phyogs dang brtson 'grus dus rnams nyid// gzhan ni rdzas dang sa gzhi lha dang sngags// kha cig sems stobs yon zhes rnar smra// sgrub phyir de ltar bcu dang brgyad dang
385a7(rgyud): lnga// de bzhin bzhi dang gsum ngang gcig nyid ces// sngags rigs rang rang blo yis rnar 'chad// sangs rgyas rgyud la cho ga gnyis kyis 'grub// sgrub pa gang zhig rang gi
385a8(rgyud): yon+ta rdzogs// brtson 'grus mchog dang yang dag lnga pa dang // gzhan gyis rnyed pa dag la phrag dog med// 'dod la ma chags lus kyi nyon mongs bzong // gug skyed klad
385b1(rgyud): ko chang bar zur phyin la// gsang sngags dag cing shin tu cho gar bcas// sangs rgyas byang chub se ra bsten pa yis// gnas bzlas ni yad 'ong dngos grub thob// ji ltar
385b2(rgyud): ri dgas dbang po bkres pa da// mthu stobs chen po glang chen bsod pa dang // de bzhin spyang ki pheg dang ridags dang // wa rnams kyang ni myur du gsod pa ltar// de bzhin
385b3(rgyud): sngags pa seng+ge'i tshul gyis// rab dang 'bring dang tha mi lus rnams la// brtson 'grus chen po dang ni ldan pa dang // 'bangad ba'i mchog rnams kyis kyang bsten par bya// rdza'i
385b4(rgyud): sgra dang dung rnga'i sgra dang ni// shin tu 'jigs byed skye bo'i sgra dag dang // gang rgyangs sprugs glu dag dang glu gar dang // gling bu pi wang rdza rnga chen po'i sgra// bya bran sna tshogs sgra
385b5(rgyud): ngang chu smra dang // bung meng brgyan gyis sil thA la sgo rnams dang // sha sbrang cha grang rlung gis gnod pa yis// / mi yi sems ni g.yeng zhing g.yo bar byed// bzlas
385b6(rgyud): byed che mi myur mi ngal zhing // sgra cher mi dbyung ha cang chung ba'ang min// sgra bzhin ma yin gzhan du g.yengs bzhin min// gug skyed klang kor tshig rnams nyams par min// 
385b7(rgyud): ltar chu klung nyin mtshan rtag tu ni// rgyun mi 'chad par 'bab par 'gyur ba ltar// de bzhin phyag bcas bzlas dang brtul zhugs kyi// bsod nams lus can la ni 'phel bar
385b8(rgyud): 'gyur// le lo 'dod chags mi dgar ldan pa'i sems// gang nas gang du g.yeng zhing rgyu ba dag/ de dang de nas myur du bzlog nas ni// gsang sngags yi ge mchod la lags par
386a1(rgyud): sbyar// sna rtser lta zhing rnar rtog pa spong // nam zhig bskyod kyang rnam par mi g.yo ba// de tshe dmigs la gnas pa thob pa ste// sems ni lasu rung bar 'gyu
386a2(rgyud): bar nges// rtse gcig sems dang ldan pa'i mi la ni// yid las 'byung ba'i dga' ba rab tu skye// dga' bas lus ni shin du sbyangs pa 'thob// lus sbyangs pas ni bang po'i skal
386a3(rgyud): ldan 'gyur// lus bde rtse gcig sems dang ting 'dzin gyis// de che bzlas brjod dogs pa med par 'gyur// cha rabs gzhan du gang dang gang byas pa'i// sdig pa ma lus bzlas
386a4(rgyud): brjod byas pa 'ang 'byung // bzlas pas sdig pa ma lus byang 'gyur na// ngang ba'i yid kyis dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ de phyir bcom ldan rgyal ba'i dbang po yis// chos
386a5(rgyud): kun gyis rtsa ba sems zhes gsungs// sems ni ngang pas lha mi'i bde ba dang // mtho ros dang ni byang grol thob par 'gyur// sems kyi skyon gyis dud 'gror
386a6(rgyud): skye ba dang // sems dmyal bsad cing mi sdug dbul por 'gyur// sems ni rab tu dang bar 'gyur ba'i mis// sa chu me rlung skya rgan 'chi sogs// bar dang ba mar gnad
386a7(rgyud): ba kur bral ba// rnam grol bde zhi bzhi pa bab par 'gyur// gsang sngags dngos kun kun dang thun mong dang // bde ba chung zhing sdug bsngal brgya dang 'brel// nyon mongs dug
386a8(rgyud): bcas rjer 'jig par 'gyur// dang ba'i sems kyis bab par 'gyur ba yin// 'dod rgyal las las ma byung dus las min// rang bzhin dbang phyug las kyang 'byung ba min// rgyu
386b1(rgyud): med can mon skyes bus ma byas kyang // las dang nyon mongs pa las san 'byung // gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ldan// de ni bdag min bdag kyang gzugs ma yin// gzu
386b2(rgyud): la bdag mang bdag la gzugs med de// gzugs ni stong pa'o phung bzhi'ang rig par gyis// gzugs ni dbu ba dag dang 'dra ba ste// tshor ba chu bur bzhin du rtag pa med// 
386b3(rgyud): ltar mthong ba lta ba bzang po yin// gang zhig gzhan gyur de ni lta ngan gsung // de ltar zlos pa'i gsang sngags nyer gyur na// mtshan mo nyal na rmi lam 'di dag mthong // khang bzang
386b4(rgyud): ljon shing rgyal mtshan sing+geH/ ri bo shing rta sgra ldan sprin dang glu/ stag dang bas deng glang chen khyu mchog la/ rmel man ni dga' bas rmas pa dang // me tog phreng ba spos
386b5(rgyud): dang dri rnams dang // sha chang nya dang 'bras bu glegs pa ma dang // lho yi gzugs dang ut+pal dmar po dang // shing rta gang ba 'am pa bzhon be'u phrug can// gdugs
386b6(rgyud): dkar rnga yab lham dang ral gri dang // bsil yab gser g.yu can dang phreng ba dang // nor bu mu tig nya phyis dung dang dngul// bud med gzugs bzang yid 'ong bu mo dang // rin chen sAn
386b7(rgyud): rnams kyis spras pa'i rgyud// mal bstan dkar po bting ba rnyed pa dang // tho rangs khar ni chu bo chu klung dang // 'bab chu 'am rgya mtsho dang ni rdzing bu dang // lu ma la ni 'thung ngam rgyal
386b8(rgyud): ching // nga bizhin khrag gos lus khrus byed pa'am/ lha khang mchod rten 'dug nas rgyal po'i gzugs// byang chub sede'i mchog dang rang sangs rgyas// zag med dge 'dun pa/ 
387a1(rgyud): slong dge slong ma// dge bsnyen rnams dpas bdag lha rnams dang // mchong gnas bram ze yid 'od skyes bu dang // me dang mi mchog phyug cing 'byor dang bu// pha ma mtha
387a2(rgyud): bshes gnyen dang gnod sbyin dang // grub pa'i lha dang na chung tshogs rnams dang // ji snyed nyi ma zla ba za ba dang // sa yi nang 'gro sa bon 'thung ba dang // me la rdzi zhing sha ni za ba dang // lus
387a3(rgyud): kyi nang nas bud med zhugs pa mthong // rmi lam bzang po 'di dag mthong ba gang // de dag ring por mi thogs grub par 'gyur// zla ba gcig dang zla phyed nyin zhag dang // skad cig gis ni
387a4(rgyud): phyi byir nye bar 'gyur// 'phags pa phungs bzangs kyis zhus pa'i le'u lnga pa'o// / dngos grub nyen zlos la dag ba dang // sems ni nam yang sdig la dga' mi 'gyur
387a5(rgyud): bkres skom cha grang rlung dang ngal ba yi// sdug ba sngal drag pos nyen kyang g.yo mi 'gyur// sbrang bu sha sbrang srin bu grog sbur dang // sdig sprul rkang brgya pa
387a6(rgyud): dang sbrul dang dreng // sha za srul po rnams kyang de dag gi/ lus dang grib ma la ni mi 'gong ngo // tshig ni gzung bar 'os shing yid gzhungs la/ snyan ngag dang ni dri ba rnams la mkhas
387a7(rgyud): chos la mngon dga' rten rnams mthong ba dang // lus kyi nang dang dri ma med par 'gyur// skye bos mthong ngam bos par gyur kyang rung // myur du mngon dga' yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// bud
387a8(rgyud): mang 'dod lha'i mdangs 'phrog pa rnams kyis// 'dod lha'i long spyod phyir ni 'bod par 'gyur// gang cha mkhas pas lha dang gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha yi bu mo'i gzugs dang sgra/ 
387b1(rgyud): mis ni dga' ba'i yid kyis mthong pos na// de tshe shin tu nye bar gyur pa yin// lus ni dri meng dag par rig pa dang // gso sbyong sdom pa dang ni ldan pa las// nyin zhag gcig gam
387b2(rgyud): gnyis sam gsum du ni/ kha zas spang zhing bsrung bar gnas pa yi// nyin zhag de dag 'das par byas nas// rang gi 'byor phyir bsgrub la 'jug pa byas// gsungs de dpung bzang
387b3(rgyud): gis thos slar gsol pa// zas kyis mi 'dag ces sngar gsungs pa dang // mchod 'os khyod kyis lus ngag bgyi phyir yang // ci slad smyung ba mi bzang bgyi bar gsungs// srid
387b4(rgyud): bi'i mthar phyin bde bar gshegs pa yis// shing rta'i mig sku'i bza' ba 'ang ci byor gsungs// rdo rje can gyis dpung bzang tshig gsan nas// 'brug smra zab 'a
387b5(rgyud): gsung gis bka' stsal pa// bu cig lus ngagra bya phyir spyang bya bar// bang gshegs 'di na nam yang mi gsung yang // lus 'di mi gtsang lpags pa sha
387b6(rgyud): khrag dang // klang rgyas sgyu ma mcher mtshan mkha' ma zhag/ mkhris po bad kan khu chu phyis sa dang // gcin skabs ba spu'i skra dang rus pa dang // mig dang rna ba sA dang kha dang ni// 
387b7(rgyud): sgo mtshan dang bug dgu po yi// rma nas dri ma sna tshogs mi gtsang ba// 'dzag pa'i rgyu ni ni rtag tu 'byung ba yin// de ltar yan lag bde 'dus pa dang // sa chu me rlung na mkha' rnams
387b8(rgyud): dang ldan/ ji bzhin las kyi rjes 'brang mo yo lus// bde ldan pa'i gzugs la gnas pa yi// bshang gcig snabs dang mchil ma bang kan dang // 'di dag zang par bya byir smrad
388a1(rgyud): bar gsungs// dri ma zad nas mi yi lus ngag tu// rang gi 'byor phyir bsgrub la bde bar 'jug/ 'dod chags kyis ni gdungs par gyur na yang // lus kyi ya
388a2(rgyud): lag 'di dag thams cad la// dran pa rtse gcig mngon du byas nas ni// ye shos mig gis so sor rnam par brtag/ da ltar gang gis nges par brtags pa na// lus dang / 
388a3(rgyud): srog la rje su chags pa yi// 'dod chags rtsad nas yongs ye zhing 'gyur te// nyi mas mun nag gtan nas bsal ba bzhin// phan yon de yos gsang sngags nye bsna
388a4(rgyud): nas// rang gi lus la nye bar rig pa dang // yar gyi tshes brgyang dang ni bcu bzhi 'am// yang na bco lnga la ni bzlas brjod bya// lha yi gnas kyis ngag bstar ba'i phyir/ 
388a5(rgyud): sa dang lci bsres pa la sogs pas byug/ dad pa sa bde gshegs kun la phreng ba dang // lnga bshos me ta ga dri dang mar mes mchod// de nas rdo rje 'dzid pa
388a6(rgyud): nga la mchod// de nas rang sngags lha la dbul bar bya// bstod 'os sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bstod na su// phyir zhing byang chub sems kyang dran byas te// sems can skye rga
388a7(rgyud): na mchis gzir ba la// ji ltar rigs par snying rje'ang bsgom par bya// 'dus chen mdo sde klag pa 'am bkra shis kyi// tshi gsu bcad pa 'am chos kyi 'khor lo mchog/ de bzhin
388a8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'am sgron ma che// gang yang rung ba gocag ni rom bzhin klag/ de nas bla 'og phyogs rnams bcings na su// lus la go cha bgo bar byas nas ni// 
388b1(rgyud): / gong du smos pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams las// gcig cig tshon rtsi rnams kyis bri bar bya// rdo rje me chu rlung dang mdung thung ngag/ rim bzhin dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bri bar bya// rab
388b2(rgyud): bris la lha dang lha min dang // snang ba'i bdag nyid sems ni myos par 'gyur// sang+ge'i gdan gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i stan// de ni dkyil 'khor dbusu bzhag par bya// bdag
388b3(rgyud): nyid srung ba byas te der 'dug nas// rdzas blangs nyung ngu bzlas brjod byas nas ni// 'dug pa'i sbyin sreg stong yang sbyin bsreg bya// de nas de ni dri chus bkrus nasu// bgegs ma
388b4(rgyud): rnams kyang rab tu gsal byas nas// byang chub shi nga lo gsum gyi steng du bzhag/ bzhi yis bkab nas ji snyed grub pa ni// rnam gsum mthong gi bar du gsang sngag
388b5(rgyud): bzlas// drod dang dul 'thul me bzhin 'bar ba 'am// rim bzhin zlog nas 'byung na'ang grub par gsungs// dro bas 'gro ba thams cad dbang gyur te// dung pa 'bru
388b6(rgyud): bas lus ni mi snang 'gyur// 'bar bas mkha' la shin tu 'gro 'gyur te// mi yi lus ni lha ltar gsal bar 'gyur// ji ltar lus la grang ba 'jug pa dang // ji ltar mngal
388b7(rgyud): du dri za 'jug pa dang // le zer me shel zhugs nas me 'byung ltar// de bzhin dngos grub lus la 'jug par 'gyur// mar me mched cing shin tu 'bar ba dag/ snum zhing dkyus ri
388b8(rgyud): gser gyi mdog ltar dang // 'bru mar zad kyang 'bar bar gyur na ni// de tshe sngags pas dngos grub thob 'gyur te// de ngag rdzas las byung ba'i dngos grub bo// me so ni ri ma'i sku gcu
389a1(rgyud): 'gul ba 'am// phreng ba sprin ma mig dang rnga yab bam// gal te rgyan rnams g.yo bar gyur pa 'am// mkha' las me tog char ram rdzi char 'bab// sa ni myur dug yo
389a2(rgyud): byur pa 'am// lus mi snang bar mkha' las tshig tu ni// bu cig dam pa ci 'dod slongs shig ce'am// lha yarnga sgra 'am lus kyi ba spu'i ldang // rgyar gyi char cher rab tu 'bab pa 'am// dza
389a3(rgyud): mkha' la lha dang lha min dang // gsang sngags gzugs ni mngon du mthong na 'grub// ma nyams me tog dbyig dang chub sres shing // bstod dang bcas par mchod yon rgyun spangs nas/ 
389a4(rgyud): rtse gcig sems kyis mgo btud phrag byas te/ dang dang 'bang po'i rjes 'thun mchog blang ngo // mchog thob nas ni dga' bas phyag byas te/ ngad pas bstod cing mchod
389a5(rgyud): yod phul nasu// gsang sngags brjod cing sla ra yang gshegasu gsol// gsang sngags kun la tshul ni 'di yino// gang zhig sems stobs mchog tu ldan pa
389a6(rgyud): ngo // 'dir ni 'jigs dang bcas pa'i las bya'o// sems stobs chung ba'i mi la sha za yis// glags mthong nas ni phung bar 'gyur// dpa' bo go bgos mtshon cha'i thabs
389a7(rgyud): mkhas pa// chas pa'i glang chen mchog gzhon gzhu thogs nas// mnga' 'phen mthu dang ldan pa gcig pus kyang // ngag yi tshogs kun las ni rgyal bar nus// de bzhin
389a8(rgyud): sems stobs chen po'i tshul khrims kyis// go bgos legs bsrungs glang chan zhon nasu// gsang sngags gzhu thogs bzlas brjod mnga' 'phen pas// 'byung po la
389b1(rgyud): sogs mtshan mo rgyu las rgyal// chur po 'am yan lag lhag chang thung ngu dang // de bzhin ring po 'am yang sbom po 'am// smad pa'i mngal las smras pa 'am ma ning ngam/ 
389b2(rgyud): pa de 'dra'i ro dag spang bar bya'o// ma zhu ba dang rims drag chad pa dang // 'khru smyug bcings ngang chu dang gsal shing dang // sbrul gyis bsang ngam dug gis shi ba 'am// bang
389b3(rgyud): kan rlung sogs mthong min bsang ba la// yan lag tshang zhing kha na ma smang po// lus la rma mang skyes pa'i ro mthong nas// ral gri becon lag na thogs pa yis// nyin
389b4(rgyud): bar phog phag tu ni bsrung bar bya// dur khrod khang stong dang ni shing gcig dang // bzhi mdo 'am 'bab chu ngag gi chu klung ngam// mtsho 'am rgya mtsho'am ni ra ba
389b5(rgyud): la// skad cig gis kyang ro langs 'grub pa ra 'gyur// gang yang rung ba'i gnas gcig brtags nas ni// / sa dang lci ba la sogs byug par bya// gtsang ma der
389b6(rgyud): ni dkar rag dmar po 'am// tshon rtsi sna tshogs rnams kyis dam tshig bri// gong du smos pa'i dkyil 'khor de rnams las// bsams nas 'dod pa gang yang rung ba gicag/ dang
389b7(rgyud): pa chen pos rigs kyi yum gyi mchog/ zlos shing rab tu bsgrims te bri bar bya// 'jigs pa mang pa'i g.yog gi nga blangs nas// khyer te 'ongs nas ku shi'i stang bzhag ste// skra
389b8(rgyud): dang kha spu rnams kyang brags byas nas// de yi mong la 'bru mar ngag gis bsku// de nas bum pa zhabs mi gnag pa bzhi/ gtsang ma'i chus bkang khrus rtsis sbyar te bkru// des
390a1(rgyud): gas sar thugs gcig bstan nas// da nas dkyil 'ab dgas rba stan dang // mnyams ma tog steng du bzhag nga / rA ma mig pa sha rnam bya
390a2(rgyud): bstan// dri yis thug bdug zas 'dug par bya'o// phreng ba gdags shing me tog sil mas gtor// sha dang nya sha mar khu til bsres pa'i// khur ba la sogs ji ste
390a3(rgyud): bungs bskyed de// 'byung po klu dang sha za gnod sbyin dang // 'dral bla 'og phyogasu sbyin par bya// grogs po mchog ldan bdag nyid bsrung ba ste// rtse gcig sems kyis gsang sngags
390a4(rgyud): bzlas brjod bya// ro ni ljang du nye ba'i chen ni// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can bgegs na sna tshogs 'byung // gtsug tor rgyal po'i sngags kyi thal ba 'am// ma grugs yungs kar sogs
390a5(rgyud): la bsngags na su// gtor na phyogs bzhi dag nas 'ongs pa'i bgegs// gsang sngags mthu yis de dag 'byer bar 'gyur// de dag zhi bar bya phyir khro bo ni/ 
390a6(rgyud): bdud rtsi thab sbyor drag shul los can sbyar// bgegs rnams bcom pas de nas 'ongs pa'i bgegs// gsang sngags mthu yis myur du ldang bar 'gyur// gang zhig gsang
390a7(rgyud): sngags cho ga zhib mo las// mthong ba de ni dogs med nges par 'grub// gal te ro de langs par gyur pa las// de yi gsang sngags cho ga mi shes na'ang / gsang sngags
390a8(rgyud): gzhan du bstan pa'i cho ga yis// langs pa de la rang gi dngos grub blang // gter gyi phyogs dang phug tu 'gro ba dang // ral gri any+dza bzhon pa mngag bzhug dang // 'byung khungs
390b1(rgyud): gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len// mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub rab tu ster// srung ba'i stobs med sngags kyi stobs med dang // dka' thub stobs med sems stobs
390b2(rgyud): med pa yi// blo zhan gang zhig ro langs dngos grub tshol// de ni mtshan mo rgyu ba rnams kyis bsad// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u drug pa'o// 
390b3(rgyud): mi gang mi yi sha ni 'tshong 'dod des// mar gyi nga la dur khrod song nasu// shing rdo mtshon dang dgu dang dbyug to sman// bgegs la sogs pas shi bar gyur pa yi// byin pa 'am
390b4(rgyud): brla dang mgo dang ske dag dang // 'jigs pa med pas mtshan ma blangs nasu// btubs te skon bu 'am rgya dum sar pa 'am// gtsang ma rer ni mi nyung bzhag par bya// 
390b5(rgyud): lus la khrag gis lag rjes bris na su/ rgyu mas mgo dang mgrin pa dkri bar bya// lus la mi lpag sa sar pa bgos nas kyang // lag g.yon shas bkang
390b6(rgyud): gyo mo de thogs nas// khrag gis bskus pa'i ral gri lag g.yas kyis// rab tu bsgoms nas de ni thogs nas kyang // spra cher 'bod cing tshig tu sha 'di dag/ khyed cag su
390b7(rgyud): zhig nye bar byed 'dod ces// shar dang byang dang lho dang nub phyogasu// myur du bskor zhing shin tu brjod par bya// ci ste lus ni snang ngam mi snang bar// chog gis khod ni nor ram rig
390b8(rgyud): pa 'am// btsud kyis len pa 'am grong ngam rgyal sring ngamo// phug tu 'gro 'am ci 'dod ces zer na// sngar ni gang zhig sems kyis bsams pa'i don// de nyid smra zhing
391a1(rgyud): gzhan du mi bya// rig mang pos bsten pa'i dur khrod 'dir// don 'di yi phyir sdug bsngal drag pos yis// bdag kyang gdungs bzhin 'ongs kyi 'di nyid na/ 
391a2(rgyud): yod na sha 'dir khyed la bdag la byin// ci ste srang la gca' ste ma gang na// rang gi sha yaus don dgang bar bya// gal te dur khrod 'di ni stong pa ste// nor med bu khyod gzhan
391a3(rgyud): du song shig ces// mtshan mo rgyu bas de skad bsgo na ni// de la bdag ni gang du 'gro zhes dri// lan thob de ni rang gis brtags nas su// sha de bor nas de nas 'gro bar bya// 
391a4(rgyud): sha yis cho ga ngas gsungs de dag ni// gsang sngags ma bzlas pas ni bsten mi bya// rigs mchog gtsug to/ stobs chen la sogs pas// dur khrod du
391a5(rgyud): srung bar ngas gsungaso// gsang sngags drag pos gang zhig sha za ba// de la dur khrod mi shi'i sbyin bsreg bya// ral gris sor gnyis sor gsum tshad tsam du
391a6(rgyud): btubs nas me la sbyin sreg stong bya'o// me tog ma nyams 'bras yos sha khrag nya// chang dang sbrang rtsi bu ram chen dang til// bdag pa phreng ba mar me byug pa can// lha bshos
391a7(rgyud): gtor ma dur khrod gau tor bar bya// dbab dang bskung dang gnyid kyis myos bya dang // dmag gzhom gleng khyer phung bar bya ba la// sha za ma mo'am srin mo'i tshogs// gnod sbyin
391a8(rgyud): rnams la sha yi sbyin bsreg bya// mi yi sha ni rnyed par ma gyur na// ba long sha yi sbyin sreg de bzhin shis// ma ho'i sha 'am khyi sha dmar bsres la// tshes grangs dag la
391b1(rgyud): sbyang byas sbyin bsreg bya// gnod sbyin mo yi cho ga zhib mor ni// gsang sngags mnyes byas grub pa 'di rnams ster// ma dang sgyug mo sru mo grogs mo dang // bu mo chung ma ma
391b2(rgyud): mor grub par 'gyur// ma dang smyug mo sru mo gang yin de// yid bzhin rin chen bzhin du grub pa mchog/ yid 'ong grogs me bu mo grub pa 'bring // chung ma mna' ma grub
391b3(rgyud): pa tha mar bsgrags// dus gsum du ni me tog phreng ba dri// mar ram 'bru mar mar me tsan+da dang // a gar dri zhim bdug pas mchod pa dang / gtor ma sna tshogs rtag tu mtshan
391b4(rgyud): mo sbyin// gnod sbyin mo ni dga' nas mngon phyogs nas// rnyed pa rnyed cing sa bor 'byung bar byed/ 'dod chags zil gyis non po'i bud med kyang // gnod par byed pa
391b5(rgyud): par gnas par 'gyur// bud med gnod pa byed che 'gro mi bya/ rnyed pa mang zhung la yang 'dod mi skyed// sngags pa maHna mo khu ba dgag byas la// brtson 'grus
391b6(rgyud): rab tu bskyed de bsgrub par bya// sems rmongs gang zhig gzhan du brtsam byas na// gnod sbyin mos ni myur du phung bar byed// bsams na phung bar yang ni 'gyur ba nyid// sha zi'i
391b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo la 'ang de nyid de// de las chog lhag pa 'di rnams bye// sha chang phug tshod mau cung pang dang // nas chen mo sha can dang 'bras chan nya// gtor ma de dag kun tu bcu
391b8(rgyud): ba dbul// gnas ni khang stong dag gam dur khrod shis// me tog shir sha kun tu arga dang // bil ba bri ha ku sha ra dzan/ a kas ut+pa la a Da ru sha ka/ se'u can mya
392a1(rgyud): ngan tshang sogs me tog dbul// klu la bu ram 'o ma mar sbyar ba'i// bdug pa dri zhim a gar tsan+da dri// phreng ba me tog dri zhim sna tshogs dang // 'bras can zho dang
392a2(rgyud): 'bras yos 'bras bu dbul// ba dan sngon po ru pa sngon po dang // gos kyang sngon po lha bshos gtor ma 'di// phreng ba byug pa me tog sngon po dag/ ji snyed brang gis 'gro ba rnams
392a3(rgyud): la bul// mab bong me long ral gri chu dang shal// mar mes gzhi bcas dang na mkha' dang // lhung bzed nor bu dag dang mo 'ab ra ba// 'di la gsal bar ston pa rtag tu 'byung
392a4(rgyud): 'das pa dang ni ma 'ongs da ltar 'byung // mtho ris sa stengs dus dang mi ldan yang / lha dang lha min dge dang mi dge ba'i// / las rnams thams cad gsal bar smin
392a5(rgyud): par rtogs// cho ga nyams pa 'am yang na phyed bzlas pa 'am// yi ge chad dam yi ger lhag ma 'am// bzlas brjod ma byas dang pa med pa dang // mchod pa med cing sa gzhi mi gca
392a6(rgyud): dang // sprin gyi tshogs kyi nyi zer bsgribs pa dang // byis pa yan lag nyams shing lhag pa dang // de lta bu la mi yi gsal ston pa// 'bab par mi 'gyur dgas pa yong ma ston/ 
392a7(rgyud): gsal ston dba' phyir sngon du chog bzhin// bzlas shing ches grangs bzang la sngags pa yang // sbyang byas dgongs kar sa dang lci ba yis// tha ka tsam gyis sa gzhi lags
392a8(rgyud): par byug// byug spos dang ni me tog bdug spos dang // lha bshos mar me dag kyang phul nas// byis po gzhon nu sta gon gnas par bya// de nas nang bar cho ga 'di kun bya/ 
392b1(rgyud): khrus byas lus la gos dkar gtsang bgos te// shar phyogs kha bltas ku shi'i gdan stengasu// 'dug nas gsang sngags rjes su dran par bya// me long thal ba gtsang ma/ 
392b2(rgyud): lan bdun nam// brgyad dam yang na bcur ni phyis na su// rtse gcig sems kyis gsang sngags zlos bzhin du// byis pa gzhon nu nub tu kha bstan pas// lha yi mig
392b3(rgyud): gis bltas na 'das pa dang // da ltar dang ni ma 'ongs mthong bar 'gyur// me long zhes bya'i cho ga mtha' dag ni// ral gri gsal bar ston pa sbyar bar bya// ma bong rgya skyugs
392b4(rgyud): khu bas bskus nasu// 'bru mar dri zhim ngag gis gdab par bya// bum pa gtsang nga mo chus bkang mi yor bzhag/ sa bcug lhung bzed nor bu chu yis gang ba// skugatu
392b5(rgyud): la ni bdug spos me tog dbul// de nas byis pa gzhon nus blta bar bya// gsal bar ston nam rmi lam la sogs pas// dngos grub brtags te de nas bzlas
392b6(rgyud): brjod bya// gal te yid ni ches par ma gyur na// de nas rig sngags mi gdug bzlas brjod pa// nga yis gsang sA gas dag pa gang yang rung // gso sbyong bas
392b7(rgyud): nas nan tan bzung na su// rgyal ba'i ril bsrel mchod rten drung du bzlas// yang na sku gzugs mo nyams spyan sngar bzlas// lus dang ga yid lag pa mig dang ni// sman
392b8(rgyud): mtshams yan lag rdor g.yog pa dag / rab tu bsdams nas de la yid gzhol zhing // byams la gnas shong ku shi'i khris la 'dug/ ji srid du ni rtse gcig gnas gyur/ 
393a1(rgyud): pa de srid du ni 'bum 'am nyis 'bum bzlas// nga yis gsang sngags hUM zhes bya ba 'dis// shing la'ang 'bab na mi la smos ci dgos// de nas da
393a2(rgyud): ba'i snod rnams brtag par bya// bu mo gzhon nu lo bsu'am bcu gnyis pa// bcu pa 'am brgyad dam bdun nam bzhi 'am gsum// yang na khye'u 'ang rung ste gnyis sam lnga// 
393a3(rgyud): tshigs rus rtsa mi mngon cing gzugs bzang ba// yan lag rdzogs shing mig dkyus ring la dkar// kha bzhin zla 'dra mche ba mnyam la rmo// sor mo thogs bzang mdzes la long bu
393a4(rgyud): nub// lte ba zab cing mdzes la nu 'dzings legs// ba spu'i re re skra yang gnag la sdug/ lto ba mi rlo gnyer ma ga sum dang ldan/ mdog kyang bzang zhing mang
393a5(rgyud): byang dang yang ldan// gang la yid dga' lta ba brtan par 'gyurar// blta bas kyang ni ngoms par mi 'gyur dang // lha gan na ngag la mi phyogs dbab pa'i snod// chos
393a6(rgyud): grangs bzang la nyin zhag gcig du ni// smyung ba byas pas bdug spos phreng ba dang // tsan ngan mar me me tog rnams kyis mchod// bza' dang 'bras chan la sogs gto
