393a8(rgyud): sogs de la sbyin// bdug pas bdug cing gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya// hUM gos gsang sngags thog mar bzlas na su// gr-ih+Na a bi sha zhes brjod par bya// mig na
393b1(rgyud): gdangs shing 'dzums par mi byed na// rdzogs par gyur par shes par byas na su// 'jigs pa med de nga tshe dri bar bya// mchod pa dang ni bdug pa phul nasu// rig pa mchog
393b2(rgyud): gi gsang sngags dran byas nas// phyag 'tshal nas ni lnga tshogs gang yin dri// dus gsum ngag gis bdag gis dgos pa gang // da ni legs par dgongs nas bka'
393b3(rgyud): stsol cig/ bde dang sdug bsngal dngos grub thob mi thob// shes nas de yang de bzhin gzung na su// de ma thag tu slar yang btang bar bya// mi gdug sngags bzlas chog
393b4(rgyud): 'di rnams kyis// dbab pa'i don la sems ni phebs 'gyu gyi// gang zhig blun pas gzhan du brtsams na ni// de ni mi kun rnams kyis dpyas par 'gyur// zhi zhing
393b5(rgyud): gzhungs la rgya cher dukyus kyang ring // brtan zhing gzi che ma sa ldan dmar bar snang / 'dzums shing 'byed med lha yi mig 'dra ba// dam pa'i snod la lba babs
393b6(rgyud): de ltar 'gyur// mig ni rab tu dmar zhing zlum por 'dug/ bgrang cing mi sdug rab tu 'jigs 'jigs lta// 'dzums pa med cing 'jigs med lta ba ni// srin po lta la
393b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin babs pa'i mig/ gal te babs pa snod rimi gtong na// shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad brjod pa 'am// stobs po che'am dgod pa 'am lcags kyo bzlas/ 
393b8(rgyud): yang na rab tu 'dus pa'i mdo sde bklag/ sang+ge'i gdan gyi arga'am pa la shi'o// yam shing mar gyis bskus pa brgya rtsa sreg/ ma grugs til ni sbrang rtsi 'am mar gyis
394a1(rgyud): bskus// gtum pos spyir bsreg nyi shu rtsa gcig bya// snga ma bzhin du gsang sngags cho ga dag/ dam tshig cho ga ji bzhir spyad nas ni// bdag gis yid
394a2(rgyud): dang 'thun pa'i dngos grub pho ba// sngags pa yun ring nyon mongs mi 'gyuraro// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u bdun pa'o// // sangs rgyas kyis gsum
394a3(rgyud): yan lag brgyad lam mi// yang dag 'tsho dang las mtha' ting 'dzin dag/ stsol dang rtog dang dran dang lta ba rnams// so sor yang dag bsten par bya// lam 'di rnams kyis gas
394a4(rgyud): sngags dngos grub cing // de bzhin 'dis ni mtho ris thar pa tho'o// rgyal sras sngon gyi rgyal ba 'das pa dag/ 'di nas gshegs shing de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/ 
394a5(rgyud): dogs med sems kyis lus dang ngag yid kyis// gus par bsod nams gang dag bsags pa yang // / bde gshegs gsungs pa'i bden pa'i lam dmigs na// / 
394a6(rgyud): dge ba'i lam de yang dag bskyed pa yin// yongasu 'dzin pa rnam par spangs na su// chos gos dang ni bsod snyoms ngan song dang // sman dang mal stan ngan ngon tsam gyis kyang // 
394a7(rgyud): chog pa'i sems dang ldan pas bsod nams thob// bdag la bstod pa nam yang mi bya zhing // sems can gzhan la smad par mi bya'o// stag dang sprul dang me 'drar 'jig rten
394a8(rgyud): ngag/ bsams nas spangs te dben la dga' bar bya// bud mang mtshan nyid skyes bu'i mtshan nyid dang // sman dang glang chen brtag pa 'am skar ma'i dpyad/ mtshon cha brtag pa/ 
394b1(rgyud): 'am rta dpyang rang bzo 'am// stan bcos ngan pa slob cing klog pa spang // glang chen rta ngang ba lang bya gag khyi// gong mo sreg pa 'ug pa skyes pa dang // bud mang bu mo byas par lug sos
394b2(rgyud): 'bab mo 'gyed pa mi blta mi bya'o// yul si'i gtam dang mi dbang sten pa dang // dmag dang gyang dang na chung gtam dag dang // srung ldabs dang ni sngon gyi lo rgyus dang // 'dod chags
394b3(rgyud): dang ni smad 'tshong gtam mi bya// sngags pa gsang sngags bzlas pa mnos pa ni// grong dang grong khyer khyim dang gtsug lag khang // mchod rten bisti gnas ri dang dka' thub
394b4(rgyud): gnas// kun dka' lu ma 'amau rdzing bur 'gro mi bya// sngar bshad pa yi gnas rnams ma rnyed nas// lha khang stong pa dag gam shing drung ngam// ri dang chu bo chu klung 'bab
394b5(rgyud): chu dang // nags tshal stong pa dag dang yul ste/ nga dang // gnas gang rung bar sngags par gnas shing bzlas// yang na gnas ni nges par ma byas na// zla ba brgyad po
394b6(rgyud): 'di yis dus ngag tu// gnas 'di gang yang rung ba gcig tu bstan// mtsho dang shing dang ri bo dgon pa'i gnas// mtshe'u dang khang pa gnas sam chu ngogasu// dgun dpyid zla ba
394b7(rgyud): rnams la gnas byas nas// sngags pas dbyar ni gcig tu gnas bya ste// ji ltar rgyal bas dge slong dbyar zla gsum// tshul zhugs gnas gzhan mi 'gro gsungs pa ban
394b8(rgyud): de bzhin bcom ldan 'das kyis bsngags pa yang // zla ba gsum du gcig tu gnas par gsungs// sngags pas dbyar ni sgrub la mi 'jug par// bzlas brjod kyis ni dus
395a1(rgyud): kyang bzlas par bya// dbar 'das nas ni gsang sngags gzi bskyed pas// bdag nyid bsrung byas sgrub la 'jug par bya// me thab zlum po gru gsum gru bzhi nga // 
395a2(rgyud): pad+ma lta bur byas shing dbyibs logs shing / 'jam zhing shin tu mnyam par byas nasu// de dag sa dang lci bas legs par byug/ zlum por dbang thang bskyang dang nor dgug
395a3(rgyud): ngang// spyar drang zhi ba'i cho ga bya bar shes// gru gsum du ni dgar bskang bsang ba dang // gshed byed la sogs drag po rnams kyang bya// gru bzhi par ni klu dong gsang ba pa'o// 
395a4(rgyud): srog bskam pa 'am yan lag gzhag par bya// pad+ma'i dpyi bsuM bung med bu mo'i grong // yu l-i kun thob pa 'am ngon kun sgrub pa'i shis// ma thab lci ba gtsang / 
395a5(rgyud): mas byugs nas kyang // ba ma thog thag ku shA dgram par bya// dkon mchog gsum dang phyag na rdo rje dang // yul la dad pas phreng ba bdug pa dang // dri dang
395a6(rgyud): ma nyams me tog ji snyed pas// cho ga bzhin du legs par mchod par bya// yam shing mang po thabs kyi drang bzhag ste// rlung yab kyis ni me ni spar nas kyang // sangs rgyas rnams la
395a7(rgyud): phyag byas khro ba ni// bdung ci 'khril pas ma nyams pad+ma 'am// mi grugs til nag las ni bdun nam brgyad// bcu'am nyi shur sreg blugs me la sreg/ ku sha bting
395a8(rgyud): 'am khris sam rtswa stan la// 'dug nas shar phyogs kha bltas rdzas rnams ni// mar ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma las bstegs nas// rang gi gsang sngags sgrub phyir sbyin bsrag
395b1(rgyud): bya/ me yis mtshan nyid nye bar brtag pa ni// me sdug dub me lce sgra rnams las// de bzhin 'grub dang mi 'grub thams cad kyang // sngags kyis byin rlabs me ni son par byed/ 
395b2(rgyud): dru ba med cing gser gyi mdog ltar gdang // me lce rab tu che la g.ya su 'khyil// kha dog gzhan 'dra yang na dkar yang rung // yang na byi ru bcag pa'i kha dog 'dra// shin tu snum
395b3(rgyud): la me lce 'gab nas 'phro// rab tu 'bar ba nyi ma'i 'od zer 'dra// dbyibs ni bum pa rgyal mtshar gdugs dang 'dra// dpal be'u dang pad+ma blugs gzar 'dra// me lce tri shul rje rje
395b4(rgyud): ral gri 'dra// yang na shing rta mchog dang rnga yab 'dra// rdza rnga rnga chen dang ni gling bu'i sgra// du ba me lce dri zhom me stag bzang // yang na ma sbar bar yang 'bar gyur na// de tshe dngos grub rgya
395b5(rgyud): chen thob par 'gyur// du ba che zhing me stag rgod pa dang // 'bar ba ra dka' zhing cung zad cung zad 'bar// me lce rngar chang cing gzigadangs med // rngub gnag sbyin dang pal
395b6(rgyud): sha yi mdog/ gsal zhing 'dra zhing zhib mo'i gzugs dang 'dre// phyugs kyi mgo 'dra skra yang rab tu rtsub// me lU 'phro bas sbyin sreg byed par 'tshig/ mi ro'i dri nga dngos grub
395b7(rgyud): meng par ston// me'i mtshan ma 'di rnams mthong nas ni// stobs po che'i mar gyis skyon bsreg bya// byin pa dag dang 'chan khung spu rnams ni// lag pas kyang ni gtog par mi bya
395b8(rgyud): zhing // me yis me sreg spu gris breg mi bya// spu med bya phyir sman gyis mi byug// ji ltar ral gri so ma 'dzin pa'i mis// lags par ma bzung lag pa tshong pa ltar// de bzhin sngags/ 
396a1(rgyud): kyang legs par ma bzlas ma// 'bras bu med pa 'am yang phung bar 'gyur// mi ni tshul khrims gtsang sbra mi ldan yang // gsang sngags lnga ni nam yang gnang
396a2(rgyud): mi mdzad// lha de'i 'khor du gyur pa gang yin rnams// mi yi glags mthong nas ni phung bar byed// sgrub pa kun la dang po kho nar ni// lha bshos gtor ma phal tshar dbul bar bya// 
396a3(rgyud): sngags pa'i las grub nas kyang dus kun du// rang gi nyams kyis ji snyed dbul bar bya// lha dang lha min gnod sprin lto 'phye grul// na mkha' lding dang 'dab bzangs lus srul po// 
396a4(rgyud): dri za 'byung po gdon gyi rigs rnams dang // gang dag sa la ga nas pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// bu smad g.yog 'khor tshogs dang bcas rnams la// bdag gis pus mo sa la
396a5(rgyud): btsugs na su// thal mo sbyar nas khyed la gsol 'debs kyi sa// gsan nas phan gdags phyir ni longs spyod cig/ 'byung po gang dag ri rab steng gnas dang / 
396a6(rgyud): dga' ba'i tshal dang lha yi gnas rnams dang // shar nub ri dang nyi zla'i khyim rnams dang // ri bo kun la gang dag gnas pa dong // chu bo kun dang chu ba'i mdo rnams dang // rin chen gnas na
396a7(rgyud): lhag par gang gnas dang // mtsho dang brdzing bu lter ka chu ngogs dang // g.yang chu sil ma can gang gnas dang // grong dang phyugs lhas grong khyer stong pa dang // khang stong dag dang
396a8(rgyud): lha yi khang pa dang // gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas dag gam// dka'i thaib+ha gnas dang glang chen bres dag dang / rgyal po'i dkor khang dag na gang gnas dang // lam/ 
396b1(rgyud): srang bdun khang dang ri bzhi mdo dang // gang dag lam po che dang shing gcig dang // dur khrod chen po 'am nags tshal chen po 'am// seng ge dred dang gcan zan gdas dag dang // 
396b2(rgyud): 'brog chen 'jig su rung bar gang gnas dang // gang dag gling mchog rnams na gnas pa dang / lhun po dur khrod dag na gnas pa rnams// rab tu dgyes shing go bar gyur na su// 
396b3(rgyud): phreng ba me tog dri dang bdug pa dang // bstod dang gtor ma mar me gus dbul ba// ring bzhes nas no betung zhing bsnams na su// las 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzapa/ 
396b4(rgyud): de ltar gdon la mchod pa byas nasu// de nas phyogs skyong rnams la mchod pa bya// dbang po 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas pa yis// gtor ma phul ba 'di dag bzhes su
396b5(rgyud): gsol// me dang gshin rje srin po chu dag dang // rlung dang lus ngan 'byung ba gdon dang bcas// steng gi nyi zla chang ba che na po dang // lha rnams kun dang sa yik+Sha
396b6(rgyud): rnams dang // ri yi lha dang gnod sbyin tshegs rnams la// so so so sor gtor ma phul 'di rnams// rab tu dgyes pa yis ni bzhes nas kyang // rang rang phyogasu lags par
396b7(rgyud): bzhugs na su// rang gi bu slang mdza' bshes gnyen 'dun dang // nang mi dmag dang dpung bcas thabs gcig tu// me tog dri dang byug pa gtor mar btsos// 'di rngams
396b8(rgyud): btung zhing legs par gsol nas kyang // bdag gis las 'di 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de ltar gang zhig mtshan mo rgyu ba la// gtor ma gtong ba'i las rnams byed pa
397a1(rgyud): de'i// dngos grub myur zhing shin tu bgegs kyang med// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'ang thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i la
397a2(rgyud): brgyad pa'o// // gang zhig dgra bcom pa ma bsod pa dang // 'thun pa'i dge 'dun dbyen ni byed pa dang // de bzhin gshegs la sdang ba'i sems kyis// nam zhig mi
397a3(rgyud): ngag sku 'tshal 'byin pa byed// shin tu mi bzang ba yi las 'dis rnams// rgyal bas mtshams med lnga po yin par bshad// gti mug can gyis sdig pa byas na yang / 
397a4(rgyud): phung po 'di la grub pa thob mi 'gyur// mchod rten bshig cing byang chub sems dpa' gsong // nyon mongs zad pa'i ma ni sun 'byin dang // slob pa gsod cing dge 'dun
397a5(rgyud): mnga' ba la// gang zhig 'dod pas mang nyung rku 'phrog pa/ mtshams med nye lngar de bzhin gshegs pas gsung sa// tshul nyams mi gang zhig ni 'di byed
397a6(rgyud): bskal pa'i bar du man med sdug bsngal myong // gsang sngags dngos grub bsgrims kyang yong mi 'bob// gang zhig bde gshegs gsungs gi glegs bam ngag/ chung gas
397a7(rgyud): pa dang mas ni sreg pa dang // bsam pa ngan pas chur ni 'dor ba dang // yang na chos kyi sku ni spong ba 'am// bslab tshig ma lus pas ni rkyen pa yi// dge slong dag gam dge
397a8(rgyud): slong ma gsod ngam// dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma gsod ngam// ngan pa'i sems kyis lha khang sreg kyang rung // mi yi yul na sdig pa 'di byas pa// dka' bar spyod pa lngan
397b1(rgyud): yang grub mi 'thog/ gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa yi// bsam pas gnod ba cung zad byas kyang rung // bdag nyid ngan pa dmyal bar bcos par 'gyur// de nas ngan
397b2(rgyud): nas las kyi dbang gis kyang // rigs ngan mi dang dud 'gror skye ba 'bob// 'di dag ngas ni khyod la mdor bshad pa'o// gang zhig byang chub sems ni blangs pa las// rmongs pa
397b3(rgyud): 'jig rten lha tshogs phyag byas nas// de dag de la mi dgor gyur nas su// de yi gsang sngags dngos grub nyams par byed// gang gi tshe na sems ni ngang ba yis// mi yi
397b4(rgyud): yul na byang chub sems blangs pa// de ni phyin chad lha dang lha mir dang // 'jig rten ma lus rnams kyis phyag byar 'os// mau ni mngon par mtho ba ma lus pa'i// bslab pa
397b5(rgyud): mtha' dag blangs par gyur pa dang // sem so can kun la mi 'jigs sbyor ba dang // dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yang bsabs pa yin// gang zhig mi bzang
397b6(rgyud): las byed thub pa gsong // rig sngags gcod dam gnod par byed pa 'am// bsam pa ngan pas gsang sngags tshogs mi mchod// don med bzhin du sen mos rtsa
397b7(rgyud): gcong dang // rkang pas rkang pa nyed par byed pa dang // phyugs la sogs pa sna tshogs sA 'bigs dang // 'phags pa dge 'dun la ni mi gus pa// 'byung po byin nam lnga
397b8(rgyud): yi gtor ma 'am// sa la lhung ba sngags pas bza' mi bya// 'dod chags zil gyis nin pas dud 'gro dang / bud med bgrod bya min par 'gro mi bya// glang chen mi gdul
398a1(rgyud): sprul yang mi gzung zhing // rta rgyug klu ngo bas lugs gis gzhu mi bya/ las de rnams dang ldan par gyur pa de'i// dngos grub nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur
398a2(rgyud): sems can nad kyis gdungs dang sdug bsngal la// rtag tu byams pa'i sems ni yid la bya// dper na na mkha' mthar thugs med pa la// 'dom gyis gzhal bar mang
398a3(rgyud): rtogs mi nus ltar// de bzhin dkon mchog gsum la brten nas ri// phan gnod byas pa'i dge sdig mtha' mi rtogs// rgya dang sI dang bong rgya 'jol bu yis// khyi la
398a4(rgyud): sogs pa'i sems cad gsod pa dang // bya rog la sog sa gzab kyis bcings byas nas// 'di dang pha rol tu yang grub mi thob// bdud dgra'i me tog snying po pa
398a5(rgyud): ba rnams// rkang pas mi rdzi mgo la gdags mi bya// bkres las gdungs kyang de dag rnams la ni// phul ba'i lnga bshos rnams kyang bza' mo bya// 'jigs
398a6(rgyud): kyang tshangs pa brgya byid khyab 'jug dang // drag po rlung lha sogs la phyag ma bya// nges bshang ba yi chos la mi bsten zhing // de dag dka' thub ma spyang rtags ma mchod// 
398a7(rgyud): de dag chos la'ang ngan sems mi bya zhing // de yi spyod la nam yang dga' mi bya// de dag bstod pa mi gdon sngags mi bzlas// sbyin pa sbyin tshe snying rje bskyed nas sbyin// 
398a8(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bsten pa yi// gnas dang rgyal sras rnams la phyag bya'o// rang sangs rgyas dang rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams// de dag rtog tu phyag bya
398b1(rgyud): gnas yin no// ji ltar zla ba tshes la mi rnams ni// phyag 'tshal nyal lus can phyag mi 'tshal// de bzhin dang pas rgyal ba'i thugs sras la// phyag bya de ltar bde ba
398b2(rgyud): gshegs la min// 'jig rten kun gyi mngon mtho bslab pa can// snying rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i don du ni// skye ba len pa de la ci yi phyir// bu cig bdag nyid kun gyis
398b3(rgyud): phyag mi bya// skyes bu bsam yas rmad byung rdzu 'phrul can// de la mi ngar gang zhig mi 'dud pa// de la rgyal ba thams cad thugs nur nas// de yi gsang sngags dngos
398b4(rgyud): grub mo stsol to// dper na shing gi me tig dang por ni// yid 'ong phyi nas 'bras bur 'gyur ba ltar// sems can mchog rnams me tog 'dra ba ltos/ 
398b5(rgyud): 'bras bu bzhin du rgyab rig par gyis// gang zhig rang ba zhin chags sdang rnam bral yang // rtsa la snying brtse khru la khro ba dang // 'dod chags can la chags
398b6(rgyud): can ltar ston pa// byang chub tshul gnas de la phyag 'tshalo// gang zhig las dang rnam smin mkhyen pa yi// 'gro ba kun la ji ltar 'thun pa yi// gsang sngags gcu
398b7(rgyud): gyi rjesu 'jug mdzad pa// sngags kyi rnam 'dren nga la phyag 'tsha lo// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u dgu pa'o// // lha dang lha min pa mi la
398b8(rgyud): phar gdags phyir// gsang sngags rig sngags rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ bya ba phrag gsum dang ni 'bum phrag lnga// rig 'dzin sde sdod bshad par rgyal bas gsum
399a1(rgyud): ngas ni gsungs pa rnams gzhom pa dang // dngul ba'i sdug bsngal bsal bar bya ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor bcas shing phyag rgyar ldan pa yi// gsang
399a2(rgyud): sngags bye ba phrag bdun rab tu bshad// pho nya bcu dang rig pa'i rgyal po bdun// de bzhin phyag brnyan drug cu rtsa bzhi dang // nga yi snying po dam pa brgyad rnams dang // khro bo drag
399a3(rgyud): bo bdud rtsi zab sbyor dang // rig pa mchog la sogs pa mthu bo che// rig pa'i bdag po gsang sngags rjes 'brang bcas// de rnyeng rdo rje'i rigs ni gang yin pa// ngar ni 'di dag pa
399a4(rgyud): yis rgya cher bshad// spyan ras gzigs dbang kyi gsang sngags bye ba phrag/ gsum dang de bzhin 'bum phrag lnga rnams bshad// de yi rig sngags bdag
399a5(rgyud): po rta mgrin dang // de'i ming can dkyil 'kho ra dam pa gsum// bcu gnyis phyag dang bcu drug pa dang ni// thor chug cod pan 'dod pa 'byor byed dang // zhal bzhi
399a6(rgyud): don yod zhag par bdun bstan pa// sa stengs gsang sngags nyi ma bdun ltar 'bar// de rnams rta mgrin dkyil 'khor gsang sngags te// mi la mchog sbyin 'jig rten
399a7(rgyud): gsum gyis 'dud// sgrol ma dkar mo gos dkar can ma dang // rnam gzigs ral pa gcig ma dkar sham dang // grags ldan khro gnyer can dang 'di dag rnamaso// pad+ma'i rig
399a8(rgyud): kyi rig sngags rgyal mo mchog/ de dag dkyil 'khor sna tshogs gzugs can dang // phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs rnams dang ldan// rgyas pa'i gsang sngags rgyud du 'od/ 
399b1(rgyud): dngag can// rig pa'i dbang phyug gsang sngags bdag zang sgom// nga yis gsang sngags ma la grub mchog ster// de la lnga can yang ni mngon par dga'// gnod sbyin dbang
399b2(rgyud): phyug de dang rtag 'thun pas// de yi bkang yis gsang sngags mchog rnams bshad// lngas rtser gyis ni stong phrag nyi shu ste// de yi chung mas de yi phyed bshod do// 
399b3(rgyud): nor gyi bdag pos stong phrag sum cu ste// gang po'i pha yis kyang ni 'bum bshad do// lha dang lha min la sogs rgyal ba la// dang pa rnams kyis gsang sngags mtha' yas
399b4(rgyud): bshang / kha cig ji yi rigasu gtogs pa ste// kha cig kyang ni pad+ma'i rigasu gtogs// kha cig nor gyi rig su gtogs pa yin/ gzhan yang kha cig gnas med rnam pa
399b5(rgyud): 'khyam// nor spyod ces bya nor ngas kyi rigs gsungs// nga na rdo rje'i rigs las rab tu bstan// spyan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma'i rigs yin te// rigs pan
399b6(rgyud): pa ni 'di ni lnga rtson yod// gsang sngags mdo sde ngas bshang gang yin de// bzhi po 'dir ni rnam par sbyor bar bya// gzhan yang 'di ni kha cig gnas med par// bde ba
399b7(rgyud): gshegs la rten cing yongs 'kham pa'i// mdo sde 'dir ni de dag thams cad kyang // 'byor pa 'dod po'i mis ni rnam par sbyar// lam 'di nyid du zhugs pa'i sngags
399b8(rgyud): pas ni// yid dang 'thun pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sring gsum nang na rgyal ba dkon mchog ste// de yi 'og tu de las byung ba'i chos// de yi dge 'dun skyes chen
400a1(rgyud): brgyad po ste// srid pa gsum na dkon mchog gsum po gtso// srid gsum bsod nams rnam 'phel rgyu yin pas// dngos grub 'dod pas gsang sngag
400a2(rgyud): mgo la gdon// bsod nams ches dang log 'dren rmongs byi'i phyir// phyag na rdo rje gtu ma mchog phyag 'tshal zhes// gsang sngags rnams kyi mgo la sbyar bar bya/ 
400a3(rgyud): gnod sbyin dgon pos ngas ni bshad pa yin// nor gyis rigs dang pad+ma rigs la yang // rang gi gsang sngags bdag por ldan par bya// bde gshegs pa mon nya
400a4(rgyud): thos lam zhugs dang // rang rgyal rnams kyi lam la gnas pa dang // dad pa med cing tshul khrims 'jungs pa yis// nga yis rdo rje rnams kyang gtsang mi bya// 
400a5(rgyud): gang zhig theg pa mchog la sdang ba dang // bdud kyis bshad pa yin zhes smra ba dang // rmongs nas nga la gnod sbyin zhes smra dang // byang chub sems dpa'
400a6(rgyud): la ni mi 'dud pa'i// dge slong dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang // dge bsnyen ma dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyis// nga yi rigs kyi gsang sngags bzlas brjod na// de dag rnam
400a7(rgyud): kyis lus ni myur du 'jig/ gang zhig nga'i rigs rjesu 'brang ba'i gdon// 'thung po gnod sbyin klu dang sha za yis// nga yi sngags zlos rdo rje thogs pa dag/ mthong nas khros
400a8(rgyud): nas phung bar byed par 'gyur// gang zhig pheg mchog rgya chen klog pa dang // de la dad cing de nyid 'chad par spro// brtson 'grus che zhing byang chub sems brtan pa// de la nga yi
400b1(rgyud): gsang sngags mchog sbyin mdzad/ ngas ni 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas pa'i// gsang sngags yangs shing rgyas par bshad pa yin// de nas gzhan yang 'jig rten pa
400b2(rgyud): bsdus nas// zhar la bshad pa 'di dag khyod kyis nyon// drag po yis ni bye ba phrag bcu bshad// nor lha'i bus ni stong phrag sum cu ste// tshangs pa yis ni stong phrag
400b3(rgyud): drug cu nying // nyi mas kyang ni 'bum phrag gsum bshad do// na mkha' lding gis stong phrag po co brgyad de// gtum byed mas ni stong phrag brgyad ba shad// ma yis kyang ni brgya
400b4(rgyud): phrag bdun nyid dang // phur bus gsum pa yis ni stong pa sha da do// klu'i rgyal po rnams kyis lnga stong ste// mtshan mo rgyu bas stong phrag bcu gnyis bshad// 'gro la
400b5(rgyud): phan phyir 'jig rten bdag po bzhis// 'bum phrag bzhi ni rab hu bshad pa yin// lha min dbang pos 'bum phrag ba nyis nyid de// lha yi bdag pos kyang ni
400b6(rgyud): 'bum phrag gsum// gsang sngags phyag rgya sna tshogs cho gar ldan// so so'i gzhung gi dkyil 'khor rnams dang bcas// rang sngags rdo rje'i rjes 'brangs dang bskyed na// 
400b7(rgyud): ma bsgrims bzhin du the tshom med par 'grub// de las bzlog ni dngos grub mi bo ba la/ sdug bsngal mang po yang ni 'thob par 'gyur// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis
400b8(rgyud): zhus pa'i le'u bcu pa'o// / bcud kyis len dang gter dang phug 'gro dang // nor sbyar 'byung khungs sngags dang gser sbyar rtsi// rin bang med pa'i rin chen
401a1(rgyud): nor sbyin te// brgyad po bstan pa yongasu bsgrags pa yin// sngags dang phug du 'gro dang bcud kyi len// sdig pa spong bar byed pa mchog tu bstan/ 
401a2(rgyud): rin chen dang ni gter dang 'byung khung 'bring // gser sbyar rtsi dang nir sbyar ba ma'o// me ni sems stobs ldan zhing lA bertson// bka' thub gyis phyug dang por bstan pa'i sna/ 
401a3(rgyud): rdul shas che ba la ni 'bring por gsungs// ba ma la ni mun pa can gyis bsten// gang zhig mchog tu bstan pa bsten 'dod pa// des ni tha mar bstan pa rnam par spang // 
401a4(rgyud): gal te nor la sred cing sdug bsngal gyis// gsungs na 'bring po la ni ster bar bya// lha yi bden pa dang ni 'byor pa dang // tshe dang stobs gzugs phun sum tshogs
401a5(rgyud): pa dang // thos mang mdangs bzang gcig tu yid gzhus dang // dbang bang che kun dka' thub stobs kyis 'thob/ chags dang rnam bral dge la dga' ba dang // 
401a6(rgyud): rtag tu dkon mchog gsum la sems gzhol dang // sdig pa spangs shing bzlas brjod ldan pa yi// mi la lha rdzas dngos grub ring ba meng // rdo rje mtshon ma gnam ldugs
401a7(rgyud): 'dra ba yi// gsang sngags mi yi 'jig rten mchog sbyin mdzad// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol nyid na yang // sdug bsngal sel cing sdig 'joms gzhan med do// gang zhig
401a8(rgyud): dpag bsam ljon pa'i shing lta bu// la lar dngos grub la lar bsod nams dang // gzhan la gzugs stobs che dang bde ba dge/ yid 'bur 'bras bu 'dod pa'i mi
401b1(rgyud): la stsol// gsang sngags sna tshogs gzugasu rnam sprul nas// gang zhog sdug bsngal gang zhig skrag pa 'am// rgyal po tshom rkun thog gis 'jigs skrag pa'i// 
401b2(rgyud): 'gro ba'i tshogs chen mtha' dge slob par mdzad// gang zhig yul dang khyim yi brten kyang rung // dka' thub ma nyams rtse gcig sems kyis ni// nyin zhag gcig tu
401b3(rgyud): cung zad sngags bzlas na// de yi gsang sngags dus shig na ni 'grub// cho ga bzhin du dang por 'bum bzlas nas// de nas sngags pas sgrub la 'jug par bya// 
401b4(rgyud): nas dngos grub myur du thob 'gyur la// gtsang sngags cho gas yun ring nyon mi rmongs// lus las yi dril phyis bya sa na su// chu chen rnyog pa med par bzhugs nas
401b5(rgyud): kyang // ji tsam 'dong ba'i bar du khrus byas te// byung nas shar ram byang du kha bltas nas// chu yis lag pa rkang pa bkrus nasu// pus mo phyi rol du na
401b6(rgyud): bstan byas te// bar du lag bzhig tsog tsog par 'dug nas// sgra med dbu pa med pas nye reg bya// lan gsum bar du chu ni 'bungs nas kyang // mtshul lan gnyis
401b7(rgyud): yongasu phyi bar bya// so la chags pa lce yos reg pa dang // sbring pa byung na kha yang bkru bar bya// rab byung skyes pa bud med gzhon nu dang // gzhon nu ma dang bram ze rgan mo rnams
401b8(rgyud): de la rnams kyang sngags pas rag mi bya// sngags pas de dag rnams la mi bas mo// brgya la de dag rnams kyis reg gyur tam// sgrub pos de dag rnams la reg gyuran/ 
402a1(rgyud): slar yang khrus dang 'thong mthung byas nasu// de nas phyir yang bzlas pa 'jug par bya// gtsang sbra la dang zlos dga'i snying rje can// rtag tu len pa las ni log
402a2(rgyud): ba dang // slongs mo'i zas za lha ma zas la brtson// de yi lus la gsang sngags 'jug par 'gyur// 'ga' yis bud med gos dang nor rnams dang // bzhon pa rgyun dang byug pa ba
402a3(rgyud): btung dang // mal stan rnams ni mang nyung byin gyur na// de la sgrub la gnas pas mi blang ngo // sa pung bshang sgor lnga ste mtshan ma gsum// g.yon la gsum ste lag pa gnyis
402a4(rgyud): la bdun// yang nas dang chu yis ji srid du// dri mi dri dra la nga srid bar du bya// sos ki'i nags me mched pa'i mo lte yis// ma bsgrims bzhin du tshang tshing kun sreg ltar
402a5(rgyud): bzlas brjod me la tshul khrims rlung gis sbar/ brtson 'grus chen po'i me lces sdig bsreg/ ji ltar gas la nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// gdungs na gzi brjid ma
402a6(rgyud): bzod 'ju ba bzhin// tshul khrims nyi mi'i 'od zer gzi brjid kyis// gdungs na sdig pa'i gangs kyang zad par 'gyur// mun nag smag la mar me phyung ba yis// mun nag
402a7(rgyud): ma lus sel bar byed pa ltar// tshe rabs stong nas gnas pa'i sdig pa'i mun// bzlas brjod mar mes myur du sel bar byengad // ji ste sbyin sreg dang ni bzlas brjod kyis// gas
402a8(rgyud): sngags bsgrubs kyang dngos grub ma bob na// 'jim pa las ni mchod rten 'bum gdab pa 'am/ yang na chu 'gram bye ma dag la gdab// des ni de yi sdig pa srid gzhan la/ 
402b1(rgyud): byas pa gang yin de ni zad 'gyur na// des na gsang sngags mthu yis 'di nyid du// mthong ba'i chos la bsod nams 'bra sdu thob// sngags kyi rtsa ba dang po tshul khrims te// 
402b2(rgyud): de nas brtson 'grus dang ni bzad pa dang // rgyal ba la ni nang dang byang chub sems// gsang sngags dang ni le lo med pa'o// de ltar mi dbang yan lag bdun ldan pa// spro ba med pa
402b3(rgyud): skye dgu 'dul bar byed// de bzhin sngags pas yan lag 'di bdun dang // ldan par gyur na sdig pa 'dul bar byed// dang por bzlas brjod phal cher byas nas// de yi 'og tu 'dir
402b4(rgyud): ni sbyin bsreg bya// sbyin sreg dag gis gsang sngags mchog myur stsol// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dod pa'ang sbyin par ma dzad// gang gis dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol nas/ ga
402b5(rgyud): sngags mthu yis bud med bkug kyang ni// bud med ma yin gnod sbyin bu mo ste// de gzugs cha byad kyis ni bsnga gas pa bsten// 'dod pa'i don phyir bsgrubs pa gang
402b6(rgyud): yin te// grub na'ang gnod sbyin bu mo sbyin par byed// da ni bud med de yi lusu yang // sprul nas mtshon mo 'dod pa bstan par byed// ji ltar mi dag 'dod phyir bud med la/ 
402b7(rgyud): sten pa'i mi ni nor ni zad 'gyur ltar// de bzhini gnod sbyin mo 'am bran mo dag/ gsang sngags mthus bkug sten par byed pa'o// gzhan gyis chung mar yid la bzhag nas su// 
402b8(rgyud): gang zhig de la 'dod gdungs ston bang pa// mi shes yod kyis gzhan gyi chung ma la// 'dod pa spyad pas sdig pa mang du bog// rgyal ba la dang gzhan la phan brtson pa'i/ lha lu lba/ 
403a1(rgyud): min gnod sbyin dri za dang // grub par bcas pa'i sngags bshad gang yin pa// de dag rgyal ba'i nyan pos rang sangs rgyas// de bzhin gshegs
403a2(rgyud): dang byang chub senga' yis// ma 'ongs sems can mgon skyabs med rnams la// rab tu gzigs nas byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad// de dag 'bra spu rab dang 'bring dang ni// ba ma
403a3(rgyud): phye ba rnam pa gsum du bstan// mkha' la 'gro dang dpal gyi phug tu 'jug/ 'dod dgu'i gzugs can mi snang rnam pa dang // gnod sbyin mo yi khyo dang bcud kyis len// 
403a4(rgyud): mig 'phrul sgyu mchen mo rgyu ba ste// de dag mchog yin 'bri nga ni sa bdag/ grong dang nor dang dbye ba dang dgug pa dang // dgar dang bskrad pa dang ni bsad pa dang // kA yi gdon
403a5(rgyud): gyis zin pa gso ba dang // gang yang 'di lta bu dang 'thun pa 'i las// de ni mkhas pas phran tshegs yin par bstan bye brag du ni k+Sha dang gdod sbyin dang // byis pa
403a6(rgyud): gdon gyis zin dang gang ngag tu// lus can rnams la ngo mtshar sna tshogs dag/ ston par byed pa phra mo bran tshegs yin// bya ba dang khu tshur thal lcug skra drang dang // rna bar bzlas
403a7(rgyud): dang dbang dang bslad pa dang // bsang dang bcing la sogs pas tshar bcad dang // bong dang rig pa'i gos dang sngags goso dang // rdog pas bsdur dang rnar bskyod pa dang / 
403a8(rgyud): mig tu drug song ltar mi gzhug pa dang / khab kyis gzugs dang kha bcing smug tu zhug/ phu zhes bung dang yan lag gzhig pa dang // brang gis 'gro ba dag dang dgug pa
403b1(rgyud): phyir yang bcing dang mnan par bya ba dang // rmongs par bya dang dug zar gzhug pa dang // dug ni gzhan la spro bar bya ba dang // lcags kyur ldan pas drang bar bya ba 'am// lus la
403b2(rgyud): zhon pa'i dug ni bslang ba 'am// zos par bza' dang zos pa bcad pa dang // sa bicang ba dang po nya btang ba dang // bskrad pa dang ri kA la bsten pa dang // dung dang rdza nga'i spras ni bska
403b3(rgyud): ba ste// rnam pa'i dge dug gi rgyu dang bshad// sa ye steng gi sbrul ni brgyad cu dag/ gzhan la gnod par byed cing rnam par 'khyam// de dag rnams ni nyi shu gdengs gcan
403b4(rgyud): 'khyil ba drug dang dud med bcu gnyis dang // de bzhin sbrul ni khro bo bcu gsum ste// sum cu gang yin rigs de'i nang du gtogs// sbal pa'i mgo dang sdig pa kha
403b5(rgyud): brgyad dang // rnam par dbye na rab tu mang po yod// gcig rngu ga kha chu reg dang mthong ba dang // mche ba btsugs pa las ni dug kyang gtong // de la dug ni rgyud lam
403b6(rgyud): pa yis// rab 'bring ba ma rnam pa gsum du dbye// dug mdo khro bo'i dbang sgyur skrag pa dang // de bzhin sngags pa 'am bkres pa'i zas phyir ram// kha kho na yod pa 'am gshin rjes
403b7(rgyud): bstan pa 'am// lus la brdzes na de dag za bar byed// zos pa de yang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te// mche bas 'dzin dang sos bcad gtad pa'o// gang du mche ba gcig gos traH
403b8(rgyud): phyung ste// / da ni dug chung bas ni 'dzin par bshad// gang du mche ba gnyis kyis btab na su// khrag dag byung bar gyur pa zos pa'o// gal te mche ba gsum gyis sha bcad
404a1(rgyud): na// dri ni bcad par gyur pa yin zhes bstan// gang du mche ba bzhi yis btab nas// sbrul gyi lus ni bzlog par gyur pa de// btang nas zos
404a2(rgyud): pa yin zhes bshad pa ste// de ni sman rnams kyis kyang bzlog par dka'// mi yi rang bzhin gnad rnams bral ba'i duH// mtshon dang me dang gzi brjid mtshungs pa dag/ 
404a3(rgyud): ltar sngags kyis rab tu zhi 'gyur ba// de ltar sman pas sbyor bar mi nuso// ji ltar me dpung chen pos bud shing la/ nges par sreg la char ba skad cig gis// zhi bar
404a4(rgyud): gyur pa de bzhin dgu dag gis// ma dpung lta bu'ang sngags kyis zhi bar byed// dug gis mthu stobs shes nas rab bsgrims te// gsang sngags cho ga ji bzhin
404a5(rgyud): bzlas nas ni// ba lang khyun seng ge ji lta ra bar// dug can sbrul dang ngag med lhan cig rtse// lha klu lha min gnod sbyin grub pa dang // dri za 'byung pos mnu
404a6(rgyud): dang gsang ba pa// yi rags sha za dag dang lu sa srul po// smyo byed dag dang 'phrog ma grib gnon dag/ sa yi steng na gdon ni sna tshogs pa// mi yi sha tshil za zhing khrag
404a7(rgyud): kyang 'thung // mi ngan 'dod gdungs khro bas nyam thag pa'i// glags skabs rnyed nas lus la 'jug par byed// de dag rnams kyis zin pa'i mi 'phyan cing // glu len ga
404a8(rgyud): byed dgod cing khro ba dag dga' zhing rngam pa che la smra 'dod pa/ spod pa sna tshogs byed cing lha rnams dang // lha maun ltar bcos skye bo bzhang gang byed// gtor ma 'dod pa 'am/ 
404b1(rgyud): rtse mo byod 'dod pas// bsad pa'i don tu lus la 'bab cing 'jug/ gsang ba pa rnams gzhig phyir rigs kyi mchog/ mthu can mchog sbyin rdo rje lcags kyu 'am// gzha
404b2(rgyud): yang nga yi rigs las byung rig pa 'am// khro bo bdud rtsi zab sbyor sogs pas gso// ji lhor gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i mi dag la// gdon rnams 'jigs par gyur
404b3(rgyud): bde ltar min// mi min rlung mim grong khyer sum rtsegs dang // 'joms byed gzi chen nyi ma mes po dang // chu bdag ma yin lha min rnams kyis min// nor bdag ma yin
404b4(rgyud): gnod sprin rgyal pos min// lhag ma mkha' lding bya'i rgyal po dang // sa bsrungs bu zhon khyer 'jigs rnams kyi min// 'byung po'i rig sngags 'dir ni kun mthong
404b5(rgyud): dang // gdon gyi spyod pa ma lus shes nas// / phyi nas gdon rnams ngogs meng dul na ni// gdon gyi sa mi 'jigs sngar yang tshugs mi 'gyur// rig gsum
404b6(rgyud): 'phel dang sring gsum mthar byin dang // nyes pa gsum spangs lam gsum thugasu chud// de yi sras dang de'i lam rjes 'gro ba'i// lnga dang lha mni sogs pas
404b7(rgyud): bshad pa'i sngags// bdag nyid chen po mun pa sel ba yi// gsang sngags kyis ni byin gyis brlabs de la// 'jig rten lha tshogs rnams kyis bsngags pa yi// gas
404b8(rgyud): sngags mthu yis de yi bskyong du med// rdo rje 'chang gi gsungs thos lha de rnams// tshangs sogs lha min gnod sbyin grub pa dang // rig 'dzin klu dang gnod sbyin driH/ 
405a1(rgyud): dang // gsang ba pa dang mtshun dang 'byung po rnams// dang pas zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshig gsol pa// kye ma srog
405a2(rgyud): chags rnams la thugs rjer ldan// kye ma'o khyod kyi spyod pa sna tshogs pas// kha cig gis rdo rdo rje 'bor bar mthong // gzhan gyis dbyug thogazhan gyis 'khor lo can// de
405a3(rgyud): bzhin gzhan gyis rtse gsum zhags pa can// gzhan gyis ral gri gzhu dang be con dang // 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mtshon cha kun thogs dang // gzhan dag gis ni zhi ba nyi
405a4(rgyud): mthong // du mi'i sku mnga' dmigs med sku mnga' bar// lha dang gnod sbyin gyis mchod de la 'dung // lha mi lha yis zhabs la phyag bgyis pa// byang chub sede'i mchog la
405a5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal 'dud// rig pa'i dbang phyug gzhu ga 'gengs khyod la 'dud// khyod la bdag cag thang phya ga 'tshal 'dud// khyod la bdag cag dang nas
405a6(rgyud): skyabasu mchi// khyod kyis ji skad gsungs pa de bzhin du// mi yis logs par spyad bar bgyes nas ni// de dag myur du dbul ba'i mun gsal nas// nyi ma bzhin du shin tu
405a7(rgyud): rab 'bar 'gyur// yan lag mi nyams sems kyang mi nyams shing // nang dang sdug bsngal lus nyams mi 'gyur ba// khyod la dad pa'i mos ni thob par 'gyur// de skad kun
405a8(rgyud): gyis tshig tu smras nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin la yang yang phyag 'tshal te// gzhal mang khang du mngon par zhugs nas kyang // ji ltar 'ongs pa'i na mkha'i lam nas dong // lha rnams
405b1(rgyud): / dong nas phyag na rdo rje yis// dpung bzang la ni tshig tu yang gsungs pa// lha rnams kun gyis mdo 'di shes zin gyis// khyod kyis 'jig rten 'dir ni grags par gyis// de skad
405b2(rgyud): gsungs nas dpung bzang de yis ni// langs te gus par rab tu phyag 'tshal nas// gcang byed sdig 'joms dpal yon tan ldan pa'ang // mi yi 'jig rten 'dir ni bsgrags
405b3(rgyud): bar bgyi// 'phags pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i le'u bsu gcig pa'o// // 'phagos pa dpung bzang gis zhus pa'i rgyud rdzogs// rgya gar skud du// AH
405b4(rgyud): hA pa ri Na ta rA dza sa man+ta ka/ bod skad du// 'pha gas pa yongasu bsngo ba'i rgyal po chen po sngags dang bcas pa// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sed tha~Mng lu phyuH
405b5(rgyud): 'chi lo// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa// sangs rgyas dam chos 'phags pa yi// dge 'dun dus gsum bzhugs pa rnams// ma lus pa la skyabs mchi
405b6(rgyud): mi dge bde bshegs par gyi// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bar// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bskul ma 'tshal// kun mkhyen spyan gyis
405b7(rgyud): gzigs pa yi// bdag dge chung yang gang mchis pa// nges ni gtan du dral ba dag/ bde nye bar zhi 'gyur cig/ rnam pa kun mchog ldan pa yis// stong po shes pa'i
405b8(rgyud): 'jim// byang chub par gyi tshe rab // rtag tu bde dang ldan par shog/ rngar mi rtog lhun gyis grub// rtag tu mnyam par bzhag gyur cig/ zla nyi nor bu rol mo ltar// ser da
406a1(rgyud): la 'jug par shog/ ji ltar rgyal ba mkhas pa rnams// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs bsngo// de ltar bdag gi dkar po rnams// byang chub du ni bsngo ba
406a2(rgyud): bgyi// dkon mchog sum la dmigs pa yis// bdag gis lus ngag yid dge dang // sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab las byung ga
406a3(rgyud): de dag kun gyis bdag nyid ri// tshangs par spyod pa ldan pa dang // 'jig rten mgon gyi bston pa la// rang 'byung mngon dga' dbang ldan zhing // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung rab
406a4(rgyud): kyi// gzhung don tshig la mkhas gyur nas// ngam/ chos yongasu 'dzin pa dang // lus dang srog la dga' med shog/ bdag ni 'gum pa'i dus pi gyad che// byin
406a5(rgyud): ci ma log yid kyis// sangs rgyas tshe dpag med mthong nas// 'di nas bde ba can du 'chi// bdud kyi spyod yul mngon gyur che// drang srong chen po che dpag
406a6(rgyud): med// rtag tu ston par mdzad gyur cing // sa bcu thob nas de dag gi/ rnam par dag pa'i rim pa yis// byang chub dam pa thob par shog/ sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po nyid
406a7(rgyud): nas// bag chags bcas pa nyes bsags rtswa nas bto// yaMs sgrims med snying rjer ldan na su// 'gro ba rnams la sman dang bde ba bgyi// phyogs bcu'i mtha' yas pa na
406a8(rgyud): shes bya'i ngor// ma lus par khyab pa'i blo mnga' ba// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang // byang chub seda'i rgya mtsho sbed la phyag 'tshalo// sems kyi rnyog ma yid
406b1(rgyud): gnyis bsal nas dang por ni shAkya'i rgyal po thub la spyi bos phyag 'tshalo// bde ba can bzhugs pa'i rgyal po 'od dpag med// bla ma la yang dga' dang gus pas gdung ba
406b2(rgyud): bgyi// gang zhig phyogs kun dag na da ltar dbyung ba yi// 'gro la byams pa'i sangs rgyas nges par bzhugs rnams dang // 'das dang byis 'byung ba'i rgyal ba 'ang la// bdag
406b3(rgyud): ni dga' ba'i yid kyis yang dag mchod pa bgyi// 'di lta ste// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla sgron ma dang // sku mdog gser 'ong dang // bden pa'i dbyangs dang // 
406b4(rgyud): lhun po bzang dang / lhun po chen po dang // dbang po'i la zung gnas/ pad+ma dbyangs dang / phyag bzang dang / 'od kyi rtog dang // mchog gis 'byung gnas dang // rin chen zla 'ang
406b5(rgyud): dang / dpa' bo'i sde dang / kun ras snang ba dang // ma dag zhal dang / rin chan tog dang / mdog bzang 'byung gnas dang / sA la'i rgyal po dang / rnam dga'
406b6(rgyud): dang / bde mdzad rgyal po dang / kun nas snang ba dang // lhun po bzang po gsal ba dang / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang // dkon mchog brtsegs dang / kun nas 'od dang / dpa'
406b7(rgyud): brtsegs dang / bkod pa chen po dang / spangs gsal bai DUR+Ya dang / bang po'i rgyal mtshan dang / thob pa'i sde dang / rab tu ldan dang / 'od mdzes dang / me tog tshems dang
406b8(rgyud): spar bzang dang / shin tu bzang po dang / 'od bzang sgron pa dang / dgongs pa rnab dag dang / chos kyi 'od zer dang / brtson 'grus che ldan dang / pad+ma'i snying po dang / lhag par
407a1(rgyud): pa brtan dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / legs par 'khrungs dang / tshul bzang dang / dbyangs snyan dang / yon tan dpal 'od dang / 'jig rten tog dang / mdog bzang gsal
407a2(rgyud): ba dang / rtag tu brtson dang / tsan dan zla 'od dang / rgyas pa'i dpal dang / rgya mtsho dang dbang po chen po dang / rgyal ba'i dbang po dang / 'od dkod pa dang / brtson 'grus sbyangs pa dang / ku
407a3(rgyud): tu smon mngang / gsung ba chen po dang / rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'joms pa dang / drang srong lha dang / me 'ong dang / yid du 'ong ba dang / rnam 'jom dang / tog chen po dang / shin tu 'a

412b8(rgyud): bsrung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi sems ma bsgreng ba rnams dang / mngon par dad pa rnams dang / theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa rnams dang / sems dang po bskyed pa rnams

413a3(rgyud): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / de las gzhan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la brtson pa de dag la/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nyes lnga

413a5(rgyud): rnams dang / 'phags pa rgyun tu zhugs pa rnam sa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba rnam sa dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / phyi rol gyi mngon par she
413a6(rgyud): balnga thob pa rnams dang / de las gzhan pa 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams dang / drang srong rnams dang / de las gzhan pa 'am/ yang dag pa 'am/ lam log par la zhugs pa nas de
413a7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang ldan pa'i 'ad bar rnams dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi khongasu gtogs pa de rnams la lus dang / ngag dang / yid rnams pa bcus nyes par spyad pa
413a8(rgyud): bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgyid pa la rje su yi rang bar gyur pa de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'dus pa/ sa chen por chud pa ye shes chen po brnyes pa/ 
413b1(rgyud): / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub senga' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang bcas pa de rnams kyi spya
413b2(rgyud): sngar nongs pa nongs par mtho lo gsheg so// rnarang gzhi go// rab tu gzho mo// slong ngo // byos pa lhun po lta ba log par zhugs pa/ 'khor bar byung ba'i nongs pa nongs par gzung dugs
413b3(rgyud): zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ pra b+he pra b+ha A ka raM/ pra b+ha ba ti/ d+harma bi shung d+ho/ karma bi shud+d+hi r+N+Na ba tu ma swA hA/ sangs dang / byang chub senge'i de dag bdag la
413b4(rgyud): dgongasu gsol// gang bdag gis tshe 'di'am/ sme ba gzhan du skye ba brgya 'am/ skye ba stong ngam/ skye ba khri 'am/ smra ba pog ma dang tha ma med pa ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na
413b5(rgyud): 'khor ba'i tshe/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma rung bar bgyis pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spangs pa 'am/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / 
413b6(rgyud): bgying ba la rjesu yi rang bar gyur pa dang / chamatshas ma lags par bstan pa dang / chos ma lags pa chosu bstan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems btang ba dang / dge ba'i bshes
413b7(rgyud): gnyen ma rung bar bgyis pa nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gan su gtogs pa'i bar gyi sems pang gcig tsam yang 'gal bar bgyis pa dang / bgyid du stsal ba dang / bgying pa la rdza
413b8(rgyud): yi rang bar gyur pa dang / sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas/ sa'i rgyu mi 'byung ba dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu dang / gzungs kyi rgyu dang / mngon par shes pa'i rgyu dang / so so yang
414a1(rgyud): par rig pa'i rgyu dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rgyu dang / dbang gi rgyu dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu dang / de la bzhan pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos nas/ snang ba
414a2(rgyud): bar gyi rgyu mi 'byung ba'i las kyi sgrib pa dang / rngar smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs po'i sgrib pa de dag ba phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu 'dus
414a3(rgyud): pa/ sa chen por chung ba// ye shes chen po brnyes pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ byams pa dang ldan pa/ phan par bzhed pa/ thugs brtse ba can/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

414a7(rgyud): dang / sgra 'byin dang / chos kyi 'khor lo thogs pa med par bskor ba dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sgrib pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba

425b4(rgyud): gzung ba med pa gang lags pa de dag bdag dang sen thams cad thun mongs du bgyis nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham sa kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs

425b6(rgyud): bgyi'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba des sems can thaM la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid mngon du gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs
425b7(rgyud): zab mo sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// tad thA/ bi pu la swa re/ bi pu la yo ni she/ a na lA se/ saM b+ha be/ a na la sa ga ting ga te swA hA/ bdag nyin mo dang / mtshan ma
425b8(rgyud): gnyid log pa dang / sad pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / langs pa nas/ dbang po 'gag pa'i bar du yang lus bstan pa/ lung ma bstan pa/ lus dang ngag dang /

426a2(rgyud): chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba gang la gos pa de dag bde sems can thams cad dang thun mong du bgyis nas/ gnyisu med pa'i tshul gyis/ bla na med pa
426a3(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar bgyi ste/ ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems
426a4(rgyud): de rnams kyis yongasu bsngos pa/ de bzhin du ba dag gis kyang yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun po rnams la phyag 'tshal// rnam pa

426b1(rgyud): du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / sa chos kyi sprin la dgod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin dang / de bzhin du brtan par gnas pa'i thabs la
426b2(rgyud): mngon par brtson pa dang / sngon du 'gro ba yongasu bsags pa'i ting 'dzin dang / nges par 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin dang / kun nas gsal ba'i ting 'dzin dang / kun tu sdang ba'i ting 'dzin dang / 
426b3(rgyud): rin chen tog gi ting 'dzin dang / rin chen zla ba'i ting 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i tog gi ting 'dzin dang / snying rdza bsags pa'i ting 'dzin dang / bde kyi tshig tu dge pa bstan pa shes pa la
426b4(rgyud): mkhas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dgong par bgyi'o// de bzhin du rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya mi zad par sgrub pa'i gzungs dang / de bzhin du sen gyi spyod pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang / nyi mi/

426b6(rgyud): snying po bstan pas nyon mongs pa mtha' yas pa rnam par 'thor ba dang / brjod du med pa'i don smon pa dor dam par yang dag par 'du ba dang / ldem po'i tshig tu smra ba'i sgra 'jug pa dang /

430a8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen sbyin pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / ji ltar bcom

430b7(rgyud): 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'gyur zhing / chu zhing dpag tu med pa dang / yon gyi rgyun dpag tu med pa'i ming dang / sangs rgyas tha~Md kyi zhing bya

431a6(rgyud): par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa dung gis 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ shang+ga/ shod+l-i/ shad+Ya/ pAt+tA re swA hA/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi kham su 'dus pa'i yang
431a7(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub se de'i de rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dang / byang chub sa nga'i mdzad pa gang legs pa de dag bde ba gcig pu gnyisu ma mchis pa/

431b1(rgyud): pa dang / skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid mngon du mdzad cing / de las gzhan pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang mngon du mdzad nas/ bde bar bzhugs pa/ chags
431b2(rgyud): chung ngus bzhugasu gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa lhun po'i rtse mo'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// tang thA/ shi khaM/ shi kha/ shi khe/ kha b+had de swA hA/ de'i 'og tu ba ga tshogs / 
431b3(rgyud): tu bsags/ brnag pa yongasu rdzogs/ bsam pa yongasu rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bya ba yongasu rdzogs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mdzod par rdzogs par
431b4(rgyud): par gyur cig/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ngas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bgyi ba// de bzhin nyid kyi 'khor lo dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i 'khor lo dang rdza
431b5(rgyud): ba bzhin gyi 'khor lo dang / skye ba med pa dang // 'gag pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i 'khor lo dang / nges par lu
431b6(rgyud): ba'i 'khor lo dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang / na mkha' lta bu'i 'khor lo dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i 'khor dang / bag chags dang / mtshams
431b7(rgyud): spyong ba'i nyon mongs pa ba spangs pa'i 'khor lo dang / bdag dang/ rtag pa dang / chang pa dang / bdag dang / bang gir 'dzin pa nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub se de'i dang / yang dag
431b8(rgyud): por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu mngon par zhen pa'i bar mi dmigs pa'i 'khor lo dang / mngor na gang na 'khor lo med pa/ bskor ba med pa'i de lta bu'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur
432a1(rgyud): cig/ rab tu bskor nas sen rnamasu yongasu smin par gyur cig/ yongasu smin par bgyis nas seMn la sman pa'i slad pu son gyi khams dang / las kyi khams dang / nyon
432a2(rgyud): mongs pa'i khams dang / na mkha'i khams ni tsam pa de tsam du gnas par gyur cig/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la phyag 'tshalo// tad+ya thA/ man n+yA man n+ye/ sarba mar n+ya nA bA
432a3(rgyud): Na swA hA/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon+ta yongasu sbyong ba dang / de bzhin du sems can yongasu smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rab tu 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de bzhin
432a4(rgyud): ga sh+ye ba la mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / bsnyen pa kur bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / pha ma dang / bla ma dang / yon gnas dang / mkhan po dang / slob dpon dang / dman pa dang / bkren pa dang / sdug
432a5(rgyud): 'phongs pa las bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dam pa'i chos rnar 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / rje su yi ra dang / 'thol ba dang / bshags pa dang / ldan pa dang / phyag 'tshal
432a6(rgyud): dang mchod pa dang ldan pa dang / byis pa nas bzung nas da ltar ram/ skye ba bog ma dang / tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba nas 'khor ba'i skye ba gzhan dag bsags pa nas/ phung po lhag ma med dri
432a7(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha'i bar gang lags pa dag sen thade dang // phun mong du bgyes nas/ mchog dang / gtso dang / gya nom pa dang / ra ba dang / phul dang / bla na ma mchis pa dang / gong na ma mchis pa dang
432a8(rgyud): gong ming yang gong ma dang / mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang / minyam pa dang / mnyam pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnarare rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma mchis pa da
432b1(rgyud): yi ge ma mchis pa dang / nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / chags pa ma mchis pa dang / na mkha' ltar mnyam pa dang / lus dang / sems grol ba dang / rnam pa bad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid
432b2(rgyud): kyi yongasu bsngo bas yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / nga ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bac+doMs dang / byang chub seng rang rnams kyis gnyisu mang po'i chos nyid mtsha
432b3(rgyud): du mdzad nas/ yong su bsngos pa dang / yongasu bsngo bar 'gyur ba de ltar bang gis kyang yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// ji ltar chos nyid de dang / ji ltar de bzhin nyid de dang / ji ltar yang dag pa'i mtha'
432b4(rgyud): de dag dang / ji ltar chos nyid kyi dbyings de dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid de dang / ji ltar rnam pa thang mkhyen pa nyid de nas// ji lta ra de kho na nyid mtho bri'i bar gang la gnyis med cing // gnyis ma
432b5(rgyud): yin pa med pa de ltar yongasu bsngo bar bgyi'o// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub senga'atha~Md la phyag 'tsha lo// tad+yathAbud+d+he khA d+d+he/ sarba bud+d+ha/ bi Sha ya/ bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ 'phags pa
432b6(rgyud): yongasu bsngo ba'i rgyal po sngags nga bcas pa ji snyeng pa rdzogs// rgya gor gyi mkhan po'i d+ya kor pra b+ha dang / la ts+tsha ba ban+d+ha yaMs snying pos bsgyud / zhu chen gyi lo dub ban+de pal brtsegs
432b7(rgyud): kyis zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya san tri mA la ma hA tan+na bo ti satra ma hA ba no shU ya ning ngi shAng ma dA ma Ni rat+na ko'u shel l+ya ning de sha ma hA pa~M ri Na ma Na nA ma
432b8(rgyud): dzabod skad du// 'phags pa dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi phreng ba chen po byang chub se de'i rnam par nges pa chen po bstan pa las nong bu chen po rin po che la mkhas pa bstan pa yongasu bsngo ba chen
433a1(rgyud): rgyal po zhes bya ga/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sengar bde la phyag 'tshalo// de nas bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che rdo rje rin po che'i rtse mo la bzhugs nas byang chub
433a2(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye rgyal po'i sas 'di la byang chub la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub senge'i sad 'a chen po sems can bde kyi skyabs byed par 'dod pa/ 
433a3(rgyud): byang chub sa nga'i bslab pa'i sdom pa blangs pa/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ snying rje'i bdag nyid tsamo/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed 'dod pa/ byang chub sa
433a4(rgyud): chen po'i spyod pa'i tshogs nye bar sogs pa ra 'dod pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd kyi ye shes rab tu thob par 'dod pa/ sgrib pa meng po'i ting 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / 
433a5(rgyud): thar pa'i sgo rnams kyis rngar rtse bar 'dod pa namakha' mdzod nyid dang / lag na rin chen nyid thob par dong pas 'di ltar bsngo bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas bac+doMs
433a6(rgyud): dgas bcu la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub senga' rnams dang / rdo rje 'chang rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol/ bdag byang chub tu sems bskrad pa/ lam la rab tu gnas pa ming
433a7(rgyud): 'di zhes bgyi ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sanga' bad la dus pa du yong ya 'bul zhing mchis na de bzhin gshegs pa mnga' chen po can rnams
433a8(rgyud): dang byang chub sanga' sa de' chen pos chen po brnyes pa rnams kyis bzhes shing bdag la rtag tu bsod nams kyi stobs chen po dang ye shes kyis nye bar brtag pa dang / brtson
433b1(rgyud): 'grus dang / brtson pa'i bdag nyid dang / zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / nye bar zhi ba'i gnas dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yong su rdzogs par mdzad du gsol
433b2(rgyud): de'i 'og tu yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dag bdag la dgongasu gsol// bangag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba/ 'khor bar lhung ba/ mchi bas bcis
433b3(rgyud): pa/ brtson rang chung pa/ chos kyi lam ston pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dgu brdo bas mngon par gces pa/ mgon ma mchis pa/ skyabs ma mchis pa/ skyob pa ma mchis pa/ gnas ma
433b4(rgyud): mchis pa/ dpung gnyen ma mchis pa/ ston pa ma mchis pa/ lam grol bar zhugs pa/ 'khor ba la mngon du phyogs pa/ mya ngan las 'ongs pa la rgyab kyis bltas pa/ 
433b5(rgyud): ngan song la gzhol gangan song la 'bab pa/ mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs par lhung gangadang/ ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ sman pa la mi sman pa dang / 
433b6(rgyud): 'thun pa la mi 'thun pa dang / dge ba la mi dge bar bzung ba/ slob dpon ma mchis pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub seMnga' lta ba la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang
433b7(rgyud): na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan gyi 'tshe bas btses pa/ bde ba mthob pa/ mi skrag pa ma thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa ma thob pa/ rtag tu mnyam par ma gzhag pa/ zhi ba dang / dul ba dang / spyan pa
433b8(rgyud): dang / nges pa dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / bag yod pa dang bral ba/ ting 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / sa dang / bzod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gnas pa dang / bra
434a1(rgyud): sa byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms la gnas pa dang bral ba/ byang chub se de'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa rnams gsum la rgyab kyi phyogs
434a2(rgyud): pa/ sgrib pa meng pa'i ye shes chen po dang bral ba/ shin tu gnas pa'i chos kun tu 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid lo mi gnas pa/ mngon par shes pa dang bral ba/ stobs rnams ma thob
434a3(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa dang mi ldan zhing mi gnas pa/ mi brjed pa'i chos kyi rje su 'gro ba'i skabs dang mi ldan pa/ yon+ta gyis stong pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bduran gyis gos kyis ma
434a4(rgyud): g.yogs pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyis bgrod pa dang bral ba/ sdug bsngal brgya stong phrag du mas mngon par gces pa rtag tu gdugs pa/ rtag tu dman
434a5(rgyud): pa/ rtag tu rmongs pa/ rtag tu mnyam par ma gzhag pa/ rtag tu nyon mongs pa'i rje su zhugs pa lags na thugs rje chen pos dgongs te bang gi skyabs mdzad
434a6(rgyud): du gsol// bang gi dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol// bang gi byang chub chen po'i lam dang / byang chub kyi lam dang / byang chub kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ de bzhi
434a7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / ting 'dzin dang / rnam par grol ba dang / 
434a8(rgyud): gzungs rnams skyabs mdzad du gsol// bdag gi phun sum tshogs pa bde yongasu rdzogs par mdzad du gsol/ yon+ta tha yongasu rdzogs par mdzad du gsol// sang+yas bzhi
434b1(rgyud): ngang mthu chen po mnyes pa'i byang chub sengar rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol// bdag gis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sede 'thang la mchod pa dang / bkur sti chen po bgyis nas
434b2(rgyud): bdag 'bu'o// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkod pa chen po rnams kun tu gnas pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi rin po che'i gzhal med khang rnams dang / rin
434b3(rgyud): shing ljon pa rnams dang / rin po che'i ri rnams dang / rin po che'i gdan rnams dang / rin po che'i lan kan rnams dang / rin po che'i phreng ba rnams dang / rin po che'i gdugs rnams
434b4(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan rnams dang / rin po che'i chun po rnams dang / rin po che'i mu tig gi dra ba rnams dang / rin po che'i sdong rnams dang / rin po che'i phreng ba rnams
434b5(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i 'bar ba'i tshogs rnams dang / rin brgya gling brgya dang / nor bu chen po rnams dang mar me'i sdong bu gtsang ba/ nor bu dang / ring po che sna tshogs
434b6(rgyud): kyis spras pas 'chang ba/ gser gyi cong tsong mang pos btags pa rnams dang / pad+ma 'jam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi ge ser chen po can rnams dang / gsar gyi phreng ba rnams dang / 
434b7(rgyud): gser gyi gzhal med khang rnams dang / ring po che'i sprin rnams dang / ring po che'i 'bru'i char rnams dang / rin po che'i snying po can gyi khang bzang rtsig pa nor bu rab mchog snga
434b8(rgyud): tshogs kyi spras pa/ rin po che'i lan kan can rnams dang / rig sngags 'chang chen po'i bskyeng mos tshal nyams dga' ba rnams dang / gnas nyams dga' ba rnams da / 
435a1(rgyud): gzhal med khang nyams dga' ba rnams dang / bskyud mos tshal nyams dga' ba rnams dang / lha'i nye bar spyad pa nyams dga' ba yongasu ma spyang ba ji snyed mchis
435a2(rgyud): pa nga ngag thang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' tha~Md la dbu lo// gang dag 'jam+bu'i gling na mchis pa'i sman rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams dang / bcud kyis len gyi rigs
435a3(rgyud): dang / gang dag dus thad pa'i nor bu dang / gang dag zhal zas ro zhim po phun sum tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa rnams dang / gang dag dri bda' bo'i ljon shing rnams dang / 
435a4(rgyud): tsan+da gyi ljon shing rnam pa sna tshogs dus/ kyi rjesu 'brang ba dang / tsan+da dmar po rnams dang / rtag tu me tog dang ldan pa'i nags tshal chen po rnams dang / spos kyi ngang
435a5(rgyud): rgyas pa yod du mchi ba'i dri bda' ba'i ljon shing go rigs rnams dang / gang dag dpag bsam gyi na/ nga bdag gi ma mchis shing / yongasu 'dzin pa ma mchis pa
435a6(rgyud): rnams dang / gang dag rgya mtsho'i nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu rnams dang / gang dag ri lhun po dang / ti sa dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang ma la ya dang / 'a
435a7(rgyud): byed dang man dar dang / rdo rje'i ri la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi zom rnams la rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa rtsog ma rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi phug rdzas
435a8(rgyud): dad rin po che sna tshogs kyi brag rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi sa gzhi brtan pa rnams dang / ring po che sna tshogs kyi gzhal mang khang rnams dang / rin po sna tshogs
435b1(rgyud): kyi phung po rnams dang / ring po che sna tshogs kyi bem skas rnams dang / nor bu ring po cher sna tshogs kyi ka ba rnams dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa'i char rnams dang / 
435b2(rgyud): bu bai DUr+ya sna tshogs kyi smon ma rnams dang / gang dag lnga yul gyi gzhal mang khang blta na sdug pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi lha'i grong khyer gyi gzhal med khang yo
435b3(rgyud): bzung ba ma mchis pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi me tog blta na sdug pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi glu dbyangs kyi cha byad rnams dang / gzhal med khang stong pa
435b4(rgyud): rnams kyi char rlung gis bskyod pa na sgra snyan pa 'byin pa rnams dang / rol mo'i cha byad kyi rnar ma dkrol bar rang sgra spen pa 'byin pa rnams dang / gang dag lha yul gyi bya'i
435b5(rgyud): tshogs gzhal mang khang stong po rnams nag nas shing skad snyan pa 'byin pa rnams dang / gang dag rin po cha'i sprir sgra dbyangs chen po snyan par 'byin pa rnams dpa
435b6(rgyud): ngag lha'i nor bu rnams dang / gang dag klu dbyangs rnams dang / gang dag dri bde'i ba'am tog gi ljon shing rnams dang / phreng ba'i ljon shing rnams dang / spos kyi ljod shing rnams dang
435b7(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi ljon shing rnams dang / kha doran gyi ljon shing rnams dang / rin po che'i ljon shing yongasu longs ma spyad pa de dag thang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sedang tha~Mng la dbu ma
435b8(rgyud): gang dag sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ba ra mchod pa chen po'i sprin me tog sprin rnams dang / dri'i sprin rnams dang / phreng ba'i sprin rnams dpa
436a1(rgyud): bdug pa'i sprin rnams dang / lngab lhub kyi sprin rnams dang / byug pa'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin rna
436a2(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i gos gyi sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i ljon shing gi sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i bkang ba'i snod rnams dang / rin po che'i nor bu chen
436a3(rgyud): po spungs pa'i sprin rnams dang / rin po che'i rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sprin rnams dang / mar me'i snod stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshad tsam la dri zhim po'i 'bru mar gyis yongasu bkang zhi
436a4(rgyud): snying po'i ras ri reb brgya'i tshad tsam rab tu 'bar bi rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thade dang / byang chub se mas dpa' tha~Md la dbulo// de dag thams cad la gsol ba ni/ 
436a5(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / 'dud 'dul ba dang / mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams la
436a6(rgyud): seMn rnams kyis don du bskal pa mang por bzhugs par gsolo// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mi dmigs par bzhugs te bsngos pa ltar bdag gis bsod nams
436a7(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd dang / byang chub senga' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams la
436a8(rgyud): rjesu yi ngo // sdig pa bde kyang so sor bshagaso// oM smar sma ra/ bi mA na skad ma hA dza ba hUM// / de'i 'og tu ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin lha rdzas kyi mchod pa chen po'i sprin rnams de bzhin
436b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thad kyi spyan sngar 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig sangs rgyas dmigs pa yid la byed pas yongasu bsngo ba chen po'i 'khol 'da'
436b2(rgyud): par ram mtshan mo'i 'don pa de'i sdig pa rnams yongasu zad par 'gyur zhing nyon mongs pa bad kyang bsrabs par 'gyur ro// gong dri smos pa'i yon+ta rnams kyang 'thob par 'gyur
436b3(rgyud): lan cig bzlas brjod byas na/ tshangs pa brgya'i bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro// rmi lam na yang rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyuraro// rig sngags
436b4(rgyud): rnams kyang yang dag por grub par 'gyuraro// rdo rje 'chang gis yongasu bzung bar yang 'gyur ro// ji ltar 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnamasu yang skye bar 'gyuraro// 'phags pa
436b5(rgyud): dgongs pa'i rgyud kyi phreng ba chen po byang chub se de'i rje nges pa chen por bstan pa las nor bu chen po rin bo che la mkhas pa bstan pa yongasu bsde ba chen po'i rgyal
436b6(rgyud): rdzogaso// // kha che'i mkhan po d+harmA kar dang / lo tsA ba ban+d+ha dpal 'byor gyis bsgyur ba las rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi d+ye ka ra pra b+ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+ha dpal ba phyags
436b7(rgyud): gyis lus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pa ri ta ha tsa kr-i na ma hA yA na sU tre/ 'phags pa yongasu bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgya
436b8(rgyud): nga byang chub senga' thams cad la phyag 'tsha lo// 'di skad bdag gis bos pa dus gcig ni// bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che rdo rje ri'i zom la/ byang chub senga' senga' chen po
437a1(rgyud): 'khor mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub seng rdo rje rin po che la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang byang chub sa
437a2(rgyud): chen po dan du gnyer bar 'dod pa dang / sems can bde sgrol bar 'dod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa 'dzin par 'dod pa dang / byang chub chen por sems bskyod cing / snying
437a3(rgyud): rje chen po dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rim gro dang / bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs shing rgya
437a4(rgyud): che ba sogs par 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes smrab par 'dod pa dang / khogs pa med pa'i gzungs dang / ting 'dzin dang / rnare thar pa'i sgo dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mngon pa
437a5(rgyud): shes pas rnar rol par 'dod pa dang / namakha' la dbang dang / mdzod chen po sgrub par 'dod pa dang / rang gi lag nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du gtong zhing 'a
437a6(rgyud): bar 'dod pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thang dang / sa bskul rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub seda' seMnga' chen po rnas
437a7(rgyud): dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yang dag pa'i lam la bde bar gnas pa thob pas/ dang byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bdag gi lus dang
437a8(rgyud): sems 'di dus thaMd dang / rnam pa thams cad du// dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag lus 'bul gyi// mthu chen po mnga' ni
437b1(rgyud): / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / sa chen po la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag bzhesu gsol// bdag gi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi chog
437b2(rgyud): chen po dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang / sems kyi rgyu bskyed pa dang / rab tu zhi zhing dul ba dang / dbang dang / mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa myur du
437b3(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ yang bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa rnams bdag la dgongasu gsol/ bdag ming zhes bgyi ba 'khor ba na 'khor zhing bcis
437b4(rgyud): chen pos bcings par gyur pa// gcon ra na gnas pa yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba/ nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i dbang du gyur pa/ mgon med pa/ skyabs med/ mig med pa/ 
437b5(rgyud): rten med pa/ gtso bo med pa/ 'dren pa med par gyur ba/ lam gol bar song ba/ 'khor ba la gzhol ba/ mya ngan las las pa chen po la rgyab kyi phyogs pa/ ngan 'gro la
437b6(rgyud): phyogs pa/ lam ngan pa la bsnyen pa/ lam ngan par lhung bar gyur pa/ rtag tu bshes gnyen ngan pas zin cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba/ yang dag pa'i lam yin
437b7(rgyud): pa dang / phan par gyur pa dang / phan pa med pa dang / don yod pa dang / don med pa la rmongs par gyur pa/ dge ba'i chos dang bral zhing mi dge ba chen po bsgrubs pa/ sangs rgyas dang
437b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bde dang / 'phags pa rnams la rtag tu rgya byas kyis phyogs pa/ skye rgan 'chi'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing mi bde ba chen po bsgribs pa/ 'jigs pa med
438a1(rgyud): med pa/ bag tsha ba med pa/ sems rtag tu g.yengs par gyur pa/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / zhi zhing dben par bsgrubs pa dang / bag med pa dang bral bar gyur pa
438a2(rgyud): gzungs dang / ting 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sa bcu'i chos kyi bzod pa la bde bar gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo dang mnyam pa nyid las ring du gyur pa byams pa
438a3(rgyud): snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms tshad med pa bzhi ma sgrub pa dang / byang chub se nga'i lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan par gyur pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / thogs ma med pa
438a4(rgyud): ye shes chen po las ring du gyur pa dang / mya ngar las 'das pa'i rgyu dag ba'i chos sgrub pa la bde bar gnas pa ma bab pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa
438a5(rgyud): bar gyur pa dang / yang dag pa'i drang pa la mig ras pa dang / bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid la spyod ci nga gzhol bar 'jug pa mi sgrub pa dang / bsod nams byed pa la
438a6(rgyud): g.yol zhing lta ba snyems pa dang / ba tshom gyi sgrib pas byang chub kyi yan lag bdun mngon par mi rtogs pa dang / de bzhin du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi sgrub pa
438a7(rgyud): dang / nyon mongs pa brgya stong chad med pas zil gyis non cing sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos sdug bsngal zhing yongasu mnar te/ rtag tu gdung ba/ bsam pa zhan pas khro zhing
438a8(rgyud): g.yang ba/ nyon mongs pa brgya stong la rgyun tu gzhol bar gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub se de thugs rje chen po la gnas pa rnams kyis/ bdagi skyabs mdzad
438b1(rgyud): par gsol// bdag gi rten mdzad par gsol/ bdag gi 'dren pa mdzad par gsol/ bdag myur du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lam dang / byang chub songa' chen po'i lam
438b2(rgyud): dang / byang chub sede' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs sogs pa yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ bdag myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma
438b3(rgyud): 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / rnam par grol ba'i yon tan dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / 
438b4(rgyud): mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par gyur cig/ yang bdag bsod nams phu sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ldan par gyur cig/ mchod
438b5(rgyud): pargya chen po byang ba'i dus yang 'di skad du ba rjod par bya ste/ yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mdu chen po mnga' ba thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'
438b6(rgyud): chags bde bdag la dgongasu gsol// dang bdag sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro chen po bgyis te lus dbu'o// phyogs bcu
438b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams ma/ ji srid rgyan dang yo byad bzang po thams cad rin po che'i gzhal med khang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rin po che'i rgyan bde dang / rin po che'i shing dang / 
438b8(rgyud): rin po che'i ri dang / rin po che'i ba dan dang / rin po che'i dkyil 'khor dang / rin po che'i dbyig rnam par bkram pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / 
439a1(rgyud): rin po che'i do shal gyi rgyan dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i snod dang / rin po che'i phung po dang / rin pa che'i 'od 'phro ba dang / rin po che'i gling dgun no
439a2(rgyud): bu ring po chen po rnam par dag pa'i mar me'i sdong bu dang / rin po che'i dril bus sgra 'khrol ba/ gser btso ma'i spar khab can gyi ngom ngom po long sbyangs pas yongasu
439a3(rgyud): khebs pa/ gser btso mo'i me tog 'dzam bu'i gser gyi ze ba can/ gser gyi shing ljon pas bkris pa/ gser gyi pho brang sna tshogs rin po che'i sprir chags pa/ rin
439a4(rgyud): po che'i thigs pa char du 'bab pa ring po che'i rnam pa mang po'i mdzod kyi pho brang lha rdzas kyi nor bus rtsigs ngos spras pa/ rin po che'i shing thams cad rigs 'dzin
439a5(rgyud): bskrad mos tshal gyi ra ba yid du 'ong ba/ rin po che'i pho brang dang / gnas dang / shing dang / nags tshal la sogs pa tha/ mas cad kyang yid du 'ong ba de lta bu bdag med
439a6(rgyud): ba 'dzin pa med pa thams cad/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub senga'i thams cad la yongasu bsngo zhing 'bulo// 'dzam+bu'i gling na sman bzang po ring du 'tsho bar byed pa la sogs
439a7(rgyud): nga'i rnam pa ji snyed yod pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongasu bskong ba dang / ma g.yos par rang bzhin gyi bda' ba'i zhal zas bzang po dang / smras
439a8(rgyud): kyi shing ljon pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / tsan+da gyi shing dang / a ga ru dang / tsan+da dmar po dang / lo ma che zhing me tog rtag par bzung gis gzi bar byed pa'i shing rnam
439b1(rgyud): ba sna tshogs pa dang / yid du 'ong ba'i lha rdzas kyi spos yongasu ma bzung ba/ yongasu bzung ba med pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rgya mtsho'i chen po'i rang nas
439b2(rgyud): byung ba ror bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la sogs pa dang / ri rirab lhun po dang / ri ti se dang / spos kyi ri dang / ri mo la ya dang / ri ba dang bzung
439b3(rgyud): dang / ri ma hal dang / rdo rje'i ro la sogs te/ rin po che'i rnam pa de dag gi rin po che'i zom sna tshogs dang / rin po che'i sngags dang / rdo ba rin po che dang / rin po che'i phug
439b4(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i pho brang dang / rin po che'i rgyan dang / ring po che'i zhogs ma dang / rin po che'i lam srang mang po dang / nor bu ra na po che'i lam srang mang po dang / nor bu rin
439b5(rgyud): po che'i ka ba mang po dang / rin po che'i sgron ma'i 'khor lo mang po dang / bai DUR+Ya la sogs te nor bu'i rigs rnam pa mang po dang / ji tsam du lha'i gnas na 'a
439b6(rgyud): po med pa'i pho brang dang / lha'i nor rnam pa mang po yid du 'ong zhing blta bar mos pa dang / lha'i rol mo'i yo byad rnam pa mang po rlung gi ngad kyis bskyod pa tsam gyis sgra snyan pa
439b7(rgyud): 'byin pa dang / ra mkha' gnas kyi pho brang gnas rol mo'i sgra 'byin pa dang / lha'i rol mo rnam pa mang po mi bskyod par smra snyan pa rang 'byin pa dang / lha'i yo byad sna tshogs ma
439b8(rgyud): mkha'i gnas kyi pho brang nas sbar pa'i sgra sna tshogs 'byir pa dang / rin po che'i sprin sna tshogs las snyan po'i sgra 'byung ba dang / lha'i nor bu rin po che dbangs snyan pa
440a1(rgyud): 'byin pa dang / gzhan yang lha'i dri shing dang / me tog gi shing mang po dang / phreng ba'i shing dang / byug pa mang po dang / bdug pa'i spos kyi shing dang / smon
440a2(rgyud): ma'i shing dang / rgyal mtshan gyi shing dang / ba dan gyi shing dang / rin po che'i shing la sogs pa de dag ba ma bzung ba yongasu bzung ba med pa/ de dag thaMd kyang / sangs rgyas
440a3(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dbulo// ji tsam du nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan gyis gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ mchod pa'i sprin
440a4(rgyud): chen po me tog gi sprin dang / spos kyi sprin dang / phreng ba'i spring dang / bdug spos kyi sprin dang / byug spos kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin dang / rin po
440a5(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dang / rin po che'i bdang gyi sprin dang / rin po che'i gos kyi sprin dang / rin po che'i rnam pa'i sprin dang / rin po che'i phung po'i sprin la sogs
440a6(rgyud): ta/ rin po che'i sprin rnam pa de dag dang / gzhan yang spos kyi 'bru mar gyis mar me'i snong chen po bkang ba/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi tshang dang mnyam pa/ mar mo'i snying po ri
440a7(rgyud): rab kyi tshad tsam bsgon par byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thang dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rngams la mchod cing 'bu lo// de bzhin du mchod
440a8(rgyud): ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa'i bsod nams dam pa ji tsam pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// gang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bac+doMs
440b1(rgyud): / rnams kyis dge ba mang po brtsams te/ dmigasu med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang bsod nams de dag bang bla na med pa'i byang
440b2(rgyud): chub tu yongasu bsngo'o// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po ni bskor/ bdud
440b3(rgyud): kyi sde rnams ni pham par byas nas/ mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs par dgongs pa la/ sems can pad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir bskal pa chen po gcig tshang
440b4(rgyud): bar bzhugs par gsol zhes gsol ba btago// sangs rgyas dang byang chub se 'a thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyis bsod nams ci bsgrubs pa
440b5(rgyud): de dag bde la rje su yi ngo // dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub senga' bams cad kyis// sdig pa dang mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrub pa
440b6(rgyud): thams cad bshags pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang las kyi sgrib pa bshags shing yongasu sbyong ngo // de bzhin du mchod pa dang / bshags pa la sogs pa byas
440b7(rgyud): nas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thang mngon sum du dmigs pa'i spyan sngar/ gsang sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzla so// // oM se b+ha ra saM b+ha ra bi ma na
440b8(rgyud): sa ra ma hA dza ba hUM/ gang gas pa sngags de bzlas pas/ ci dang ci 'dod pa de thams cad 'grub cing / lha'i mching po'i sprin chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thang
441a1(rgyud): mngon sum du 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing nyid mo yang rung mtshan mo yang rung yongasu
441a2(rgyud): bsngo ba'i 'khor lo chen po 'di klog cing 'don na de'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'byung zhing / nyon mongs pa thams cad khad kyis sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi
441a3(rgyud): tshogs snga ma de dag thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// lan cig bklags pa tsam gyis kyang / tshangs pa brgya'i dpal dang ldan zhing / rmi lam na yang rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong bar
441a4(rgyud): 'gyuraro// tshe 'das nas kyang yongasu dag pa ba zhing du skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces pa// 'astsal ras/ byang chub se 'i tshogs mang po de dag bang / 
441a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod ngo // yongasu bsngo ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogaso// // li'i dge slong sde snod gsu
441a6(rgyud): dang ldan pa shI la d+harmas/ rgya gar gyi d+harma rgya'i yi ge las/ ban+d+ha rnam par mi rtog gis bsgyur ba'o// @#/ rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsa ta thA ga ta ma ga la gA hA
441a7(rgyud): bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshigasu bcad pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshalo// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes dam pa mtsho chen ldan// zla ba
441a8(rgyud): nya 'dra'i sku mnga' srid pa'i mthar phyin pa// dgongs pa mnga' dag rdzogs pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ mi 'khrugs rgyal
441b1(rgyud): po sring dang gti mug rnam sbyong ba// mgon po yon+ta thams cad rdzogs pas bkra shis pa// dge mnyam bsam sems ldan pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis ngas ni sku
441b2(rgyud): dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ sangs rgyas yon tan kun gyi rgyan gyis brgyan mdzad cing // yang dag bden pa'i 'byor pa sbyin mdzad mi slu ba// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bya'i gra/ 
441b3(rgyud): shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu'i rnams la zhi byed shog/ bsam gtan ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa pha rol phyin pa'i gnas// ye shes pad+ma'i steng bzhugs dpag
441b4(rgyud): med tshe ldan zhing // cha grangs med par byin gyis rlob pa'i bkra shis gang yin pa// bkra shis des ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog/ ser don gyi las la thugs ni sbyor mdzad kyi
441b5(rgyud): 'gro ba kun gyi 'ching bas bcings las grol mdzad pa// thub mchog dor yod grub pa'i bkra shis gang / yin pa// bkra shis nges ni skye dgu rnams la zhi byed shog
441b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i bkra shis tshig su bcad pa rdzog so// // rgya gar skad du/ ran+ta tri swa s+t+ri gA bA/ bod skad du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi
441b7(rgyud): tshigasu bcad ba/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tsha lo// che ba'i tshe mchog ston mchog bla na med// chos rje nyi ma rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyis// bdud dang bgegs rigs gnod pa'i
441b8(rgyud): ngag zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ chos nyid dben pa'i chos mchog bla na mang // dam chod bdud rtsi bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ nyes pa'i skyon 'bral dag
442a1(rgyud): tshogs rnam 'phel ba// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bkra shis shog/ dge 'dun yon+ta rin chen dpal 'bar ba// 
442a2(rgyud): rgyal sras phan mdzad bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis// nyon mongs sdug bsngal gdung ba'i ngag zhi ste// rtag tu dpal gnas nyin mtshan bka shis
442a3(rgyud): shog/ tshangs dang lha dbang bsrungs ma'i byin rlabs kyis// phan mjed lha yi bkra shis gnas gyur te// bde lags bsam pa yid bzhin du/ 
442a4(rgyud): pa dang // tshe rings nad med bde skyeng ldan par shog/ dkon mchog gsum gyi bkra shis kyi tshig su bcad pa/ bcom ldan pa/ 
442a5(rgyud): kyis khyim bdag nges pa la gsungs pa rdzog s+ho// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu cha na gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sngas
442a6(rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / oM ya~M d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA ne dun+da ShAn+ta Sh+Tha ba da / ta'achu mo no ro b+ha e waM wA dwe mA hA bram Na/ 
442a7(rgyud): /  sa 'tshugs pa'i mam na 'ad ga lags grus/ sarba mat+pa laM//
